story:
Vudy briefcases

We just started manufacturing wooden briefcases and need your help to expand and sell briefcases worldwide. This campaign goal is to raise money for new workshop tools to create new design briefcases. Each briefcase is handcrafted and currently we have 2 models:

Fat: dimensions 38cm x 25cm x 7.5cm

Slim :dimensions 38cm x 25cm x 5.5cm

we also can make this suitcase in other dimensions especially for you. So, you can order a suitcase which will fit your laptop, iPad, portfolio or any other item.  Make a brilliant impression of yourself!

Free worldwide shipping

 

Unisex wooden briefcases

 

Handmade ash wood suitcase with high quality nickel finish furniture.

 

Mini Briefcase for your business cards

Size: 7.5cmx 12cmx 3.5cm

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the news about the campaign. Even if it is posting the link on your social media accounts. Anything to help spread the love and the project is much appreciated!

 For any questions: renars@vudy.lv

story:
Our Story

Mission

As the market continues to become saturated with overly complex, cluttered designs, Creatistic’s mission is to provide high-quality products with creative, fresh graphics.

Creatistic is the labor of one Charles Thomas, started nearly ten years ago. Creatistic started off as just a design label and has now evolved into a brand well on its way to the stars. Creatistic has become an intricate logo design for an urban clothing line including shirts, hoodies, and jackets. The essential goal of Creatistic is to capture the eye of the urban market and show people that there is more to the clothing than just a design. It’s a state of mind, a conquest to unleash one’s own creativity; inspiration. Creatistic is a brand that Charles holds near to his heart because to me it’s become more than just an idea; it’s become a lifestyle.

WHAT WE NEED

We need money to make this happen, plain and simple! All of the money raised will be put towards printing and producing  our "The Code Summer Collection". We have about 5-6 designs already including new guys shirts, girls shirts, hoodies and pins. This will allow us to be able to print the designs we have come up with and have our project grow! The money will also go to keeping our website up and being able to come out with new videos and photoshoots at the beginning of our spring collection. We would like to be able to contact different stores and travel to clothing shops to present our ideas to them, this will give us that shot to do just that. You will be a part of something that is actually happening, and we will document every part of it!

To me, $5000 is a extremely good number to get a clothing line out there. I believe with hard work and a Creatistic attitude, you can start any business with that amount. For Creatistic Apparel, this is what it means:

1. $2000 for the opening shirt order which will produce enough units to make and manage production

2. $1000 for more fabric to produce more units as they sell

3. $700 for help of wholesales garments

4. $500 for great photo shoot and a catalog for all my collateral materials

5. $300.00 for web development and advertisement

Every contributer will have there name posted on my blog and store.

Other Ways You Can Help

I have a facebook fan page for this clothing line it is under "Creatistic Codel" and an online store as well so you can get a feel and understanding of what this clothing line is about. If you could please visit the fan page and "like" and share it with your friends it would greatly help.

 

THANK YOU FOR READING AND FOR YOUR TIME


Check out the twitter, and facebook page. 

http://www.facebook.com/pages/CODE/158212790896304

http://www.twitter.com/ImSoCode

story:
ENGLISH VERSION

Louison Grajcar is a classically-trained perfumer creating original fragrances in his independent laboratory in Paris.

He launched his brand TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE in 2010.

100% made in France in the Haute Parfumerie tradition.

"Upon finishing the Beaux-Arts" in Antwerp majoring in couture, Louison started a perfume school in Paris and the "European School of Herbalists" in Brussels.

After graduating he went to work at Charabot where he learned perfume composition with a master of perfumery.

His first perfumes were created in his kitchen. Influenced by his travels, the places he used to live and where he currently resides, his perfumes are the embodiment of his emotions.

--------------------------------------

Today the brand has 14 Eaux de Parfum, 4  Extraits d'Emotion, 4 Eaux de Cologne, candles, soaps and sometimes teas, all unique and original, with an olfactory signature recognizable in each of its creations.

• Eaux de Parfum: 

Indiscrete, Veloutine, Paname Paname, Plaisir d’Amour, Santa Subita, Safran Nobile, Delivre Moi, My burning Secret, Monarchy, Sainte Extase, Eau de Bruxelles, Eau d'Anvers, Carmel Snow

• Extrait d'Emotions:

Figure Libre, Fleur de Papier, Centenaire, Forever Amber

• Eaux de Cologne:

Lavander, Neroli, Cedrat, Tilleul

 

 

 

TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE is also a commitment to quality, authenticity, know-how.

The brand is distributed mainly in niche perfume apothecaries, concept-stores and multi-label boutiques In Europe.

 

 

Today, after 7 years of existence, TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE needs your help to develop this project and give it a more international dimension.

Our objective with this Indiegogo application is to finance our participation in a trade show, which would open up new markets (USA, Canada, Middle East, Asia, Russia),  and increase our visibility.

We would like to take part at the Pitti Fragranze which will take place in Firenze (Italy) in September 2017. It is one of the biggest fair in the world, and especially the first in Europe. It brings together the largest number of professionals in the sector.

 

How much does it cost ?

Taking part in a trade show costs approximately 7000 €, this includes:

- The stand

- Decoration and display of the stand

- Travel and accommodations

- Catalogs and visit cards printing, gift bags, samples, etc ...

 

 

We need you!

Let's meet this challenge together!

If we achieve this goal, TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE will be able to be present at this show.

If the target is exceeded, we will use this more to buy new raw materials and packaging.

 

 

Compensations

We have chosen very nice and unique compensations for you, to discover in the right column. They were thought to make everyone happy!

The complete range of TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE is there, everyone will find their happiness there, with special discounts.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing this campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother our expansion will go. We appreciate all contributions at this crucial stage in our development.

 

Thank you for your time and support.

TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE team

 

Find us:

www.techniqueindiscrete.com

www.instagram.com/techniqueindiscrete

www.facebook.com/techniqueindiscrete

 

If you need any help, don't hesitate to contact us:

contact@techniqueindiscrete.com

 

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

 

VERSION FRANÇAISE

Louison Grajcar est un un créateur de parfums  avec une empreinte originale, tous composés dans son laboratoire parisien.

Il a lancé sa marque TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE en 2010,

100% ''made in France'' dans la pure tradition de la Haute Parfumerie.

Après ses études aux Beaux-Arts d'Anvers section couture, Louison a intégré une école de Parfumerie à Paris puis "The European School of Herbalists" à Bruxelles. Son diplôme obtenu avec succès, il est parti se perfectionner avec un maitre parfumeur chez Charabot.

Ses premiers parfums ont été élaborés dans sa cuisine. Influencé par ses voyages, les lieux où il a vécu, ses parfums sont le reflet de ses émotions.

-------------------------------------------
Aujourd'hui la marque compte 14 eaux de parfum, 4 Extraits d'Emotions, 3 Eaux de Cologne, des bougies, des savons et parfois des thés, tous uniques et originaux, avec une signature olfactive reconnaissable dans chacune de ses créations.

• Eaux de Parfum:

Indiscrete, Veloutine, Paname Paname, Plaisir d’Amour, Santa Subita, Safran Nobile, Delivre Moi, My burning Secret, Monarchy, Sainte Extase, Eau de Bruxelles, Eau d'Anvers, Carmel Snow

• Extraits d'Emotions:

Figure Libre, Fleur de Papier, Centenaire, Forever Amber

• Eaux de Cologne:

Lavande, Neroli, Cedrat, Tilleul

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE c'est aussi un engagement sur la qualité, l'authenticité, un savoir-faire.

Ses créations sont déjà disponibles dans plusieurs parfumeries de niche, concept-stores et multimarques en Europe.


Aujourd'hui, après 7 ans d'existence, TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE a besoin de votre aide pour faire évoluer ce projet, passer à la vitesse supérieure afin de lui donner une dimension plus internationale.

L'objectif de notre demande via la plateforme Indiegogo est de financer la participation à un salon professionnel, ce qui nous permettrait de s'ouvrir à de nouveaux marchés (USA, Canada, Moyen-Orient, Aste, Russie) et d'accroitre ainsi notre visibilité.

Le salon que nous avons choisi est le Pitti Fragranze qui se déroulera à Florence (Italie) en septembre 2017. Il s'agit d'un des plus grands salon au monde, et surtout le premier en Europe. Il rassemble le plus grand nombre de professionnels du secteur. 


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Combien ça coute ?

Participer à un salon coute environ 7000 €, cela inclut:

- La location du stand

- La décoration du stand

- Les frais de transport et le logement

- L'impression des catalogues, cartes de visites, la production des tote bags et des échantillons de parfums, etc …


Nous avons besoin de vous !

Relevons ce défi ensemble !

Si nous atteignons cet objectif, TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE pourra être présent sur ce salon.

Si l'objectif est dépassé, nous pourrons utiliser ce 'plus' pour acheter de nouvelles matières premières pour créér des parfumsn ainsi que du packaging.


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Les contreparties

Nous avons choisi de très belles contreparties, uniques, à découvrir dans la colonne de droite. Elles ont été pensé pour que tout le monde soit heureux.

La gamme complète TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE est présente, chacun pourra y trouver son bonheur, avec de belles remises mises en place spécialement pour ce crowdfunding..

Au-delà de la contribution monétaire, vous pouvez aussi nous aider en partageant cette campagne avec tous vos amis et votre famille. Allez-y et publiez l'URL de la campagne sur Facebook, Twitter et toutes les autres plateformes de réseaux sociaux que vous utilisez. Plus les gens seront conscients de ce que nous faisons, plus notre développement pourra se mettre en place. Nous apprécions toutes sortes de contributions à cette étape cruciale de notre développement.


Merci beaucoup pour votre temps et votre aide !

L'équipe TECHNIQUE INDISCRETE

 

Retrouvez-nous :

www.techniqueindiscrete.com

www.instagram.com/techniqueindiscrete

www.facebook.com/techniqueindiscrete

 

Si vous avez besoin d'aide, si vous avez des questions, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter, nous serons ravis de vous répondre :

contact@techniqueindiscrete.com

story:
[Media releases]

Tenuis 1: (Previous version)
http://www.lifehacker.jp/2016/02/160225lht_solahanp_wallet.html
http://news.livedoor.com/article/detail/11221038

 

[About us]

In Japanese, Sola (空) means ‘sky,’ and Hanpu (帆布) means ‘canvas.’

Solahanpu is a Japanese design studio that designs and produces,
bags, wallets, accessories, and other items. Our products are created
using superior quality canvas that is coated with a special
paraffin wax that creates a leather-like texture.

The concept of Minimalism has been a great influence on our work,
and we specialize in extremely minimalistic items. We believe in
pragmatic and beautiful products, and our aim is to design and
create goods that feature a practical shape and structure.
We hope to share our vision with like-minded people.

 

[Backstory]

When I was traveling the world, instead of having to carry various
specialized pouches, I longed to have just a slim, thin wallet
that I could carry everywhere and that could also hold my passport.

As time passed, and not having found a satisfactory product made by
any other company, in 2009 I began planning to produce the wallet by myself.
After seven years of designing, stencil making, cutting, sewing and so on,
and following the production of many generations of prototypes,
we can now proudly offer the “Tenuis2 ”.

6 colors. Red Blue Green Yellow Black Beige.

 

[Features]

  • 3 slots, for a maximum of 9 cards
  • No buttons or zippers
  • Coin case (1.4 times larger than the original model)
  • Double layered bill pockets
  • Triangle lid pocket for small objects such as keys
  • 6 colors variations.

[Specifications]

Materials: Canvas, Plastic
 Coating: Paraffin Wax
Measurements: Width-94mm; Height-104mm; Thickness-6mm
Storage: Cards; Bills; Coins; Keys

Stylish and thin slim body coated with paraffin wax.

 

A rubber band keeps your coin case safe.

 

Despite its 6mm thin body, it does not influence on functionalities,
even easier to use.

 

You can put keys behind bill pocket, safety, secret.

 

Each of 3 card slots can contain 3cards, for a maximum of 9 cards

 

[Colors]

 

Yellow

Red    

Beige

Black 

Blue    

Green 


 

 

 

 

[Tenuis 1]

story:
Short Summary

 p29:18 is a collection of outerwear for fashion-forward, driven, social butterflies who just happen to be plus size.  p29:18 is built on a commitment to fashion and respect of the consumer and community.

New designers have a catch 22 to overcome. Buyers from boutiques and department stores don't want  to invest in companies who don't have a proven track record. In short, you can't sell to them unless you have sold to someone else.  p29:18 wants to prove that this market is hungry for new designers and great design. Purchasing a coat through  our Indiegogo campaign will help p29:18 take our coats off the internet and bring them to local boutiques in your city,

What We Need & What You Get

 We are looking to sell 300 pre-ordered coats from the spring 2016 collection.  Not only will those pre-orders allow us to attend trades shows this year to expand the brand, we will have 300 happy customers to show as examples of consumer interest to buyers.    Check out our gorgeous styles! Available in sizes 14-22 Which one is best for you?



The Impact

Young professional plus sized women are no longer accepting the small and matronly sections of popular department stores. Also more turbulent seasonal weather is driving the demand for good outwear. p29:18 is looking to fill this hole in the market. By pre-ordering a coat, you are communicating to the buyers, stylist, editors and boutique owners that you want beautiful plus size clothing in your city.


Risks & Challenges

p29:18 coats will manufactured in the US based on orders received to reduce financial and environmental waste. The challenge of this philosophy means that with no backstock on hand there will be some wait time involved after your purchase.  Also working with other suppliers and manufacturers does open up the possibility for delays. A fully funded campaign will be shipped sooner than if we don't meet our goal, BUT IF YOU A BUY A COAT YOU WILL RECEIVE A COAT OR BE FULLY REFUNDED.

All throughout the campaign and the production, we will be very happy to keep you frequently updated.

Expected delivery is between March and April.

Please understand that what you are seeing are prototypes, so you can expect the final product to be more refined.

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you have a friend or loved one who would love a p29:18 coat? Share our campaign! We would also love to connect with you on Facebook (p29:18) and Instagram (@p2918)
story_txt:
Short Summary

 p29:18 is a collection of 
outerwear for  fashion-forward, driven, social butterflies who just
happen to be plus size.  p29:18
is built on a commitment to fashion and respect of the consumer and
community.
New designers have a catch 22 to overcome. Buyers from boutiques and department stores don't want  to invest in companies who don't have a proven track record. In short, you can't sell to them unless you have sold to someone else.  p29:18 wants to prove that this market is hungry for new designers and great design. Purchasing a coat through  our Indiegogo campaign will help p29:18 take our coats off the internet and bring them to local boutiques in your city,   What We Need & What You Get
 
 We are looking to sell 300 pre-ordered coats from the spring 2016 collection.  Not only will those pre-orders allow us to attend trades shows this year to expand the brand, we will have 300 happy customers to show as examples of consumer interest to buyers.    Check out our gorgeous styles! story:
Introducing the Action Jacket.

A first of its kind, limited edition, running, hiking, outdoor, do-anything jacket.

What started as a collaboration between a former Army Ranger, and an award winning outdoor apparel designer, Roxanne Weippert, was fine tuned with the help of 2,800 awesome people who improved the design to make the Action Jacket what it is today.

Limited Edition:  The Action Jacket is a 100% passion project.  We wanted it to exist, so hopefully the Kickstarter universe will make that happen.... but....we're only planning on one production run, so get it while you can!!

 As seen on video:  Adventure Tested by the JUMPER Fam.

 

 

Secure Your Mobile Device and Go Anywhere: A Super packable design that protects you from the elements and secures your mobile device with a patent pending feature.

 

 

 

Our goal was to build a 3-season jacket that is so light, breathable and comfortable, it will become your everyday jacket from the office to your adventure.    

The technical design, size spec and stretch fabric all work together to offer complete freedom of movement for the most demanding activities. The adjustable contoured hood, drop tail hem and cuffs are all designed for added weather protection. If you adventure in the night, we have you covered with 360 degree reflective protection.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Action Jacket uses EVERTEK’S Ever Light Shell, a rugged and highly breathable fabric from Everest Textiles. 

EVERTEK’S stretch-woven 90 gsm softshell is matched with Dupoint Teflon’s Shield DWR, repelling water, wind and stains. This fabric combines a rugged nylon for a highly abrasion resistant layer, with spandex for stretch. The technical design, size spec and stretch fabric all work together to offer complete freedom of movement for the most demanding activities.

 

 

Introducing the 1-505 Socks.  From your office to your adventure; we've made these socks to look like your dress socks but to perform like a best-in-class running sock.  We've added mesh venting, heal and toe padding, arch compression, and ankle support along with a premium nylon blend feel. 

Daniel and Andy both know what it means to rely on good gear.  Daniel, a former paratrooper and Army Ranger, and Andy a technical apparel entrepreneur launched JUMPER at the end of 2015 with the aim to innovate everyday basics that can transition from the office to their adventures. JUMPER started with an everyday base layer undershirt, and then followed up with their next product, the JUMP PANTS, that launched on Kickstarter in September 2016.

story:
Proudly Made in Colombia

          Version Française        Versión Español


The instant press-on manicure designed for function & styled for fashion.

Inspired by the latest international fashion catwalks, the look and class of each nail is enhanced by using authentic Swarovski crystals, gently applied by hand - an artistic and meticulous work - turning your nails into more than just a manicure but a true piece of fashion.

Glamour diamanté is a chic & classy set of instant press-on manicure with light blue nails & golden circles. The central crystals highlight the artistic design to offer a brand new and fresh style.

                                    

                                             

Élégance rosée is a stylish set of white nails instant press-on manicure with pinky triangles. The crystal adds a dynamic source of inspiration for a creative result.

                                  

                                               

Délicatesse soyeuse is a chic & classy set of black nails instant press-on manicure with purple details. Those colors remind the softness of the season with a bright touch thanks to the central rock.

                                  For more consult our gallery

Welcome,

We are Jean and Jérémie, two french entrepreneurs based in Colombia, aficionados of style and willing to create positive impacts within the Fashion industry. 

Throughout Divine, we have for aspiration to conceive and produce premium quality & natural looking designs that turn your nails into more than just a manicure but a true piece of limited fashion.

But Divine is not all about design, it is also about functionality, caring about your health, and most importantly, adapted to busy lifestyle.

Today, we are very proud to introduce you the luxury press-on manicure encrusted with Swarovski crystals. 

For the last couple of months, we've been working hard on Divine to create our first collection of luxury press-on manicure.

We have built a very talented team of professionals, reviewed dozens of potentials providers, tried different materials and manufacturing process in order to pick the best collaborators for this project.

The samples, packaging, prototypes, Swarovski crystals and long months of R&D costed us a lot of money in order to bring Divine to perfection.

Today, our manufacturers and professional manicurists team are 100% line-up and ready to go.

We need your help to raise $20 000 and meet the minimum requirements to start producing the first collection.

                                   Get involved and let's make Divine a reality together.

80% - Production

With your contribution, we will be able to gather all the needed elements to start producing : Swarovski crystals, nail tips and packagings. After more than 6 months of conceptualizing, designing and manufacturing prototypes, we are ready to move forward!

8% - Working team

Then, part of your donation will go straight to our talented graphic designer and professional manicurists team that have been working hard during the past few months in order to bring you Divine.

5% - New office

We’ll rent a local to give Divine the proper atmosphere and space it needs to keep designing and producing the best of luxury press-on manicure.

7% -  Taxes & Fees

Of course, we will also have to pay additional taxes and fees for running this campaign.

Let's start with some surprises...

By backing us today, and exclusively on indiegogo, receive a limited edition glass nail file encrusted with Swarovski crystals. As well as... international shipping !

Bonus: By contributing, gain access to our contest and get a chance to run Divine's team for a day & customize a very unique set of press-on manicure encrusted with Swarovski crystals.

You can consult all our perks on the right column of this page.                              

                                                      Get them now !

                                           


Back our campaign!
By backing us, you're telling us that our idea is a good one - good enough to put your hard-earned money behind it. When we meet our goal, we'll be able to speed up the manufacturing process.

Share our campaign!
The only way we'll reach our goal is if the word gets out about it. It may seem like an insignificant thing, but sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn and all of the other awesome spots on the web, is priceless to us.


Divine is born from the following observations:

                                                          Women are busy !

An increasing majority of women are engaged in multiple roles of wife, mother, care taker, employee or entrepreneur; each requiring deep commitment.

                        Women are busy, but still have a strong desire to look good !

Looking good is not just about the appearance of one’s face. Nails represent a major aspect of our overall look and beauty, playing an equally important part as the hair, makeup & wardrobe looks.

Nails and fashion are a dynamic duo and the once-unassuming manicure has become the most conspicuous fashion accessory.

                      Products available are poorly executed & designs are boring !

Innovation & creativity as our motto, we took the step-up to offer more than just drug-store press-on manicures.

                                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Divine embodies French elegance, audacity and glamour. Divine stands for the conviction that beauty and function are complementary. With exceptional materials and overflowing imagination of our designers, we create our DNA. 

Designs express a marked personality and a sophisticated lifestyle. Moreover, we use the most precious rocks of Swarovski to captivate the power of elegance with simplicity and demand, our key words. The packaging, innovative and stylish, highlight the magic of the colors associated to the brightness of the crystals.

Our brand identifies itself like a pioneer within the Colombian beauty industry. It differentiates itself by its limited and exclusive collections. Pleasant and efficient at the time, Divine’s nails act in perfect harmony with the hand and enrich the visual aspect, but looking natural.

The woman Divine is full of life, glad, confident, universal and radiant. She finds her tendencies within the ultimate international Fashion catwalks. She gets inspiration from Paris, artistic effervescence symbol and place of creation & expression.

                                                                                      Drop me a line! 

                                                                                         Let's connect! 

                                                                                          Send me some love!    

Even if we are launching the business, we work with more than 20 year experimented providers. Plus, we are already very familiar with business management and we paid for all the expenses regarding R&D, certificates & prototypes needed.

But we understand that even with all of this, the risk cannot be totally erased.

Time is our biggest opponent. In the best situation, we will be able to provide you with the collection within 8 weeks after we receive the crowdfunding budget. In a pessimistic case, we will need 1 to 2 more week(s).

Because we are a start-up, we are not capable of competing with $1 nail produced in huge quantity. Nevertheless, what we lose in price competition, we gain it in quality control, flexibility and making sure you get the best product we've found on the market. 

And believe us, we tried them all !

If I want to contribute, what do I do ?

There have been a lot of questions on this, so here we go ! Start by clicking on the actual perk you want on the right-hand side, one that looks like this:

                                                    

Once you click on it/roll mouse over it, the image will get shaded, which means you can click your mouse and select it.

OR - you can click the Red button "Contribute Now" at the top right of the project's main page that looks like this:

                                              

And once you click on this, you will be led to another page. A page that looks like this one below. Once there, you'll need to scroll to find your reward.

                             

You can then pay with Paypal or by credit card, ensuring you give us the correct shipping address. 

                                               

Once approved, you will get an automatic email from indiegogo confirming your purchase.

Is Indiegogo safe and secure for my payment?

Yes, Indiegogo is safe and secure. Click here for more information.

I am an international backer, do I have to pay for shipping ?

No you don’t ! It's included :)

Which countries do you ship to?

We ship to more than 220 countries worldwide. If you are unsure that we ship to your country, please contact Jean at jean.diaz@unica-colombia.com and he will confirm.

How can I participate to the referral contest ?

Click here to learn more about our Indiegogo referral contest.

What would happen if you don’t reach your financial goal ?

We chose the « Flexible Funding » option. This means that even if we don’t completely reach our $20 000 financial goal, we will keep the money to produce. Therefore, the collection will be reduced to less designs to start. But don’t worry, this will allow us to invest our profits again afterwards. Let’s say that the process will be longer if we don’t reach our target within the assigned time.

When will I receive my perks ?

Our manufacturing partners are standing by and excited to start producing Divine. Our manicurists are also ready to apply the Swarovski crystals onto the nails. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work. Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have Divine delivered to you within 3 months after the end of the campaign.

A team of 50 employees will inspect your set and polish it to make sure it is in the best possible condition before mailing.

Our packing specialist from Colombia will light a candle and a hush will fall over the crowd as he put your press-on into the finest gold-lined box that money can buy.

We will all have a wonderful celebration and the whole party will march down the street to the post office where the entire town of Bogotá will wave “Bon Voyage!” to your package, on its way to you, in our private Divine jet ;)

How do I choose the designs I want ?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can choose your designs.

What makes Swarovski crystals so special?

The method of production and processing of raw resources are important factors in the quality of finished crystals. Swarovski uses only the finest materials to fashion faceted lead glass that is known around the world for its brilliance and value. Superior production, materials, cutting, and polishing are what set Swarovski Crystals apart from other glass works.

I’ve tried press-ons before and I am not sold. They look cheap and the application process is a pain, etc.

That’s because most nail companies are just selling you acrylic nails. We’re different. Our nails are made from high quality tips and provided with non-agressive adhesives (not glue!). Once you apply them, it really looks like natural nails. And it dries instantly. Plus, you can reuse them & keep them safe in their protector box. 

My nails are very short, round, long, etc. How do I know these will fit me ?

In each set, you will find your size among the 24 different units, for any type of nail you may have.

How do I apply these nails ?

It’s easy! Just find your right fit in the box, apply the adhesives, press the nail on it et voilà!

What do I do if I don’t want to take them off because they’re so comfortable and beautiful?

Don’t panic, you’re not alone and no one will judge you. The only answer to your question is to make sure you applied them correctly as instructed to enjoy the most of your press-on manicure.

What do I do if throngs of people follow me and try to steal my press-on manicure?

Not surprising. We’ve seen it happen.The only solution here is to make sure these people have their own set. Divine are inexpensive and classy enough to make for pretty excellent gifts. Remember, they’re cheaper and last a whole longer than flowers or a chocolate box.

If my question isn’t answered, how do I ask ?

Just email Jean - jean.diaz@unica-colombia.com 


                                           www.unica-colombia.com

Our packing specialist from Colombia will light a candle and a hush will fall over the crowd as he put your press-on into the finest gold-lined box that money can buy.
We will all have a wonderful celebration and the whole party will march down the street to the post office where the entire town of Bogotá will wave “Bon Voyage!” to your package, on its way to you, in our private Divine jet ;)


How do I choose the designs I want ?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a link to a page with a form to fill out where you can choose your designs.What makes Swarovski crystals so special?The method of production and processing of raw resources are important factors in the quality of finished crystals. Swarovski uses only the finest materials to fashion faceted lead glass that is known around the world for its brilliance and value. Superior production, materials, cutting, and polishing are what set Swarovski Crystals apart from other glass works.

I’ve tried press-ons before and I am not sold. They look cheap and the application process is a pain, etc.

That’s because most nail companies are just selling you acrylic nails. We’re different. Our nails are made from high quality tips and provided with non-agressive adhesives (not glue!). Once you apply them, it really looks like natural nails. And it dries instantly. Plus, you can reuse them & keep them safe in their protector box. 

My nails are very short, round, long, etc. How do I know these will fit me ?

In each set, you will find your size among the 24 different units, for any type of nail you may have.

How do I apply these nails ?

It’s easy! Just find your right fit in the box, apply the adhesives, press the nail on it et voilà!

What do I do if I don’t want to take them off because they’re so comfortable and beautiful?

Don’t panic, you’re not alone and no one will judge you. The only answer to your question is to make sure you applied them correctly as instructed to enjoy the most of your press-on manicure.

What do I do if throngs of people follow me and try to steal my press-on manicure?

Not surprising. We’ve seen it happen.The only solution here is to make sure these people have their own set. Divine are inexpensive and classy enough to make for pretty excellent gifts. Remember, they’re cheaper and last a whole longer than flowers or a chocolate box.If my question isn’t answered, how do I ask ?Just email Jean - jean.diaz@unica-colombia.com 




                                           www.unica-colombia.com

story:
Campaign Summary

ManStyled was founded on the premise that every man deserves to look his best and have access to a stylist. Let's face it, most men don't really enjoy shopping or have the time for it. Many men don't even have a clue what to buy or how to assemble an outfit, let alone a wardrobe. That's where ManStyled comes in. We do all the work for you and you just look good!


 Campaign facts:

  • Founded by a personal stylist with over a decade of experience in customer service and retail.
  • This campaign was created to help fund a passion project and a dream that will allow me to break free of the corporate grind and do what I was meant to do.
  • It's true that there are similar services already in the market. We're not trying to invent the wheel, we're just trying to do it better.

Your support means the world to me and I hope you will consider supporting my project.

What We Need & What You Get

Campaign specifics:

  • We are seeking $12,000 to purchase initial inventory, packaging materials, storage and handle some initial marketing expenses. The website is currently being built and is expected to launch shortly after this campaign ends.
  • The service that ManStyled.com provides is a free personal stylist and hand-selected clothing. Our customers only pay for the clothing they keep.
  • The perks for your support will include free clothes! You get a membership which pairs you with a personal stylist and you gain full access to all of our services. Your support earns you anywhere from 1 free garment to a whole wardrobe! 
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will still use the money for what it was originally intended. If we exceed our goal significantly, we will develop a smartphone app to improve customer service and accessibility.

The Impact

Your contribution will:

  • Allow thousands of men to gain access to a personal stylist and exceptional clothing which will make the world a better place for everyone.
  • Allow you to gain access to some of the best men's fashion and your very own personal stylist.
  • Allow you the satisfaction of knowing that you helped someone's dreams come true and that gift is priceless.

Other Ways You Can Help

The struggle is real and we understand if you can't contribute money, but you can still help:

  • Please share this campaign and help us get the word out we are offering an amazing referral program to help encourage community involvement. You can earn amazing referral rewards for just sharing our campaign with our network!

    • Campaign Referral Contest

    Refer $250 in contributions and get...

    ManStyled will send you a free stylist-selected men's accessory(1 tie, belt, tie bar, cufflinks or similar item) with a retail value up to $30 for your contribution. US only.

    Refer $500 in contributions and get...

    ManStyled will send you a free stylist-selected men's garment(1 shirt) in your chosen size with a retail value up to $40 for your contribution. US only.

    Refer $1000 in contributions and get...

    ManStyled will send you two free stylist-selected men's garments(1 shirt and 1 accessory) in your chosen sizes with a total retail value up to $70 for your contribution. US only.

    Refer $2000 in contributions and get...

    ManStyled will send you a free stylist-selected men's outfit(1 shirt, 1 bottom and 1 accessory) in your chosen sizes with a total retail value up to $150 for your contribution. US only.

    Refer $5000 in contributions and get...

    You gain an all-access membership to ManStyled.com and we will send you a free box of stylist-selected men's clothing(4-6 items) in your chosen sizes with a total retail value up to $350 for your contribution. US only.

  • Just use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A classic line of wallets inspired by American craftsmanship. Built to last for a lifetime, handcrafted and burnished for a refined wallet any man will love.

I always loved walking around in this old western store here in Ogden and looking at the western tack and saddlery. I don’t even have horses but the way the leather felt and looked really spoke to me.

The process and the craft hasn’t changed over hundreds of years, I felt a real sense of nostalgia. I wanted to create that same feeling in a wallet. Something that you carry everyday that sends you back to a simpler time, an old world perspective when people only bought things that really mattered and would last a long time.

 

 

We set out to create the ultimate wallet to keep men’s most essential belongings safe. A no-compromises wallet that will stay with you for a lifetime. A wallet you can be proud of.

All men carry a wallet, so it might as well be something with substantial quality and value. This wallet looks and functions as a classic weathered wallet should-- effortlessly and with a rugged, classic American style.

 

 

 

Don’t be afraid to get rough with our new Stock and Barrel Wallet. 100% made in America and hand-stitched from the best natural vegetable tanned leather, we guarantee this wallet will last you for years to come.

There are many ways manufacturers cut corners and misrepresent their products regarding leather. At Stock and Barrel, we don't cut corners on the leather.

All our products are made from very thick 3oz. vegetable-tanned full-grain harness leather. It is the best, strongest part of the hide.

 

  • Vegetable, which uses vegetable-derived tannins from sources such as oak bark and takes about 60 days to process.
  • Chrome/oil tanned which uses really nasty carcinogenic and earth-killing chemicals, that only takes one to two days to make.

Aside from wanting to leave a better, healthier planet for our children, we use only vegetable-tanned leather because of the beautiful way it looks and ages.  

Over a lifetime of use it will continue to darken and develop a beautiful and unique patina that the cheaper chrome-tanned leather never will.

It has great durability and strength and with care can last several lifetimes.

 

A wallet is only as strong as it’s weakest stitch. Which is why we’ve gone to great lengths to make sure we’re using the toughest thread out there. We use .040” inch WAXED polyester cord made in house by a brick and mortar business called The Maine Thread Company in Lewiston, Maine. 

We use a stitching method that stands the test of time, called the saddle stitch. In this stitch, the friction causes the wax on our polyester thread to melt and seals the stitch in it's place completely.

 

 

 

This company and it’s success means everything to our little family. We’ve poured our hearts into the brand and products and we’re ready to take our business to the next level. With your support, we’ll be able to invest in the much needed production equipment like; industrial stitching machines, clicker press, burnisher, splitter, etc…) that will not only improve our efficiency, but also allow us to create higher quality products.

If the funding goes well beyond our expectations we’ll able to move our operation to a bigger space and one with a possible retail front. We would love to be able to sell our products in person and create more personal relationships with our customers.

 

We're a family who breaks the mold of a traditional 9-5 work life, yet we're consumed in the art of a highly traditional craft of making quality leather goods. Stock and Barrel Co began in 2012 and has not only been a creative outlet for us, but has consistently been a source of ups, downs, cuts, calluses, tears and laughs. Many of our recent life milestones occurred right here in our workshop in Ogden, Utah. We've poured our heart and soul into this business and we take pride in each carefully crafted product.

story:
We've raised $15,000 as the minimum needed to take our app to North America - but there's still more to do! We need to rate more fashion brands to let you know how they impact on people, the planet and animals.

Please keep contributing so you can create a better world every time you shop, and empower millions more people around the globe to do the same!

Read our story to find out how.

Special Offer: 10% off ethical fashion perks

Good On You helps you discover ethical fashion brands that do better on the issues you care about.

Back by popular demand, we're offering a selection of your favourite ethical fashion items at our exclusive campaign price!

The Fable Silk Shirts

Usually $95, now just $85

These luxury silk shirts are designed in Australia and made in Jaipur, India, by a small family-run business where workers are paid almost twice the minimum wage. The silk is 100% biodegradable and hand-dyed using vegetable dyes.

Available in Black, Marine Life, Egyptian Sands, Man on the Moon and Arctic Silver. 

The Fable is rated GOOD by Good On You.

Etiko Fairtrade Sneakers

Usually $80, now just $72

These sneakers for girls or guys are 100% vegan. They're made from sustainable latex rubber and certified organic and Fairtrade cotton. The dyes are PCP and AZO free. 

Since 2005, Australian-based and family owned Etiko has been committed to creating fair and eco-friendly streetwear. Every step in their production process is traceable and transparent.

Etikio sneakers are available in hi top and low top, in white, blue and red. Sizes 5 to 13 (US sizing, or 4 to 12 UK/AU sizing) – we’ll contact you to confirm. 

Etiko is rated GREAT by Good On You.

Conscious Step Sock Collection

Usually $46, now just $41 

Includes three pairs of certified organic and Fairtrade socks that support three important causes: HIV therapy to pregnant women in Africa, planting trees in Kenya and meals to children in need.

Three eye-catching styles, delivered in a recycled paper gift box. Get these socks with soul today!

Conscious Step is rated GREAT by Good On You.

Hurry before this offer and campaign ENDS SOON!

Fashion Without Harm

The free Good On You app empowers you to make shopping choices that match your values.

The app rates fashion brands for their impact on people, the planet, and animals.

The app was launched in Australia and New Zealand last year and has tens of thousands of users. It rates more than 1,000 clothing, footwear and accessory brands and helps you discover brands that are doing better on the issues you care about.

Join us to bring the Good On You app to North America!

Back us now! Shop one of the great brands on our perks. (Scroll down for images of the perks!)

Click here to ask a question, make a comment, or sign up to be notified when the app is launched,

Do You Know The Real Cost of The Clothes We Wear?

Do we know the stories hidden behind the labels?

Too often the clothes we buy come at an unacceptable price for the world’s poorest people, our environment, and animals.

We Have The Power to Create Change!

What if you could see exactly how brands treat their workers, the environment, and animals?

What if you could know that  every time you shop you are doing what you can to avoid association with sweatshops, child labor, environmental harm or animal exploitation?

 

The Good On You App Puts The Power In Your Hands

  • Find out how your favorite brands rate on the issues you care about. The Good On You app includes ethical brand ratings for more than 1,000 brands. With your support, we’ll add many more US and Canadian brands!
  • Discover hundreds of brands that are doing more to reduce poverty, and protect the planet and animals. When you search a mainstream brand you'll see brands with similar brands that rate higher! 
  • Find great deals on ethical brands.  We offer discounts to make it easier for you to choose the brands that are right for you and for the world.
  • Use your voice and send a message to brands, urging them to do better or congratulating them on their efforts.

 

 So What's Wrong with Fashion?

 

 

 

Let's Bring Good On You to North America

We want to bring the Good On You app to North America to empower millions of people to make a difference every time they shop.

Good On You is already making a difference with tens of thousands of people already using the app in Australia and New Zealand. 

$15,000 will fund the work needed to bring the app to North America in February 2017. This will cover tech updates and ratings for brands available in the US and Canada. Around 200 of those will be smaller and mid-sized ethical brands that consciously and actively address working conditions, environmental impacts, and animal issues.

If we can reach $30,000 we will be able to rate even more brands. We'll also get to work on extending Good On You to include ratings for beauty and personal care brands – this is the most commonly requested addition from our existing users.

What are the risks?

They're pretty low. The Good On You app already exists. It's popular and works well in Australia and New Zealand. We've got a proven ethical brand rating methodology and a system for applying it. We're raising the money we need to pay our developer to tweak the app to suit North America but mostly we're raising money so we can rate more brands including the most popular and most ethical brands in the USA and Canada.

We need your help to bring Good On You to North America. Choose one of our perks to back the campaign !

 

Back the Campaign Now to Score These Great Perks

We've put together a bunch of great perks to reward everyone who supports our campaign, including some awesome ethical brands from Australia and the USA.

All product based perks come at the recommended retail price or better PLUS you get to help bring Good On You to North America empowering millions of people to make a difference when they shop! 

$5 = Join the Movement
Join the movement to change the way we shop to create a better world. We'll keep you updated  and let you know when the free Good On You App is available in your country.
(AU$6.60)

$10 = Nominate a brand to be rated or store to be listed
Nominate a fashion brand to be rated and listed in the app for our launch in February 2017. Your chosen brand will jump the queue of hundreds of brands to be rated!
(AU$13.20)

$25 = Good On You Ethical Fashion eBook
The eco, ethical, and sustainable guide to fashion. From the biggest issues in fashion, which materials to avoid and brand ratings for 10 of the most popular brands in North America.
(AU$33)

$35 = Good On You Fairtrade Tote 
A Fairtrade, organic jute tote with exclusive screen print by Australian ethical label Mirador. Perfect for Sunday farmer's markets or a trip to the beach.
(AU$46)

$46 = Conscious Step Sock Collection (3 pairs + gift box)
Fight poverty while shopping ethically! These Conscious Step Socks raise awareness around the issue of poverty while striving to create a global community with their impact partner Global Citizen. Made in Fairtrade conditions with GOTS certified organic cotton. Conscious Step is rated GREAT in the Good On You app. 

$50 = $50 Voucher — Study NY
Shop the Study NY collection: ethical contemporary womenswear made in New York City and beyond.  Collections are cut and sewn in NYC’s garment district using both ethical fabrics and production methods. Study NY is a US brand rated GOOD by Good On You. 
(AU$66)

$50 = Men’s Eco Basics Pack – Boody 
This pack includes Boody's best-selling basics for men: Boxers, Crew-neck and Business socks. Made from organically grown bamboo yarn, these versatile and wonderfully soft items will fit seamlessly into your everyday wardrobe. Available in different colours and sizes. ($AU66)

$55 = Women’s Eco Basics Pack – Boody 
This pack includes Boody's best-selling basics for women: Classic bikini brief, Cami top and V-neck T-shirt. Made from organically grown bamboo yarn, these versatile and wonderfully soft items will fit seamlessly into your everyday wardrobe. Available in different colours (black, white, nude) and sizes. Boody is rated GOOD by Good On You. ($AU73)

$80 = Fairtrade Sneakers — Etiko
These sneakers for girls or guys are 100% vegan. They're made from sustainable latex rubber and certified organic and Fairtrade cotton. The dyes are PCP and AZO free. Etiko is a Fair Trade and organic Australian brand rated GREAT by Good On You. Sizes from Men's 5 to 13 (US sizing) (4 to 12 UK/AU sizing). 
(AU$112)
Available in white, blue or red.

$95 = Silk Shirt — The Fable
These silk shirts are designed in Australia and made in Jaipur, India, by a small family-run business where workers are paid almost twice the minimum wage. The silk is 100% biodegradable and hand-dyed using vegetable dyes. The Fable is rated GOOD by Good On You. 
(AU$125)
Available in Black, Marine Life, Egyptian Sands, Man on the Moon, Arctic Silver and Rose Quartz.

Click here to ask a question, make a comment, or sign up to be notified when the app is launched,

 

What People Are Saying

Featured in

 

The Good On You Story

Good On You was created in 2015 by a team of Australians who wanted to make it easier for everyday people to make more ethical choices when they shop.

Our vision is a world where consumers’ choices drive businesses to be sustainable and fair, to ensure that they can do everything in their power to avoid harm to people, the planet, and animals.

We have backgrounds in consumer advocacy, campaigning organization, startups, business, journalism and tech.

 

Help Spread the Word

We want to see a world where consumers' choices drive businesses to be sustainable and fair. Where it’s easy for you and everyone else, anywhere to choose products that support their deeply held values.

Together we can make a huge difference to the 75 million people who work in the clothing supply chain, to the environmental challenges facing our planet and to the animals who suffer needlessly.

Can you help get the word out?

We'd love it if you could contribute to the campaign but if that's not possible - or you already have - here are some more ways to help:

1. Sign up to be notified when the app is launched in February 2017

2. Share the campaign on on Facebook, Instagram or any other social media - use hashtag  #GoodOnYou

3. Tell you friends about the Good On You campaign, in the real world or by email

4. Check out the Good Edit, our ethical fashion blog to discover new ethical brands and guides on how to shop more sustainably 

5. Support the brands and organizations that are supporting us

6. Or get in touch for more ideas about how you can get involved

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Who’s on the Good On You team?

Gordon Renouf, co-founder, is an experienced consumer advocate who was head of Campaigns at CHOICE, Australia’s leading consumer organization, and a Board member of Consumers International.

Sandra Capponi, co-founder, is a seasoned business professional with expertise is Corporate Social Responsibility, supply chains, branding, and strategy.

Bethany Noble, Head of Marketing, is an experienced marketer and communications specialist.

Will Farrier, Product Manager, is a journalist turned product manager by day and sings in an Indie band by night.

Celine Massa, Head of Ratings, is an experienced NGO campaigner and environmental scientist.

Ali Misradeghi, Head of Technology, is  qualified data engineer and experienced tech project manager.

 

How does Good On You rate brands?

In short, we aggregate all the public information available from certification schemes (Fair Trade, Global Organic Textile Standard and many more), from NGO investigations (Greenpeace Detox, Behind the Barcode and more) and brands own statements.

Ethical shoppers demand transparency and we’re here to reward brands that are meeting the consumer demand.

For the full story check how we rate.

How many brands will Good On You include when it launches in North America?

The app will include ratings for 1,000 mainstream brands and 250 ethical, sustainable and eco brands.

Our ultimate aim is to rate any brand that you can find! The more we raise the closer we will get to hitting that target!

We’ll use the money to make our rating system more efficient and increase the number of people working to create the ratings, helping you discover more ethical brands.

Why don’t you rate products in other categories like cosmetics, homewares or food?

We’d love to. That’s our ultimate goal. But we have to start somewhere!

 

 

How does Good On You make a difference?

We know there are millions of people who want to ‘shop their values’. But it’s really hard to do that, especially in fashion. So as we make it easy, and millions of people start to prefer transparent brands that are doing better, the companies behind the brands that are not doing well will begin to feel it in the hip pocket. They’ll be forced to change.

We don’t expect or even need you to make the best ethical choice every time you shop - that’s just not realistic. But we do believe we can empower millions of people to make better choices to build a movement to create change.

How can I get involved?

Spread the word - That’s the most important thing right now! Please share our campaign on social media or better still tell your friends directly in person!

Volunteer - If you think you have something to offer as a researcher, writer or marketer, please let us know. 

Get your ethical brand listed - If you represent a brand that is trying to make a difference, get in touch with your details. We may already have you on the list of brands to be included but we'd love to hear from you. 

Is Good On You a non-profit?

Good On You is a social business founded and partly owned by the non profit organisation Ethical Consumers Australia, a registered Australian charity.

 

What next?

Thanks for reading! 

Now's the time to back the campaign by donating or choosing one of our great perks!

Or click here to ask a question, make a comment, or sign up to be notified when the app is launched,

 

Join us to help make fashion sustainable and fair!

Sandra, Bethany, Gordon, Will, Celine, Ali, Dave, Kendall and all at Good On You

We've raised $15,000 as the minimum needed to take our app to North America - but there's still more to do! We need to rate more fashion brands to let you know how they impact on people, the planet and animals.
Please keep contributing so you can create a better world every time you shop, and empower millions more people around the globe to do the same!
Read our story to find out how.
