story:
*** UPDATE: WE'VE REVAMPED THE DIPPER'S DESIGN! ***

CHECK IT OUT HERE 

--- 

Join our our mailing list, and get the goods for the insider's price on at tinsel.me! 

---

Say hello to an accessory that completely breaks the mold, The Dipper. It's a necklace. It's headphones. It's beautiful and sounds amazing. 

We've created a jewelry piece with the full functionality of headphones integrated into it.

Tech accessories like headphones have become a modern day essential, but for women are often stuffed at the bottom of a purse, get tangled, lost, and become worn out over time. 

We're on a mission to transform tech essentials into beautiful fashion accessories that make your life easier and complement your style.

Our audio necklace, The Dipper, seamlessly blends style and function. No one will know that you’re wearing anything other than a necklace when it’s not in use. 

Tinsel delivers high-quality sound that rivals other audio brands. Our earbuds use top-of-the-line components and are tuned to perfection.

No more untangling wires for days, digging for earbuds in your black hole of a bag, looking like a wannabe DJ, or downgrading your lovely ensemble.

Tinsel is a carefully-considered blend of technology and craft. We built The Dipper with quality materials that are made to last.




"This ultimate #girlboss has created a gorgeous piece of jewelry/tech called the Dipper Audio Necklace that is a bold statement necklace and headphones in one. YAAAAS." Read more...


  

"If you’re constantly digging for your earbuds (or tired of seeing them tangled on your desk at work), the Dipper earbuds could be just the thing you need."            Read more...


"The Dipper is technology in discrete mode, a statement piece that says, 'I love technology, but I don’t need my headphones to dominate my whole head and outfit' like something from Beats or other headphone manufacturers." Read more...


"Whether we want to admit it or not, most of us live in our headphones. So why not invest in making them fashionable?"   Read more...


"Despite the huge success of the Beats by Dr. Dre headphones that set the trend to wear huge cushions on the head, many people dream of discreet audio headsets that blend into their elegant outfit."   Read more...



How much money do we waste on headphones that get worn out and broken? The Dipper is a jewelry piece that keeps your buds and cables safe in its lovely metal housing. Your earbuds will be going strong for a long time.

Let's put the days of untangling cables and losing our earbuds behind us! By wearing them on your body, they are always with you and ready to be used when you need them.

We know that rubber-coated wires don't match anyone's outfit. This gorgeous piece handles your audio needs while enhancing your stylish ensemble.






The Dipper is made almost entirely of metals (stainless steel and aluminum) which are then plated with 24K gold or gunmetal and silver. The earbuds are plastic with metal coating.

The stainless steel chains are hollow with insulated cables running through them. The chevron-shaped pendant is formed from an aluminum alloy that keeps it lightweight for all-day wear while it elegantly houses earbuds that we've custom-designed for women's ears.


The Dipper is easy to wear and simple to use.

To switch from necklace to earbud mode, separate the chevrons to access the earbuds and place them into your ears, then disconnect the plug from the clasp in back of the necklace and plug it into your phone (or tablet, laptop, MP3 player, etc.).

To switch back to necklace, simply unplug the connector from your device and back into the necklace, and then put the earbuds back into their chevrons.

You can also access the bottom chevron to fully extend the cable that plugs into your device. It's not required, but gives you a wider range of motion for carrying a device in your hand, a purse at your side, or a pocket.





*These measurements may change slightly as we fine-tune the product.


Our team has finished the hardest parts of developing The Dipper with our factory partner and it's ready for production. We're currently just making a few minor tweaks to improve the experience even more. We believe in building a product that women will absolutely love, so we look forward to hearing the feedback of our backers during this campaign, as well.

Unlike many other companies at the crowdfunding stage, we’ve already done the work of finding a reputable manufacturer and developed our product in collaboration with their engineers, so tooling and production can begin as soon as we have the funds.



Our team has veterans who have developed many electronic and audio products, so we’ve avoided many pitfalls that new hardware startups face.

We’ve intentionally started with simple product features that allow us to execute with minimal challenges. Issues that lie ahead are most likely to happen when testing the first samples. If we discover any issues, we’ll be sure to notify our backers immediately and even seek your feedback.

We have so much love for our supporters and plan share our progress with you each step of the way!



In seven months, we’ve managed to get this project to a stage that takes many hardware companies years to achieve. The Tinsel team is fully dedicated to bringing The Dipper to life, and has carefully stretched our starter funds to get it this far. 

Now, we need your help to take the next step. Your support will allow us to start manufacturing so we can make our audio necklace a reality. What you are seeing are our prototypes --  the final product will be even better than what we have today.

Armed with your contributions and about 6 months time, we can have The Dipper around your neck in April 2016 (hello, festival season!).




Every dollar counts! If you can’t buy The Dipper today, give what you can and help us out by telling everyone you know about Tinsel. Use the sharing links to the left to spread the word! 



Aniyia Williams and Monia Santinello founded Tinsel with the belief that women deserve better when it comes to their tech. We started by trying to solve the pain points of a product we all know and find useful -- headphones -- and brought together a team to help us bring the project to life.

We are so proud to have a group that's incredibly cohesive and diverse. From those of us with years of experience in product development, manufacturing and industrial design, to years of experience in marketing, branding, operations and sales - we are all united by our passion to build beautiful well-made products.



What is Tinsel?

Tinsel is the name of our company and the products we make. We’re building a tech jewelry piece that integrates the full functionality of headphones into a beautiful necklace.


How much will it cost after Indiegogo?

After our Indiegogo launch, The Dipper audio necklace will retail at $199.


Does it have Bluetooth?

The Dipper is not Bluetooth enabled. Though we look forward to adding wireless necklaces in future collections, we don’t want you to worry about charging and syncing your jewelry just yet!


Does it do any activity tracking/notifications/etc?

Right now we are laser-focused on creating a beautiful, luxurious necklace with amazing audio quality. That said, we hope to add more functionality to future jewelry based on what Tinsel customers want and need.


What’s it made of?

The necklace pendant and necklace clasp is made from aluminum to keep it lightweight for all day wear. The chains are made from stainless steel. The remote and earbuds are made of plastic.


Does it come with a jack that plugs into your phone?

Yes!!! And that means you can use it with any device that has a standard 3.5mm audio connection.


Can you talk on the phone with it or listen to audio only?

Yes! The Dipper has a microphone and 3-button remote control, so you can talk on the phone, listen to music, podcasts...all the things you could do with other headphones, but in style. ;)


Does it come in other sizes/lengths/styles?

The Dipper comes in one size and length, available in two color finishes: 24K gold-plated and gunmetal (both with touch of silver).


How good is the audio quality/sound?

We will have sound quality that rivals your favorite audio brands - the electronics inside will be high quality, and they will be tuned for great, balanced sound.


What is WAM and why should I donate to them?

Women’s Audio Mission (WAM) is a non-profit changing the face of sound by educating and providing opportunities to girls and women in audio engineering, music production and recording arts. Women are chronically underrepresented in these areas (less than 5%), and Tinsel is inspired by their mission to level the playing field of women in tech. With your donation, we will put $20 towards the purchase of audio necklaces for their staff and students.

story:
Our Mission

We want to provide everyone with the opportunity to wear a smart and fashionable timepiece. We have partnered with an incredible designer and watch manufacturer to create R. Genn: gentleman’s fashion made affordable. 


Our Product

We opted for a timeless and versatile design featuring a brown, leather strap that can pair with any attire and be worn on any occasion. With a premium, Japanese movement and high-quality mineral glass, these watches offer what design watches do, but for a fraction of the price.

Our Goal

Once we reach our goal, we will be able to start selling the watches at a price of no more than $57, staying true to our philosophy that men’s fashion can be affordable. We will also be able to expand our range, offering different designs at the same, affordable price. So make a pledge today, and support R. Genn watches and our dream of providing high quality, affordable watches.


Time To Act

This is where you come in. We have all of the pieces in place but need to raise $5,000 for an initial production run of R. Genn watches. All Indiegogo backers will receive an R. Genn watch first at a discounted price.


Join us now and help us make gentleman's fashion affordable!

Our Mission
We want to provide everyone with the opportunity to wear a smart and
fashionable timepiece. We have partnered with an incredible designer and watch
manufacturer to create R. Genn: gentleman’s fashion made affordable.  
Our ProductWe opted for a timeless and versatile design featuring a brown, leather strap that can pair with any attire and be worn on any occasion. With a premium, Japanese movement and high-quality mineral glass, these watches offer what design watches do, but for a fraction of the price.Our GoalOnce we reach our goal, we will be able to start selling the watches at a price of no more than $57, staying true to our philosophy that men’s fashion can be affordable. We will also be able to expand our range, offering different designs at the same, affordable price. So make a pledge today, and support R. Genn watches and our dream of providing high quality, affordable watches.Time To Act


This is where you
come in. We have all of the pieces in place
but need to raise $5,000 for an initial production run of R. Genn watches. All
Indiegogo backers will receive an R. Genn
watch first at a discounted price.

Join us now and help us make gentleman's fashion affordable!

story:
The NOOKRONO is our take on the classic chronograph-style wrist watch. With this project, our goal is to create a beautiful, contemporary timepiece with a movement designed in-house that will compete with those used in Swiss or Japanese watches. The inspiration for this design is Space and the Space Race of the 1960's. The dial and face of NOOKRONO are evocative of spaceship launchpads, ready to reach the stars, and the intersecting lines represent directions you can go in the explorations of your own space and time. The watch will only be available in 4 very limited editions exclusive to Indiegogo, and will only be available during this campaign. 









NOOKA is a New York fashion design company founded by artist/designer Matthew Waldman. We are most prominently known for our timepieces, and are constantly pioneering our craft of expressing intuitive processes with physical objects. The ethos of NOOKA is universal language, which guides the creation of products with enhanced functionality and a techno-progressive philosophy. 

Our work has had an enormous impact on the younger generation, generating a greater interest in both industrial design and linguistics.



With 10 years of experience, NOOKA is a proven studio that knows how to bring a concept into production and reality. With the funds we receive, we will be able to follow through the design process until completion of the product, create the new molds necessary for manufacturing, and complete all the testing and prototyping required to insure a fantastic end result. Any additional funds will be used to help us develop the next generation of NOOKA products and support our ongoing student internship program.



Despite its wide global reach and strong presence in the fashion industry, NOOKA remains a small design lab that has never received any outside funding. As a self-sustained company, we face harsher financial consequences than larger corporations when presenting new products to the marketplace, so we often don't have the opportunity to develop all of the products we would like to. By contributing to this campaign, not only do you get a truly limited edition timepiece, you also help support NOOKA and its team of talented designers to continue to independently promote optimistic futurism via universal language.

If you love our designs but simply can't afford to add this NOOKA to your collection, you can always help us out by spreading the word! Or follow us by joining our Twitter feed or Facebook fan page. Please be sure to check our website, nooka.com, for sales and new products.


The quartz chronograph movement new to this watch is one that we are developing in-house and producing in China. We are confident that this movement will match the accuracy and performance of similar Swiss and Japanese movements, bringing the joy of the chronograph to a wider audience. 

The position of the chronograph dials may vary from the renderings and prototypes shown on this page.

Some potential risks may include delays due to unforeseen issues which can affect any manufacturing process, but our track record in producing custom quartz movements is excellent, so we feel confident that this should not be a problem. Our production specialist lives full-time in Hong Kong to make sure production continues to run as smoothly as possible.



Please read through the FAQ before supporting our project.

All Product Specifications are subject to change without prior notice.


Q1.  When will I get my NOOKRONO?

Our goal is to ship the watches to the awesome Indiegogo supporters by the end of 2014. As we have produced timepieces for the last 10 years, we are confident in our projected time of completion.

Please refer to our Project Timeline section for more details leading up to the delivery of your NOOKRONO. We will also keep you updated on the progress via our Indiegogo page.


Q2.  Is NOOKRONO unisex? Will it fit my wrist?

Yes, this watch is unisex with a wrist circumference range of (6¾in / 171mm) and (9¾in / 248mm).


Q3.  Is the NOOKRONO waterproof?

Yes, although we do not recommend diving with it. Our plan is for NOOKRONO to be waterproof between 3 - 5 ATM (We will update this number when the water test of the production model is completed.)


Q4.  How much does shipping cost?

Free Domestic Ground Shipping within the United States. For International Shipping, please add $20 to your contribution via Paypal.

PLEASE NOTE: the customer is always responsible for taxes and duties levied upon delivery and these costs will NOT be reflected in your purchase on Indiegogo.


Q5. Is there a warranty?

You will receive our standard 1-year warranty. Wear and tear is excluded from this policy.


Q6.  Is there a number for Customer Service?

Nooka is a small company with one employee dedicated to customer service. Because of this, email is the most efficient way to resolve issues with an online order. We understand that this can be frustrating for some customers, but please bear with us. We are striving to improve customer experience as we grow. (service@nooka.com)




All Images Copyright © 2014 Nooka Inc., All Rights Reserved.

story:
*Click HERE to learn how you can earn a FREE Flinders and other rewards for referring supporters to our campaign through our Indiegogo Rewards Program!*

As Featured On:

Our Story

Hi everyone - my name is Sujain Krishnan and I'm the owner and founder of the Melbourne Watch Company.

As an enthusiast and collector of affordable mechanical watches, I originally started my adventure into the world of watch making through building homage style pilot and military watches for the online enthusiast community. I ran this small business ("Melbourne Custom Watches") for the better part of the last year with success. 

However, I decided recently that I was not satisfied with simply building other people's designs and that I would like to pursue the goal of launching my own brand of original design mechanical timepieces. 

From this idea, the Melbourne Watch Company was born. My goal is to create product offerings that provide customers with the option of a quality mechanical timepiece at an affordable price point. 

Through this Indiegogo project we are offering you the chance to secure a Flinders at the pre-production price of $395AUD (or $350AUD for the first 50 backers!). 

The planned RRP for the Flinders is $525AUD.

We are targeting delivery of the Flinders to customers for mid to late February 2014.

**Please add $30AUD to all watch order perks for international shipping. Shipping is free within AU.**


The Flinders

The Flinders Automatic is our first original design and was created after research into affordable dress style watches. I found that many watches in the sub $500 range were either quartz, unappealingly designed or were fairly chunky in thickness.

Named after Melbourne's iconic Flinders Street Station, I wanted our first timepiece to be one which would not look out of place among higher end watches. Additionally, I wanted to give buyers the combination of a high quality mechanical movement, a slim case and affordable price tag.

Note - All photos below are of the pre-production samples of the Flinders and are not renders.

After many hours of research, I decided on the top grade Miyota Cal. 9015 self-winding mechanical movement to be the heart of the Flinders. This 24 jewel automatic movement operates at 28,800 BPH and has a power reserve of 42 hours when fully wound. Miyota is a subsidiary of Citizen watches and is known for producing high quality, accurate and reliable mechanical movements.


The case for the Flinders is a high grade 316L stainless steel with a slim case height of only 9.8mm. This will allow the Flinders to be easily slipped under a shirt cuff for use with a suit, or to simply be comfortable for everyday wear. 

The Flinders caseback features a sapphire glass display which will show off the Miyota movement as it ticks away. The caseback itself is engraved with the text "Flinders Automatic Movement Stainless Steel" and also features our company logo and a serial number.

Note - The sample case back shows the logo incorrectly positioned as the engineering team were forced to move the screw positions. The production case back will be changed for a neater look.


The dial is multi-layered and features a guilloche centre and stainless steel markers. The date will be shown at the 3 o'clock position. There are two colour options - a white dial with silver markers and black hands or a black dial with silver markers and silver hands. The dial and hands are framed by flat, anti-reflective sapphire glass.

Note - The dial on the samples incorrectly has luminous dots at the base of the hour markers. The production version will have stainless steel dots as per the original design.


I wanted the Flinders to have a unique touch to it, so I designed the sweep seconds hand to feature the "M" from our company logo. Unlike quartz watches, the sweep seconds hand of a high beat automatic watch glide smoothly around the dial. 


The Flinders will come with a genuine leather strap (20mm tapering to 18mm) with stitching and an engraved thumbnail style buckle. The white dial version will come with a brown strap with white stitching and the black dial version will come with a black strap with black stitching.

As a final touch, all watches will ship in a leatherette display case featuring our company logo.


Full Specifications

The Flinders will have the following specifications:

Case: 40mm 316L stainless steel
Glass: Flat Anti-Reflective sapphire
Movement: Miyota Cal. 9015 automatic
Dial: Guilloche with date window at 3 o'clock
Hands: Hour/Minute/Sweep Seconds
Water Resistance: 5TM/50m
Strap: Genuine leather (20mm tapering to 18mm at buckle)

All watches come with a 12 month manufacturers warranty.


The Design Process

The first step of the design process was to create the draft of the concept via some (very rough) sketches. I then took these designs and approached several manufacturers to begin the process of bringing the Flinders to life.

Below: The initial rough design sketch of the Flinders


I was then provided with the initial design renders and engineering drawings for the Flinders in order to get a better picture of how the final product will look. This process went through several iterations before we settled on the final design which was approved for prototype creation.

Below: The final 2D design renders

Below: Engineering Drawings


From the 2D renders and detailed engineering specifications I had some 3D renders created to help visualise the final product before proceeding to sample creation.

Below: 3D renders of the Flinders



The next step was the delivery of the pre-production samples which we have received and approved. Photos of these can be found throughout the project above and in the campaign gallery.


The Timeline

Where are we at now?

As of 7th January we have confirmed that the Flinders is going into production next week and should be ready by the end of the month as per the original plan.


Project Timeline

The following is a list of our planned activities and their target timeframes.


Completed:

Early November 2013: 
- Release of design renderings and project information on Watchuseek (the world's largest online watch community)

Late November 2013:

- Delivery of pre-production samples of the Flinders in both colours. 

December 2013:

- Indiegogo project setup with details of production plans and detailed photos of the samples.
- Samples and/or photos to be sent to popular watch review websites such as Watchuseek, WristWatchReview and WornAndWound.


To Come:

January 2014:

- Production of the Flinders to commence.

Mid February 2014:
- Target for Production version of the Flinders to be ready for acceptance. 

Late February 2014:
- Targeting delivery of Flinders automatic watches to project supporters.

As we progress I will update this Indiegogo page to communicate any and all relevant news including delays if they arise. 


Backer Perks
Funds raised through backing our project on Indiegogo will be used to help with the production of the first run of Flinders watches and display boxes as well as for consumables such as postage boxes and packing etc. The balance of funds required to deliver the production watches will be supplied by the company owner.

Please find more information regarding the different perk rewards below:


Pledge $2AUD - Receive a personal letter of thanks 

If you pledge $2AUD you will receive a personalised letter in the mail (not an email!) from company owner and founder - Sujain Krishnan. All letters will be delivered at the conclusion of the project in January.


Pledge $5AUD - Your name on our website "Indiegogo Backers" page

If you pledge $5AUD you will have your name placed on a special "Indiegogo Backers" page on our website (page will be created at the conclusion of the project in January). 


Pledge $25AUD - Receive a pair of cufflinks featuring the Melbourne Watch Company logo

If you pledge $20AUD you will receive a pair of cufflinks with the Melbourne Watch Company logo embossed on them. Each set will be placed within a black velvet box.

Below is a sample photo of the cufflinks - Delivery will be in January at the conclusion of the project.


Pledge $40AUD - Receive a men's black leather wallet featuring the Melbourne Watch Company logo

If you pledge $40AUD you will receive a men's leather black bi-fold wallet with the Melbourne Watch Company logo embossed onto it. 

Below is a photo of the wallet sample:


Pledge $350AUD - Receive a Flinders Automatic watch at a further reduced "early bird" pre-production price - Limited to 50 only!!

If you are one of the first 50 people to back us you will receive a Flinders in your choice of colour at the early bird price of $350AUD. 


Pledge $395AUD - Receive a Flinders Automatic watch at the pre-production price in your choice of colour

If you back us for $395AUD you will receive the Flinders Automatic in your choice of colour. We are targeting mid to late February 2014 for delivery of the Flinders to our supporters.

Pledge $700AUD - "All In"

If you back us for $700AUD you will receive the Flinders Automatic in both dial colours as well as a set of cufflinks and a black leather wallet (both featuring our logo). 


Risks And Challenges

While we have tried to be realistic and conservative with our estimates for the time-frame of this project there may be unforeseen delays that arise as we progress. In this event all target dates will be revised and communicated to backers accordingly.

Also - according to our manufacturer, the demand for the Miyota 9015 movement has risen dramatically in the last 12 months. In response to this we have already pre-purchased the Miyota 9015 movements for the Flinders to avoid any issues with supply down the track.

story:
Are you Looking for a pair of underwear that will literally change your life?

Can you believe it?

The Riparo Indiegogo Campaign is almost finished!

The ride has been incredible and with-out you, this would not be possible.

If you are the kind of man who always wants the best, it only makes sense to extend that desire to your underwear. The world of men's underclothing has come a long way in recent years, and today you can find contemporary styles to suit even the most discriminating tastes.

What you wear under your clothes is just as important as any other part of your wardrobe, whether or not you are the only person who sees it. Underwear is probably the single most functional garment you put on every day and one of the most important factors in whether you feel comfortable in your clothes. 

Whether you're a boxers, boxer briefs, or briefs type of dude, your underwear is probably the most important thing to stock up on for your wardrobe. You can never have enough pairs. After all, they're all that separate your junk from a cruel world that's full of flying projectiles, unwanted thirst, and other things that'll mess up your day/night/life if they come into contact with your schmanging area.

Maybe you're fine copping the cheapest underwear out there so you can splurge on various grails. But if you do that, you should probably replace a couple pairs every few months anyway. Even if you're the type of guy who'll only settle the finest cottons and silks surrounding your undercarriage.

I don’t know about you, but I don’t compromise on quality and comfort and safety with the things we wear every day. A pair of jeans, maybe. But not undies. And a day decked out in a pair of Riparo is a fine day indeed. Roomy or snug, cozy or lacy, plain or funky: They’re just cool, quality threads that feel good and look and are the worlds ultimate underwear. 

Get ready to throw out your draw full of fruit o’ loom and man up into Riparo. We took the most advanced fabric technology and construction techniques available to build the Ultimate pair of underwear. Your honey’s going to love them.

There is a reason why we call Riparo "The Ultimate Underwear" 

  • Antimicrobial to fight body odor
  • Light Weight 
  • Machine washable
  • Stretch for comfort in action
  • Quick to dry - just rinse out and hang overnight when you travel
  • Breathable and soft to the touch
  • Free of toxins and allergens
  • Highly effective, In addition to rigorous internal testing, accredited labs to have shielding effectiveness of 99.9% for the range of everyday radiation (<10MHz – 8+GHz) 

Yeah that's right, Riparo does it all!


  • Worried about germs from your ass sitting on the toilet. We nuke them!
  • Worried about lingering smell lurking down there. We got you covered
  • Worried about sweating and over heating. We got you covered.
  • Worried about EMF radiation nuking your balls? We got you covered!
  • Worried about stretch factor. You know it...We got you covered.

Riparo is the real deal, no joke -- TERMINATOR of underwear's. We are here to make you invincible and fully guarded and protected from all of life's crazy elements. 

Did we mention, because of the silver technology, Riparo can even ward of werewolf's That right! We got you covered
.
You only got a couple of days left to save over 40% on Riparo and get yourself the worlds most Ultimate underwear. 



Thank you

Ameer 

P.S -- Riparo underwear will make an awesome Christmas gift for your brother, boyfriend, husband, or any other guy on your list.

single most functional garment you put on every day and one of the most
important factors in whether you feel comfortable in your clothes. 
Whether you're a
boxers, boxer briefs, or briefs type of dude, your underwear is
probably the most important thing to stock up on for your wardrobe.
You can never have enough pairs. After all, they're all that separate your
junk from a cruel world that's full of flying projectiles, unwanted thirst, and
other things that'll mess up your day/night/life if they come into contact with
your schmanging area.
Maybe you're
fine copping the cheapest underwear out there so you can splurge on various
grails. But if you do that, you should probably replace a couple pairs every
few months anyway. Even if you're the type of guy who'll only settle the finest
cottons and silks surrounding your undercarriage.
I don’t know
about you, but I don’t compromise on quality and comfort and safety with the
things we wear every day. A pair of jeans, maybe. But not undies. And a day
decked out in a pair of Riparo is a fine day indeed. Roomy or snug,
cozy or lacy, plain or funky: They’re just cool, quality threads that feel good
and look and are the worlds ultimate underwear. 
Get ready to
throw out your draw full of fruit o’ loom and man up into Riparo. We took
the most advanced fabric technology and construction techniques available to
build the Ultimate pair of underwear. Your honey’s going to love
them.
There is a
reason why we call Riparo "The Ultimate Underwear" 




Antimicrobial to fight body
     odor
Light Weight 
Machine washable
Stretch for comfort in
     action
Quick to dry - just rinse
     out and hang overnight when you travel
Breathable and soft to the
     touch
Free of toxins and allergens
Highly effective, In
     addition to rigorous internal testing, accredited labs to have shielding
     effectiveness of 99.9% for the range of everyday radiation (<10MHz –
     8+GHz) 


Yeah that's right, Riparo does it all!

Worried about germs from your ass sitting on the toilet. We nuke them!
Worried about lingering smell lurking down there. We got you covered
Worried about sweating and over heating. We got you covered.
Worried about EMF radiation nuking your balls? We got you covered!
Worried about stretch factor. You know it...We got you covered.

Riparo is the real deal, no joke -- TERMINATOR of underwear's. We are here to make you invincible and fully guarded and protected from all of life's crazy elements. Did we mention, because of the silver technology, Riparo can even ward of werewolf's That right! We got you covered

.
You only got a couple of days left to
save over 40% on Riparo and get yourself the worlds most Ultimate
underwear. 










Thank you
Ameer 
P.S -- Riparo underwear will
make an awesome Christmas gift for your brother, boyfriend, husband, or any
other guy on your list.

story:
ViroMasks was born out of passion to provide better and more effective solution to the raging pandemic across the globe. Facemasks in the current form were designed back in the 1930s; there is a need to disrupt the market and make more durable usable facemasks to reduce the carbon footprint, increase effectiveness and reduce the current as well as future air borne infections. 

Technology

ViroMask uses HeiQ Viroblock; a Swiss technology to neutralize viruses on the surface. Viroblock is tested in Peter Doherty Institute of Infection and Immunity in University of Melbourne, Australia and proven to neutralize 99.98% of SARS-CoV-2 virus within 30 mins. Possibly the world most efficient technology to rapidly neutralize coronavirus. The technology has two components; Silver Ions and Vesicle Structures to rapidly neutralize enveloped viruses. 

 

Design

ViroMasks uses patent-pending cup shaped design to ensure that only filtered air comes through. Sides are made of 100% ultra soft polyester to ensure no air passes through. The center pockets filter which is made of the same active layers as N95 respirator. 

Aluminum Noose Clip

ViroMasks keeps wearer’s safety and comfort paramount at each step of design. ViroMasks incorporates an aluminum flat noose clip that can easily be molded onto the wearer’s face shape. The shape is then maintained over a long period of time; ensuring proper fit onto the wearer’s face and minimal to no air leakage.

Adjustable Ear Loops

ViroMasks keeps the wearers comfort and protection as its priority. Our ear loops are made of elasticated polyester which helps give it that stretch around the ear and provides comfort over a long period of use. 

The safety provided by any mask depends on its fit on the wearer’s face. ViroMasks has incorporated a cord system to help wearer adjust the size to ensure the mask fits well providing the desired safety. 

Exhale Breathing Valves (Only in ViroMasks Vault)

ViroMasks Vault feature 2x Breathing Valves. Breathing valves are for exhale only. Their primary reason for being part of ViroMasks is: 

  • Help mitigate the heat buildup in the mask 
  • Help mitigate Carbon dioxide buildup in the mask 

 

Filtration (Vault and Armor)

ViroMasks Armor and Vault both have advanced filtration. The middle area has a pocket where the filters can be replaced. The average lifespan of a filter is 100 hours of active use. Both Armor and Vault come with 3 filters in the pack and additional filter packs can be bought. 

ViroMasks has a statically charged melt blown non-woven fabric filter. Melt blown filters above 95% particulates in the air at 0.3 Micron level. 

  • ViroMasks Melt blown is statically charged 
  • Viruses have a slightly positive charge 
  • The filter efficiency that ViroMasks achieve is at par with N95/FFP2/KN95 masks through our filter. 

 

 

Sustainability

Do you know that most masks (surgical and respirators) have a plastic layer that takes over 400 year to biodegrade naturally? Who wants to see our oceans full of masks in a couple of years time ? Get your ViroMasks; enjoy the same level of protection and lower cost per usage. 

 

Self Contamination

ViroMasks neutralizes germs and viruses on the surface within 30 mins; so the chances of self-contamination are reduced. Any residue on the mask is rendered ineffective within a short span of time. So if you touch your mask and then your face (it is not recommended) but it will be safer compared to other masks. 

Limit Transmission

ViroMasks neutralizes or kills the virus on contact; unlike other masks that just trap the virus which can then bounce off to the weakest link. 

 

Certifications and Test Results

Most of the test results are available to be downloaded from ViroMasks website. We are a transparent company and invite others to be more transparent with their customers. 

  • EN14683:2019    Breathing resistance or differential pressure    1.42
  • ASTM F1862    Splash resistance test    111
  • ASTM F2299:2017    Penetration by Particulates    98.5
  • 16 CFR Part 1610    Flammability    Class I
  • ASTM F2101    Bacterial Filtration Efficiency    97.75
  • ISO 18184    Anti Viral Efficacy @ 10 washes    99.92
  • ISO 18184    Anti Viral Efficacy @ 20 washes    99.54
  • ISO 20743:2013     Quantitative antibacterial test     99.99
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Visual Inspection    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Material    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Cleaning and Disinfection    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Practical Performance    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Finish of Parts    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Leakage    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Compatibility with Skin    No Irritation observed
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Flammability    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    CO2 Content of Inhalation Air    0.7
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Head Hardness    NA
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Field of Vision    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Exhalation Valve    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Clogging    NA
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Demounted Parts    Pass
  • EN149:2001 + A1:2009    Breathing Resistance    Pass
  • Anti Viral Efficiency against SARS-CoV-2    99.99%

 

Future of FaceMasks

The world will continue to use face masks for a considerable number of years in the future. We have seen in the previous pandemics; facemasks were very efficient in curbing the spread. This time around sadly; a big part of our disposable facemasks is made of plastic; which will not degrade quickly (unlike cotton). 

We believe the market for ViroMasks will stay and increase as the time passes and people have a general knowledge of what is an effective face mask. 

 

How we will use your funds 

Target 1: Raise 500K and Reduce our shipping Carbon Footprint

Currently, we are strategically producing in Dubai, UAE; practically in the center of the world and then air shipping to our customers around the world. We understand that this is not the most carbon efficient way of doing business. As step one; we would like to use the funds to rent out 3PL services across the globe in key markets and place the product there. 

Target 2: Raise 1M and create local entrepreneurs and jobs

If we are able to raise one million USD or more; we will start the work on franchising the manufacturing closer to consumption market. This will ensure minimal carbon footprint; help the entrepreneurs and local industry. Help generate local jobs. And truly make it a brand that everyone owns and has an interest in. 

Target 3: Raise 1.5M and create Anti-Viral Sprays 

If we are able to raise more than 1.5M USD; we will spend more on R&D to come up with Aerosol to make your car-seats and other fabric based touch points anti-viral. This will help in mitigating extensive cleaning needs and generally will keep the viral load in the environment to a minimal.

story:
Our Story

We are Devo Watches, a small Irish based watch brand located in the Wicklow Mountains, Ireland. Devo Watches was developed out of frustration towards the watch industry. We felt that most start up watch companies were offering low quality carbon  copies of each other with price tags of €175+. The market place is saturated with "Minimalist Watches" so with this collection we have developed the prefect dress watch to help you stand out from the crowd. At Devo Watches we are looking for steady growth while creating a name that will be still recognized in the watch industry in 20 years! We really hope you can be part of our story and join us on our journey to reinvent the watch market. 

Our main goal of this project is to offer a reliable and well designed watch for more than a reasonable price. At Devo Watches we feel the entry level watch market is very over priced for the watches that are on offer. This is where Devo Watches comes in and offers you all of the watch at half the price.

Our Vision

Our Vision for Devo Watches is to be known as more than a watch brand. We want to be known as a brand that offers real quality with a personal touch. We are not the biggest watch brand nor are we looking for hundreds of thousands to fund our project. At Devo Watches we just want to get our watches out there so people can enjoy them and spread the word of what we are doing as a brand.  We are only at the beginning of the Devo Watches story and we hope with your support we can become something special.

Our Design

The Curvo Collection is based on a classic tank watch design with a modern edge. As time has moved on watches have increased in size and we took this into consideration when designing the Curvo. While the case size itself (30 x 25 mm) gives the watch its classic look the extension of the lugs to 45 mm makes it wear and feel like a modern time piece. The collection derives its name from the watches curved design. As with all dress watches the watch itself should fit seamlessly under a shirt or jacket. With the curved watch it flows around wrist with unmatched comfort. As with all our designs a small splash of color on the hands adds a new dimension to the watch.      

Movement: Japanese Quartz

Water Resistance: 3 ATM

Case Size: 30 mm x 25 mm

Lug to Lug: 45 mm

Strap Size: 22 mm

Crystal: Glass

Produce Testing

A small number of sample watches were produced for testing. At Devo Watches this is the most important part of any collection. Our name is everything to us so if we are developing a product we want it to be at the highest standard possible. The sample watches have been worn daily for  the past few months by a small number of people who we trust and value their feedback. In July a focus group was arranged and the watches were discussed and the feedback helped Devo Watches build a truly user friendly watch! Small adjustments were make which included lengthening the strap and improving quality of the buckle.   

 

Inspiration For The Design 

The inspiration for our design came from a love of vintage style tank watches. I am a pencil and paper kind of guy ever though I am a below average artist. One scribble leads to the next and a idea/ design is soon born. we started with the idea of a small rectangle watch and we made prototypes out of plastic at different sizes to see what suited our wrist, but nothing really felt right. Watches were either to small or at the larger size looked over-sized and uncomfortable. We went back to the kitchen table to do some more drawing and this is when the breakthrough came. We decided to incorporate the lugs in to the watch case itself so that we would have the small vintage style look while having the watch wear and feel like a larger modern watch. Now that we had the lugs as part of the watch case we could bend the lugs to curve around the wrist and this would not affect our watch movement that will be located in the rectangular part of the watch. Drawing continued for another number of weeks till we felt that we had a final drawing that we could present to out manufacturer. With the case and movement finalized we could move onto the rest of the watch. From the beginning we knew the dial style we want. With the inner rectangle indented into the watch it adds the depth we felt the watch needed. Numbering on the dial was discussed at length as to see what suited the design and shape of the watch. With the shape of the watch we felt the normal 12, 3, 6, 9 did not suit the watch so we decided to display only the even numbers so that all corners are clean on the watch which really works well with the lines of design. Our design for the hands comes to symbolize the watch as a whole. Classic lozenge hands splashed with a modern metallic blue.  

Main challenges

The biggest rick for this project is that it falls into the rest of the watches looking for funding and gets overlooked. But I promise we have the drive and motivation to get this project over the line because this is more that a project to us this is a Dream and we wont stop until we achieve this Dream!

story:
Short Summary 

My name is Charli and I’m a freelance artist in Austin, TX. I work in traditional mediums such as marker, colored pencil, and watercolor to create vibrant pieces inspired by kink practice and queer sensuality. I’ve been selling my artwork online, at art shows across Texas, and at various BDSM conventions and conferences for 5 years. My style is recognized across the country and in a few places abroad. It’s even been spotted in a few stray tattoos! 

Much of my work is sold in the forms of original paintings, digital prints, stickers, and shirts. My art prints and stickers are made by myself in my home, but I have shirts printed periodically by a company here in Austin, TX. My goal with this campaign is to collect funds through pre-orders to get my Plague Doctor design printed on an order of shirts.

What I Need & What You Get 

My plan is to get a set of tank tops and a set of t-shirts. Tanks will be sized XS - 2XL, and T-shirts will be S - 2XL - but larger sizes may be added depending on pre-orders! Full retail price for the shirts will be $20 - pre-order price here is $15!

Other Ways You Can Help 

I understand that some people won’t be able to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! This is one of those rare moments where exposure would actually be great! Share this project on social media! Send it to your friends who might think it’s rad! Get the word out there! The more people I can reach, the better chance I’ll have. No matter how you’re able to help, thank you for your support!

story:
What is the RAINY DRY® ?　

The RAINY DRY® Knit Jacket is an innovative product that doubles as rain wear with its superior water-repellent technology*, which is derived from a Japanese technology that was developed in order to minimize water and dirt damage to traditional kimonos, or traditional garment. In applying this technology to the finest knit material, we have expanded the potential of knit wear. We have developed two different styles, one for outdoor adventures and one for urban wear, which puts fashion at the forefront. Both styles have a variety of color options.

*Please note that although RAINY DRY® has very high water-repellency, it may not completely block water against strong water pressure. 

1. Long-lasting and super-strong water-repellency　　

The most impressive feature of RAINY DRY® Knit Jacket is its superior water repellency. This lets the owner simultaneously look sharp and be ready for a sudden downpour at any time. It is the world’s first water-repellent jacket that can be used as rain wear made from natural fiber knit.

Water-repellency test : WATER

Water-repellency test : Wine

Water-repellency test : Ketchup

Water-repellency test : Soda

 

2. Two designs (Rugged and Metro with 6 and 2 color options) and a Knit Cap

To suit our customers’ needs and tastes, we have designed two different styles:

Rugged style Jackets

The Rugged style is made of a special knit fabric that has proven to be the most water-repellent knit available through numerous water resistance tests. We selected this thick, heat-retaining knit for its ability to withstand outdoor activities in which the wearer might be exposed to rain or water, such as mountain climbing. We have also attached a large hood, which will cover the head completely to protect the wearer from a sudden downpour.

Metro style Jackets

The material selected for this design evokes a fashion-forward style perfect for wearing around town. To play up the natural playfulness of the knit, we came up with a stylish colorblocking design featuring two coordinating colors that really stands out from the crowd.

  

Rainy Dry Knit Caps

We also created Rainy Dry Knit Caps with this material so that you can make the most of its superior water-repellency while enjoying the trendy coordination with a knit cap that comes with a choice of five different colors. 

3. Pill-free, top-quality knit material

The cotton used for the material is Indian cotton, which ranks among the top in the world alongside cotton from the Caribbean Sea region and Egypt. The material is the finest high-grade cotton in the world, and has been carefully selected for its supple, soft texture and glossy elegance.

Cotton is ranked by the length of its fibers, and the cotton used to produce the raw material here has long fibers.

The longer the fibers are, the thinner each individual fiber will be, which makes the yarn that is produced from it less fuzz-prone and more silky and lustrous. Long-fiber cotton is used by top-quality fashion brands around the world.

By spinning the long India-produced cotton fiber into compact yarn, we have created a glossy material that is soft to the touch and resists pilling.

  • Compact yarn processing: A revolutionary spinning technology that twists the fibers in such a way that prevents fuzz and pills from developing on the surface of the fiber.

4. 100％ Made in Japan - Guaranteed ”Japan” Quality

The RAINY DRY® Knit Jacket is produced in Niigata, Japan, which is renowned for producing high-quality knit material. Using the latest Japanese precision technology, the material is produced by one of the top-ranked manufacturers of traditional Japanese goods.

The manufacturer is a long-standing enterprise in its 82nd year of operation and produces goods one by one with care.

The RAINY DRY® Knit Jacket is an innovative product that doubles as rain wear with its superior water-repellent technology, which is derived from a Japanese technology that was developed in order to minimize water and dirt damage to traditional kimonos, or traditional garment.

5. Message from the Producer

I love sweaters. I firmly believe that the warmth and flexibility of knit cannot be matched by any other fabric.

For the past 25 years I’ve been creating sweaters for Japan’s top fashion brands, working in close collaboration with domestic, Japanese manufacturers of threads, knit, and other finished materials.  Drawing on this knowledge and experience, my team and I embarked on a mission to design something unheard of for knit clothing.

After three years of development, our team was finally able to create a knit product that can be worn without umbrellas on a rainy day. We decided to call it “Rainy Dry,” the world’s first ever water-repellent knit jacket.

This product opens entirely new doors to knit products for use in sports and urban environments. We hope that you’ll take the chance to experience this innovative product backed by technology, functionality and design for yourself. It can drastically change your lifestyle!

The brand name “El Alto” is named after a town in Bolivia which I have particularly fond memories of from my travels, while the rhinoceros is an animal I personally admire for its classical elegance.

Keisuke Abe,

Producer, El Alto

6. Product Details

Rugged style

Unisex Size

Metro style

Mens Size

Ladies Size

Knit Cap

Unisex Size

In applying this technology to the finest knit material, we have expanded the potential of knit wear. We have developed two different styles, one for outdoor adventures and one for urban wear, which puts fashion at the forefront. Both styles have a variety of color options.*Please note that although RAINY DRY® has very high water-repellency, it may not completely block water against strong water pressure. 1. Long-lasting and super-strong water-repellency　　The most impressive feature of RAINY DRY® Knit Jacket is its superior water repellency. Water-repellency test : Ketchup

story:
Clique aqui para português:

 

 

Whenever you support us, not only you're helping our business grow, but you're helping the world to become a better place, by sponsoring the education of children and assuring livelihood to several artisans in India who live under vulnerable conditions. 

We provide international quality products with top materials and finishing at amazing prices. Our products come with warranty, and our team is concerned in making all of our clients "happee", so rest assured you'll always have our support.

Embroideries and prints are unique and handmade, and our embroidered products are made in limited quantities, so whenever you buy a piece, it's one of a kind, unlike mass made products. 

These crafts are not merely art forms but also a major source of income, and a big pillar for rural economy in India. Buying products made by these artisans can create a positive impact and change the lives of millions of people.

As we already do, for each product sold, 2 USD are reverted to educate underprivileged children in Jaipur, so growing our company we are also contributing to sponsor the education of more kids. You can learn more at our website.

 

 


  • Made in 100% leather and hand embroidered fabric from Kutch, India.
  • Fits the passports of all countries.
  • Comes with a proper space to keep the boarding pass.
  • Comes with a removable wristlet to add extra handling ability.
  • 3 small pockets to keep various cards, credit/debit/ priority pass or currency cards. 
  • Button closure to keep items safe.
  • Size - 5” X 4.3” inches.

 


  • Removable leather strap, it can be used as a wristlet or simply a wallet.
  • Fits IPhone 6/6s or all the phones which are smaller or of the round about size. 4 small pockets for keeping credit /debit /driver's license or your work ID etc.
  • Zipper pocket for carrying money or coins.
  • Made in 100% natural leather.
  • Size - It has been designed to fit in the palm of any woman’s hand. With the size - 6.8” X 5” on outside, it has 3 divisions, one to carry phone, one for cards and third one for money / any small documents etc.

 


  • Made with natural leather 
  • Front part in fabric hand embroidered by tribal women from Kutch, India.
  • Back part in yellow or pink canvas.
  • Additional removable strap.
  • Inner closure with YKK zip fastener.
  • Card holder, pocket for mobile, and special water bottle holder.

 


  • Made with natural leather 
  • Flap in fabric hand embroidered by tribal women from Kutch, India.
  • Back part in leather with additional YKK zip fastener.
  • Additional removable strap and wristlet, to be used as a clutch or purse.
  • Mobile pocket and inner closure with YKK zip fastener.

 

  • Open sandals made in naturally tanned leather by artisans from Gujarat, India.
  • Hand stitched with cotton threads, ultra resistant.
  • Hand embroidered with golden and silver threads and colorful pom poms.
  • Sizes - 35 to 41 (European). 

 

  • Scarves in organic cotton made by artisans from the traditional area of Bagru, India.
  • Hand printed using the block print technique, with wooden carved blocks.
  • Available in 2 prints.
  • Size: 0,50m x 1,90m.


  • Scarves in gajji silk, traditional from Gujarat, India.
  • Tie dye and clamp dye prints.
  • Available in 3 colors: maroon with yellow tie dye, white with orange tie dye, and blue and white clamp dye.
  • Size: 0,50m x 2m.

 

  • Beach bag made from handwoven recycled plastic.
  • The plastic goes through a careful process of selection, cleaning and segregation according to color and quality. Later on, it is cut into long strips and woven using an ancient technique from Kutch - the pit loom.
  • 2 inner pockets, zipper closure.
  • Available in assorted colors.
  • Size: 14 x 10 inches.

 

 

We work in partnership with the NGO Rays Aasha Ki Ek Kiran, in Jaipur, India, providing funds for the education of the children they assist. Rays helps over 60 children who are HIV+, providing them housing, medical care and quality education at private schools. On our first year, we've been able to fund 1 year of education for 4 children. As we grow, we will help more kids as well.

 

 

The majority of the funds will be used for production. We have also included a budget for visiting more artisans, an amount to develop more samples and marketing efforts.  If we surpass our goals, the remaining amount will be used to increase the production even further.

 

We understand that there are potential snags and challenges that could come up along the way, but we will be completely transparent and will be available with our responses and updates on a regular basis when it comes to production and fulfillment including updates while we are with artisans. In case we do not reach our goal, we will still use the funds we get to develop products, it just will be on a smaller scale. Likewise, if we surpass our target, we will be able to grow even faster.

Any possible delays will be communicated through our Indiegogo updates and our Social Media platforms (Facebook, Twitter and Instagram) and also through emails, but we are making sure it won't happen.

In case you cannot support us, but would still like to help, here is what you can do:

  • Share the link with your friends
  • Follow us on social media

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Português:

 

Somos uma marca de moda social que reverte 2USD de cada venda para educar crianças carentes na Índia. Agora, nós também como objetivo fortalecer a nossa marca, trabalhando em  colaboração direta com artesãos de áreas rurais na Índia, que desenvolvem incríveis bordados feitos à mão, trabalhos em couro, tie dye, estamparia em block print e tecelagem em plástico reciclado, que se tornarão lindos lenços, bolsas e sapatos. Precisamos do seu apoio para globalizar estas formas de arte rurais e capacitá-los financeiramente para continuar os seus ofícios.

 

Quando você nos apois, não está apenas ajudando o nosso negócio a crescer, mas também está ajudando o mundo a se tornar um lugar melhor, patrocinando a educação de crianças e garantindo uma fonte de renda a artesãos na Índia, que vivem em condição de vulnerabilidade. 

Nós oferecemos produtos com qualidade internacional, com as melhores matérias-primas e acabamento e preços incríveis. Nossos produtos possuem garantia, e nossa equipe é preocupada em fazer todos os nossos clientes felizes,  então tenha a certeza de que sempre contará com o nosso apoio.

Bordados e estampas são exclusivos e feitos à mão, e nossos produtos bordados são feitos em quantidades limitadas, então quando você compra um item, é um produto único, ao contrário de produtos feitos em massa. 

Esses ofícios não são apenas formas de arte, mas também uma importante fonte de renda, e um grande pilar para a economia rural na Índia. Ao comprar produtos feitos por esses artesãos, você está ajudando a causar um impacto positivo nas zonas rurais, e mudar a vida de milhões de pessoas.

Como de costume, para cada produto vendido, 2 USD são revertidos para educar crianças carentes em Jaipur. Então, o crescimento de nossa empresa estamos também contribui para patrocinar a educação de mais crianças.


  • Feito em 100% couro e tecido bordado mão de Kutch, na Índia.
  • Acomoda passaportes de todos os países.
  • Vem com um espaço adequado para manter o cartão de embarque.
  • Vem com uma pulseira removível para carregar facilmente no aeroporto.
  • 3 pequenos bolsos para manter cartões.
  • Fechamento de botão para manter os itens seguros.
  • Tamanho - 12,7 x 11cm.


  • Alça de couro removível, pode ser usada como carteira ou pequena bolsa.
  • Acomoda IPhone 6 / 6s ou todos os telefones de igual ou menor tamanho.
  • 4 pequenos bolsos para manter cartão de crédito / débito / carteira de motorista, identidade, etc.
  • Bolso com zíper para guardar dinheiro ou moedas.
  • Feito em couro 100% natural.
  • Tamanho - Projetado para caber na palma da mão de qualquer mulher. Com o tamanho - 17,2 x 12,8cm, tem 3 divisões, uma para telefone, um para cartões e um terceiro para o dinheiro / quaisquer documentos pequenos etc.


  • Feita em couro natural.
  • Aba em tecido bordado à mão por mulheres tribais de Kutch, na Índia.
  • Verso em couro com bolso adicional com zíper YKK.
  • Alça removível adicional, para ser utilizado como clutch ou bolsa.
  • Fecho com tira de couro e fecho interno com zíper YKK.

 


  • Feita em couro natural.
  • Frente em tecido bordado à mão por mulheres tribais de Kutch, na Índia.
  • Verso em lona amarela ou rosa tinta à mão.
  • Alça removível adicional.
  • Fechamento interno com zíper YKK.
  • Compartimento para cartão, bolso para celular e porta garrafa d'água.

  • Sandálias feitas em couro natural pintado à mão por artesãos de Gujarat, na Índia.
  • Sola costurado à mão com fios de algodão, ultra resistente.
  • Couro bordado à mão com fios de ouro e prata e pom poms coloridos.
  • Tamanhos - 33 a 39.

  • Lenços em algodão orgânico feitos por artesãos da região de Bagru, Índia.
  • Estampado com a técnica de block print, tradicional técnica indiana que utiliza blocos esculpidos em madeira.
  • Disponível em 2 estampas.
  • Tamanho: 0,50m x 1,90m.

  • Lenços de seda gajji, tradicionais de Gujarat, na Índia.
  • 2 opções em tie dye (vinho com amarelo e branco com laranja) e uma opção em clamp dye (azul com branco).
  • Tamanho: 0,50m x 2m.

  • Bolsa de praia feita a partir de plástico reciclado tecido à mão.
  • O plástico passa por um cuidadoso processo de seleção, limpeza e segregação de acordo com a cor e qualidade. Mais tarde, ele é cortado em tiras longas e tecido usando uma técnica antiga de Kutch - o tear de cova.
  • 2 bolsos interiores, fecho com zíper.
  • Disponível em cores sortidas.
  • Tamanho: 35,60 x 25,5cm.
  •  

 

 

Nós trabalhamos em parceria com a ONG Rays Aasha Ki Ek Kiran, em Jaipur, Índia, destinando fundos para a educação das crianças que eles acolhem. A Rays ajuda mais de 60 crianças soropostivas, proporcionando moradia, cuidados médicos e educação em escolas particulares às crianças. Em nosso primeiro ano, conseguimos patrocinar 1 ano de educação para 4 crianças. À medida em que crescermos, ajudaremos mais crianças. 

 

     

     

    A maioria dos fundos serão usados para a produção. Incluímos também um orçamento para visitar mais artesãos, uma quantidade de desenvolver mais amostras e esforços de marketing. Se eu ultrapassar os nossos objectivos, o montante restante será usado para aumentar a produção ainda mais.

    Entendemos que existem potenciais dificuldades e desafios que possam surgir ao longo do caminho, mas vamos ser completamente transparente e estará disponível com as nossas respostas e atualizações em uma base regular quando se trata de atualizações de produção e atendimento inclusive enquanto estamos com artesãos . Em caso de não alcançar o nosso objectivo, ainda vamos usar os fundos que recebemos para desenvolver produtos, ele só será em uma escala menor. Da mesma forma, se eu ultrapassar a nossa meta, vamos ser capazes de crescer ainda mais rápido.

    Quaisquer atrasos possíveis serão comunicados por meio de nossas atualizações IndieGoGo e as nossas plataformas de mídia social (Facebook, Twitter e Instagram) e também através de e-mails, mas estamos certificando-se de que não vai acontecer.

     

    No caso de você não pode nos apoiar, mas ainda gostaria de ajudar, aqui está o que você pode fazer:
    Compartilhar o link com os seus amigos
    Siga-nos nas redes sociais
