Alça removível adicional.
Fechamento interno com zíper YKK.

Compartimento para cartão, bolso para celular e porta garrafa d'água.




Sandálias feitas em couro natural pintado à mão por artesãos de Gujarat, na Índia.

Sola costurado à mão com fios de algodão, ultra resistente.

Couro bordado à mão com fios de ouro e prata e pom poms coloridos.
Tamanhos - 33 a 39.




Lenços em algodão orgânico feitos por artesãos da região de Bagru, Índia.
Estampado com a técnica de block print, tradicional técnica indiana que utiliza blocos esculpidos em madeira.

Disponível em 2 estampas.

Tamanho: 0,50m x 1,90m.



Lenços de seda gajji, tradicionais de Gujarat, na Índia.
2 opções em tie dye (vinho com amarelo e branco com laranja) e uma opção em clamp dye (azul com branco).
Tamanho: 0,50m x 2m.



Bolsa de praia feita a partir de plástico reciclado tecido à mão.
O plástico passa por um cuidadoso processo de seleção, limpeza e segregação de acordo com a cor e qualidade. Mais tarde, ele é cortado em tiras longas e tecido usando uma técnica antiga de Kutch - o tear de cova.
2 bolsos interiores, fecho com zíper.
Disponível em cores sortidas.
Tamanho: 35,60 x 25,5cm.
 


 

 

Nós trabalhamos em parceria com a ONG Rays Aasha Ki Ek Kiran, em Jaipur, Índia, destinando fundos para a educação das crianças que eles acolhem. A Rays ajuda mais de 60 crianças soropostivas, proporcionando moradia, cuidados médicos e educação em escolas particulares às crianças. Em nosso primeiro ano, conseguimos patrocinar 1 ano de educação para 4 crianças. À medida em que crescermos, ajudaremos mais crianças. 
 


 

 

A maioria dos fundos serão usados para a produção. Incluímos também um orçamento para visitar mais artesãos, uma quantidade de desenvolver mais amostras e esforços de marketing. Se eu ultrapassar os nossos objectivos, o montante restante será usado para aumentar a produção ainda mais.


Entendemos que existem potenciais dificuldades e desafios que possam surgir ao longo do caminho, mas vamos ser completamente transparente e estará disponível com as nossas respostas e atualizações em uma base regular quando se trata de atualizações de produção e atendimento inclusive enquanto estamos com artesãos . Em caso de não alcançar o nosso objectivo, ainda vamos usar os fundos que recebemos para desenvolver produtos, ele só será em uma escala menor. Da mesma forma, se eu ultrapassar a nossa meta, vamos ser capazes de crescer ainda mais rápido.
Quaisquer atrasos possíveis serão comunicados por meio de nossas atualizações IndieGoGo e as nossas plataformas de mídia social (Facebook, Twitter e Instagram) e também através de e-mails, mas estamos certificando-se de que não vai acontecer.
 

No caso de você não pode nos apoiar, mas ainda gostaria de ajudar, aqui está o que você pode fazer:Compartilhar o link com os seus amigosSiga-nos nas redes sociais

story:
Join the <1% movement 

Liberti’s <1% Collection seeks to raise awareness for the less than one percent of refugees worldwide who are fortunate enough to escape the hardships of refugee camps, and for the 99 percent who remain behind. 

Six <1% uniquely designed pieces

We bring you handcrafted, beautiful jewelry exclusively available to you through Indiegogo for a limited time. Be a part of our mission of love, hope, and change by wearing and sharing the collection to help kickstart Liberti and empower the <1% in their journey.

Here’s how you can support Liberti:

1. VIEW  the <1% Collection jewelry available for pre-order listed below.  

2. DECIDE which piece of jewelry “reward or special perk” you want to purchase.  What is a perk? As part of our crowd, you’ll get exclusive product rewards and perks as a special thank you for being first to purchase our jewelry. 

3. LOOK for the name of the special reward to the right and CLICK on it. 

4. COMPLETE check out using secure form as a guest or login if you’re returning to Indiegogo. Orders can be shipped anywhere in the world. 

If you solely want to make a pledge to Liberti’s Apprenticeship Program

1. CLICK on the “Contribute Now” hot pink button located at the top right. With every dollar you pledge, we can extend it to become a true investment in the life of a resettled refugee in America. They will develop the skills needed to support the growing demand for domestically produced handcrafted products through our apprenticeship training program.  To learn more about the program scroll down the page.  

2. ENTER your payment information into the secure form to check out.  

3. That's it. It takes less than 2 minutes to pre-order or contribute, and Indiegogo will follow up with a confirmation

Featured In:

Every dollar you pledge will be an investment in the life of a resettled refugee in America through the Liberti apprenticeship training program, used to develop skills needed to support the growing demand for domestically produced handcrafted products in the U.S. Studies show that those who complete apprenticeship programs have career earnings of $240,000 and higher than those of similar non-participants.

Thoughtfully and gracefully designed, each piece is created to invoke curiosity and be a conversation starter every time you wear it. Day or night, casual or formal, this collection will allow you to exude a rare blend of confidence, charm and exquisite taste, while radiating a positive glow from knowing you brought a little more beauty to the world.


 

Our vision is to empower all US refugees to be free to live the American dream. We’re dedicated to integrating American refugees in all aspects of our business and providing on-the-job training and career building opportunities to ensure growth and professional development. Eventually, we hope to give all employees the opportunity to become shareholders in the company they're helping to build. We intend to accomplish this while continuing to create one-of-a-kind, beautiful and fashion-forward accessories with the highest quality materials, handmade in the USA.
Liberti’s Impact & Apprenticeship Program: 

With your support on Indiegogo, we will launch an apprenticeship program on-boarding refugee employees in all aspects of our business. This includes on-the-job training and career building opportunities that resettled refugees in the U.S. need to be successful. 



The Liberti team is modest in size but large in heart and dedication. We work hard to help our country's newcomers to be free to live the dream that we all have been blessed with. Each person in our Liberti family plays an integral part in our humble operation in Denver and Rhode Island. We appreciate all of the hard work that has made this vision a reality. 

Here is just a small sample of the Liberti crew we are proud to call them teammates, brand ambassadors, partners and fellow social impact makers. 


                                                         

Prior to founding Liberti, I have been privileged to partner with not only innovative U.S. startups as a social impact marketing consultant, but also as a senior sales and marketing partner with Fortune 500 companies including United Airlines, AT&T and American Express. During this 25 years, I have grown to appreciate the opportunities available to me as an American entrepreneur, due in large part to the efforts of our veterans and the hard work of our own refugee/immigrant families. I trace my own refugee heritage to the forced migration of French immigrants from Canada to New Orleans. It is with gratitude and honor to our own immigrant families that has inspired a desire in me to "pay it forward" to assist in refugee assimilation in America today. I am blessed to be part of a  team that is passionate and committed to supporting the <1% movement,  and am especially thankful for our manufacturing partner Raul Maldonado. Raul, an immigrant from Bolivia, sought opportunity in the U.S. to develop his craft and establish a business focused on designer quality jewelry. With more than 25 years of jewelry designer experience, Raul has worked with elite brands such as Tiffany’s designer Elsa Peretti’s famous gold snake, bean pendant, wire bangle, open heart and many more. I am honored that Raul has offered to serve as the lead of Liberti’s jewelry production and Jewelry Apprenticeship Program, offering to "pay it forward" as well by sharing his extensive knowledge of handcrafting fine jewelry and empowering US refugees with artisan skills.

It is with gratitude and hope that we begin this new American story called Liberti.


What is the <1% Campaign?

According to the United Nations Refugee Agency (UNHCR), there are 14.4 million refugees of concern around the world, and of this vast number, less than one percent are submitted for resettlement. Liberti has created our newest line, the Less Than 1% Collection, to elevate awareness for the less than one percent of refugees fortunate enough to escape the brutality of refugee camps, yet still face further hardships as they begin to settle in their new countries and rebuild their lives.

Even though these refugees escape, they still face further hardship as they begin to settle in their new countries and rebuild their lives. By creating opportunities to empower our resettled refugees in the U.S., Liberti and other similar organizations can reduce the number of those marginalized by society and help everyone be free to live the dream. 

Is Liberti jewelry sold in stores?

Not yet, but we hope to partner with retail stores in the near future. If you're a socially conscious retailer interested in carrying our high-end jewelry while making a social impact, please find more information on our website here.

Where is Liberti jewelry made?

Everything is made in the USA! Our manufacturing facility is located in Rhode Island and our distribution and marketing center is located in Denver, Colorado.  

What materials are used for Liberti jewelry?

Our jewelry uses the finest stones, beads and precious metals, including nickel-free silver, brass made with copper, and pure 14 and 18 karat gold. All materials are ethically and sustainably sourced.  Learn more here.

What’s your process for making the jewelry?

From start to finish, we put a tremendous amount of creativity, care and passion into every piece we lovingly create and produce right here in America.

Liberti’s team of artists are the ones who concept, design, and develop our entire line using a proprietary blend of time-honored jewelry-making techniques and technologies, resulting in little pieces of perfection we know you’ll love.

Where do we ship?

We ship to all states in the US and around the world. Just note that when placing an order for delivery outside the United States, you are considered the importer of record and must comply with all applicable laws and regulations. Charges for duties, taxes and the carrier's collection fee are your responsibility.

When will I receive my order?

All pre-orders will be delivered by the time frame noted in the rewards descriptions. See the descriptions under the "Select A Perk" section at the top right side of this page. We use FedEx Ground for all orders placed. Your order will leave our warehouse within three business days (excluding pre-ordered items, which will have an extended shipping timeline). Transportation time in the US is typically an additional two to five days. International shipping is based upon your location. You’ll be notified of your tracking number once your order has shipped. If you require faster delivery, you can choose the express option for an additional charge.

What is your return policy?

Enjoy a one-year warranty on all Liberti products for damage caused by shipping or production defects. Please contact us and we will be happy to assist you with your replacement.

Is Liberti a non-profit?

As a mission-inspired company, Liberti’s business model blends the best of business and social impact with a for-profit but mission-driven bottom line. Our plan is to launch an apprenticeship program to onboard refugees and integrate them into all aspects of our business, while providing on-the-job training and career building opportunities they need to be successful. Our goal is to give all employees the ability to become shareholders in the company they’re helping to create.

Where are the Indiegogo funds going?

We’re launching on Indiegogo to kickstart our apprenticeship program, expanding the production of the <1% collection and the creation of beautiful, meaningful jewelry.  All Indiegogo pledged funds will go directly to the training of Liberti Creators  and funding purchases of tools and hardware.

Every dollar you pledge will be an investment in the life of a resettled refugee in America through the Liberti apprenticeship training program, used to develop of skills needed to support the growing demand for domestically produced handcrafted products in the U.S. Studies show that those who complete apprenticeship programs have career earnings of $240,000 and higher than those of similar non-participants. These increased earnings will not only enhance the lives of resettled refugee families, but also directly benefit US taxpayers by reducing demand for provided services and direct resettlement costs, estimated to be $257,000 for a refugee household over 5 years.

What is our Apprenticeship Program?

Our program is an employer-driven program that provides our refugee employees a “learn while you earn” model that combines on-the-job training with job-related mentors who provide training and instruction tied to the attainment of the skills required for the job.  Our unique model also involves progressive increases as our apprentice’s skills increase.

Liberti is leveraging the latest in technologies, 3D printing, online commerce, and innovations in training. We also use a strengths finder resource development through the complete involvement of our apprenticeship program.  All of our apprentices start working when they enter into our apprenticeship program and benefit from steady wage increases as they become more proficient. Our program will mirror the average starting wage for apprenticeship in the US, which is $15 per hour. Learn more about the areas of focus for the apprenticeship on our website here.

How are the refugees identified and how is their relationship managed by Liberti?

Liberti has partnered with several nonprofit agencies who provide support services, assimilation and needs assessments for newly arrived refugees. Our partners help us determine the refugees who would be a good fit for our company and learn more about the candidate's background. We also have a very detailed application process and we look to hire and invest in refugees who are: responsible, organized, self-starters, creative, quick learners, detail-oriented and have an interest in developing their skills to help grow the business.

How do people distinguish between refugees and undocumented immigrants?

An undocumented immigrant is someone who chooses to resettle in another country, but does not have the legal documents to seek residency and/or citizenship. Refugees do not have the choice to remain in their home country. They have fled to escape from war and persecution, often losing or leaving behind beloved family members along the way.

Where are Liberti’s refugees from?

Many of our potential refugees for our apprenticeship program will be coming from Nepal, Sudan, Iraq, Burma, Somalia or other poor or war-torn parts of the world. All potential applicants to the program must have come to the U.S. legally under the refugee asylum program. Our applicants must have a valid I-94 form and/or (aka “green card”) to apply and become a Liberti Creator.

How does money from a purchase flow back to each refugee employee and the apprenticeship program?

We reinvest profits back into the company and our apprenticeship programs. Our vision is to provide additional company-paid educational opportunities, 401K plan and profit sharing to all. We want to provide a path for success within Liberti so all can find their purpose and support within their new community and homeland and be free to live the dream.

Why the name and crown symbol?

The word Liberti is a unique spelling on the word Liberty which means to be free to live the dream. Our logo is derived from the Statue of Liberty’s crown which represents the 7 seas and 7 continents of the world and has been an icon of freedom and a welcoming signal to immigrants arriving from abroad.  “Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to be free."


Today in the U.S., there’s an unprecedented demand for handmade and artisan products in the gift, home and accessories markets. The current market is filled with brands and designers doing admirable work in third-world countries to help empower families and lives abroad. Popular brands such as Toms and Me2We have proven wildly successful at helping consumers believe they are changing the world with their everyday purchases.

Liberti will capitalize on the good will and consumer behavior generated by these social pioneers, but with a different spin since our artisans are the poor and marginalized living right here in America. We will focus on creating fashionable accessories and jewelry that are already in demand, but provide a touch of culture and unique story behind each beautifully handcrafted piece.

Utilizing a strong team of marketers, strategists, industry designers and friends, Liberti has developed plans to help address the various hurdles of launching a new business in the highly competitive accessories market. But we also recognize we still have many steps and hurdles to conquer. Some of these hurdles include: 

• Customer service to support initial demand from Liberti fans and rapid exponential customer growth 

• Cultural and language barriers from a diverse workforce 

• Retail partners for multi-year exclusive representation 

• Ensuring our entire supply chain supports and meets ethical and sustainable industry standards

If you think you can help us with our challenges, recognize a challenge we may have not addressed, or can add value to the Liberti mission, we’d love to hear from you. We welcome your questions, ideas and insights surrounding our launch. Feel free to reach out to us and join in on this exciting adventure to create a movement of social impact businesses that, together, can truly change the course of this country. 

Cheers to Liberti!

Reward Upgrades

Already backed the project? Thank you! And you can still add on additional rewards. Simply adjust your pledge amount to include the value of any of the products listed. At the end of the campaign, you will be able to indicate exactly which new rewards you want. Email us at hello@libertiusa.com if you have any questions.

story:
The World's First Super Umbrella

offering Weather Detection System, Loss Prevention, Patented Safety Runner, Super LED Overhead Lighting, Feather Weight & Ergonomic Design Handle.



The weather always seems to change at the wrong time. From sunshine to rain, right at the moment when we don't have our umbrella. It's Murphy's Law after all, right? TARAbrella is your rainy-day companion! A smart umbrella that gives you the weather forecast, you turn a rainy day into an exciting day. TARAbrella is always there to remind you to bring your umbrella when the weather's about to change.

No more checking your phone or weather app to decide if you should bring your umbrella! TARAbrella uses 3 modes of weather indicator lights to alert you directly whether to bring it or not. It not only gives your weather forecast, but also helps you make decision, bringing simplicity and convenience to your life! Combined with its anti-lost tracker, glowing LED tip, and carbon-fiber material five times stronger than steel, yet lighter than a smartphone, you get yourself the coolest smart umbrella!






TARAbrella Has a Mind of its Own

TARAbrella provides you with accurate weather forecast within 6 hours! Looking at the clouds and not sure if you should bring an umbrella before leaving home? TARAbrella will help alert you!



Your smartphone will tell you the weather, but it’s just one more thing you need to do with your phone. With TARAbrella, there’s no turning on phones, charging phones, or skimming through weather apps. The bright glow of the LED light bar built into TARAbrella’s handle tell you in 3 easy to identify indicators what to expect from mother nature as you head out the door; transparent for sunny or partially cloudy days safe to leave the umbrella at home; flashing blue for an overcast day with a chance of drizzle and solid blue on days when you can surely expect rain.  

  

Never Lose Your Umbrella Again

As if an umbrella that predicts the weather all on its own wasn’t enough, we didn’t stop there with the TARAbrella.  Stylish, built to last and packed with features, the TARAbrella is one umbrella you won’t want to lose - and with its built-in loss prevention system, you never will!

Simply detach TARAbrella’s wireless pocket fob, slide it in your pocket, and you’ll be sure to never misplace or leave the TARAbrella in a café or pub while out on the town.  The TARAbrella’s pocket fob will beep to remind you of your umbrella once separated by a distance of about 30 feet.



Super LED Overhead Lighting

The ultrabright LED overhead light at the crown of the TARAbrella will light your path in the dark or in fog, and provides visibility of your presence to motorists.  Stay safe and dry with the TARAbrella.



Patented Safety Runner

TARAbrella’s patented safety runner ensures easy and and comfortable opening and closing of the umbrella, guaranteed to never pinch your fingers.  The umbrella’s runner and framework are constructed of a carbon-fiber material five times stronger than steel, able to withstand even the most extreme weather conditions.  


Light As Feather

Weighing less than an iPhone (really!), the TARAbrella still manages to be five times stronger than steel with its carbon fiber structure.


Style and Comfort

It may be high-tech in the world of umbrellas, but the TARAbrella is as stylish as it is smart and practical.  With TARAbrella, we have paid attention to detail as well as comfort.  TARAbrella’s ergonomic handle - made to fit in your hand comfortably for hours – is just one example of our attention to detail.

Wall Mount Charging Cradle

TARAbrella includes a charging cradle that can easily be mounted to the wall, meant to both charge and hold the TARAbrella while allowing the TARAbrella’s weather indicator to be easily visible as you head out the door.




Packed inside the TARAbrella are the sensors and “brain” of TARAbrella which allow it to provide you with an accurate prediction of the day’s weather.  Inside TARAbrella, data provided by a digital barometer measures atmosphere pressure every 35 seconds while a digital hygrometer constantly measures humidity.  Add in a little electronic wizardry to analyze the combined data, and TARAbrella is able to provide an accurate, constantly updated forecast of what to expect from mother nature through the simple LED indicator bar built into TARAbrella’s handle.

 








We've had enough frustrating experience being caught in the rain with no umbrella nearby, that's why we've decided to dedicate ourselves to designing the most outstanding umbrella. We've focused our energy in the past 12 months to develop TARAbrella. In our design process, we've overcome many challenges in order to develop the mechanism and waterproof capabilities the product currently has. Now, we are proud of be able to present TARAbrella to the world.













Our team is made up with experienced engineers, designers and creative people who have years of experience in the umbrella, product design and manufacturing industry.



Your contributions are vital in order to get TARAbrella into manufacturing. TARAbrella seeks individuals who recognize the outdated technology in the everyday umbrella, and wishes to reimagine the umbrella as an intelligent and sophisticated marvel instead of an antiquated burden. The cost of our first production run can be overcome with the help of your great support. If you are tired of the dreary rainy day, help the TARAbrella to be born.


Thank you to our amazing producer TNO Production helps us to finish all the art designs and video.

Thank you to our wonderful advisers Tronson help us finish the industry design of TARAbrella.

Now, we are proud of be able to present TARAbrella to the world.










Our team is made up with experienced engineers, designers and creative people who have years of experience in the umbrella, product design and manufacturing industry.




Your contributions are vital in order to get TARAbrella into manufacturing. TARAbrella seeks individuals who recognize the outdated technology in the everyday umbrella, and wishes to reimagine the umbrella as an intelligent and sophisticated marvel instead of an antiquated burden. The cost of our first production run can be overcome with the help of your great support. If you are tired of the dreary rainy day, help the TARAbrella to be born.






Thank you to our amazing producer TNO Production helps us to finish all the art designs and video.



Thank you to our wonderful advisers Tronson help us finish the industry design of TARAbrella.



















Q1: What accessories will come with each TARAbrella?
A: Each TARAbrella comes with :
     Rechargeable Stand x 1
     Anti-lost Tracker x 1
     Micro-USB cable x 1Q2: How does TARAbrella forecast weather by itself?
A: TARAbrella’s can forecast weather by itself with both the data of a barometer and a humidity-meter to accurately estimate the weather within 6 hours. Firstly, it uses the barometer to determine the change of pressure over time (every 35 seconds). So, if the pressure drops, there is a greater chance of rain. Secondly, The humidity-meter provides information of the moisture levels in the environment, which combined with pressure levels forecasts the weather. With the sensor integrated into the handle, the LED light indicator will show you every time the weather changes.
Q3: How long does TARAbrella’s battery last after fully charge?
A: We designed the TARAbrella to be very energy efficient so that only need a very small built-in battery, which you can charge via rechargeable stand . The battery life would depends on how often you use the weather signal bar and LED light features. The battery can last for 100 hours if the weather signal bar keep turning-on; If both the weather signal bar and super LED light keep turning-on, it can last for more than 30 hours in estimate.
Q4: What is the size and weight of TARAbrella?
A: TARAbrella is 83cm long when closed, and its canopy is 104cm when openning. It weighs 198g only.
Q5: What is the Anti-Lost function of TARAbrella?
A: TARAbrella has a built-in, detachable tracker that can help you keep tracking on your TARAbrella so that you will never lose or forget it. When you leave your TARAbrella at one of your preset safe locations, for example, your home, office, or car, the tracker won't bother you. However, once you are 10+ meters away from your TARAbrella, the tracker will beep.
Q6: What does the 4 situations in 3 modes of TARAbrella mean?
A: The 4 situations mean sunny, partially cloudy, cloudy and rainy day. The 3 modes mean transparent mode, sparkling mode, and whole blue mode of the TARAbrella’s weather signal bar. The weather signal bar will be transparent for sunny and partially cloudy days, and it will appear sparkling blue light for cloudy day, and whole blue light for rainy day.
Q7: How much is shipping?






A: One TARAbrella: China/Hong Kong is $10 USD, All other countries are $15 USD
     Two TARAbrella: China/Hong Kong is $20 USD, All other countries are $25 USD

story:
Still want to purchase a wallet?  www.articulatelifestyle.com



How is the 2.0 improved? 

We took all the feedback and suggestions we received from our backers and created an even better wallet. 

  • The Articulate Wallet 2.0 now uses an upgraded premium full grain imported Italian leather that looks and feels amazing.   We wanted a wallet that would compare to the inflated designer brand wallets.  Not only does it look and feel the same, it incorporates features that no other wallet has. 
  • The new design has six card slots with slanted corners to make for quick access.  It is truly one of a kind. 




  • The 2.0 is now 1/2in THINNER then the 1.0.  ONLY .35in!! This makes it as thin as an iPhone!  By using an upgraded leather, we were able to make one of the thinnest leather bill-folds on the market today.
  • Seamless, refined build quality. The edges of the wallet now wrap inside of the wallet. This makes for a professional, higher quality wallet.  
  • The lining on the back pocket wraps over itself. 
  • We added a special RFID blocking lining. You can now feel secure that all your personal information, including the card in the back pocket, are protected from RFID identity theft.   Other RFID blocking wallets on the market are boring/bulky and have nothing unique about them.   
  • We widened the wallet by 1/4in to hold your bills more easily. 
  • The ability to fully customize at a very affordable price- $55

Articulate Wallet 2.0 Collection




The Story-

Articulate began just over a year ago, when we set out to create a wallet that would simplify our lives.  We launched our first design on Kickstarter and thanks to the overwhelming support, we were successfully funded.  We fulfilled over 3,000 orders and since then have received feedback and suggestions for a better wallet.  Taking them into consideration we have come up with something truly unique and one of a kind.  

We wanted a wallet that was convenient to use, looked great, and was thin at the same time.  Money clips are a one solution to keeping it thin, but we found it very inconvenient folding your bills to put them away.  The standard bill-folds we found on the market were either too bulky, too cheap looking, or way over priced.  The Articulate Wallet 2.0 gives you everything you look for in the perfect wallet.  An ultra-thin minimalist design, convenient to use, and all at a very affordable price.


Customize Your Articulate 

Although we offer TEN great looking wallets, we wanted to give our Indiegogo supporters the opportunity to make this wallet their own.  Whether it's your favorite sports team's colors, patriotic colors, company colors, school colors etc., we wanted our supporters to have that choice.  Mix n' Match any of the leather colors we offer in the 2.0 collection, along with any stitching color.  

What is RFID and why should I care?

Whether its your debit/credit card or you government issued ID or driver's license, these cards now include RF(radio frequency) enabled chips.  When these chips come into contact with radio waves, they respond with a slightly altered signal. The response can contain encoded personal identifying information, including the card holder's name, address, Social Security Number, phone number, and pertinent account or employee information.  Upon capturing this data, thieves are then able to program their own cards to respond in an identical fashion (via 'cloning'). Many sites are dedicated to nothing but teaching people how to perform this act, as well as supplying the necessary equipment and software.

With the Articulate Wallet 2.0, ALL of your information is protected, including the card in the back pocket.  Feel safe that all your personal information is protected in an ultra thin and stylish design.  

The Perfect Wallet

•Patent Pending back pocket for your most used card

•SIX easy access card slots

•TWO underneath pockets for business cards and change

•RFID blocking

•Ultra Thin minimalist design (.35in)

•Several colors to choose from + International version

•Customizable

Your Support

This is where Indiegogo comes in. We need your support to launch this new line of wallets. We are raising funding for the manufacturing, packaging, shipping costs and logistics of the Articulate Wallet 2.0.  With your help, we can take this next step, and deliver an even better wallet then before.  Although it is just a wallet, we hope to provide simplicity in your everyday life.  Thank you so much for the support!  

Manufacturing

Articulate Wallet 2.0 are made from 100% full grain genuine Italian leather.  We have established a great relationship with our manufacturer and know they will deliver the highest of quality wallet once we are successfully funded. We have the packaging material designed and ready to go. Now, with your help we can get out the first production run of our newest Articulate Wallet!  Your pledge will go directly into the production and final assembly costs of the wallets, allowing us to meet the minimum order quantity. If you have any suggestions on how we can improve the wallet, or would like to give some feedback, we would love to hear it.  Your support is greatly appreciated!!

Risks and Challenges

The challenges of Articulate Wallet 2.0 will be getting the word out, and convincing backers to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

story:
Spinners/Fidgets

Keep envisioning X’s and O’s? Want to get 3 in a row? Bored of twiddling your thumbs? Pre-order the Tiktakto from EDC Machining!

  • Quit bad habits!
  • Pass time and look at pretty colors!
  • Upgrade to a true gentleman/woman's pocket carry tool!

The Tiktakto design was inspired by the idea of things just lining up in life. Get 3 in a row!

What We Need & What You Get

We need capital to fund tooling and materials to get you the cheapest precious metal spinner to date!

  • For backing the project, you will receive a Tiktakto spinner in your choice of Brass, Copper, Stainless Steel, or Bronze, complete with hybrid ceramic bearing and custom anodized aluminum endcaps!

Risks & Challenges

We currently run the risk of not meeting our goal and being out the setup and materials for the prototype units currently being created. We need to receive enough orders to meet our funding goal and break even, creating a great spinner and delivering it to you, the customer.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share this campaign with your friends!
  • Like @edc_machining on instagram!

story:
Short Summary

  • My name's Beckie, I'm 21 and have a positive outlook on traveling while one has the ability to. Growing spiritually, emotionally and personally as you seek out other places is one of the best things you can do for yourself.
  • Having an opportunity to leave home doesn't come very often. This opened up because I have no ties to what I now call "home" in Oklahoma. I'm looking to call Los Angeles my home for a while. I also have an opportunity to research and go one-on-one with models and get some insight on the fashion there. 
  • Anything that is contributed will be more than helpful. Everything I earn is more than what I had before. I cannot express my gratitude and gratefulness enough on this campaign. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • My goal is $600. What is earned will be used for transportation in the city.
  • I'll be living minimally while I'm there, not out extravagantly spending money. 
  • If I can get enough insight and experience, I'll be looking to change my blog to a more fashion-based blog and share my experiences. 

The Impact

  • The impact will not change the world, but it will change my world. Every bit that is earned will go towards educating myself and seeking out the information I otherwise cannot get. 
  • My life is meant to be one big experience and this adds onto another chapter I can talk about. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • I understand everyone isn't able to contribute. I completely understand. If you'd like to help get the word out, you can use the Indiegogo share tools. 
  • EVERYTHING IS APPRECIATED.

I'll be living minimally while I'm there, not out extravagantly spending money. 
If I can get enough insight and experience, I'll be looking to change my blog to a more fashion-based blog and share my experiences.

My life is meant to be one big experience and this adds onto another chapter I can talk about.

EVERYTHING IS APPRECIATED.

story:
Hi! This is Robert. :)

I'm a 24 year old fashion designer, who finished fashion school about 1 year ago and willing to launch my own brand, open my own business online and hopefully a physical store in Valencia, Spain (for now).

I started thinking about launching my own brand in May, 2014. That is when I started the illustrations, technical drawings, and browsing for manufacturers. In July, 2014 I asked for some of the samples from the collection: a couple of bags, couple of shoes, few dresses, pants, blouses and skirts.

And at this point is where ‘indiegogo’ kicks in. This is the point where I need your help to get the funding I need to make this dream come true: the factories have their minimum order quantity, which is not very high, but without your support, I can’t meet the MOQ.

What I Need & What You Get

My funding goal is ambitious. Can’t deny that! € 50.000 is a lot of money to ask for, and in such short period of time. Let me tell you what I’m going to do with the money:  

  • Anything raised up to € 7.500 will help me launch the bags collection. All bags are made of real, authentic leather.
  • If I reach € 15.000, I can also launch the shoes collection. Same as bags, they are all made of real leather.
  • If I go up to € 35.000, I will launch the clothing line, consisting of two lines: a casual line, and a formal one.
  • And if things really wind up well, and I get to the € 50.000 goal, I can open the actual store in Valencia, Spain.
  • Anything raised over the € 50.000 goal, will go straight into new designs, to expand the collection, and bring you more variety in styles, shapes and colours.
I am realistic about this whole funding thing, and I am aware that there’s a big chance for me not to meet the goals, and not being able to fulfil this dream of mine. This being told, I am putting aside my negativity, and try to stay positive. I really hope that there are people that share my dream and believe in me, in my project.
As a gratitude for your kindness and support, I have some rewards, listed below:
  • For € 5, you will receive a thank you e-mail, for supporting this project.
  • For € 10, you will receive a thank you e-mail, for supporting this project, and one signed illustration.
  • For € 25, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, and a 5% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after opening the store.
  • For € 50, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, and a 10% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after opening the store.
  • For € 100, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, and a 25% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after opening the store.
  • For € 250, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, and the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag.
  • For € 500, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag and the black stilettos.
  • For € 1.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos and the black boots.
  • For € 1.500, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos, the black boots and the black and green dress (from the video).
  • For € 3.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos, the black boots, the black and green dress and the black grain leather shoulder bag.
  • For € 5.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos, the black boots, the black and green dress, the black grain leather shoulder bag and the burgundy knee-length dress with sleeves.
  • For € 10.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos, the black boots, the black and green dress, the black grain leather shoulder bag, the burgundy knee-length dress with sleeves and the pink coat.
  • For € 15.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black stilettos, the black boots, the black and green dress, the black grain leather shoulder bag, the burgundy knee-length dress with sleeves and the pink coat and a 70% DISCOUNT for 24months.

(Shipping for all the rewards described above, is not included)

         

    

   


If you can't (or don't want to) contribute - and don't be afraid to say you just don't want to - there's no judgement here! Then you can still help massively just by spreading the word! Share the link, use the Indiegogo share tools on all of your social media platforms and help spread the word to anyone and everyone who may want to contribute!

And most of all, thank you all just for reading this.
story_txt:
Hi! This is Robert. :)
I'm a 24 year old fashion designer,
who finished fashion school about 1 year ago and willing to launch my own
brand, open my own business online and hopefully a physical store in Valencia,
Spain (for now).
I started thinking about launching
my own brand in May, 2014. That is when I started the illustrations, technical
drawings, and browsing for manufacturers. In July, 2014 I asked for some of the
samples from the collection: a couple of bags, couple of shoes, few dresses,
pants, blouses and skirts.
And at this point is where ‘indiegogo’
kicks in. This is the point where I need your help to get the funding I need to
make this dream come true: the factories have their minimum order quantity,
which is not very high, but without your support, I can’t meet the MOQ.
What I
Need & What You Get
My funding goal is ambitious. Can’t
deny that! € 50.000 is a lot of money to ask for, and in such short period of
time. Let me tell you what I’m going to do with the money:  

Anything raised up to € 7.500 will help me launch the
bags collection. All bags are made of real, authentic leather.

If I reach € 15.000, I can also launch the shoes
collection. Same as bags, they are all made of real leather.

If I go up to € 35.000, I will launch the clothing
line, consisting of two lines: a casual line, and a formal one.

And if things really wind up well, and I get to the €
50.000 goal, I can open the actual store in Valencia, Spain.

Anything raised over the € 50.000 goal, will go
straight into new designs, to expand the collection, and bring you more variety
in styles, shapes and colours.
I am realistic about this whole funding thing, and I am aware that there’s a big chance for me not to meet the goals, and not being able to fulfil this dream of mine. This being told, I am putting aside my negativity, and try to stay positive. I really hope that there are people that share my dream and believe in me, in my project.
As a gratitude for your kindness and support, I have some rewards, listed below:

For € 5, you will receive a thank you e-mail, for supporting this project.

For € 10, you will receive a thank you e-mail, for supporting this project, and one signed illustration.

For € 25, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, and a 5% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after opening the store.

For € 50, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, and a 10% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after
opening the store.

For € 100, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, and a 25% DISCOUNT for the first 3 months after
opening the store.

For € 250, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, and the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag.

For € 500, you will receive a thank you e-mail for supporting
this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag and the black
stilettos.

For € 1.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black
stilettos and the black boots.

For € 1.500, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black
stilettos, the black boots and the black and green dress (from the video).

For € 3.000, you will receive a thank you e-mail for
supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black
stilettos, the black boots, the black and green dress and the black grain
leather shoulder bag.

supporting this project/dream, the black acrylic clutch/shoulder bag, the black

story:
Our Facebook Page

Thank you for visiting our Indiegogo page. In order for Elfer to continue with his work, we must now raise funds which will allow us to invest in inventory and an online store. In exchange for your contribution we are offering online store presale bargains as perks. The online store will open  with a variety of Elfer's uniquely designed fashions, accessories and home décor items. You can see many examples of his work below.

While here please take the time to visit with us below in order to gain a better understanding of what Elfer Castro and our company represents; ethically, socially and environmentally.  

Thank you for any support you are able to provide.   

What We Need:

  • $29,500 for the purchase of raw materials, and to pay women's cooperatives to have the Elfer's creations made; and
  • $5,500 for website and online store development.
  • Anything raised beyond our goal will allow us to expand our product line, thereby providing more income to the women who produce our products.
  • You to make a contribution.
  • You to help us get the word out to as many people as possible through your social network.
  • You to Like us on Facebook.
What You Get:
  • The satisfaction of knowing that you are directly helping the women in the poor, remote regions of Peru by providing them with income to help support their families and grant them independence. (Read more below)
  • Comfort in knowing you are encouraging environmentally responsible stewardship of the earth. (Read more below)
  • Pleasure of knowing you are helping fund early childhood development and women's health through the Elfer Castro Foundation (Read more below)
  • Every contribution gets an entry into the weekly draw.
  • Great perks, as listed on the right-hand side of our page.
Perks:
  Wool/Alpaca Hat  ($75)             Cushion ($110)                   Infinity Scarf ($130)

Elfer and some of his team members working in "The Lab":

Some of the items we will offer for sale on our online store:

Works from "The Lab" some of which will be available at our online store:

Our Business Model:

Weekly Prize:

Each week we're giving away this limited edition, signed Elfer Castro 22" x 24" Print.

All you have to do is contribute and like our Facebook page to be eligible. Entries will be from Monday to Sunday and we will pick the winner on Monday mornings. The winner will be announced on our Facebook page.

Elfer has developed a network of artisans who live in remote areas across Peru. He has spent countless days over a number of years living and working with artisans in their remote, far-flung, mountain villages learning their techniques and teaching them his designs, standards, and requirements in working with yarns, textiles, pottery, woods, and metals. Together they have created clothing, jewellery, furniture, and home décor pieces, which later travelled from these villages directly to the world stage. (Read more)

"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication" - Leonardo Da Vinci

We strongly believe that our team begins with the farmers and herders who supply us with natural, organically produced raw materials. Next are the artisans who, working closely with Elfer, bring his designs to life using traditional techniques, as handed down through the ages to the grandmothers, mothers, and daughters who still live in their remote, ancestral villages on the north coast and high in the Andes Mountains of Peru near the Inca ruins of Macchu Piccchu and Lake Titicaca.

We work largely with women's cooperatives, which are certified "Fair Trade". Aside from providing income for these women, working with their cooperatives also helps with quality control and production schedules. (Read more)

"Not to ourselves alone are we born." - Cicero

Elfer works with native Peruvian cotton, alpaca and baby alpaca fleece, natural wool, copper, and natural dyes when creating his products. They are 100% pure and natural creating beautiful, breathable fabric. Absolutely no chemicals are used in the natural dying process, which follows our mantra of "using what Mother Nature gives us to work with". (Read more)

"Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another." - Juvenal

Elfer, and therefore our company, has an uncompromising commitment to the environment and the indigenous peoples living in the remote villages of Peru.

In our view, the women in these far flung, remote villages in particular need the most help to lift themselves and their children out of the never ending cycle of poverty, poor education and often, abusive domestic situations. 

The work provided by Elfer Castro Lab helps greatly to this end by providing income for these women, but we have decided this is not enough. As our company becomes profitable, we will begin to fund “The Elfer Castro Foundation”. This foundation will focus exclusively on helping these indigenous women and their children by directly funding women’s health and early childhood development and education. (Read more)

“If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children.” – Mohandas Gandhi

To provide our, discerning, worldwide customers with original, avant-garde, quality made products while using only natural raw materials in a sustainable, safe, ethical, socially, and environmentally responsible way; while earning a fair profit, (which is shared with our workers through The Elfer Castro Foundation,) and giving “a hand up” to as many people as possible along the way.

“Although gold dust is precious, when it gets in your eyes it obstructs your vision” – Hsi-Tang Chih Tsang  

We can appreciate that not everyone can contribute to our campaign, but there are still other ways you can help!

  • Help us get the word out by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Pinterest, and Tumblr.
  • E-mail our campaign to your friends and family.
  • If you are a member of the media, Elfer would be glad to talk with you to help promote the campaign. Please contact us using the information below.

            Elfer Castro Lab Ltd. is a Canadian company registered in Ontario.              Items from the on line store will be shipped from Canada.

We can appreciate that not everyone can contribute to our campaign, but there are still other ways you can help!


Help us get the word out by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Google+, Twitter, Pinterest, and Tumblr.
E-mail our campaign to your friends and family.
If you are a member of the media, Elfer would be glad to talk with you to help promote the campaign. Please contact us using the information below.







            Elfer Castro Lab Ltd. is a Canadian company registered in Ontario.              Items from the on line store will be shipped from Canada.

story:
0.2 Is More Than A Fragrance

In our lives full of responsibilities, choices and of course heartaches, we hope for that first look into the eyes of another that sends a rush of excitement through our bodies.  

Science has revealed that this sensation can happen in one fifth of a second.  That means that in just 0.2 seconds from first seeing someone our bodies release the endorphins and other hormones that signal love at first sight.  

Whether you believe in love at first sight or not, you wouldn’t want to miss the chance to meet your destiny….would you?

0.2 is a unisex fragrance that provokes the emotional high of that first glance every time it is worn.

The particles represent all that is experienced in our everyday lives, and the magic of 0.2 comes shining through.

Life is never the same.


How The Fragrance Was Made

Knowing that love is a unique and special gift to each person, Holly made sure to have the right blend of people to be on the team.  First and foremost on that team was one of the most talented and successful perfumers in the United States to help her formulate what was to become "love at first sight" in liquid form.

While Holly had created simple fragrances in the past with only two or three notes, this one required a more distinctive and enveloping signature.  The task to make the fragrance wasn't easy and it took a lot of effort and time in what is called the "perfume organ".

During the course of two months and about 12 hours of intense smelling and creating Holly only focused on the simple mantra, "This fragrance needs to invoke and spread love!"

At last, the final formula of the fragrance was born and it was completely intoxicating!

Top notes of Italian Bergamot and Spearmint introduce you to a fresh musk accord that is both clean yet earthy. 

Tunisian Amber is grounded by a hint of Oakmoss to keep you in that moment, and take you deeper.

Perfume Organ


Amazing On Women!

It really is incredible how this fragrance changes on people and even continues to change through the day.  We have had women that literally sunk into their seats with their eyes rolling back in complete bliss!  One woman insisted on spraying a little on her sofa, sheets and even her dog!

When wearing 0.2 the possibilities are endless.

Amazing On Men!

We can't stress enough how incredible this fragrance smells on a man.  Dozens of men, including those that never wear a fragrance, said that they would wear this.  

In comparison to other mens fragrances that are hard to handle when you're stuck in the elevator with them, 0.2 is not overpowering.  It contains a seductive whisper that literally draws a person in to smell more.  Get ready to hear that question, "You smell amazing.  What is that cologne you're wearing?"  

Don't hide from your curiosity and try the sample vial!

Married?

Here's another beautiful quality of this fragrance.  Go back to that moment you had with your partner when you knew they were the one or you had that rush and needed to be close to them.  When you both wear the fragrance you can have that feeling throughout the day when you're apart and find yourself more excited than ever to get home.

Inspired Packaging

The packaging represents through the artwork the all encompassing rush of love. 

An explosion of thoughts, feelings and emotion.  Raw, undefined, but always beautiful.

We know that love and life can be messy but there is always the possibility of magic.  That magic is the embossed shiny platinum 0.2 coming through the crush of particles on the bottle and box.  To add a three dimensional feel the particles on the bottle are on a reverse label on the back so they shimmer through the fragrance.

Holly's vision was brought to life with an incredibly talented design team in Australia that was a destined meeting.  Brought together by a beautiful woman that just knew they had to meet but at the time didn't even know why.  Destiny.

The collection will have three different colored boxes - black, white and shiny silver.  The overall design of our bottles and boxes are contemporary, edgy and of course sultry,

100ml black box, 50ml box will be white and 7.5ml box (not shown) will be a beautiful shiny silver.


Our Inspired Words

Live in love. Love in a heartbeat.

An instantaneous reaction. 

Transient. Human. Irresistible.

Love in an instant. Intensity.

Touched by love. Rapture. Beauty.

Love is love.

Undefined.

Testimonials

"I remember it engulfed an unknown sensation yet also so familiar.  It was new and fresh but also comforting, warm and enticing."  - Nicole, Manhattan Beach

"Knowing the intention actually made my heart flutter when I first sprayed it on myself.  I couldn't believe how my body responded!"  - Jay, Perth, Australia

"It smells the way I like to feel, confident and at peace.  0.2 brings to mind all the good things that I want in my life."  -Viv, Redondo Beach

"I normally don't wear cologne but after trying 0.2 it's something I would definitely wear.  It not only smells great but makes me feel like I have swagger."  - Wayne, Los Angeles

"I'm so in love with how this fragrance smells on me!  0.2 makes me feel so beautiful, sensual, magnetic and confident.  It takes me to an enlightened state and enriches my daily life.  It feels like home."  - Maria, Sydney, Australia

"The first time I smelled 0.2 it stirred emotions of passion, fire and love all at once. I remember vividly it was the scent of my soulmate, my one true love." -Summer, Philadelphia

"Every time I experience the fragrance, I am reminded of the most sensational, instantaneous, heartbreaking, ecstatic, unstoppable, unexpected love. Every time.  0.2 is an explosive fragrance.  Wonder the possibility." - Brooke, Australia


Our Mission

Problem:

In societies all over the world people have stopped looking into the eyes of strangers and therefore miss out on a connection, a possibility, and way to escape the feeling of loneliness.  As corporations are churning out more and more technology humans have less and less face to face interactions.  We must get back to the core of our humanity and simple things in life like looking at each other.

Solution:

A wearable fragrance that triggers our instinct of allure and attraction and alters our mood simply with the intention of human connection.  The powerful combination of intention and our sense of smell is life changing.

Opportunity:

0.2 is a fragrance that connects an individual to their desire by powerfully provoking an emotional response through their sense of smell: the feeling of love at first sight.

Objective:

The 0.2 fragrance will spark a global movement of love and acceptance by reminding people to look at those around them with wonder and possibilities.  To have a greater sense of love for life, our fellow human beings and our surroundings.


For Your Support

Your pledge will support the production of filling bottles and help meet the minimums required for the fragrances. For backing us, you’ll be the first to experience the 0.2 line with prices exclusive to Indiegogo.  The official launch in stores will be January 2015 and Holly will be hitting the road to speak about the journey.

We can’t wait to hear what you think.

Warm Regards, 
Holly & The Riddel Group


OUR REWARDS & SHIPPING

We will be contacting you at the conclusion of the campaign where we will confirm your shipping address and other details at that time. Shipping is free within the continental United States. We offer subsidized shipping for our international customers and shipments to Alaska/Hawaii.

1.8ml sample vial - $11

7.5ml Sprayer - $40

50ml Bottle - $70

100ml Bottle - $140

LIMI - Love Is My Intention sterling silver ring with a sapphire inside that holds the energy of destiny and faith. Wear this ring to commit to living each moment with love as your intention. $65 value.


LIMI rings - Love is love.

                                    

                                    Thanks for an amazing Indiegogo!

                                         OUR STORY CONTINUES AT

                                                 www.0point2.com


Risks and challenges 

Our team has experience in both production and distribution. We've spent the last year with our manufacturer and fragrance partners preparing for this moment. Even so, we understand our background and experience doesn't eliminate all risks. We're still making minor adjustments to the packaging process.

All has been done to avoid any potential risks in delivering 0.2 Fragrance. Our goal is to ship before the end of December but because the bottles are coming from France there can certainly be a delay that is out of our control. In any case, we'll always keep our supporters up to date.

100ml black box, 50ml box will be white and 7.5ml box
(not shown) will be a beautiful shiny silver.
Our Inspired Words
Live in love. Love in a
heartbeat.
An instantaneous reaction. 
Transient. Human. Irresistible.
Love in an instant. Intensity.
Touched by love. Rapture. Beauty.
Love is love.
Undefined.
Testimonials
"I remember it engulfed an
unknown sensation yet also so familiar.  It was new and fresh but also
comforting, warm and enticing."  - Nicole, Manhattan Beach
"Knowing the intention actually made my heart flutter when I first sprayed it on myself.  I couldn't believe how my body responded!"  - Jay, Perth, Australia
"It smells the way I like to
feel, confident and at peace.  0.2 brings to mind all the good things that
I want in my life."  -Viv, Redondo Beach
"I normally don't wear
cologne but after trying 0.2 it's something I would definitely wear.  It
not only smells great but makes me feel like I have swagger."  -
Wayne, Los Angeles
"I'm so in love with how
this fragrance smells on me!  0.2 makes me feel so beautiful, sensual,
magnetic and confident.  It takes me to an enlightened state and enriches
my daily life.  It feels like home."  - Maria, Sydney,
Australia
"The first time I smelled
0.2 it stirred emotions of passion, fire and love all at once. I remember
vividly it was the scent of my soulmate, my one true love." -Summer,
Philadelphia
"Every time I experience the
fragrance, I am reminded of the most sensational, instantaneous, heartbreaking,
ecstatic, unstoppable, unexpected love. Every time.  0.2 is an explosive
fragrance.  Wonder the possibility." - Brooke, Australia

Our Mission
Problem:
In societies all over the world
people have stopped looking into the eyes of strangers and therefore miss out
on a connection, a possibility, and way to escape the feeling of loneliness.
 As corporations are churning out more and more technology humans have
less and less face to face interactions.  We must get back to the core of
our humanity and simple things in life like looking at each other.
Solution:
A wearable fragrance that
triggers our instinct of allure and attraction and alters our mood simply with
the intention of human connection.  The powerful combination of intention
and our sense of smell is life changing.
Opportunity:
0.2 is a fragrance that connects
an individual to their desire by powerfully provoking an emotional response
through their sense of smell: the feeling of love at first sight.
Objective:
The 0.2 fragrance will spark a
global movement of love and acceptance by reminding people to look at those
around them with wonder and possibilities.  To have a greater sense
of love for life, our fellow human beings and our surroundings.

For Your Support
Your pledge will support the
production of filling bottles and help meet the minimums required for the
fragrances. For backing us, you’ll be the first to experience the 0.2 line with
prices exclusive to Indiegogo.  The official launch in stores will be
January 2015 and Holly will be hitting the road to speak about the journey.
We can’t wait to hear what you think.
Warm Regards, Holly & The Riddel Group

OUR REWARDS & SHIPPING
We will be contacting you at the
conclusion of the campaign where we will confirm your shipping address and
other details at that time. Shipping is free within the continental United
States. We offer subsidized shipping for our international customers and
shipments to Alaska/Hawaii.



1.8ml sample vial - $11


7.5ml Sprayer - $40


50ml Bottle - $70


100ml Bottle - $140



LIMI - Love
Is My Intention sterling silver ring with a sapphire inside that holds the
energy of destiny and faith. Wear this ring to commit to living each moment
with love as your intention. $65 value.

LIMI rings - Love is love.

                                    
                                    Thanks for an amazing
Indiegogo!
                                         OUR STORY CONTINUES AT
                                                 www.0point2.com



Risks and
challenges 
Our team has experience in both
production and distribution. We've spent the last year with our manufacturer
and fragrance partners preparing for this moment. Even so, we understand our
background and experience doesn't eliminate all risks. We're still making minor
adjustments to the packaging process. 
All has been done to avoid any
potential risks in delivering 0.2 Fragrance. Our goal is to ship before the end
of December but because the bottles are coming from France there can certainly
be a delay that is out of our control. In any case, we'll always keep our
supporters up to date.

story:
About the Project

                                                                      Hi! :-)  

                             I am Apostolis and I come from Heraklion of Crete. 

                                                                (Photo by Alex)

Since I can remember myself, I had a passion with travelling. After exploring most of Europe, I had a crazy idea... To go around the globe with my bicycle! The only problem back then was, that I had no bicycle... So i bought myself one and started pedaling. After completing some trips in Greece, I was ready for the "Round the globe" thing... But I wanted this journey to mean something, not only for me, but for everyone else as well. Having experienced all this endless gratitude, from all the people that had helped me, on all those wonderful journeys, I wanted to give some feedback to the world. So I came up with the idea to create Around the Good World project.

This project is about all the ordinary people living next door, that are willing to help unknown strangers, without asking anything in return. Those are the real life Superheroes! It's about, breaking the walls that we have built around us, alienating ourselves from other people. The best example to demonstrate this, will be the journey itself.

So while i will be on the road, i will upload on the projects website, all the wonderful people that will help me throughout the journey with their kind actions. You can check it out on the THANK YOU page. There will be posts, photos and maybe some videos of random acts of love!

Help us, to share this simple but yet very powerful message, up until the most remote edge of the planet!


On the Road

The project is about to begin this May and those wheels are gonna keep spinning, for at least 3 years. 

I will cycle an average of 50 km every day, while taking times to rest in between. When I will be on the countryside, I will mostly sleep in my tent and when in a city I will try to find couchsurfers, willing to host me.

I have already made two similar trips. The first was a stunning circle around Crete, which was almost 500 km and it took me 2 weeks to complete. The next was the round of the beautiful Peloponnese, which kept me going for 1 month and was more than 1.000 km. You can watch photos of these incredible journeys here.

On the road, I experienced tons of kindness, hospitality and love. I made new friends and saw some spectacular views and places, that made me feel blessed! 


Fear and Love

People ask me often "Aren't you afraid, going out there on your own?" The honest answer is that, of course I'm afraid for the unknown... And this is exactly the reason, that i want to make it known!  
There are gonna be difficulties, that's certain. But overcoming those, is what transforms us and makes us better human beings. I'm not doing this in order to find out what to be, but instead how to be. 
When you experience true love, you can't go back to fear. This is something that I've been taught, from complete strangers on my journeys. They offered me food, shelter and many more. They were not rich, they had no big houses, or cars. They were poor, but they still were sharing their meal with me, along side with their best smile. This is how Good Karma is being created! But what goes around, comes around.
So I'm choosing to accept, trust and love, everyone and everything that will come my way. The project starts pedaling Around the Good World!
 

What Now...?

The campaign has ended and i feel trully blessed for this experience! So much love and support from everybody, which is difficult to describe. The message of the project has been showed and the campaign reached the 30% of the goal, which is awessome! :D 
Though the 70% is still missing. I am trying to reach travel agencies or airline companies, so that they can sponsor the project, by providing the travel services that are necessary for the project. Those are a flight ticket from Tokyo to San Fransisco, including the fee for the bicycle. Another flight ticket above the Darien Gap from Panama to Colombia. Final, a flight ticket from Brazil to Morocco, so that i will be able to return to Europe. Yet, there is no company willing to help with this.
If you can help with this task, or you know somebody who can, please feel free to contact me at aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com and explain the details. I'm sure we can make it and we will! :)


How You Can Help

There are many ways, that you can support the project :

  • You can make a Donation here.
  • Can't donate? No problem! :) You can spread the word on social media. Like us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and everywhere else. Post it, share it, shout it out loud! :)
  • Contact and tell us, how you want to get involved, your opinions, ideas or anything else aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools



 


Τι Είναι το Around the Good World

 
                                                                    Γειά! :-)  
                                  Είμαι ο Αποστόλης από το Ηράκλειο της Κρήτης

                                                  (Η Φωτο είναι από τον Αlex)

Από τότε που θυμάμαι τον εαυτό μου, είχα πάθος με τα ταξίδια. Αφού ταξίδεψα πολύ στην Ευρώπη, μου ήρθε μία τρελή ιδέα... Να κάνω το γύρο του κόσμου με το ποδήλατό μου! Το μόνο πρόβλημα τότε, ήταν ότι δεν είχα ποδήλατο... Οπότε αγόρασα ένα και άρχισα να κάνω πετάλι. Αφού έκανα μερικά ταξίδια μέσα στην Ελλάδα, ήμουν έτοιμος για το γύρο του κόσμου. Ήθελα όμως αυτό το ταξίδι, να σημαίνει κάτι όχι μόνο για μένα, αλλά για όλους. Έχοντας βιώσει απέραντη ευγνομωσύνη από όλους τους ανθρώπους που με βοήθησαν σε όλα αυτά τα υπέροχα ταξίδια, ήθελα κι εγώ με τη σειρά μου, να δώσω κάτι πίσω. Έτσι είχα τη ιδέα να δημιουργήσω το εγχείρημα Around the Good World.

Το εγχείρημα θέλει να αναδείξει, όλους τους απλούς, καθημερινούς ανθρώπους, που βοηθάνε άγνωστους ανθρώπους, χωρίς να ζητάνε αντάλλαγμα. Αυτοί είναι οι πραγματικοί Σούπερ Ήρωες! Έχουμε χτίσει τείχους γύρω μας, αποξενόνωντας μας από τους άλλους ανθρώπους και το εγχείρημα, επιχειρεί να τους γκρεμίσει. Το καλύτερο παράδειμα για να γίνει αυτό, θα είναι το ίδιο το ταξίδι.

Για όσο καιρό θα είμαι στο δρόμο θα ανεβάζω στην ιστοσελίδα του εγχειρήματος, όλους τους φανταστικούς ανθρώπους που θα με βοηθήσουν κατά τη διάρκεια του ταξιδιού, με τις ευγενικές τους πράξεις. Μπορείτε να το παρακολουθείτε στη σελίδα, ΕΥΧΑΡΙΣΤΩ. Θα υπάρχουν άρθρα, φωτογραφίες και κάποια βίντεο, με πράξεις καλοσύνης!

Βοηθήστε μας να διαδώσουμε αυτό το απλό, αλλά πολύ δυνατό μήνυμα ανθρωπιάς, μέχρι τα πέρατα του πλανήτη!

 

Στο Δρόμο

Το εγχείρημα θα ξεκινήσει αυτό το Μάιο και θα διαρκέσει, για τουλάχιστον 3 χρόνια. 

Θα κάνω γύρω στα 50 χλμ ποδήλατο κάθε μέρα, ενώ θα ξεκουράζομαι όποτε νιώθω ότι το χρειάζομαι. Όταν θα είμαι στην εξοχή, θα κοιμάμαι κυρίως στη σκηνή μου, ενώ όταν θα είμαι σε κάποια πόλη θα προσπαθώ να βρω ανθρώπους που θέλουν να με φιλοξενήσουν, μέσα από σχετικές ιστοσελίδες. 

Ήδη έχω κάνει 2 παρόμοια ταξίδια. Το πρώτο ήταν ένας απίστευτος κύκλος γύρω από την Κρήτη, γύρω στα 500 χλμ, που κράτησε 2 εβδομάδες. Το επόμενο ήταν ο γύρος της πανέμορφης Πελοποννήσου, όπου σε 1 μήνα περίπου, έκανα πάνω από 1.000 χλμ. Μπορείτε να δείτε φωτογραφίες και από τα 2 αυτά υπέροχα ταξίδια εδώ.

Όσο ήμουν στο δρόμο, βίωσα απέραντη ευγένεια, φιλοξενία και αγάπη. Έκανα καινούριους φίλους και είδα εκπληκτικές θέες και μέρη, τα οποιά με κάνουν να νιώθω ευλογημένος!



Φόβος και Αγάπη

Πολλοί με ρωτάνε συχνά "Μα καλά, δε φοβάσαι να το κάνεις αυτό ολομόναχος?" Η ειλικρινής απάντηση είναι, ότι φυσικά και φοβάμαι για το άγνωστο που θα συναντήσω... Αλλά αυτός ακριβώς είναι και ο λόγος που θέλω να το κάνω, για να γίνει γνωστό!
Θα υπάρξουν δυσκολίες σίγουρα. Το να ξεπερνάμε όμως αυτές τις δυσκολίες, είναι αυτό που μας μεταμορφώνει σε καλύτερους ανθρώπους. Δεν το κάνω αυτό για να μάθω τι να είμαι, αλλά για να μάθω πως να είμαι.
Όταν έχεις βιώσει την αληθινή αγάπη, δεν μπορείς να ξαναγυρίσεις πίσω στο φόβο. Αυτό είναι κάτι που μου έμαθαν τελείως άγνωστοι άνθρωποι, που συνάντησα στα ταξίδια μου. Μου προσέφεραν φαγητό, καταφύγιο και άλλα πολλά. Δεν ήταν πλούσιοι, δεν είχαν μεγάλα σπίτια, ούτε αυτοκίνητα. Ήταν φτωχοί, αλλά και πάλι μοιράζονταν το φαγητό τους μαζί μου, μαζί με το καλύτερό τους χαμόγελο. Έτσι δημιουργείται το Καλό Κάρμα! Έτσι κι αλλιώς, ότι κάνουμε επιστρέφει πίσω σε μας.
Έτσι επιλέγω να αποδέχομαι, να εμπιστεύομαι και να αγαπώ, οτιδήποτε & οποιονδήποτε παρουσιαστεί στο δρόμο μου. Το εγχείρημα αρχίζει να κάνει πετάλι, Around the Good World!
 

Και Τώρα Τι...?

Η Καμπάνια έφτασε στο τέλος της και πραγματικά νιώθω ευλογημένος για αυτήν την εμπειρία! Τόση πολλή αγάπη και υποστήριξη από όλους, είναι πολύ δύσκολο να περιγραφεί με λόγια. Το μήνυμα του εγχειρήματος φάνηκε ξεκάθαρα και η καμπάνια έφτασε το 30% του στόχου της, το οποίο είναι φανταστικό! :D 

Παρόλα αυτά, χρειαζόμαστε ακόμα το 70%. Τον τελευταίο καιρό προσπαθώ να προσεγγίσω ταξιδιωτικά γραφεία και αεροπορικές εταιρίες, για να γίνουν χορηγοί του εγχειρήματος, παρέχωντας τις ταξιδιωτικές υπηρεσίες που είναι απαραίτητες για το εγχείρημα. Αυτές είναι ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο από το Τόκιο για το Σαν Φρανσίσκο , συμπεριλαμβάνοντας το κόστος για τη μεταφορά του ποδηλάτου. Άλλο ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο πάνω από το Darien Gap από τον Παναμά για την Κολομβία. Τέλος, ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο από τη Βραζιλία για το Μαρόκο, για την επιστροφή στην Ευρώπη. Μέχρι στιγμής, καμία εταιρία δεν έχει προσφερθεί να βοηθήσει.

Αν μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε σχετικά με αυτό ή αν ξέρετε κάποιον που να μπορεί, παρακαλώ επικοινωνήστε μαζί μου στο aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com . Είμαι σίγουρος ότι θα τα καταφέρουμε! :)




Πως Μπορείτε να Βοηθήσετε

  • Κάντε μία Δωρεά Εδώ
  • Δεν μπορείτε να κάνετε δωρεά? Κανένα πρόβλημα! :-) Μπορείτε να διαδώσετε αυτήν την καμπάνια στα social media. Κάντε like και share στο Facebook, στο Twitter, στο Instagram και οπουδήποτε αλλού θέλετε. Ποστάρετέ το, κοινοποιήστε το, φωνάξτε το, διαδώστε το παντού! :)
  • Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας και πείτε μας, πως θέλετε να βοηθήσετε, τη γνώμη σας, τις ιδέες σας ή οτιδήποτε άλλο aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com
  • Χρησιμοποιήστε τα εργαλεία του Indiegogo
