Το εγχείρημα θα ξεκινήσει αυτό το Μάιο και θα διαρκέσει, για τουλάχιστον 3 χρόνια. 

Θα κάνω γύρω στα 50 χλμ ποδήλατο κάθε μέρα, ενώ θα ξεκουράζομαι όποτε νιώθω ότι το χρειάζομαι. Όταν θα είμαι στην εξοχή, θα κοιμάμαι κυρίως στη σκηνή μου, ενώ όταν θα είμαι σε κάποια πόλη θα προσπαθώ να βρω ανθρώπους που θέλουν να με φιλοξενήσουν, μέσα από σχετικές ιστοσελίδες. 
Ήδη έχω κάνει 2 παρόμοια ταξίδια. Το πρώτο ήταν ένας απίστευτος κύκλος γύρω από την Κρήτη, γύρω στα 500 χλμ, που κράτησε 2 εβδομάδες. Το επόμενο ήταν ο γύρος της πανέμορφης Πελοποννήσου, όπου σε 1 μήνα περίπου, έκανα πάνω από 1.000 χλμ. Μπορείτε να δείτε φωτογραφίες και από τα 2 αυτά υπέροχα ταξίδια εδώ.
Όσο ήμουν στο δρόμο, βίωσα απέραντη ευγένεια, φιλοξενία και αγάπη. Έκανα καινούριους φίλους και είδα εκπληκτικές θέες και μέρη, τα οποιά με κάνουν να νιώθω ευλογημένος!





Φόβος και Αγάπη
Πολλοί με ρωτάνε συχνά "Μα καλά, δε φοβάσαι να το κάνεις αυτό ολομόναχος?" Η ειλικρινής απάντηση είναι, ότι φυσικά και φοβάμαι για το άγνωστο που θα συναντήσω... Αλλά αυτός ακριβώς είναι και ο λόγος που θέλω να το κάνω, για να γίνει γνωστό!
Θα υπάρξουν δυσκολίες σίγουρα. Το να ξεπερνάμε όμως αυτές τις δυσκολίες, είναι αυτό που μας μεταμορφώνει σε καλύτερους ανθρώπους. Δεν το κάνω αυτό για να μάθω τι να είμαι, αλλά για να μάθω πως να είμαι.
Όταν έχεις βιώσει την αληθινή αγάπη, δεν μπορείς να ξαναγυρίσεις πίσω στο φόβο. Αυτό είναι κάτι που μου έμαθαν τελείως άγνωστοι άνθρωποι, που συνάντησα στα ταξίδια μου. Μου προσέφεραν φαγητό, καταφύγιο και άλλα πολλά. Δεν ήταν πλούσιοι, δεν είχαν μεγάλα σπίτια, ούτε αυτοκίνητα. Ήταν φτωχοί, αλλά και πάλι μοιράζονταν το φαγητό τους μαζί μου, μαζί με το καλύτερό τους χαμόγελο. Έτσι δημιουργείται το Καλό Κάρμα! Έτσι κι αλλιώς, ότι κάνουμε επιστρέφει πίσω σε μας.
Έτσι επιλέγω να αποδέχομαι, να εμπιστεύομαι και να αγαπώ, οτιδήποτε & οποιονδήποτε παρουσιαστεί στο δρόμο μου. Το εγχείρημα αρχίζει να κάνει πετάλι, Around the Good World!

 



Και Τώρα Τι...?
Η Καμπάνια έφτασε στο τέλος της και πραγματικά νιώθω ευλογημένος για αυτήν την εμπειρία! Τόση πολλή αγάπη και υποστήριξη από όλους, είναι πολύ δύσκολο να περιγραφεί με λόγια. Το μήνυμα του εγχειρήματος φάνηκε ξεκάθαρα και η καμπάνια έφτασε το 30% του στόχου της, το οποίο είναι φανταστικό! :D 
Παρόλα αυτά, χρειαζόμαστε ακόμα το 70%. Τον τελευταίο καιρό προσπαθώ να προσεγγίσω ταξιδιωτικά γραφεία και αεροπορικές εταιρίες, για να γίνουν χορηγοί του εγχειρήματος, παρέχωντας τις ταξιδιωτικές υπηρεσίες που είναι απαραίτητες για το εγχείρημα. Αυτές είναι ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο από το Τόκιο για το Σαν Φρανσίσκο , συμπεριλαμβάνοντας το κόστος για τη μεταφορά του ποδηλάτου. Άλλο ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο πάνω από το Darien Gap από τον Παναμά για την Κολομβία. Τέλος, ένα αεροπορικό εισιτήριο από τη Βραζιλία για το Μαρόκο, για την επιστροφή στην Ευρώπη. Μέχρι στιγμής, καμία εταιρία δεν έχει προσφερθεί να βοηθήσει.

Αν μπορείτε να βοηθήσετε σχετικά με αυτό ή αν ξέρετε κάποιον που να μπορεί, παρακαλώ επικοινωνήστε μαζί μου στο aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com . Είμαι σίγουρος ότι θα τα καταφέρουμε! :)





Πως Μπορείτε να Βοηθήσετε


Κάντε μία Δωρεά Εδώ

Δεν μπορείτε να κάνετε δωρεά? Κανένα πρόβλημα! :-) Μπορείτε να διαδώσετε αυτήν την καμπάνια στα social media. Κάντε like και share στο Facebook, στο Twitter, στο Instagram και οπουδήποτε αλλού θέλετε. Ποστάρετέ το, κοινοποιήστε το, φωνάξτε το, διαδώστε το παντού! :)

Επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας και πείτε μας, πως θέλετε να βοηθήσετε, τη γνώμη σας, τις ιδέες σας ή οτιδήποτε άλλο aroundthegoodworld@gmail.com

Χρησιμοποιήστε τα εργαλεία του Indiegogo

story:
Short Summary

My name is Imani But I go by Diamond J, or DJ for short. I am the creative custom shoe designer for clubshoeicide.com and creator of Petit Gateau Whipstix. I started these companies with the intent of bringing out the unique individual style of women who want to express themselves in a way that will set them apart from everyone else. My custom design shoes and lip glosses cater to the fashion and beauty industry...but are for any woman who wants to let her light shine. I am a very outgoing and creative individual, who finds herself constantly ready to take on new adventures and enjoys meeting new people.

My inspiration comes from my love of art and beauty. I look at life as a beautiful canvas, and I am constantly redefining the pictures I paint in my mind. I have always loved to be different, by expressing myself in a way society deems to be "abnormal". My inspiration is you, her, him and them. I believe fashion and makeup are some of the best forms of individual expression..and when I design a pair of shoes, or create my artwork on someones face, I feel free..I feel as though this is my world and I dont have to conform to the outsiders. I think outside the box, but its my box I choose to think beyond. Inspiration inspires me.

What We Need & What You Get

Lip Gloss:
15 lip tubes at 10 each = $150 (25 pots per package)
Natural Ingredients and tools needed to make Lip Gloss in bulk= $388
total needed=$538.00

Shoes:
For 3 boxes of wholesale shoes
(flats, platforms, open toes)= $588.00
Glue= 65.00
Materials needed for artwork (crystals,spikes,pearls, paint, brushes, beads, etc) $840.00
ink and transfer paper = 200.00
shoe boxes (50) = 150
Total needed= $1843

The total amount would be $2381, however I am asking to raise 2500 for any miscellaneous items that may be needed in the process. However if I dont reach my full goal, I will still be able to fund part of my dream. To me that is a start and every success story starts from a dream and a vision, and every little penny helps.


Funding needs to be in place by July 17th in order to take advantage of the upcoming fashion season. Purchasing of products (shoes, tools, packaging, etc) will be needed to ensure enough shoes, lip gloss and accessories are available for up and coming events to showcase for the fall and well, to start selling when people ask "do you have anything available now?".

Everyone who Donates will receive something special, be it a free lip gloss, a pair of shoes, a personal thank you card. I believe in gratitude, therefore your contribution will not go unnoticed :)

 

The Impact

Individual diversity and the ability for women to be able to express themselves as unique individuals is a vital component of the Company's strategic positioning. This diversity is unique to Women all across the globe and provides many distinct advantages.

I establish ClubShoeicide and Petit Gateau WhipStix with hopes of being the number one supplier of unique custom design shoes, accessories and handmade lip gloss. Applying the highest standards of excellence to the purchasing, creating, and delivery of our Shoes, Accessories and Lip Gloss. while also being able to Embrace diversity, Contribute positively to our communities and charities across the globe, and be a mentor/role model to others, esp our youth showing them that you can succeed if you put your dreams to work. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Also let people know about my website clubshoeicide.com. 

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
SeeYourself Fashion Show in Support of Beat!

Eating Disorders: 

Ø  1.6 million people in the UK are affected by an eating disorder; 11% of them are male. 

Ø  1 in 100 women aged between 15 and 30, are affected by anorexia.

Ø  Bulimia develops around the age of 18 or 19, and is 3 times more common than anorexia.

Ø  Binge eating affects males and females equally and usually appears later in life, between the ages of 30 and 40.  (Beat, 2014)

Eating Disorders (EDs) is a mental disorder that alter seriously a person’s everyday diet and may lead to serious health damages.  It can be manifested either by eating extremely small or huge amounts of food. Obsession with eating and food can overtake the person’s life.

Our project:

The ByPeople team has decided to host a fashion show event in London, intended to raise people’s awareness on anorexia and other EDs.

New upcoming designers will offer their creations; the models for the show will be normal sized, everyday girls sending an important message to all people attending it. Making a statement from the ‘new’ generation of designers who vote no to models with EDs. At the event the attendees will also have the opportunity to interact with people form the Beat, and be informed regarding EDs, the symptoms of eating disorders, their impact on the society and ways to treat them. We will also provide information and support to the kinfolks of those suffering from these diseases, with the help of Beat, UK’s leading charity supporting anyone affected by eating disorders.

Seeyourself is an event/campaign calling upon everyone to see their true self in the mirror and love even the ‘imperfections’!


Beat’s vision is that eating disorders will be beaten.

Beat’s aims are:

•  To change the way everyone thinks and talks about eating disorders

•  To improve the way services and treatment are provided

•  And to help anyone believe that their eating disorder can be beaten

Beat does this by:

•  Challenging the stereotypes and stigma that people with eating disorders face

•  Campaigning for better services and treatment

Providing information, support and encouragement to seek treatment and recovery.

Background:

ByPeople is a PR agency, established recently and planning to organize events that contribute in raising funds and awareness for causes. Our belief is that change starts from small things because, ‘there is a little bit of the ocean in every drop’. Being active members of the society we intend to contribute in positive change and the creation of a community of inspired individuals.

SeeYourself Fashion Show in support of Beat aims to utilize the influence that the fashion industry has on young individuals and generate positive change.

Our Designers

TBC

Budget analysis of your contribution:

79% of UK citizens in 2015 donated to a variety of charities. (CAF, 2015)

We ask your contribution, to raise a total of £2,000, which is the estimated minimum cost for the realization of the Seeyourself fashion event.

We offer our services for free and along with our generous sponsors will try to keep the expenditures as low as possible. The money will be distributed as shown by the chart to organizational costs such as installations, food and beverages, printing of material and functional costs.We are trying hard to further minimise the cost.


Possible Concerns?

Any surplus from the collected amount along with the ticket earnings will be all donated to Beat. Similarly, if the amount collected fails to cover the organizational expenses the total will be donated to the cause.

If you choose a perk, information about the ticket will be promptly sent to you. Further information of the event can be found on our facebook page, and the event. http://on.fb.me/1Lg93HR

What else can YOU do?

Apart from money you can help by letting more people know about our event and becoming part of our community, become our ambassadors.

Who are we?

Six girls doing our masters in Marketing Strategy & Innovation at Cass Business School in London; we love fashion but most of all we believe in a better world and in small acts of good faith that generate bigger change!

In the picture below (from left), Maggie Petrova  (Bulgaria), Markella Zarifi (Greece), Ysaline Lannoy (Belgium), Anna Asprogeraka (Greece), Kiko Zhou (HongKong) and Christina Mykoniatis (Greece).

Though we have diverse backgrounds and many things that set us apart, there are also others that bring us together and social awareness is one of them. We would like to facilitate the link between socially conscious individuals and good causes, which limited companies/organizations have tried to address (Pallotta, 2013, Desmos, 2016; AH, 2016) and we hope to inspire you. 


Follow us on:

story:
FIND US AT OUR NEW WEBSITE!

Thanks for all the incredible support in raising just under $30'000, come join the story over on our new website and get your ChapterTen Watch. New style's and designs coming soon.


ChapterTen Watches?

ChapterTen watches is a team of people with a rebellious spirit and huge goal: to produce designer watches at the highest quality, also at an industry changing price, while leading the way for socially conscious brands. 

We believe that buying a watch should leave you looking great and with money in your pocket.

So we went about building a watch and a brand that focused on four key aspects:

1. Looks great; we partnered with industry leading designers to create our watches with a minimal and modern design that could be worn in any setting.

2. High quality; With a 42mm stainless steel case, genuine italian leather strap, japanese movement and hardened crystal mineral glass, these watches lead the way in quality, comfort and reliability with an added 2 year warranty.

3. Accessible pricing; by doing things differently and selling directly to the consumer we will be able to sell our watches for three times less than our industry equivalent. That’s more money left in your pocket. 

4. Give back; 10% of profits are donated to our non-profit partners around the world helping others tell great stories. 

With these principles, we have spent the past year connecting & collaborating with leaders in the watch industry to produce our first collection of three styles.


What We Need & What You Get

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging & purchasing one of our awesome watches, but sharing this movement with your friends.

We need your support!

To raise the funds we're opening up our range for pre-order at a discounted rate of $59.00. Once available to the public, they will retail at $89.00. Still 3 times less than the industry equivalent.

The perks, along with a thank you letter from our team, will ship as soon as production has finished. We have confidence this will be early July.

The ChapterTen Collection

ChapterTen Warranty.

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we genuinely hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch movement.

Who makes up the team and how did it all start?

ChapterTen is made up of a variety of individuals consisting of baristas, teachers, photographers, real estate agents, models and athletes! It is headed up by Jonno Rushbrook and Cassandra Hartford. Two young entrepreneurs passionate about quality design & seeing people live great stories. 

Specifications:

Case Material:  316L Stainless Steel Bezel, Case & Screw Caseback
Case Diameter: 42 mm
Case Depth: 7.8 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Strap Material: Genuine Italian Leather Band
Band Width: 20 mm
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Hardened Crystal Mineral Glass
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Water Resistant: 3 ATM (33 feet)

Order Fulfillment?

Our team has an extensive history of working & owning e-commerce retail stores which made us perfectly suited to designing and creating these watches. It has also provided us with the ability to package and ship with your order with speed and professionalism. Once the watches touch down, there will be a lot of coffee consumed and very little sleep until we have them shipped and delivered to your doorstep.

Challenges?

The greatest challenge we face is raising awareness and making noise to bring our dream to life. We are going to do everything we can to spread the word but we need your help. If you could do something as simple as tweeting about and/or sharing this page with your Facebook friends, it can go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top page.


From everyone here at the ChapterTen team, THANK YOU so much for your time and your support.

story:
Nous faisons une campagne de financement participatif (ou crowdfunding) afin d'accélérer la mise en place de notre projet. Pour nous soutenir, nous proposons en quantité limitée des montres Infinite Watch à moindres coûts. Nos offres sont traduites en français en cliquant sur le lien ci-dessous.


  >>cliquez ici<<


Infinite Watch, just like any tattoo, is an extension of your personality. Really chic and premium quality swiss made.

Each Infinite Watch is made on demand from 8 materials easily customized by you. Ted is the coolest artist we have ever met, he can make your own watch model by sending him what matters to you.

Here our story in two minutes video : 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Zod5pLCEgw

#homemade


This watch is more than customizable, it's your infinite.

Our Story

Infinite Watch is a 2 best friends start up, our names are Evann and Audry. We are friends since a long time, we are very complementary and we’ve been through a lot together. 

We strongly believe that the customization of clothes and accessories will evolve very rapidly so as to answer to the incoming growth of the wear technology. We created Infinite Watch with the will to answer to tomorrow's standard. From a personal point of view, I would allow people to get inspired with a watch that has an high emotional value for them.

We are the only watch brand with such personalized service.

#watchitreachit


A premium quality



We are very confident with the quality of our watches. We work with premium quality materials from leading manufacturers. We use the Ronda 503 quartz movement and our watches are all « Swiss made ». It is our commitment to quality. 

Watch Specifications:

Case material : Plastic.
Case size : 43 mm. 
Strap material : Silicon + Stitching.
Movement : Ronda 503, Swiss. 
Water resistant : 5 atm.
The dials are printed in a French printing company that has 40 years of experience.

The laser engraving on the case back is very clean, sharp and legible. Made in France. 

All brushed stainless steel. 

Warranty : 2 years.

Warranty does not cover :  

  • The life of the battery.
  • Wear and tear and aging. 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken lens, etc.) 


Your very personal touch

The customization concerns 8 parts of the watch : the colors of the bands, stitching, case, crown, second hand. The engraving on the steel case back. The type of index and of course the dial, where you can write and stick picture(s). 

We are the only watch brand which offers a picture treatment to ensure a total harmony in the colors of your watch.  

We really want to pay attention to your own individual style, and of course we also thought that some help might be useful to meet your satisfaction, well, that’s Ted’s job.


Ted's touch

Ted is the little buddy that appears on the side of your page when you create your watch. He will be able to answer to any style questions, but also concerning the process of customization.  You just need to send him a photo and text you want on the dial.

Ted is unique, in fact we are the only watch maker to offer a such a personalized service.

Check out Ted's work:



* If you have any doubts about the quality of your picture, please ask ted. He will let you know if the quality is good enough to be used.

A genius offer

It’s simple, we do not want to waste your money if we can refurbish your watch. if ever you get tired of your customized watch, you can exchange your infinite watch for a new one with 40 % off. We will tell you how to send your old watch back to us and you'll receive your new infinite watch within a month, easy !

This offer is doable because the materials of your old watch are refurbished except 2 things : bands and cases.. they are new !  

We will use your own case back, buckle and quartz movement to make your new watch. All steel will be polished, like new.  

This offer is renewable as many times as you want. But to get this offer, one condition only, buy your first Infinite Watch on this IndieGogo web page.


How will that campaign help us ?

We have the design and logistics ready to launch the production, however we don't have the total funds to create a complete website and to produce an important batch of watches. If the funding campaign proves successful, we will get in contact with you within 3 months to create your watch.

We chose to give up on expensive advertising to retain the highest quality materials and make an affordable offer. Talk about Infinite Watch to all your friends and relatives that might be interested in our project. 

We need you, you are part of our story, the more we raise the more we’ll spread the message. 

Your infinite is our inspiration.
#watchitreachit






 >>    Cliquez ici <<

story:
Clox is the first brand of stilettos and ballerina pumps with fully-functional, custom made clocks.

Mia always asked herself - are we going forward or running in circles like the legs on the clock? Ever since she was little, she always lived in between dreams and reality, her obsession with time grew larger and somewhere in her imagination CLOX was created. CLOX was the answer to her everyday struggle between steps and time. 

Clock has an interesting round shape, so the first reason is decorative. However, like footsteps, moving clock legs are dynamic. CLOX legs are running in circles day after day, showing the irony of steps and time and its connection with every modern woman's life. CLOX is the answer for today's busy rhythm of life and repetitive actions that she's making day after day.

Perfection takes time, so this CLOX Collection is named Take Your Time. It reminds us how important it is to sometimes slow down and do it right. The photo campaign shows the production in a fun, a bit surreal way, reminding us what every pair of shoes goes through before it ends up on our feet.

CLOX is a brand created by Mia Marić, a graphic designer from Croatia. It combines fashion design, graphic design, photography, brand strategy, advertising and social media to create a truly original, very comfortable shoe, hand-made in a family-owned factory. CLOX shoes are produced in Europe, at two specialized shoe factories. First factory specializes in high-quality flat shoes (ballerina pumps) and is based in Croatia, while the second one is located in Italy and specializes in women's stilettos. Since it's inception, CLOX collaborates with brand consultants, best Croatian fashion photographers and shoe production developers.


The stiletto-clock idea was conceived in 2009, and a year after Mia decided to make her dream a reality and began working on the project. CLOX brand was founded in December of 2011, with the first campaign launched in February of 2012 when her shoes were first introduced to the Croatian market.

Clocks on shoes don't need to show the right time, or same time. We advise you to play with your time and set your left foot in one time zone and the right foot in another! When batteries stop just replace them the same way you would do it on your wristwatch, or you can set the legs in the CLOX logo position.

CLOX stilettos and ballerinas are perfect footwear for every confident young woman who knows how to manage time and use it to her advantage. They're elegant, yet unique and rebellious stilettos with character, that can make you ask yourself if you use your time well. CLOX Timeless Straps are unisex accessories that you can wear in many creative ways.

First three years of CLOX are behind us and we are ready to tell the world about our shoes. We're planning our first big collection and we need your support to cover half of the cost of the factory production. We also appreciate your support in spreading the word about us! So every share, like and comment is greatly appreciated.

Don't measure your feet in the morning, because feet often swell during the day due to heat and activity. For the best fit, measure your feet at the end of the day. To measure your shoe size follow these instructions: place a piece of paper on the floor with one end against a wall. Stand on the piece of paper with your heel against the wall. Mark the piece of paper where your toes end with a pencil. Measure from the end of the piece of paper to the mark you created with your pencil and compare the measurement to our sizing chart. Be careful to choose the right size because while the initial shipping is free, returns and reshipping are not.




Since 2012 we designed three collections, all produced in Croatia (EU). With each collection we worked on improving our molds and acquired better, more premium leather. Now that we designed the perfect stiletto and the ballerina pump we need your support to cover the factory production costs. We offer you presale pricing, at lower prices than the web shop and stores once the collection is launched.

Since we've been on the market for three years and have produced and sold collections the risks are small, mostly connected with unexpected factory delays. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and ahead of schedule.

PRESS KIT: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/sjjr24usi7urbeg/AADT...

story:
Our Story

JaJo Couture is a women's clothing label of all sorts ranging from tops, skirts and simple dresses to lavish collars, decorated jackets and high impact fashion.  The label is currently owned, operated and ran by the designer Janean Johnson.  Fashion Week is a big deal for designers to showcase their current line and this year JaJo Couture is inspired to return to the LA scene to showcase the new 2012 Fall Collection called Raven's and Rage.


JaJo Couture showed with Project Ethos in 2010 and received a large impact of media coverage and interest in the clothing line.  You can go to the JaJo Couture website at www.JaJoCouture.com to see previous video footage, photos and press coverage.


The Impact

The campaign is in a short amount of time less then 30 days to raise the funds but every portion will push forth and put JaJo Couture on the runway in LA.  

What We Need & What You Get

JaJo Couture needs to raise the funds for the participation fee and the cost of travel to get there and back.  JaJo Couture is not merely requesting donations, there are perks to this, more like a sponsorship, gift certificates, logo placement and merchandise are being offered for funding and sponsors.


Demographics:

Median Age: 25.8

Age Range: 21-34

(Men & Women)

Income Levels:

*13.3% earn $40k>

*38.6% earn $40k+

*25.2 earn $60k+

*13.1% earn $90k+

*9.8% earn $125k+


The media coverage for Project Ethos spans from the 

Huffington Post, WWD, CA Apparel News, LA Times 

& 944 magazine just to name a few.  This is a great 

opportunity to take a piece of the exposure and support 

JaJo Couture.


Once you purchase your package please email your logo and link information to Janean@JaJoCouture.com


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't monetarily help there are other ways to help, post this on your Facebook, your twitter and linked in to help get the word out!  JaJo Couture appreciates all forms of support.

story:
The World's Raddest Swimwear

Sensi Graves Bikinis combines performance, function, and fashion. We started the company in 2012 based on a need we saw in the market, and over the past 7 years we’ve continually produced swimsuits that look amazing, stay put, and empower women.

Now we're upping the rad factor even more with our vision of becoming the most ethical, transparent and sustainable swim line out there. That starts with transitioning to all recycled fabrics made from reclaimed fishing nets and recycled plastic bottles.

The Why

In 2012, professional kiteboarder Sensi Graves launched her eponymous swimwear label, Sensi Graves Bikinis, to meet the demands of her sport. After losing one too many string bikinis in the surf, she decided to tackle the job herself and design suits that actually stay on in rough conditions. 

Today, at Sensi Graves Bikinis, we design swimwear that’s made to stay put. Our core mission: to design swimwear that’s both fiercely functional and fabulously feminine. Our values include not only making great product but also protecting the places we play. 

We aim to produce swimwear that makes you feel awesome, but we also want to make products that are truly eco-friendly. This campaign is our commitment towards increased sustainability and transparency. With your support, we can make the most eco-friendly swimwear out there.

 
 

We have chosen to make the entire 2020 line out of recycled fabrics! With this campaign, we are launching 5 tops and 5 bottoms available for pre-order. This campaign features a few of our best selling pieces as well as some new additions that all told, make up the most comfortable, flattering and supportive swimwear around. Get excited... We dive into the product specifications below!

 

Why Back Us

We have been designing and producing innovative swimwear for 7 years with sustainability built into the business from the beginning. With this campaign, our backers will put us on the pathway towards becoming one of THE most transparent, ethical, and sustainable clothing brands on the market. 

We need YOU: people who want innovative swimwear, but without sacrificing environmental responsibility.

Your funding will help us:

 

The How

For our 2020 line, we’re partnering with Salem, Oregon facility, KAM, to implement high quality manufacturing with acute attention to detail that enables superior efficiency and fewer carbon emissions than overseas production.

 

 

Utilizing local manufacturing is just one piece of the puzzle. Moving forward we are committed to using only fabrics made from up-cycled or recycled materials; primarily plastic bottles, reclaimed fishing nets and nylon off-cuts. These fabrics reduce the global warming impact of nylon by up to 80% compared with virgin materials.  

For every Sensi Graves top you buy, you’re keeping 5 plastic bottles out of the ocean. 

We carry our commitment through every detail of our swimwear, by using compostable hygienic liners and packaging, recycled hang-tags and packaging and organic cotton labels.

Transparency in action; here's where we currently source from:

 

About the Fabrics

In partnership with two fibers manufacturers, Econyl® and Repreve® we've committed to fabrics that have less impact on the world, with the ultimate goal of creating a closed-loop, take back system for old swimwear. 

Repreve®, is one of the world’s leading performance fibers made from recycled materials. Repreve transforms recycled bottles into an amazing fiber. Compared to making virgin fiber, Repreve offsets using new petroleum and therefore conserving water and emitting less greenhouse gas in the process. 

Econyl® starts with rescuing waste such as fishing nets, fabric scraps, and industrial plastic from oceans and landfills. This waste is then regenerated into yarns and textiles to be repurposed into apparel and more. Econyl’s vision is a circular system in which Econyl products, once at the end of their lifecycle, can re-enter the system at the beginning and be regenerated anew.  

 

For every 10,000 tons of Econyl® materials used, 70,000 barrels of crude oil are saved.  

 

Both fiber companies make excellent quality materials that hold up over time, are soft to the touch and feel amazing against the skin. 

 

Includes 10 body style options to mix and match to find your perfect suit. All fabrics are UPF 50+. Each body style is available in a selection of colors. Surveys will be sent for size and color post-campaign. 

 

Alexa top

A full-coverage, high-neck and super-supportive top.  The Alexa top is specifically designed for women with larger busts and smaller rib cages. The multi-strap cross back disperses support across the entire back and enables all over cinch-ability. An adjustable back enables you to get the perfect fit.

 

Aurora bottom

This surf bottom is designed to stay put no-matter what. The drawstring waistline enables cinching for maximum staying power. And the elastic over the booty keeps everything tight and right. With a scrunch butt, the Aurora is both flattering and fun. 

 

 

Colleen top

This fully reversible bikini top has hidden seams for added comfort, a one-inch under-bust elastic band for staying power and thick shoulder straps for comfort and durability. The Colleen bikini top is a comfortable sports top that has sexy strap-back detail and a low scoop neck front for crowd-pleasing wearability. Doubles as a sports bra.

 

 

Kyla bottom

The Kyla reversible bikini is our standout cheeky bottom. And because it's reversible, it’s like you get two super awesome bikini bottoms for the price of one! These bottoms are seamless and very comfortable. 

 

Stacy top

Adjustable, comfortable and supportive, the Stacy top features cross back straps, pads and a ruched front. This top is designed for larger bust sizes and will hold your girls in. With good coverage and excellent support this top is made to work. Has removable soft bra cups.

Nika bottom

Brand new for 2020, the Nika bottom is a flattering high-waisted piece that looks ah-mazing. This top features a seamless waistband for a smooth, comfortable fit and a high leg in the front for a flattering look. Moderate coverage. 

Issy top

The Issy top is quickly becoming our favorite piece in the line-up. This top features a beautiful strappy back, 1" under bust elastic for superior hold and excellent bust coverage to keep you feeling tight and right. Removable soft bra cups. 

 

Jennifer bottom

Our best selling bottom! These bottoms are so comfortable you won’t want to take them off. With zero elastic around the booty, the Jennifer bottoms won’t cut into your cheeks. Featuring a ruched detail in the back to create a flattering shape.

 

 

Claire top

Cross back straps allow for easy cinch-ability when you're ready to get busy and provide optimal staying power. A great option for women with larger busts and smaller rib cages but super flattering on a variety of body types. No bra cups means not having to worry about any adjustments. 

 

 

 

Amanda bottom

Reversible moderate coverage bikini bottom. This bottom is super comfortable. The raised sides and front allow for more coverage and provide a smoothing effect. 

Behind the Magic

Sensi Graves is a professional kiteboarder, entrepreneur and speaker. In 2007, she tentatively signed up for a kiteboarding lesson in North Carolina’s Outer Banks and immediately fell in love. Just two years later, she applied to be a kiteboarding coach, relocated to the East Coast, and started collecting accolades. The Hood River, Oregon, competes at international kiteboarding invitationals, garners continuous coverage in kiteboarding magazines, and leads women's kiteboarding retreats worldwide.

As a professional athlete and active woman, Sensi knows what it takes for swimwear to stay put. 

 

Head of customer service and sales, Victoria Williams is a lawyer-gone yoga teacher whose sought after classes and sold out retreats make her a legend in the field. Her years of yoga practice and avid surfing and snowboarding make her an excellent product tester as well as expert in the line. 

 

Professional kiteboarder Colleen Carroll was team Sensi's very first team rider and athlete. Colleen is a top level athlete having claimed podiums around the globe. She’s won the prestigious Triple-S Invitational 4 times, has been awarded the AWSI female kiteboarder of the year 3 times, and has been showcased in publications worldwide.  Colleen continues to progress her skills on the water and thrives on sharing these with others.

 

Hired to help bring professional and democratic fit to the 2020 Sensi Graves Bikinis line, Stephanie and Kozet of The Squad bring years of product and fit expertise.

Stephanie Muhlenfeld has 16 years of product experience with brands including Victoria’s Secret, Aerie, Nike, and Evelyn and Bobbie. She also holds 8 patents across 3 companies.

Kozet Mitchell spent 14 years at Nike across multiple departments as a key innovator and maker. Kozet’s love for product, and persistent dedication to ensure a product is designed and developed to its full potential is an exceptional quality that is hard to find.

Interested in becoming a part of our team? Through our ambassador program, we seek to build community, encourage female empowerment and spread high vibes. 

Known for bikinis that are made to move in, our swimwear keeps up with your ultimate lifestyle. Our main customer base is in the United States but we are looking for ambassadors to help us grow worldwide. Help us spread the Sensi Graves Bikinis mission, wear awesome suits and make money along the way. Apply today and join our growing community. 

 

Funding Breakdown:

This is an opportunity to be part of something special! You are being given the chance to help create change in how swimwear is manufactured.

The funds raised from this campaign will help pay for the regenerated and recycled fabrics and put a down payment on our 2020 order with our Oregon-based manufacturer.

Now we're upping the rad factor even more with our vision of becoming the most ethical, transparent and sustainable swim line out there. That starts with transitioning to all recycled fabrics made from reclaimed fishing nets and recycled plastic bottles.

The Why
In 2012, professional kiteboarder Sensi Graves launched her eponymous swimwear label, Sensi Graves Bikinis, to meet the demands of her sport. After losing one too many string bikinis in the surf, she decided to tackle the job herself and design suits that actually stay on in rough conditions. 
Today, at Sensi Graves Bikinis, we design swimwear that’s made to stay put. Our core mission: to design swimwear that’s both fiercely functional and fabulously feminine. Our values include not only making great product but also protecting the places we play. 
We aim to produce swimwear that makes you feel awesome, but we also want to make products that are truly eco-friendly. This campaign is our commitment towards increased sustainability and transparency. With your support, we can make the most eco-friendly swimwear out there.

  

We have chosen to make the entire 2020 line out of recycled fabrics! With this campaign, we are launching 5 tops and 5 bottoms available for pre-order. This campaign features a few of our best selling pieces as well as some new additions that all told, make up the most comfortable, flattering and supportive swimwear around. Get excited... We dive into the product specifications below!

 
Why Back Us
We have been designing and producing innovative swimwear for 7 years with sustainability built into the business from the beginning. With this campaign, our backers will put us on the pathway towards becoming one of THE most transparent, ethical, and sustainable clothing brands on the market. 
We need YOU: people who want innovative swimwear, but without sacrificing environmental responsibility.
Your funding will help us:

 
The How
For our 2020 line, we’re partnering with Salem, Oregon facility, KAM, to implement high quality manufacturing with acute attention to detail that enables superior efficiency and fewer carbon emissions than overseas production.
 

 
Utilizing local manufacturing is just one piece of the puzzle. Moving forward we are committed to using only fabrics made from up-cycled or recycled materials; primarily plastic bottles, reclaimed fishing nets and nylon off-cuts. These fabrics reduce the global warming impact of nylon by up to 80% compared with virgin materials.  
For every Sensi Graves top you buy, you’re keeping 5 plastic bottles out of the ocean. 
We carry our commitment through every detail of our swimwear, by using compostable hygienic liners and packaging, recycled hang-tags and packaging and organic cotton labels.
Transparency in action; here's where we currently source from:

 

About the Fabrics
In partnership with two fibers manufacturers, Econyl® and Repreve® we've committed to fabrics that have less impact on the world, with the ultimate goal of creating a closed-loop, take back system for old swimwear. 
Repreve®, is one of the world’s leading performance fibers made from recycled materials. Repreve transforms recycled bottles into an amazing fiber. Compared to making virgin fiber, Repreve offsets using new petroleum and therefore conserving water and emitting less greenhouse gas in the process. 
Econyl® starts with rescuing waste such as fishing nets, fabric scraps, and industrial plastic from oceans and landfills. This waste is then regenerated into yarns and textiles to be repurposed into apparel and more. Econyl’s vision is a circular system in which Econyl products, once at the end of their lifecycle, can re-enter the system at the beginning and be regenerated anew.   For every 10,000 tons of Econyl® materials used, 70,000 barrels of crude oil are saved.   Both fiber companies make excellent quality materials that hold up over time, are soft to the touch and feel amazing against the skin. 
 

Includes 10 body style options to mix and match to find your perfect suit. All fabrics are UPF 50+. Each body style is available in a selection of colors. Surveys will be sent for size and color post-campaign. 
 
Alexa top
A full-coverage, high-neck and super-supportive top.  The Alexa top is specifically designed for women with larger busts and smaller rib cages. The multi-strap cross back disperses support across the entire back and enables all over cinch-ability. An adjustable back enables you to get the perfect fit.

 
Aurora bottom
This surf bottom is designed to stay put no-matter what. The drawstring waistline enables cinching for maximum staying power. And the elastic over the booty keeps everything tight and right. With a scrunch butt, the Aurora is both flattering and fun.   Colleen top
This fully reversible bikini top has hidden seams for added comfort, a one-inch under-bust elastic band for staying power and thick shoulder straps for comfort and durability. The Colleen bikini top is a comfortable sports top that has sexy strap-back detail and a low scoop neck front for crowd-pleasing wearability. Doubles as a sports bra.
 

 
Kyla bottom
The Kyla reversible bikini is our standout cheeky bottom. And because it's reversible, it’s like you get two super awesome bikini bottoms for the price of one! These bottoms are seamless and very comfortable. 
 Stacy top
Adjustable, comfortable and supportive, the Stacy top features cross back straps, pads and a ruched front. This top is designed for larger bust sizes and will hold your girls in. With good coverage and excellent support this top is made to work. Has removable soft bra cups.

Nika bottom
Brand new for 2020, the Nika bottom is a flattering high-waisted piece that looks ah-mazing. This top features a seamless waistband for a smooth, comfortable fit and a high leg in the front for a flattering look. Moderate coverage. 

Issy top
The Issy top is quickly becoming our favorite piece in the line-up. This top features a beautiful strappy back, 1" under bust elastic for superior hold and excellent bust coverage to keep you feeling tight and right. Removable soft bra cups. 
 

Jennifer bottom
Our best selling bottom! These bottoms are so comfortable you won’t want to take them off. With zero elastic around the booty, the Jennifer bottoms won’t cut into your cheeks. Featuring a ruched detail in the back to create a flattering shape.
   
Claire top
Cross back straps allow for easy cinch-ability when you're ready to get busy and provide optimal staying power. A great option for women with larger busts and smaller rib cages but super flattering on a variety of body types. No bra cups means not having to worry about any adjustments. 
 

  Amanda bottom
Reversible moderate coverage bikini bottom. This bottom is super comfortable. The raised sides and front allow for more coverage and provide a smoothing effect. 

Behind the Magic

Sensi Graves is a professional kiteboarder, entrepreneur and speaker. In 2007, she tentatively signed up for a kiteboarding lesson in North Carolina’s Outer Banks and immediately fell in love. Just two years later, she applied to be a kiteboarding coach, relocated to the East Coast, and started collecting accolades. The Hood River, Oregon, competes at international kiteboarding invitationals, garners continuous coverage in kiteboarding magazines, and leads women's kiteboarding retreats worldwide.
As a professional athlete and active woman, Sensi knows what it takes for swimwear to stay put. 
 

Head of customer service and sales, Victoria Williams is a lawyer-gone yoga teacher whose sought after classes and sold out retreats make her a legend in the field. Her years of yoga practice and avid surfing and snowboarding make her an excellent product tester as well as expert in the line. 
 

Professional kiteboarder Colleen Carroll was team Sensi's very first team rider and athlete. Colleen is a top level athlete having claimed podiums around the globe. She’s won the prestigious Triple-S Invitational 4 times, has been awarded the AWSI female kiteboarder of the year 3 times, and has been showcased in publications worldwide.  Colleen continues to progress her skills on the water and thrives on sharing these with others.
 

Hired to help bring professional and democratic fit to the 2020 Sensi Graves Bikinis line, Stephanie and Kozet of The Squad bring years of product and fit expertise.
Stephanie Muhlenfeld has 16 years of product experience with brands including Victoria’s Secret, Aerie, Nike, and Evelyn and Bobbie. She also holds 8 patents across 3 companies.
Kozet Mitchell spent 14 years at Nike across multiple departments as a key innovator and maker. Kozet’s love for product, and persistent dedication to ensure a product is designed and developed to its full potential is an exceptional quality that is hard to find.

Interested in becoming a part of our team? Through our ambassador program, we seek to build community, encourage female empowerment and spread high vibes. 
Known for bikinis that are made to move in, our swimwear keeps up with your ultimate lifestyle. Our main customer base is in the United States but we are looking for ambassadors to help us grow worldwide. Help us spread the Sensi Graves Bikinis mission, wear awesome suits and make money along the way. Apply today and join our growing community. 
 
Funding Breakdown:
This is an opportunity to be part of something special! You are being given the chance to help create change in how swimwear is manufactured.
The funds raised from this campaign will help pay for the regenerated and recycled fabrics and put a down payment on our 2020 order with our Oregon-based manufacturer.

story:
***Note: After you check out, we’ll send you to a survey where you will specify things like ring size and ring selection etc. Also, most of the rings are Unisex. 

 

Ring Collection

You can select from these six designs or you can place a custom order. Note - During the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, your custom ring specifications, etc.

Also, When ordering a ring, you can choose to have a sterling insert(insertion of silver) and Luminescence added in your ring with no extra cost.

 

 Gold Landscape Ring

 Flower Ring

 Aurora Borealis Ring

Wild Mountain Ring

 Purple Rose Ring

 Coral Ring

 Enchanted Flower Ring

 

Sizing Guide

Note - After the campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all of our backers. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, etc.

If you're unsure of your ring size, you can use the website below to calculate it for free. All you'll need is something the same size as a credit card (library card, grocery store club card, etc., or of course a credit card will do) to hold up to the screen to calibrate the size of how images will show up on your monitor. Once you do that, it will give you a chart of circles. Just hold a ring that you knows fits you up to the screen and find the circle it matches with. Or, you can go to a jewelry store and they'll be able to tell you your size for free. But do not worry if you get your size wrong we will be happy to exchange it for you with no extra cost.

Here's the link to find your ring size: http://findmyringsize.com/

 

Pendant Collection

Aurora Borealis

 

Patterns Pedant Set

 

Want to feel more Special? 

Then, order a Custom Ring or Pendant and we are sure we won't disappoint you.

 

 

Short Summary

Dismayed with the lack of uniqueness in the jewelry market, we decided to create something different. Three years ago, we bought a poor quality miniature wooden ring on the internet. We did not receive what we ordered, totally different than the pictures.

We knew we could do something better and we decided to create a range of our rings. After working 2-3 years on perfectioning rings, we discovered the secret of making these rings

We worked hard to create a ring more unique and of better quality than anything else on the market. We knew we were on to something when we put up on Facebook a batch of six rings we created by hand. We sold them all In fact, one man was so stunned by the way the ring looked in the photographs that he bought one and used it to propose to his girlfriend. The beauty of the ring knocked her socks off and, of course, she said yes.

Each ring is carefully created by hand and imparted with natural materials such as flowers, wood, moss, amber, corals, etc. The result makes each ring look as if it contains its own hidden world.

Development


What makes us Unique? 

After 2-3 years of experiment...Together, we’ve created our own ultra-clear epoxy resin formula tailored for the brand. This cures much more slowly than other epoxy blends and so seals the wood perfectly. It won’t yellow with time or when under sunlight. It’s also tougher than market resins and smooths better during sanding.

we’ve also created our own coloring agents to work with this specific type of epoxy. These won’t fade after a few months and so the rings will look vibrant for years to come.

Take a look at the high detailing below....

 

 

Return Policy 

If it needs to be resized then feel free to send it back and we'll take care of it for you.

 

The Impact 

This will allow us to bulk order supplies so we can provide you these beautiful rings at a very low price and we would like everyone to feel different with the custom order option where you can send us an image or inspiration and we will create a ring just for you. So why wait? Pre-order your favorite ring now or get a custom ring.

 

What We Need & What You Get 

We have been working on these rings for the last 2-3 years and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to bulk order supplies so we can make these rings available to you and others at a very low price and make you stand out from the crowd.

For queries, Kindly drop us an email at chirag@myenchantedsoul.com

 

Product Development (In Production Stage)

To develop Enchanted soul, we went through a rigorous process of design, prototyping, and testing. We wanted to make sure these rings were unique and would make you feel special. We started with some rough sketches, to give us some idea of the aesthetic look of the ring. 

We wanted it to be smooth with no hard edges. We also wanted some initial ideas of the hidden worlds these rings could contain. 

Then we tested different rings, to make sure we got the shape, the feel, the epoxy blend, the quality of the wood and the overall look just right. We fine tuned our process, from turning, to selecting the right tools, manufacturing the billets, creating the hold, even the type of sandpaper we used. 

All this allowed us to create the finished product -- our range of beautiful handcrafted rings, with enchanted worlds you can take with you anywhere.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Where I can select my ring size? 

A : After your purchase, we will be sending out a survey. This survey is where you will specify things like ring size, ring of your selection, etc.

Q: Do you make men's ring? 

A : Our Coral, Aurora Borealis, Wild Mountain and Gold Landscape rings are Unisex. Also, you can also place a custom order.

Q: What do you mean by the custom ring? Does it mean backers can send you photos/images that they would like to have in the ring? 

A : Yes exactly, we will be collecting this information during the survey later.

Q: What if I order a wrong size even after following the sizing guide? 

A: Do not worry if you get your size wrong we will be happy to exchange it for you with no extra cost.

story:
Get a free pair of Sunski Originals when you share this campaign with your friends!  Details here

 

FAQ:

Yes, US shipping is free! International funders please add $12 to your order to cover mail costs.

Yes, you can get more than one pair! Once you fund for your first pair, you can contribute again and select a second perk. (international backers don't need to add shipping again)

Inspired by the vibrant colors and classic styles Tom found on his surf trip to Australia, the Sunski Walkabouts are the perfect combination of timeless design and modern craftmanship. With solid polarization lenses, polished matte-black frames, and custom a travel box, the Sunskis offer designer quality features at a price affordable to everyone. 

We're here on Indiegogo to introduce the Walkabouts as our first new addition to our original Sunski line launched last summer. Our goal is to produce a limited production run of the Walkabouts for timely delivery this fall! We hope you enjoy learning about the shades!

Thanks for stoping by!  -Michael & Tom

 

Ever since we launched the original Sunski colors last summer, we’ve been hard at work making sure the Sunskis meet our high standards for quality, comfort, and affordability. We’ve also listened to your feedback and suggestions throughout the entire process: you guys wanted a new style of Sunskis with a darker frame...Which is why we're so excited to introduce the brand new, matte-black, Sunski Walkabouts!  

Like the original Sunskis, the Walkabouts are polarized shades featuring the quality you would expect from designer sunglasses at a price that everybody can afford. They come in our custom Sunski travel boxes, and are especially important to us because they represent the first product expansion we have launched since we first made the originals Sunski. Crowdfunding will always be a part of the Sunski story, so we felt that Indiegogo would be the perfect place to introduce our new Sunskis.

We’ve also limited the number of Sunski Walkabouts that we’re producing to ensure on time delivery and manageable box packing.  It's just the two of us here and we pack every box ourselves!

Thanks for spending some time to learn about out our brand new Walkabouts. For more information about story and the rewards we’re offering for your support, please read on!

 

The Walkabouts feature the timeless wayfarer style, updated with the latest technology in sunglasses manufacturing.  Check out all the details here!

We've updated the lenses with the very best technology available today.  The tri-acetate cellulose core includes a solid polarization layer, and the lenses offer 100% full-spectrum UV protection, including UVA, UVB and UV400 wavelengths.  The combination of polarization and UV protection allows for better and brighter vision without eyestrain.  They are EU Category 3 lenses with a visible light transmission rating of 15%, and meet all US ANSI z80.3-2001 standards, including the FDA basic impact test.  The dialectic mirror coating further blocks glare and makes you look really cool as well. 

The rugged Sunski frames that you all love are back, in black.  The durable and flexible polycarbonate frames can take the beatings you throw at it and still hold up beautifully.  The construction material used is the lightest and strongest on the market, and the elasticity of the arms provides the wearer with a universal fit that's both comfortable yet tight enough to stay on your head, no matter how big the moguls or how head-bangin' the rock concert. 

The hinges have been upgraded from their original style to a five-spoke and pin design that allows for stronger torsional rigidity and consistent tension when opening and closing the hinge.  They also look awesome. It's all in the details!

 

As independent designers with new tools like Indiegogo, we can partner directly with our supporters to deliver all of the Sunski quality at a price that everybody can afford.  With your help, we can sidestep the brand inflation, middlemen and markups that makes most “designer” glasses of this quality extremely expensive.  The Sunskis embody the best of what we're all about: making things that we love to use--things that we hope you’ll love as well.

In return for your support, we’re offering...Sunskis! We've limited the number of Sunski Walkabouts that we are producing so we can keep box packing under control and deliver your Sunskis on time.

Thanks for checking out the Sunski Walkabouts! We can't wait to start making these incredible shades so we can get them to you this fall! Cheers!

In return for your support, we’re offering...Sunskis! We've limited the number of Sunski Walkabouts that we are producing so we can keep box packing under control and deliver your Sunskis on time. 







Thanks for checking out the Sunski Walkabouts! We can't wait to start making these incredible shades so we can get them to you this fall! Cheers!

story:
About Tiksy

www.Tiksy.org

Tiksy, which means world in Quechua, works with peruvian artisans from Cusco and Arequipa. The Belgian designed clothes are handmade with natural alpaca fibers or organic cotton and naturally dyed with plants such as red corn, nogal or Chilca.



My name is Carole Stavart and  I'm the owner and designer of Tiksy. I'm from Belgium and live in Peru.

In 2004, we created Tiksy with a Peruvian friend  as a social project to help women artisans to have opportunities of work and learning. We participated to several social projects and trade fair such as Peru Moda and Ethical Fashion show in Paris. After a few years, we started sending models to Belgium and France.


Nowadays, Tiksy is available in several boutiques in Belgium and France and we work with a distribution company for Belgium, Holland, Luxembourg and Germany since one year!

What we need now is increasing our stocks and our team! 

Because cash flow is an obstacle to our progress, we need your help to create our dream!

 Helping us to realize our dream, you'll get samples of Tiksy or a trip to Peru!

   

Today, we need 200 000$ to increase our production, our team and to get a bigger office

 If we don’t reach the amount, we’ll focus on the stock production first. Feel free to ask our business plan to know more about the expenses distribution.

Anyway, helping us, you’ll discover nice items in alpaca wool! So soft and warm! Or also have the opportunity to visit us!

The Impact

  Eco –friendly and ethical fashion is growing more and more becoming an important niche in Europe but also in other continents. Nowadays more people are aware of environmental and ethical issues in textile production. 

Tiksy wants to join the line of textile brands that make the difference!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our Indie gogo campaign with others through FB, Twitter or simply through a conversation! 

If you want more information about us, visit our website: www.tiksy.org or call me at +51 1 2214755 or skype me! carolita08

After a few years, we started sending models to Belgium and France.Nowadays, Tiksy is available in several boutiques in Belgium and France and we work with a distribution company for Belgium, Holland, Luxembourg and Germany since one year!What we need now is increasing our stocks and our team! Because cash flow is an obstacle to our progress, we need your help to create our dream! Helping us to realize our dream, you'll get samples of Tiksy or a trip to Peru!   Today, we need 200 000$ to increase our production, our team and to get a bigger office If we don’t reach the amount, we’ll focus on the stock production first. Feel free to ask our business plan to know more about the expenses distribution.Anyway, helping us, you’ll discover nice items in alpaca wool! So soft and warm! Or also have the opportunity to visit us!The Impact  Eco –friendly and ethical fashion is growing more and more becoming an important niche in Europe but also in other continents. Nowadays more people are aware of environmental and ethical issues in textile production. Tiksy wants to join the line of textile brands that make the difference!Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share our Indie gogo campaign with others through FB, Twitter or simply through a conversation! If you want more information about us, visit our website: www.tiksy.org or call me at +51 1 2214755 or skype me! carolita08

story:
You can read more about us at http://www.bollytude.com




We all love Bollywood movies. Some choose to love a few and some love to hate a few. Bollywood is essentially its bold colors, the heartwarming music, the cheesy romanticism, the corny plots, the ‘ouches’ and the dhishoom dhishooms, basically all things masala. We quote them everyday, from ‘Tumhare paas kya hain’ to ‘Abey khamosh’! We love these cliches and we live them! No matter how much we try denying it, Bollywood is a big part of our lives. And that’s where the idea for Bollytude came from. To make Bollywood an even bigger part of our lives.


All Bollytude t-shirts will be printed on very high quality, light weight, 100% cotton t-shirts by American Apparel / Alternative Apparel.

The goal for these t-shirts is to make something that is comfortable enough for your everyday college/office wear and fashionable enough that you'll want to wear it to a party or out on a date.

The t-shirts will be printed using direct to garment printing techniques.

Below are the links for the t-shirt sizing.

Men's t-shirt       |     Women's t-shirt




Bollytude plans to become the premium exclusive brand for all Bollywood merchandise. You might see glimpses of Bollywood in a few brands today, but it's quite an uncharted territory when it comes to having a whole brand dedicated to hindi films. Bollytude aspires to be that brand, to own that territory, to be the brand the youth associates with. The idea here is to take our favorite movies, the over abused cliches and plots, signature moves and give them a fresh new perspective, a new ATTITUDE! We aren't trying to just quote movies on a shirt, we are making a fashion statement, a bold one!


All the money we raise in this campaign will help us as a startup capital for our vision:

- Bollytude promises that, we will never ever compromise on quality and always print on the best quality comfortable t-shirts.

- Currently Bollytude has outsourced its printing efforts to an external entity. We plan to do all the printing in-house so as to guarantee top notch quality t-shirts and designs. We have done extensive research in the past 3 months on the quality of the t-shirts we want to use, the best printing technique and coming up with really cool designs.

- Our customers will never ever have to pay for any shipping and handling. Yes that's right, we believe in providing the best customer experience. All our product prices will be all inclusive of any shipping and handling costs*.


Help us spread the word! Use your unique campaign link from the top of the page and share it with your friends using whatever you like. Tweet it, post it on Facebook, share on Google+, text it, IM it, use a carrier pigeon, whatever. 

What do you get for all this you ask? Good question! 

To appreciate your efforts for helping us reach many more 'Bollywood lovers' we'll be giving you free t-shirts.

This is how it works:

Anytime anyone clicks your unique link to get to our page, Indiegogo tracks that activity and “credits” you with the referral.



Our online store/website: http://www.bollytude.com

Like our page on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bollytude

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bollytude

Read what we are working on: http://bollytude.tumblr.com/

Have suggestions for us or just want to say hello?

Write to us at hello@bollytude.com


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important:

Once you support us, we will send you a separate email for your choice of t-shirt design, size and other details.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A little heads up!

- Apparel images here are mockups. Actual products may slightly vary from the mockups in color tone, graphic size/positioning, etc. We do our best to make sure what you see is what you get.

- For the perks that contain more than 1 t-shirt, you can select from any of our deisgns, male/female and sizes.

- * The product cost will not include taxes. We know it's a bummer but its a govt thing :( Also we currently only ship in US and Canada. For international shipping you will have to pay $10 extra, but we are working really hard to make that go away :)

story:
日本語の紹介ページはこちらをご覧ください。

Would you like to wear a watch designed for yourself?

Starter Watch is an online service that lets you design and 3D print your own watch. After designing your watch and submitting the data online, the parts will be 3D printed and delivered to you. You can simply put them together only with a screwdriver. We believe a watch can be one of the items that reflects your personality. If so, we thought, it would be wonderful if we could provide a service where anyone can easily realize her/his imaginations to create a watch for her/him.

> Start designing for free


Fantastic design ideas from users!



Featured in the media!




Available in 3 simple steps



1. Design your watch online using our online tool

We prepared a website where anyone can easily design watches

2. Get the parts

We take care of the 3D printing and shipping!

3. Assemble the parts

Set up the parts only with a supplied driver!

Gallery



How to design

As you can see in the following video, you can realize your idea quite easily without having hard time to become fluent in a CAD software. We are thrilled to see a lot of interesting watches to come out from our service!




Start designing for free

We have developed 3 design themes. You can start designing right away from the following links!This application is not available on smart phones.




How to perk

Step1:

After finishing designing, click on the "Finish button" and get a unique URL of your work.

Step2:

Choose a perk and finish your payment, then we'll send you an e-mail automatically. If you want to put any words on the dial, please choose a perk "print word" additionally.

Step3:

please reply to our email and let us know the URL you get in Step 1. And if you choose "print word" in the previous step, please write the words you want to print, too.


If you lose the URL, please find your work from the following page by searching for a word of your model name or your account name.
http://starter-watch.com/gallery/ 


Special Prices



Schedule



Product Details

 

Available in 6 colors

Not only the shape but you can also customize the color of the watch and the belt! We have each 6 color variations!


Print your favorite words

You can print your favorite words on the dial.



Risks & Challenges

Recently, 3D printer has become more and more affordable and approachable. For most people, however, 3D printers are still very expensive and CAD software is quite difficult to deal with. So, we decided to make an original platform that enables users to make 3D data easily and that takes care of all the process of printing. As you can see from our website, all the features are ready and the system is up and running. The only challenge we have left is to develop a larger-scale production system so we can provide our service to all the people interested in Starter Watch. And the development cost more than we can afford. That is why we need your support.

Thank you!


About us

We are the japanese designers unit "Ginger". Our background are in design, fashion, planning and engineering.


FAQ

How do I buy watch?

On the right side of our campaign page, a vertical banner shows you the different perks you can buy. Choose a perk and finish your payment, then we'll send you an e-mail automatically.lease reply to our email and let us know the URL which you get at the following address after finishing designing. Design at this link http://starter-watch.com/#designPatterns


特定商取引法による表記

story:
FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!!!!!!!



Leisure Who?

Leisure Activist Group clothing is going next level!

We are an exciting new caused based brand, producing quality lifestyle clothing.

Utilizing various waste material for our raw product, specializing in recycled PET bottles (rPET).

That means for every piece of clothing you buy, we have less plastic waste polluting our oceans.

We are Certified Legit!

FREE SHIPPING

Since we are striving for global recognition, all perks come with FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING, if our project goal is met.

(active top and yoga pants)


Where does the fabric comes from!


Through our work with Upcycle the Gyres Society (http://www.upgyres.org/) we hope to close loop the supply of all our clothing with waste management systems WE implement on our next voyage. Which means you are supporting the ONLY clothing company who takes the steps to PERSONALLY directs waste plastic to revenue


(Mens pants and jacket)

With your help, we can bring this label world wide and prove that the we are in an age of conscious consumers who want to know what they are buying.


Why Sell Clothing?


After three years of attempting to generate sponsors and running the largest fundraising crossing ever attempted with Kite-surfing and Stand Up Paddling (Tonga to Australia) we have decided to take the necessary steps to become financially independent and be in the position to achieve our goals with The Ocean Ambassadors program.

Here's a little story of what we were up to for 2012


Other media links:
http://www.leisureactivistgroup.com/content/Media-Testimonials/60.aspx

Why Go Indiegogo?


This campaign is to fulfill minimum order requirements to launch our clothing.

  • To complete a basic production run of our selection we need this project goal to be met. Without full minimum orders we cannot take our line to the masses.
  • Our perks are produced only from certified and traceable waste material. As we feel when selling an "Eco Product," you better know what you're talking about.
  • If we reach our goal. Our products can start to be recognized as a leader in quality as a caused based brand where proceeds go straight into our flagships operation of The Ocean Ambassadors. (http://theoceanambassadors.com/)


History and the Name:

Leisure Activist Group originated as an educational charter company and offering their top instructors as private guides for visiting Super-yachts in the South Pacific

Our charters focused on IYT and PADI accredited courses, team-building, leadership and enjoying nature.

The specialized guiding service was for clients who wanted to get the most out of their stay in the Pacific Ocean and would engage us as a private coach for Surfing, Kiteboarding, Scuba Diving and for having a great deal of local knowledge and contacts. 

The name came from us being "Activists of Leisure."

After years of working amongst the different island nations, we found there was a massive need for local education on waste management and renewable energy sources.

Slowly but surely we closed down charters and guiding, and are now 100 % focused on our environmental work. 


Now using our clothing as a conduit to generate our essential operating costs. But, since we liked the name, it stuck.

You are now involved in the biggest clean Up, EVER!

Your contribution to this campaign has the potential to have a direct impact on the largest problem our oceans face. The subject on everyone's mind at the moment is waste plastic in the water. Though everyone is talking about it, not many seem to have a solution.

If we are able to operate our next voyage for The Ocean Ambassadors program, we get to implement waste management systems in each island nation we visit. In the hope to close loop our complete supply of plastic for our clothing material! This means we get to curb the problem before it starts.

We don't stop there, our founder is the "Pacific Ocean Marine Logistics Coordinator and Proof of Concept Captain" for Upcycle the Gyres Society. So as new technologies emerge that could be capable of cleaning the garbage patches throughout our oceans, we will be involved in making sure it does not do more harm than good.

One of the only group of people SET on fixing this problem.

www.upgyres.org

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you like what we are doing, HELP US. We would greatly appreciate everyone's help in spreading the word. Start by liking us on Facebook, Share our posts as much as possible and TELL everyone you know about what is happening, and be sure to utilize all Indiegogo share tools!
  • If you know anyone who has a retail shop who may be interested in carrying these products. Kindly direct them to our retail outlet perk options.
  • Contact media avenues, radio, news, magazines, bloggers, breakfast television etc and let them know what is happening.
  • If you truly appreciate what we are doing, feel free to sponsor a mile of the ocean ambassadors voyage for $10 and ensure we can cover costs. http://theoceanambassadors.com/sponsor-a-mile/

and thank you everyone for taking the time to see what we are up to.

ENJOY!

story:
Hi! We are Mark and Twan,

In 2010 we started the World's First Crowdfunded Fashion brand: YOUASME MEASYOU. We want to realise a closer connection between our designs and you, to be inclusive rather than exclusive.

This is expressed through the designs of our refined knitwear and jersey labels MEASYOU (men) and YOUASME (women). 

Our aim is to slow down the speed at which we consume, choosing more aware for better quality and long lasting design.

In order to raise funds for the production of our 7th. collection for Fall/Winter 2014-2015 we now return to the community.

We made a Fantastic list of Perks for you to choose from, hopefully you'll be able to support us!

We would really appreciate it!

Thank you!!

Mark & Twan

YOUASME.COM



YOUASME MEASYOU on TrustPilot.com

www.youasme.com

story:
Dkoko 2015 Bikini Collection

Dkoko is a bikini and clothing brand that is inspired, designed and made in Costa Rica by surfer girls. After 5 years of experience we have learned how to make the perfect bikini that stays on when you surf and practice other sports. 

We need your support to help us create our new bikini collection and have it ready on time to sell it to retailers. Get one of our bikinis, surf leggins and rashguards now and get them before the rest of the world and at a special price!

  • Our products are locally made in Costa Rica where workers enjoy a good job environment and social benefits.  
  • We use high quality materials and fabrics with UV protection.
  • All our products are tested in real waves by real surfers in Playa Hermosa, Costa Rica.

Our new collection: Caribbean Kaleidoscope

This will be our best collection so far! Inspired by the Caribbean of Costa Rica our new collection will feature an unique combination of tropical prints and solid colors in the way only Dkoko knows how to do it. We will have new designs with special features like pockets for keys and wax.

  • Our new collection will have 6 different bikini bottom styles available in sizes Small to Large and in 6 different colors and print combinations. Also 4 bikini top styles available in sizes Small to Extra large in 6 different colors and print combinations. We will also offer 1 style of one piece bikini, surf leggins, rashguard and t-shirts available in different colors and prints as well.
  • With the money raised we will buy all the fabrics and materials needed.
  • We will also do do a photoshoot, video and catalog that we will send to you so you choose the products you will be getting.

What you will be getting?

Help us make this amazing collection reality and you will receive any of the following:
  1. $5: We will mail you a cool Dkoko Sticker for your board or car and thank you note.
  2. $10: Dkoko Cap with our logo.
  3. $25: Dkoko T-shirt Available in Sizes Small to Large in 3 different colors.
  4. $35: We will mail you our catalog so you choose either a bikini bottom or top. We will have 6 different styles of bottoms and 4 styles of tops. 

  5. $70: Choose your perfect surf bikini! Choose from any of our different top and bottom styles.

  6. $60: Surf Rashguard available in Sizes Small to Large, short or long and in 3 different color combinations.

  7. $70: Surf Leggins available in Sizes Small to Large, short or long and in 3 different color combinations.

  8. $120: Surf Pack #1 that includes a surf bikini set (or a 1 piece bikini) and your choice of a rashguard or leg gins.

  9. $200: Surf Pack #2 that includes a surf bikini set (or a 1 piece bikini), 1 surf leggin and 1 rashguard of your choice.

  10. $350: Surf Day with the Dkoko Surf Team. We will take you surfing to a beautiful and perfect surf spot in Costa Rica. If you haven't surfed before you will receive a surf lesson or if you are an experienced surfer we will take you to one of our favorite spots. 

    How are we doing this?

    Check our timeline: 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    You can also help us spreading the word and sharing this campaign with your friends!
