Also 4 bikini top styles available in sizes Small to Extra large in 6 different colors and print combinations. We will also offer 1 style of one piece bikini, surf leggins, rashguard and t-shirts available in different colors and prints as well.

With the money raised we will buy all the fabrics and materials needed. We will also do do a photoshoot, video and catalog that we will send to you so you choose the products you will be getting. 


  What you will be getting?
Help us make this amazing collection reality and you will receive any of the following:

$5: We will mail you a cool Dkoko Sticker for your board or car and thank you note.
$10: Dkoko Cap with our logo.
$25: Dkoko T-shirt Available in Sizes Small to Large in 3 different colors.
$35: We will mail you our catalog so you choose either a bikini bottom or top. We will have 6 different styles of bottoms and 4 styles of tops. 

$70: Choose your perfect surf bikini! Choose from any of our different top and bottom styles.

$60: Surf Rashguard available in Sizes Small to Large, short or long and in 3 different color combinations.

$70: Surf Leggins available in Sizes Small to Large, short or long and in 3 different color combinations.

$120: Surf Pack #1 that includes a surf bikini set (or a 1 piece bikini) and your choice of a rashguard or leg gins.

$200: Surf Pack #2 that includes a surf bikini set (or a 1 piece bikini), 1 surf leggin and 1 rashguard of your choice.

$350: Surf Day with the Dkoko Surf Team. We will take you surfing to a beautiful and perfect surf spot in Costa Rica. If you haven't surfed before you will receive a surf lesson or if you are an experienced surfer we will take you to one of our favorite spots. 



  How are we doing this?  Check our timeline: 

  Other Ways You Can Help You can also help us spreading the word and sharing this campaign with your friends!

story:
Many thanks to our models in the photo above, Jenifer Ann and Double D Bre!

Who We Are

Adorable Foxie is comprised of a mom and pop - literally. We're a husband and wife team, along with our toddler, and we travel the southeastern US selling fake fox tails. Yes, you read that right. 

We got our start in 2009 when Carissa "Foxie" St. Clair left a high-stress job in auto finance to pursue other interests. She was contacted by Cookie Magazine, a nationally syndicated magazine for parents, to produce a faux fur wolf tail for a DIY "Max" costume for parents wanting an inexpensive, easy costume for their little Wild Things to wear. After that, well, the rest is history.

Each year, we've expanded our product line to include a variety of accessories, including:
  • Faux fur ears and tails,
  • Leg warmers and wrist cuffs,
  • Hats and hoods,
  • Scarves, and
  • Mini skirts

    We've worked with a local costume boutique to supply them with fun, customized faux fur accessories year-round. We also continue to travel to area fandom conventions throughout the southeast to bring some of the best costume pieces to attendees.

    Now, we're on a mission to expand even more, breaking the mold by using hard-to-find fabrics to create truly unique accessories for our convention booths and our Etsy store.


    What We Need & What You'll Get

    Our goal is simple. We have the opportunity to visit New York City at the tail end (har har!) of August, and we will be purchasing a variety of limited-run materials that cannot be found anywhere else. The garment district is known for its selection of high quality, one-of-a-kind fabrics that are produced in smaller quantities. We are planning to spend two days in the city, the first to shop around and see what's available, and the second day to finalize our purchases and bring our treasures home. 

    • Our goal is simple: $500 will get us about 20 yards of fabric if we average the cost at $25 per yard. Some of the fabrics may be more or less, and we may be able to haggle down prices depending on how much we are willing to spend.
    • In return for supporting our campaign, you will receive products made from the materials we bring home. You'll be the first to own some of these beautiful faux fur accessories, all handcrafted by Foxie. 
    • All rewards will be delivered in time for Halloween 2014. Also, all reward tiers include the cost of shipping within the United States.

      The Impact

      Adorable Foxie truly is the epitome of small business. We operate out of our home, dedicating a full room of our house to all things sewing. By reaching our goals, we will be ale to:

      • Add unique, limited run accessories to our repertoire,
      • Increase our stock for conventions and on Etsy, which is incredibly busy during the months of September and October, and
      • Inspire others to create beautiful costumes around some of the marvelous pieces we will create. 

        Risks & Challenges

        The biggest challenge in all of this will be deciding how much material to bring home. We already plan to purchase several yards of hard-to-find fabrics, whether we receive funding through this campaign or not. However, any contributions will allow us to expand that amount and decide on a larger variety instead of limiting ourselves to just a few types of faux furs.

        • For each $250 we receive in funding through this campaign, we will select an additional color and/or texture of faux fur to purchase. This will increase the variety of products available for Halloween this year.
        • Since we won't know until we get there what options we will have available, we cannot guarantee choices of colors up front. We will be sharing images of the fabrics we decide upon on our Facebook page, and if none of them suit your preferences for the reward you've selected, you are welcome to choose something more closely aligned to what you are expecting based on the other materials we have access to year-round. (For example, if you had your heart set on a royal fabric, but we can't find it on our trip, we will pursue other options for making sure you get what you're looking for.)
        • If the success of this campaign is far greater than we are expecting, we have experienced friends that can be enlisted in some of the tasks, such as tracing patterns onto fabric or flipping products right-side-out in order to save time and get everything shipped out before Halloween.

          Other Ways You Can Help

          Want to see some of the fun things we'll come up with, but unable to contribute financially? Please spread the word! Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and any other social media platforms you're on.

          In addition, if you're familiar with the New York City garment district, we welcome any tips you may have regarding which shops to visit, what sights to see (Foxie hasn't been to the City since she was just a kid!), and even where to have lunch. 

          This is going to be so much fun!

In addition, if you're familiar with the New York City garment district, we welcome any tips you may have regarding which shops to visit, what sights to see (Foxie hasn't been to the City since she was just a kid!), and even where to have lunch. 
This is going to be so much fun!

story:
If you give a shirt, you'll support a good cause.  

So here's the deal.  

I work with homeless individuals in New York City.  I spend my day creating and managing socially innovative programs that try to end the crises homeless people experience every day. 

Ending homelessness takes time, money, and lots of buy-in.  

But I've noticed something recently that really bothers me.  Something that doesn't take all those complicated things to fix.

Some homeless people don't have clean undershirts to put on in the morning.

How can I expect a chronically homeless person to hold down a job, or a paranoid schizophrenic to nail a housing interview, when they don't even have a clean pair of drawers?

I looked into it, and there are very few charitable organizations geared towards single homeless adults, fewer that focus on clothing, and none that put a premium on new clothing.  I thought that the money must exist in shelter budgets, but a 20% growth in homelessness over the past two years has shrunk expendable line items to zero.

I can get a guy a suit, but I can't get him some skivvies.  

That brings me to part two.

I really feel passionate about this.  In fact, I like it so much that I may start my own nonprofit.  That way, I'd be able to make donations tax-deductible, ask department stores for clothes, partner with businesses trying to do good, or even start a socially responsible business dedicated to the cause.  

While all that jazzes me up good, I don't know if anyone else really cares.

So to show my commitment to the cause, and prove to everyone that I'm not joking, I hope to run a half marathon on March 22nd.  I haven't run a road race since college, and though I drink significantly less, I'm probably not in good enough shape to run competitively.

Hopefully, you'll applaud my effort by throwing me a bone or two.  Or instead of a bone, how about a $1.50 for a shirt?

You can give in any increment you want, but to incentivize the deal I made some prize packages to the right.

If I don't raise all $500 by March 23rd, then your donation simply gets returned to you.  

If you good people do help me raise the $500, I will buy undershirts/underwear/socks in bulk and hand deliver them to a few shelters in particular need.

So please give a shirt!

story:
I Hate My Job...

so I want to work for myself!

*Update!: Put in my notice at work. Last day will be Aug. 9th - also now the end of my campaign.


Who am I?

  • My name is Joe Dillon. My birthday is October 19. I have brown hair. I live in Cleveland. I want your monies...I'll tell you why later.
  • I am creative. I am smart. I have a degree in journalism; I also studied advertising, public relations and art history.
  •  I work in retail - where college graduates go to die. I don't want to die. I WANT TO LIVE.

What am I going to do?

  • I'm going to sell, sell, sell. I've recently taught myself how to screen print t-shirts, and I think I have some pretty awesome ideas that will sell on Etsy, mostly. I also design pretty much anything for print: invitations, greeting cards, posters, etc. that I will also try to sell on Etsy.
  • Also, I'm going to blog about it so you can see where your hard-earned monies are going. I plan to have contests. Contests = free things. Told you I was smart.

How will your money help?

  1. Materials are expensive. How am I supposed to print a t-shirt without a t-shirt to print on? Surprise! I can't. 
  2. I need software for designing. I'd like to get a subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud. I am not a student; therefore, it costs a buttload of money. For the programs I would need (Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign), it will cost about $600/year. Yikes! I could get away with just a subscription for Illustrator at $19.99 per month; We'll see how generous people will be.
  3. I'm quitting my job to pursue this crazy dream. There goes my money. I will be looking for another part time job, but with my savings going to things like - oh I don't know - bills and food, I would love some extra start up cash. Hello, that's what this website is for.

story:
THE PERFECT COMBINATION OF NATURE + TECHNOLOGY

Take on multi-day treks deep into the mountains, climb steep, rugged ascents, and take the path less travelled with our new technical trekking sock. Midweight knit, medium cushioning, and crew length provide support, comfort, and warmth. This sock won't let you down. Made with Yak wool. Made in NZ.

Hiking steep chutes, cruising on groomers, relaxing in the lodge, touring the backcountry, or learning to ski. Whatever your ski style the Pamir ski sock is the only pair you'll ever need. Midweight knit, medium cushion and over-the-calf length is designed to maximise the warmth and comfort in your boot, while also being perfect for hard wearing, hard working skiers who prefer to get out in the backcountry. Made with Yak wool. Made in NZ.

Keep it simple and lightweight with our Trail crew sock. It looks and works great in the city, biking to work, on cold morning runs, on the trail, and anywhere else you can imagine. Lightweight cushioning, mesh panels, crew length and a classic design make this your next go-to sock. Made with Yak wool. Made in NZ.

Yaks have been living on the high altitude plateaus of Tibet, Mongolia and Central Asia for millions of years, at altitudes up to 5000m where winter temperatures frequently go below -40C. Yaks have evolved an amazing insulation system to keep them warm in these extreme environments.

Long coarse hair protects them from the wind, rain and snow, while a soft undercoat of down insulates. We only use the soft down fiber to get the best warmth and comfort.

Sourced from the Tibetan Plateau

Our yak fiber is sourced from the northeastern region of the Tibetan Plateau, where the best grasslands are located and where thousands of herders and their yaks live. We buy the best quality, finest fiber that is sourced directly from herding communities. The herders are paid a fair price, allowing them to earn an income that is compatible with their way of life.

With more than 116 years of sock making experience right next door to us in New Zealand, it just made sense to knit our socks here in NZ. You need more than just a long history of making socks however. So how does the most modern plant in the Southern Hemisphere, the latest Italian knitting machines and a dedication to the highest quality and latest technology sound? We couldn't ask for more, and the socks speak for themselves.

Don't worry too much about which size you are at the moment, as we will collect sizing information in a survey after the campaign ends.

NZ Shipping - $3 with NZ Couriers and Post Haste using 2-Day or overnight delivery. Full tracking and signature on delivery.

Australian Shipping - $6 with Australia Post Parcel Post. 2-7 day delivery with full tracking.

United States Shipping - from $6 to $8 with USPS First Class or Priority Mail. 2-5 day delivery with in-transit or full tracking.

UK Shipping - $8 with Royal Mail 2nd Class Signed. 2-3 day delivery with signature on delivery.

Europe Shipping - $14
- UK Royal Mail International Tracked & Signed. 3-5 day delivery. Full tracking and signature on delivery.
- DPD UK Classic to Europe. 3-7 day delivery. Full tracking and proof of delivery.

Rest of World Shipping - from $10 to $13 For countries or regions not specified above, we will ship with NZ Post International Airmail (untracked 6-10 delivery estimate).

Peak to Plateau began in 2015 after founder Stefan Warnaar spent 3 months travelling, hiking and exploring the vast Mongolian Steppe, and high altitude mountains of Central Asia and the Himalayas. His passion for the outdoors and instant connection with this region of the world sparked the idea for the brand.

After spending time living with yak herders and feeling the warmth and softness of yak, he knew that people needed to be introduced to this amazing natural fiber. As a Kiwi, merino had always been the fiber of choice, but Stefan knew that with the help of yak it was possible to create something even better.

For all enquiries please contact yaks@peaktoplateau.com or send us a message through Kickstarter.

story:
Two friends had one vision, to build the most transparent watch company in the world. After a cricket match in Menorca, we sat down and realised that we had more in common than just this sport. We were unaware of the other's enthusiasm for watches and the desire to design timepieces. What started as a conversation, led to a plan to start our own brand. We developed a strategy to deliver direct to the consumer. This was the start of the #HWjourney.

All the watches you see here on this Kickstarter campaign have a retail price of $145 each, but they are available as a reward to you for a pledge of just $90.

  • To design stylish minimalist watches with an industrial twist
  • To ensure affordability without compromising on quality
  • To become the most transparent watch company in the world

It goes without saying that we wanted to design quality stylish watches without the big brand mark up, like you, we are watch enthusiasts unhappy with paying over inflated prices.

Quality is paramount to us; we believe our reputation is only as good as the durability and reliability of our watches. Therefore we ensured that all materials used in the making of our watch were of the highest standard. Every watch is individually tested before being shipped to our customers.

We wanted to do things slightly differently; so we set out to become the most transparent watch company in the world. We're building a unique on-line community through our Ambassador Club. This means we are the only company giving our customers and fans the opportunity to see what we do behind the scenes to cut our way in this industry. We are documenting everything we do on social media, via Facebook, Instagram, SnapChat and YouTube. We have once a week live Facebook broadcasts, we make films of us hand delivering watches to competition winners, we give daily story updates and make videos featuring our Ambassadors. In a short period of time we have grown the club to over 2,500 ambassadors in over 50 countries across the globe. They all have the opportunity to give us feedback on our products, marketing and branding.

Our #HWjourney has only just begun and we want it to become a global phenomenon. We want to put into manufacture even more lines of watches after these chronos and further develop our growing Ambassador Club. With a successful Kickstarter campaign we will be able to further develop our marketing strategy to grow our Ambassador club to over 50,000 people across the globe. We will ensure that our transparency remains throughout our #HWjourney and we are excited to see where it may lead in the future.

All our watches have interchangeable straps and the Chronograph sub-dials are a 24 hour clock, 60 minute timer and 60 second timer.

Hagley West Watches are also backed with a warranty. We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us. Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch. 

 Warranty does not cover: 

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence or accidents

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support in the form of pledges, but also for you to share our story with a friend. 

We are doing everything we can to spread the word of the #HWjourney on social media but if you could simply share our page on your social media platforms it will help us enormously. 

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support in the form of pledges, but also for you to share our story with a friend. 

Just to remind you if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing.   

We are doing everything we can to spread the word of the #HWjourney on social media but if you could simply share our page on your social media platforms it will help us enormously.

Thank you so much for your support and helping us kickstart our #HWjourney

It goes without saying that we wanted to design quality stylish watches without the big brand mark up, like you, we are watch enthusiasts unhappy with paying over inflated prices.
Quality is paramount to us; we believe our reputation is only as good as the durability and reliability of our watches. Therefore we ensured that all materials used in the making of our watch were of the highest standard. Every watch is individually tested before being shipped to our customers.
We wanted to do things slightly differently; so we set out to become the most transparent watch company in the world. We're building a unique on-line community through our Ambassador Club. This means we are the only company giving our customers and fans the opportunity to see what we do behind the scenes to cut our way in this industry. We are documenting everything we do on social media, via Facebook, Instagram, SnapChat and YouTube. We have once a week live Facebook broadcasts, we make films of us hand delivering watches to competition winners, we give daily story updates and make videos featuring our Ambassadors. In a short period of time we have grown the club to over 2,500 ambassadors in over 50 countries across the globe. They all have the opportunity to give us feedback on our products, marketing and branding.

Our #HWjourney has only just begun and we want it to become a global phenomenon. We want to put into manufacture even more lines of watches after these chronos and further develop our growing Ambassador Club. With a successful Kickstarter campaign we will be able to further develop our marketing strategy to grow our Ambassador club to over 50,000 people across the globe. We will ensure that our transparency remains throughout our #HWjourney and we are excited to see where it may lead in the future.


All our watches have interchangeable straps and the Chronograph sub-dials are a 24 hour clock, 60 minute timer and 60 second timer.
Hagley West Watches are also backed with a warranty. We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us. Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch. 
 Warranty does not cover: 

The life of the battery 
Wear and tear and aging
Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence or accidents

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support in the form of pledges, but also for you to share our story with a friend. 
We are doing everything we can to spread the word of the #HWjourney on social media but if you could simply share our page on your social media platforms it will help us enormously. 

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support in the form of pledges, but also for you to share our story with a friend. 
Just to remind you if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing.   
We are doing everything we can to spread the word of the #HWjourney on social media but if you could simply share our page on your social media platforms it will help us enormously.
Thank you so much for your support and helping us kickstart our #HWjourney

story:
Backpack access for the photographer taken to a new level.

Wolffepack is a multi award-winning, revolutionary new concept in backpack design. After many, many requests, we've now taken our unique access system a step further and adapted it for the photographer.

 

A backpack that hangs hands-free in the perfect place to access your camera:

 

Introducing the Wolffepack Capture

The ultimate backpack for cameras and access. We've taken access a big step forward, and whilst this bag is ideal for photographers, its adaptability makes it a great access bag for everyone.

The Wolffepack Capture comes with a custom padded pod for DSLR plus lenses and accessories, which can be removed for loading flexibility.

We launched Wolffepack with the fantastic support of the Kickstarter community over a year and a half ago, and since then the Wolffepack design concept has won multiple design awards across 3 continents:

 The Wolffepack Capture is the ultimate backpack for cameras and access, for everyone, from the photographer to the traveller, commuter, hiker, parent, or explorer. This bag was designed to adapt to what you need to carry, but at all times to give you the best access.

The unique Wolffepack's system for unparalleled access to your gear has attracted international attention:

Here's what people are saying about the Wolffepack Capture:

"Wolffepack Capture is a photographer's secret weapon – and this week's featured Kickstarter. WHY IS IT INTERESTING? Because it makes it so much easier to start taking photos."  Trusted Reviews

“The new Wolffepack Capture camera backpack does something that we wish every photography backpack could do: it lets you swing it around front without actually taking it off, making it much easier to get at your gear."  PetaPixel

"Much like its forebear, the Wolffepack Capture is deep, high-quality product that's comfortable, adjustable and ideal for periods of long use. Better yet, the internal structure of the pack has been designed to hold your chosen DSLR safely with extra padding and an extra bag that offers even more protection for your expensive hobby."  T3

What sets the Wolffepack Capture apart?

Since launching Wolffepack, the original revolutionary backpack, people have told us over and over that they'd love us to apply our patented technology to a camera bag. We've worked with professional photographers and listened to our existing users' suggestions, and we haven't just come up with the ideal bag for camera access, but a fantastic backpack for everyone.

- Quick and easy access

With the Wolffepack's patented expetoSYSTEM, you can lower and bring your gear round to the front in one simple action. Get to your camera and your gear when you need it. Don't miss a shot just because your gear is stowed away on your back and its just a bit inconvenient to get it out, all over again.

- Camera workstation in the perfect position

The Wolffepack's unique design allows you to have your gear in the perfect working position in front of you. The bag swings round to provide a mobile workstation, without having to take it off and put it on the floor.

- Hands-free working to front

The bag hooks on to the front of the shoulder straps, leaving your hands completely free to work out of your bag, whether that's for a lens change, a change of battery or a new storage card.

 

 - Clean & safe gear

Traditional camera backpacks can get wet, muddy or damaged on the ground, especially when those shoulder straps hit the dirt.  With the Wolffepack system, the Capture stays off the floor, clean and protected on your front.

- Padded & secure carry

The Wolffepack Capture contains all the padding you need to keep your equipment protected, in the pod and in the bag. What's more, with the bag attached to your front, you can keep your gear safe in front of you, where you can see it.

So what makes it so special?

The Wolffepack Capture has a unique set of features that make it perfect combination for cameras and access:

- Custom-designed removable padded camera pod

The specially-designed padded camera pod docks and locks in the top of the backpack, for perfect access to your camera. It can be stowed in the bottom half for a different space configuration, or it can be removed completely.

The capacity of the pod includes space for a DSLR (with lens) plus 2 spare lenses (like a 24-70mm) or 1 lens plus a flash unit. It also has side mesh pockets that can take filters or lens pens or spare batteries. The zipper pocket has space for cables or filters or spare memory cards, and it also has a dedicated card storage flap.

 

- Aperture action easy opening

We worked hard on the ergonomics and workflow for the camera user. The aperture action means that when unzipped in a clean, easy, one-handed single movement, the top of the bag naturally drops open to reveal your gear in the perfect place in front of you, exactly to hand, exactly where you need it.

 

- Hands-free operation, bag off the ground

With the bag moved to the front you can rest it on your front or stow it there with the G-hooks and webbing straps. This gives you a ready made workstation right in front of you, leaving you free to work with both hands, without having to take the bag off and put it on the floor.

 

- Customisable carry system

A special 2 part access bag, it has an internal dividing shelf that can be unzipped and folded flat. This creates 3 carry modes and converts from 2 compartments to one large cargo bay to suit your gear and your day.

- Direct access to lower section of bag

The split-level design of the Capture means that you have instant access to the bottom of the bag, meaning no rummaging through other items to get to the bottom of your stuff for what you need.

 

 - Wolffepack patented expetoSYSTEM

Wolffepack combines the access advantages of a messenger bag with the comfort and health benefits of a backpack. The innovation at the heart of the Capture's unique appeal is Wolffepack's patented orbital trapeze technology: the expetoSYSTEM.

 

But that's not all...

The Wolffepack Capture is full of features - we've sweated to cover every last detail.

Padded, microfibre-lined 15"laptop sleeve, accessible with pod loaded:

 

The custom-designed camera Pod is padded and lined with microfibre to protect valuable equipment. There are configurable dividers, a zippered pocket, mesh pockets and elasticated slip for SD cards:

A Wolffepack branded waterproof rain cover in ripstop nylon stashes into a hidden pocket underneath the base of the bag, ready for whenever you need it.

An adjustable chest strap is also removable, if you don't need the extra load stability the strap provides.

Inside the back panel (you can see it behind the chest strap) sits a sculpted airflow back system, well padded to keep you comfortable and cool

The shoulder straps are wide and padded with EVA foam to spread the load and give you the best backpack experience.

We've added thoughtful touches to make your bag look clean and neat, like strap tidies. At the end of the webbing length that adjusts the size of the shoulder strap we put a little extra flap and stud so you can fold it over and tidy it away to get rid of those dragging loose ends that get in the way and get filthy.

Tripod clips are included, as is a comfortable neoprene-lined top handle that integrates into the aesthetic profile of the backpack. 

The front of the bag includes a quick access slip pocket, held in place by one of our customised G-hooks. It also has webbing loops on its front section for a bike light.

The lower section, ready to take your everyday gear has 4 internal cargo net pockets, ideal for chargers or spare batteries.

The main bag section has a high rated no.10 big zipper, to ensure smooth action and reliable service.

Spaces for all your gear:

The main compartment carries the pod and gives access to the laptop/tablet sleeve.

 The front access compartment has an organiser section at the top, and beneath it sits the lower cargo bay for everyday gear.

Specifications:

Capacity: 26 litres approx

Bag weight empty: 1.5kg approx

Bag Dimensions: height 46cms, width 31cms, depth 18cms 

Exterior Textiles: high grade water-resistant 450x300D melange polyester with PUx2 coating, gunmetal zipper pulls and hooks

Camera Pod (removable): height 18cms, width 25cms, depth 14cms, weight 0.2kg approx. Padded and soft microfiber-lined comes with internal dividers, zipper pocket, storage card slot, and 2 mesh side pockets. Capacity for DSLR (with lens) plus 2 spare lenses (like 24-70mm) or 1 lens plus flash unit.

Compartments: 3 customisable spaces: Upper half plus lower half, with moveable shelf down converts into 1 large space 

Tripod Clip: Fits either side into side pocket plus webbing loop and clip

Laptop Sleeves: Padded and soft microfiber-lined for a laptop up to 15”/38cm or for tablet computer 

Pockets: Organiser section, Front slip pocket with G-hook, and cargo mesh pockets for chargers, batteries, day gear 

External Side Pockets: 2 pockets for drinks, small items or tripod legs

Waterproof rain cover: Ripstop nylon and branded with Wolffepack logo it tucks into custom pocket under the backpack 

Features: Strap tidies, Top handle, Chest strap (detachable), webbing loops for bike lights, heavy duty no.10 zipper on main compartment 

Materials: Wolffepack’s system uses leading-edge materials from the high performance worlds of yachting and mountaineering. It includes Kevlar, carbon fibre, and Dyneema, which is 15 x stronger than steel and used by the military for ballistic protection. The Dyneema cords can carry a load of more than 300kg. 

Colour: Heathered textured grey with red detailing

What rewards are on offer?

 

 1. Wolffepack Custom Camera Pod - £35

- Get the custom-designed padded pod that will transform your conventional backpack into a camera bag,

2. Wolffepack Capture + Raincover (no pod) - £99

- Get the Wolffepack Capture but without the camera Pod.

3. Wolffepack Capture with Pod and Raincover - £125

4. Double Capture - 2 Wolffepack Captures, both with pod and rain cover - £225

5. Triple Capture - 3 Wolffepack Captures, all with pod and rain cover - £335

 

The Wolffepack Access System:

- leading technology and materials

The Wolffepack Capture uses our patented technology - the expetoSYSTEM. With a heritage drawn from the worlds of mountaineering, sailing and the military, we have used a combination of materials and invention that has revolutionised backpack design.

The bag is held totally stable on the back by 3 super-strong cords at different points, so that it cannot swing or move until the moment you choose to release it.

It is strong and easy to use

Can a backpack be securely held by cord? We've designed for strength and stability:

  • 3 cords (not just one) anchored at separate points on the bag keep it totally stable and securely held to your back when raised, without any swinging
  • the cords can pull a load of over 300kg, more than enough for a typical backpack
  • Dyneema cords are tough and it's a material used by the military for ballistic protection

It's a simple and easy operation to use the Wolffepack® backpack. Here is that video demonstration, once again:

 

The original development process

Wolffepack started out 15 years ago as just an idea, born out of watching a postman struggle to get repeated access to the letters in a sack on his back. Personal frustrations with the backpack over the years led to the belief that there had to be a better way to carry stuff, but still get quick and easy access to it.

It moved from being just an idea, to initial sketches:

Eventually, with the help of the Kickstarter community in November 2014, an idea about how to reinvent the backpack came to life and the Wolffepack backpack was born, and now has thousands of users in over 30 countries and design awards across 3 continents.

About the creator

David Wolffe has an Engineering degree from Cambridge University, and is a lifelong backpack user and photography enthusiast, whether travelling, commuting, skiing, or corralling his 3 kids.

Project timetable

We have already worked closely with our manufacturing partners to build thousands of Wolffepack Metros and Escapes (our first styles). We've also created with them a number of prototypes leading to finished Capture samples that we love. Once Kickstarter quantities are clear, we can begin the production process. We expect that the first bags should be ready to ship to your doors in November this year. 

The following timetable is planned:

- July/August 2016: Kickstarter Campaign

- August 2016: Confirm order with factory

- August 2016: Order materials and components

- September 2016: Production commences

- October 2016: Finished units start journey to warehouse

- November 2016: Final last-leg dispatch to Kickstarter backers

 

Risks and challenges

We've already run and delivered a successful Kickstarter so we know a little about how to deliver a project.

We've built thousands of Wolffepacks so the technology is already working on a volume scale basis.

The risks to delivery of the project are limited in nature due to the huge amount of development and planning that has already taken place. 

Working prototypes have been in testing for several months and have passed threshold tests. 

The design is now ready for production and all specifications have been signed off. Samples of the Wolffepack Capture have been manufactured but in units only. The transition now is into scale production.

story:
• 1. MAKING A DIFFERENCE ONE SOCK AT A TIME!

    Necessary good wants to help make the world better! Thats why 10% of each pair sold will be donated to help support children in education and for every pair purchased we will donate a pair to a person in need. I've been working with Martha's table for years so it made so much sense to continue our partnership. 

    Our socks are made from quality materials, like supima cotton. What makes supima cotton so special?  A number of things. It has an especially long fiber which gives supima unusual qualities of strength, softness and color. And 100% of it is grown in the USA.

    3. FASHION FOWARD, BOLD AND UNIQUE DESIGNS

    Our socks are created for people who feel confident in their style and allow their socks to help express their personality. Necessary Good socks are for those who appreciate quality design and whose unique sense of style sets them apart from the crowd.

    My name Is Steve Thompson, founder of Necessary Good, LLC. I've been hard at work and I want to share with you the reasons why I chose to start Necessary Good.

    First, I love expressing my personality through socks. Whether it's the bold colors, creative designs or simply their stylish appearance,  I have always had a passion for crazy socks. People were always curious about what crazy socks I might wear, so about a year ago I got an idea. I enjoy style and fashion as a form of self-expression and I was already investing lots of money into buying socks made by other people. It just seemed necessary to create a good product of my own. 

    What’s amazing about Necessary Good is that it will not only create some amazingly stylish socks, but it also serves a purpose. I want to  make an impact and a difference within our community.

    • 10% of the proceeds from each sock purchase will go to charity. 


    • If you buy a pair, we will donate a pair to someone in need. 


    • We want people to feel good about how their socks add style to their outfit and to have peace of mind knowing their purchase is helping make a difference.  The work that we do with our socks is only a fraction of our goal.

    It’s truly going to take everyone's support for us to be successful! It's not just about Necessary Good. Making this campaign successful will impact many lives.

    Reaching $20,000 goal provides:

    • Production cost for all six sock designs
    • Shipping 
    • Materials 
    • Packaging 

    This campaign is tremendously important to us. We have to succeed because we've invested so much time into making the best product and finding a way for our product to make a difference within our communities in the United States. 

    We have so many people who are excited about our socks and want us to succeed. That's why we need you to help spread the word even further and help make our campaign a success. Every penny counts! I’m so proud of what we’ve already been able to accomplish, and we need your support to take Necessary Good to the next level.

    in addition to pledging you can help us by spreading the word. Share our campaign link with family and friends, encourage them to make a pledge and follow us on Instagram and Twitter and like our page on Facebook. 

The great thing about our campaign is that we've put a tremendous amount of thought into.

Production: We've built a strong relationship with our suppliers and discussed production details to ensure no products delays. Our supplies are anticipating our order and have no problem meeting our order requirements. 

Timeframe: Again, We've set a reasonable timetable. If anything changes we will be as transparent as possible and keep all backers up to date.

Timeline:

Completion of campaign: September 12

Wait up to 20 days for funds to clear: October 2

 Week 1: Backers provide mailing address by October 13

Week 2-9: Production Completed by December 15

Week 10-12: Shipping from Manufacturer by December 29

Week 13: Packaging and Fulfillment by January 5

Week 14: Delivery week of January 12
story_txt:
1. MAKING A DIFFERENCE ONE SOCK AT A TIME!
Necessary good wants to help make the world better! Thats why 10% of each pair sold will be donated to help support children in education and for every pair purchased we will donate a pair to a person in need. I've been working with Martha's table for years so it made so much sense to continue our partnership. 

2. QUALITY MATERIALSOur socks are made from quality materials, like supima cotton. What makes supima cotton so special?  A number of things. It has an especially long fiber which gives supima unusual qualities of strength, softness and color. And 100% of it is grown in the USA.

 
3. FASHION FOWARD, BOLD AND UNIQUE DESIGNS
Our socks are created for people who feel confident in their style and allow their socks to help express their personality. Necessary Good socks are for those who appreciate quality design and whose unique sense of style sets them apart from the crowd.

 

 
My name Is Steve Thompson, founder of Necessary Good, LLC. I've been hard at work and I want to share with you the reasons why I chose to start Necessary Good.
First, I love expressing my personality through socks. Whether it's the bold colors, creative designs or simply their stylish appearance,  I have always had a passion for crazy socks. People were always curious about what crazy socks I might wear, so about a year ago I got an idea. I enjoy style and fashion as a form of self-expression and I was already investing lots of money into buying socks made by other people. It just seemed necessary to create a good product of my own. 

 
What’s amazing about Necessary Good is that it will not only create some amazingly stylish socks, but it also serves a purpose. I want to  make an impact and a difference within our community.
10% of the proceeds from each sock purchase will go to charity. 

If you buy a pair, we will donate a pair to someone in need. 

We want people to feel good about how their socks add style to their outfit and to have peace of mind knowing their purchase is helping make a difference.  The work that we do with our socks is only a fraction of our goal.

 

 
It’s truly going to take everyone's support for us to be successful! It's not just about Necessary Good. Making this campaign successful will impact many lives.
Reaching $20,000 goal provides:

Production cost for all six sock designs
Shipping 
Materials 
Packaging 

This campaign is tremendously important to us. We have to succeed because we've invested so much time into making the best product and finding a way for our product to make a difference within our communities in the United States. 

 
We have so many people who are excited about our socks and want us to succeed. That's why we need you to help spread the word even further and help make our campaign a success. Every penny counts! I’m so proud of what we’ve already been able to accomplish, and we need your support to take Necessary Good to the next level.

 

 

                              *** Pyramid design is subject to change***

 
in addition to pledging you can help us by spreading the word. Share our campaign link with family and friends, encourage them to make a pledge and follow us on Instagram and Twitter and like our page on Facebook. 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 
The great thing about our campaign is that we've put a tremendous amount of thought into.Production: We've built a strong relationship with our suppliers and discussed production details to ensure no products delays. Our supplies are anticipating our order and have no problem meeting our order requirements. Timeframe: Again, We've set a reasonable timetable. If anything changes we will be as transparent as possible and keep all backers up to date.Timeline:Completion of campaign: September 12Wait up to 20 days for funds to clear: October 2 Week 1: Backers provide mailing address by October 13Week 2-9: Production Completed by December 15Week 10-12: Shipping from Manufacturer by December 29Week 13: Packaging and Fulfillment by January 5Week 14: Delivery week of January 12

story:
Hi there!

My name is Amanda Meade. I'm 26 and I live in Walled Lake, Michigan, with my boyfriend, a software/mobile app developer. I work as a graphic arti st at Lover's Lane Corporate, designing graphics for the company's website, among other things.

For the past two years in my spare time I've been running a business -- Designs by Amanda Marie. I create and sell jewelry primarily on Etsy but also via Storenvy, BigCartel and through the Square Marketplace.

At this time, I have sold 2,009 items on Etsy, have 947 admirers (people who have clicked the “favorite” button within my Etsy shop), and hold a five star rating with 374 reviews. There are currently 640 items for sale in my shop.

This campaign is important to me because this endeavor is something I have been planning for years. I first discovered laser cut acrylic in 2008, which was also my first encounter with Etsy. Once I graduated college I was able to devote more time to planning and started saving. Unfortunately, and as I'm sure you can all relate, life kept getting in the way and I kept finding myself further from my goal.

The possibilities of items I could create with a laser cutting machine is truly endless. I will be able to make jewelry, key chains, charms, even displays. I will be able to cut up to 1/4" acrylic and wood, plus have the ability to engrave those materials as well.

What I Need & What You Get

Any contributions I receive will go towards the cost of the laser cutting machine and some sheets of acrylic and wood to get me started. I plan to purchase the 5th generation hobby laser from Full Spectrum Laser. 

I have lots of ideas put together -- some can be seen now within the gallery and I will continue to post more as I finish them. Having these complete make it so as soon as the laser cutter and materials are delivered, I should be able to have items turned around within the first 24 hours. My goal is to have 100 items posted in the Amplified Light Etsy shop within the first six months of owning the laser.

I will be starting a new Etsy shop, separate from my current. Amplified Light will also get its own Storenvy shop. Further, I plan to upgrade my current shop on Big Cartel so that I can sell 25 Amplified Light items there. That will just be a starting point -- if I find success through a paid subscription I will upgrade to 100 items.

I own AmplifiedLight.com and will sell all of my items there as well.

Contributions over $10 will receive store credit at any of my Amplified Light shops. You're helping start this business, I think it's only fair to think of contributions as pre-orders as well.

If you are in a band or are a musician and are interested in a unique line of jewelry to sell to your fans, I would love to work with you. If you are another jewelry maker who would like to further brand your items, I have a lot of ideas for ways we could work together. 

Even if I don't reach my goal, any and all contributions will still go towards the cost of the laser cutter. I am going to make this happen, no matter what! I have too many ideas and have invested too much to let this endeavor fail.

I plan to purchase my acrylic/wood from these two online suppliers:

Inventables

eStreetPlastics

The Impact

With a laser cutter, I can create basically anything that I can design in a vector file. Even further, not only can I cut up to 1/4" acrylic and wood, I will also be able to engrave those materials as well. This creates the opportunity to personalize any item, and can be used to add details to items.

I consider myself a very eclectic individual -- I love a lot of different things and I can relate to people on lots of different levels. That's one aspect I look forward to the most with this business -- being able to connect with people on a much more personal level.

I feel like this was made for me. It's everything I could want from a creative process. I'm so in love with typography, graphic design, bright, bold colors, and I can go on for days with all the different ways I can combine all of these things and create these visions with this equipment. 

Often in my feedback, customers will talk about how many compliments they tend to receive while wearing a piece I designed. That's such a cool feeling for me -- not only am I being complimented but my customer is too.

Contributing to this campaign will really be helping make a dream come true. I feel very prepared to take this business on and soon make you proud to be a part of it.

    Risks & Challenges

    My biggest challenge with this endeavor is why I'm here! The initial start up cost of this business is really the only thing keeping me from beginning.
    One possible challenge I have considered involves the shipping of my product. Depending on the design, pieces I intend to sell could have delicate parts that will need to be shipped properly to avoid breaking in transit.

    The solution: as I intend to sell items such as necklaces and bracelets, I can hang those items from necklace fold-overs, similar to how they would be presented at a costume jewelry store. I will place that in a black and white striped tissue paper, and that in a clear plastic pillow box for added protection.

    I feel the chance for risks with this endeavor is very low as I've been successfully running a business via Etsy for the past two years. Within that time I've experienced a lot of different challenges and I have all of that experience going into this business.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Spread the word! Better success in any crowd funded project comes from awareness, so if you aren't able to financially assist, posting on my behalf to any of your social networks is immensely helpful and appreciated!

      Even further, if you know someone who may benefit from a relationship with me (bands, musicians, other brands, etc.), please forward them a link to this campaign and feel free to give them my info!

      Remember to use the share tools offered by Indiegogo, located under the video above. It could take as little as a few clicks to help out!

      Thanks so much for your interest in my efforts and I truly appreciate your time, contributions and help spreading the word. If you have any further inquiries, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me -- I'd love to hear from you!

      Amanda Marie Meade

      ammame33@gmail.com

story:
O U R  V I S I O N 

Is to encourage the youth of today to be, feel and manifest positivity, happiness and a fullness of life itself - as our brand name suggests, liberating their hearts...

Seeded from the collective vision of iconic Byron Bay artist and print specialist Colin Heaney and social-change entrepreneur Kirstie Fisher,  Liberated Heart launched in late 2013 with the fashion and marketing savvy of Mariah Hearn.

Together we designed collectives that brought on trend style with compelling prints, featuring a diverse, modern and trans-seasonal fashion range that caters for women of all ages, all over the world – supporting our online phenomenon.

Always aiming to surprise and delight each collective supports a trending theme drawing inspiration from a blend of counter cultural events that have played a part in human evolvement. From flower power, environmental movement, sexual and spiritual revolution to the birth of the London club scene!
Liberated Heart designs are the essence of psychedelic fashion and are the go-to for not only the Australian festival season but are also in high demand intentionally.


Our team puts so much energy and importance into the life style and vibe behind our brand. Having the ability to reach out to all generations, sharing our culture and values is one of the most amazing parts of building something truly special - which sets us aside from the norm. 

W H A T  WE  N E E D  &  W H A T  Y O U  G E T

Over the past year, with lots of positive manifestations and opportunities, we have managed to grow rapidly and exponentially.  We met the challenges of new production while increasing our supply as quickly as possible to support our ever growing customer and fan base. 

CHALLENGE - Fast growth has meant we sell out quickly and loyal customers await our next replenishment.

GOAL - Increase our production capacity!

 We also want to be able to offer better shipping opportunities for our international customers.  

CHALLENGE - We want Liberated Heart to be available for as many people as possible.  Investing your favorite pieces should not have to include high shipping. 

GOAL - Starting in our fastest growing market, we aim to be shipping from LA as soon as possible, allowing FREE SHIPPING across the US!!

Our goal is to raise 50k to boost us 

forward and make it happen. 




Not only do we have some super sweet and unique perks for you, featuring a limited edition 'crowd funding' print and potentially a 2 night stay at print artist Colin Heaney's 'Casa Blu' in beautiful Byron Bay but you also will be able to choose a charity to donate to. 



         T H E  I M P A C T


This would allow us to move on to the next level as we are always drawing constant energy and inspiration that allows for continual growth and modernisation. Our team is constantly creatively expressing new garment ideas and mind blowing prints to keep customers and fans excited. We are exponential, oozing potential and pushing the boundaries of fashion and style with out of this world unique tendency.
Here at Liberated Heart, we honestly feel like this is an amazing opportunity to connect with you, to invite you to join us on this J O U R N E Y and be a part of an already established business that is ready to move forward and please our customer & fan base. With such steady growth and on a constant rise we feel that this is an amazing time to pay it forward and get things going - bring on the new year because we are R E A D Y & E X C I T E D

Further to our campaign to grow Liberated Heart we also want to support the causes most important to our hearts.  To share in our abundance and joy with our 3 chosen charities we created a mycause.com.au campaign.  If you go to https://www.mycause.com.au/page/85306/liberatedheartpayingitforward
You can chose which of our charities you donate to x x x



You can check us out on instagram @liberatedheart http://instagram.com/liberatedheart or on our website www.liberatedheart.com.au





O T H E R  W A Y S  Y O U  C A N  H E L P
S P R E A D  T H E   L O V E

Tell all your friends and families and their families and their friends :)

Click the share FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ links 


oh and one more thing... T H A N K Y O U so so so much.....

Sending good vibes your way

story:
try before you buy!

 

Our campaign is simple!

Clothfusion will bring as many items you like (ordered online) to your door in minutes to try on for size/style.

Then only buy what looks good on and we will take back rest for free!

 

 

 

 

 how?

 

  • Just imagine, you see a dress you like online from a high street store

(Black dress - high street store 1)

 

  • then perhaps add it in another size

   

        Medium                   +              Large

 

  • plus in a different colour (they always look and feel different on depending on your shape) this time from different high street store

 

    

Medium   +    Large    (Blue dresses from high street store 2)

 

 

  •  which now means you have added 4 items to clothfusion

 +   +    +  = 4 dresses

(From 2 different high street stores)

 

 

  • now you, pay nothing! (Yes you read that right, you pay nothing at this stage for the items!)

 

  • then, select a delivery time 

 

 

(as quick as 1 hour!)

 

  • Clothfusion will now bring all 4 items to your door (home/office/bar!)

 

  • all you have to do is - try them all on, then decide which one you like (if any)

 

  • now only pay for the item that suits you and your style (not that just looks good in an online picture)

 

  • Clothfusion will then take back the rest, for FREE! (No more queues at the postoffice on your lunch break), so essentially you can try on as much as you like for the cost of one delivery fee only!

 

Let us take care of it all for you… the changing room will now come to you!

 

 

 

  why?

We have come a long way with eCommerce in recent years but until we have the ability to touch, feel and try on items then there will always be a need to leave your home. 

Clothfusion gives you the high street at your door. We believe this project is very important for eCommerce giving users the ability to try on items in real-time bringing them straight to your door. This put's the power in your hands to decide what you would like, once you have physically tried the items on.

The technology behind the store will be key to its success. With your pledge Clothfusion will be developing a highly sophisticated website that will enable real-time purchasing from multipule stores and delivery of your items to your door within minutes!

With your help we will save users a lot of time, money plus removing the headache of painful return policies.

Clothfusion will even give the high street retailers a competitive edge against the on-line giants of today (Amazon etc..) helping out with in-store returns (a known problem they face today) overall a win-win situation for users and the high street!

 

 

 

  how?

If you share the same vision as us then we would love for you to get involved at an early stage in something that is truly going to be big!

Even if you cannot make a pledge but share our vision, please help us by sharing with your friends and telling the World all about us via our social channels (below)!

 

If you are able to make a pledge then we are offering the following one-time exclusive packages

 £4 - Social supporter

 £9 - Bronze - X 40 items loaded

 £22 - Silver - X 100 items loaded

 £39 - Gold - X 200 items loaded

 £69 - Platinum - X 700 items loaded

 

If we do not to make our total target, we will still go ahead with the project on your contributions. All this means is that the strategic hubs placed around the country will be limited first to the most popular areas, then scaled out from there as we grow. So if you are living somewhere remote, even more reason to get behind this prioject from the start!!

 

 

 

 about..

For the past decade I have been working on projects within ecommerce, more specifically for a personalised recommendation engine for platforms such as Magento (an eBay Inc company) through to global marketing and email service providers.

This has given me great experience to excel within this fast moving environment but more importantly, to be able identify weaknesses that will benefit users at an early stage of the industry.

This has given me great experience to excel within this fast moving environment but more importantly, to be able identify weaknesses that will benefit users at an early stage of the industry.

story:
Please visit www.tipewatches.com to purchase your TIPE!!

 

 

TIPE Watches will be featured in British GQ in the May, June, and July issues!! Find us in the Fashion Collection section. Get your TIPE today!!

 

 

CHOOSE YOUR TIPE...

TIPE Watches believes that you should be able to own a high quality, durable watch that doesn't break the bank and goes everywhere with you. For this first collection, we focused on:  

  • The design and getting every detail accurate. We wanted a watch that you could dress up or dress down. Something with a sharp, sophisticated look.
  • The quality, meaning the craftsmanship of the watch as well as the materials used to make it.
  • The cost. We don't want you to just own one TIPE Watch. Our price point was very important, so that you can own multiple watches for your different styles. 

 

INTRODUCING TIPE WATCHES

Our first prototype was produced in early 2017. Since then we have refined all aspects of the watch and have confidently landed on these final designs for our Original Collection. 

 

WHO IS TIPE WATCHES?

TIPE Watches (pronounced type) was formed over a year ago in Phoenix, Arizona by a team of  photographers, marketers, and graphic designers that shared a similar love of watches. We collaborated to design a watch that would be affordable as well as durable.

TIPE Watches is committed to producing the perfect watch that can go everywhere with you. We hope you can see our love of watches through the current and future designs and our attention to detail. Our goal is to provide multiple collections with different styles for men and women, continuing to focus on quality and affordability.

 

WATCH SPECIFICATIONS:

For the Case and Clasp material, we used Double IP plating on the stainless steel to prevent tarnishing. Watches that include double IP plating are:

  • Prague / Monaco / Santiago: Black double IP plating
  • Moscow / Madrid: Rose Gold double IP plating

 

 

OUR PROMISE TO YOU

As we stated earlier, cost was one of the major focal points while developing these watches. We don't want you to just own one TIPE Watch. Our price point was very important, so that you can own multiple watches for your different styles. 

We looked around at the competition and noticed that they charge an inflated price due to extremely high markup. We work directly with our manufacturer, so we are able to pass savings along to you in the form of a high quality watch that is affordable.

 

 

TIPE WATCHES ARE BACKED BY A WARRANTY

We truly believe in our watch quality and you should as well. The 24-month warranty covers all internal parts of the watch (movement, hands, and dial).

 

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

With your pledge, we will be able to fund this first collection of TIPE Watches. Your support goes beyond just purchasing a watch. We want to create a community with our backers - a bond. We want you to feel a part of this company as well. We will provide you with updates along the way. When you receive your watch, we hope that you share with us, through social media, where you go with your TIPE watches. 

If you would like to make a contribution instead of purchasing a watch and support our journey, please click on the pink "BACK IT" button at the top of the page. We truly appreciate your support!

We ask that you share your interest in TIPE Watches with your friends and get them involved as well. If you could spread the word about our campaign, that can help us as well. 'Like' our Facebook page, follow us on Instagram or Twitter, and help us make TIPE Watches a reality! Please sign up on our website to receive updates and special offerings once our campaign is over.

http://www.facebook.com/tipewatches

http://www.instagram.com/tipewatches

http://www.twitter.com/tipewatches

http://www.tipewatches.com

 

 

POST CAMPAIGN

Our crowdfunding campaign is 45 days. We will start to finalize all orders personally with you early in March through the end of the campaign on March 22nd.

We plan on placing a mass order with our manufacturer In the middle of March to get watches to you earlier. It should take roughly 60 days for the order to be produced, reviewed, tested, quality checked, packaged, and shipped. We will perform our own quality review once we receive the mass order and we will start to send out your TIPE Watches as soon as possible!!

 

Risks & Challenges

DELIVERY TIME: Our manufacturer has a proven track record of timely delivery. We will work closely with them, during the production process, to make sure everything is on track. We will do what we can to ship your TIPE Watch before the expected delivery date. We will communicate with you every step of the way so that you know exactly when you can expect your TIPE!

If you need to reach us for any reason, please feel free to leave a comment above or contact us through our website at http://www.tipewatches.com.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
At TRONNOVATE, We are guys that always being excited to change the way people think about daily usage products. Remember the amazing user experience with FLATPAC? 

When we design, we focus on making products adaptive for every adventure, outdoor recreation, and daily use. We observe the indispensable needs and integrate our material knowledge with a simple and functional design.

That's why and how we create STIKY.

 

Everyone, meet STIKY! What we want STIKY to bring is the most versatile experience of multi-purpose fabrics.

  • Stick Together: The patented self-adhesiveness material that way beyond Velcro allows you to easily keep it steady and organized.
  • Keep Dry: Unique water absorbing function will keep one side of STIKY dry all the time, which is perfect for keeping you away from sweat and do not have to worry about messing your bag up with wet fabrics again.
  • Stay Warm: Perfectly keeps your body heat with super tiny fiber (micro fiber) when needed. 

STIKY is beautiful, intelligent and adaptable, designed for everyday use and all kinds of utilities.

With 3 different sizes but same excellent usability, STIKY is designed to fit into any kinds of activities in your everyday life.

Let's check out the awesomeness of STIKY now!

The most iconic feature of STIKY is its self-adhesiveness, and that's why we named it so. Thanks to the cutting-edge material, you could easily wear STIKY and keep it steady anywhere you want.

  • Steadily Wearable

There are tons of ways to wear STIKY. You can put it on the waist. it is perfect when you need to change the swimming suit on the beach or simply after a shower.

Once it sticks on, It will stay firm and steady. Now you will never be awkward again when enjoying the summertime.

We know you love to exercise, for the adventurer like you, STIKY, is the perfect equipment! We prepared a unique size for the runners to keep them away from sweat.

It's so compact that you can put it into your pocket and wear it on immediately when you ready to start a run! 

Just Open it Up, Stick It On, and Go!

  • Easy to Be Organized​

It can't be easier to keep STIKY organized with this extraordinary self-adhesiveness. That's the way STIKY being so unique and innovative.

What's more, one of the coolest parts of STIKY is keeping all your belongings organized, too! You can use it to have clothes, shoes or any other stuff easily packed by just simply roll them into STIKY.

Roll It Up Nice'n Easy and All Your Clothes Are Packed!

The L size of STIKY will be you best gadget for camping and hiking. The Packing will be done within seconds, including all your clothes and an extraordinary multi-purpose fabric!

With this unique feature, you can find your own way to use STIKY for keeping everything packed and organized!

Your Bag Get Messed Up by Shoes? STIKY Will Take Care of It !

With its extraordinary water absorption, It will quickly drain the water and locked it in only one side whilst keep another side dry and comfortable all the time.

  • One Side Dry All the Time

You won’t mess the bag up again with wet towels and clothes, Just roll it up and put it back!

Don't worry, It will lock the water inside the material and keep the outside of STIKY dry and clean all the time. Just enjoy a lovely picnic with STIKY on a beautiful lawn during a sunny day! 

With STIKY, you can enjoy a bottle of iced water without getting your bag or everything within it wet! Roll it up with STIKY, and take it with you to the summertime adventures!

We use Microfiber (Ultra-fine Fiber) to allow STIKY perfect in capturing the heat, making it highly efficient to help you stay warm yet keep it slim in thickness and comfortable in texture.

While outdoor activities, STIKY is good for keeping you warm by trap your own body heat within the fiber when needed, which makes STIKY even more versatile, more than just a towel.

STIKY is amazing not only because great approach on material technology but also matured design. When designed STIKY, we tried to make as compact and integrated as possible in every single detail.

  •  Hanging Loops

For every user, at any kind of situations. we designed different sizes of STIKY and all of them including hanging loops that would perfectly fit your backpack or sling bag while traveling.

  • Both Side Usability

Any side of STIKY is usable, You could choose the fiber side (Yellow/Gray) for the better and soft texture. or the loop side (Black) for long-time dry and clean experience.

  •  Overstitched Edge 

To make STIKY more durable and easier to hold, the edge of it sews with an overstitch. The overstitched edge structurally increases the strength of the material and helps users to easily grip it.

  • Travellers: With 3 kinds of sizes, every traveller will find his/her own STIKY! Helping them not just as towels, but also for packing, organizing and keeping them warm!
  • Runners: The specialized size for runner will be your best gadget to carry with you while running!
  • Beach Lovers: The self-adhesiveness and outstanding water absorption make STIKY your best partner at the beach.
  • Commuters: The STIKY's versatile style allows people to go out light and keep you everyday carry gadgets well-organized within STIKYs. 

And For Everyone! With 3 different sizes but same excellent usability, STIKY is designed to fit into any kinds of activities in your everyday life!

  • Size L: Perfect for Outdoor Activities Size 

  •  M: Fits into Any Kind of Situations ​

  • Size S: Keep You Away from Sweat All the Time​

  • Easy to Be Well Organized, and Help You to Organize! 

Not Just a Versatile Fabric, It Helps You to Keep Everything in Order!​

story:
Summary

Sovereign Sandals was born out of the desire to create sandals of the highest quality and comfort, with a dedicated mission to support organizations rescuing and rehabilitating girls rescued from the sex trafficking industry:

  • Ethically Minded, Responsibly Sourced, and Compassionately Handmade.
  • We partner with Agape International Missions globally, and Courage Worldwide locally.
  • Sovereign Sandals provides above living wage work experience to rescued girls in Cambodia, where they sew the straps for each pair of our sandals. 
  • Each Sovereign Sandals purchase supports home building efforts for rescued girls in California, with a portion of all sales helping to fund the next build-out of Courage House in Northern California.
  • Your support of our campaign will allow us to introduce customization to our product line, further enhancing the ability of rescued girls to learn new skills, and earn a livable wage.

What We Need & What You Get

This is what we need to introduce customization to our product line:

  • Back-end software for our website that will allow customers to digitally design and build their unique sandals.
  • To stock-up on inventory of straps, foam, rubber, and toe-pieces to ensure a timely turn around once your unique sandal is designed.
And this is what you'll get:
  • Your $5 contribution to this campaign will earn you $10 towards your first purchase of a customized pair of Sovereign Sandals!
  • Each additional $5 contribution valid for another $10 off an additional individual pair of Sovereign Sandals.
  • The satisfaction of knowing that you've helped contribute to rescuing girls from the sex trafficking industry...

The Impact

Your contribution will help:

  • Provide work experience and an escape from the streets for girls rescued in Cambodia.
  • Build homes for girls rescued in California, giving them a place to rehabilitate and be loved.

Other Ways You Can Help

After you contribute:

  • Share this campaign with your networks!
  • Promote your contribution on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram, and ask your followers to join the crusade for customization!
  • Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram to keep up to speed with the results of our campaign...

story:
burnt. is back by overwhelming demand! 

WOOD is definitely proving to be GOOD!

Why burnt. 3.0? 

We have 2 Woody Good Options to get you burnt. 

1) You CLICK we SHIP. No Wait, No Hassle. We have a very limited quantity of our Wicked Woods in Stock and we want to get them out in the sun where they belong.. You CLICK and we SHIP! No waiting means you'll be Wearing Wood within 2 weeks of purchase, not two months. Look for the perks on the right titled CLK&SHP - pick your style, pick your lens... party on, but don't forget to add shipping.

2) Like our first 2 campaigns in true indiegogo fashion we're taking preorders at  a wicked good discount. If you can wait we'll create! You save Big and in exchange we aim to delivery 30 days after the campaign ends! 

Join the burnt. community by liking us on FACEBOOK and following us on INSTAGRAM!

Watch for

  • Instant Shipping with you CLICK we SHIP (CLK&SHP) perks
  • $40 Random Pair Perk - we choose the Bamboo's you'll be rocking while you enjoy the $25 Savings - HURRY there are only 5 available 
  • SAVE on shipping by ordering up to 3 pairs at once!
  • Mid way through the campaign we'll be releasing unique CLK&SHP multipack perks with extra woody good savings - stay tuned
  • Deep Savings on preorder perks, including multipacks 

Chesterman - Our classic bamboo frames, handmade and named after our favourite surf beach. Light, tight and a clean, classic fit available in blonde (natural) or carbonized (our favourite). Oh, and they FLOAT. Perfect for the beach or the boat.

For the spec techies: Chestermans are sized at 53-18-145.

Cowichan - Handmade dark hardwood frames. Slightly larger, they carry a trendy, modern profile that Steph and Krystal love but still look great on Mike's dad. Available in the full range of our polarized lens colours and shown here in Clayoqout green. Don't drop these ones in the lake, you won't get 'em back. We learned the hard way that hardwood doesn't float. 

A wider fuller profile at 54-22-140.

Sombrio - Just a little off the beaten path. A little trendy, a little classic, another local surf spot. Same size and shape as our Cowichan frames but with the distinctive wood grain of wood. Another handmade hardwood frame, you'll want to keep these ones out of the water unless you want to dive for them. Here with classic black lenses, or choose your favourite of our polarized lenses from below.

54 22-140 if you're counting. 

Chesterman - The oh so natural blonde version of our favourite style. 

Visit getburnt.ca for a look at our complete lineup. 

Save Now Before Campaign 2.0 is Over!

             

Our wicked windshields...7 layers of POLARIZED UV 400 awesomeness! Why are you still paying huge dollars for plastic frames and a brand name? Our polarized lenses will keep you from squinting just as well as any $200 pair of the same ol' same ol'. Be different wear wood!

What colour will you choose? Glacier blue, Clayoquot green, Classic black or burnt. orange?

         

Made of 100 % recycled cardboard each box is hand stamped, making them as unique as the contents within.

burnt. is based in one of the few locations in the world where you can surf and snowboard in the same day. Inspired by the landscape around us, we have big ideas for the future. Come with us. 

meet the entire burnt. crew here

burnt.

Click here to see the two original burnt. campaigns that thanks to our community members raised an amazing $38,800

Caring For Your Wicked Woods
