story_txt:
burnt. is back by overwhelming demand! WOOD is definitely proving to be GOOD!Why burnt. 3.0? We have 2 Woody Good Options to get you burnt. 1) You CLICK we SHIP. No Wait, No Hassle. We have a very limited quantity of our Wicked Woods in Stock and we want to get them out in the sun where they belong.. You CLICK and we SHIP! No waiting means you'll be Wearing Wood within 2 weeks of purchase, not two months. Look for the perks on the right titled CLK&SHP - pick your style, pick your lens... party on, but don't forget to add shipping.2) Like our first 2 campaigns in true indiegogo fashion we're taking preorders at  a wicked good discount. If you can wait we'll create! You save Big and in exchange we aim to delivery 30 days after the campaign ends! Join the burnt. community by liking us on FACEBOOK and following us on INSTAGRAM!Watch for
Instant Shipping with you CLICK we SHIP (CLK&SHP) perks
$40 Random Pair Perk - we choose the Bamboo's you'll be rocking while you enjoy the $25 Savings - HURRY there are only 5 available 
SAVE on shipping by ordering up to 3 pairs at once!
Mid way through the campaign we'll be releasing unique CLK&SHP multipack perks with extra woody good savings - stay tuned
Deep Savings on preorder perks, including multipacks 
Chesterman - Our classic bamboo frames, handmade and named after our favourite surf beach. Light, tight and a clean, classic fit available in blonde (natural) or carbonized (our favourite). Oh, and they FLOAT. Perfect for the beach or the boat.For the spec techies: Chestermans are sized at 53-18-145.Cowichan - Handmade dark hardwood frames. Slightly larger, they carry a trendy, modern profile that Steph and Krystal love but still look great on Mike's dad. Available in the full range of our polarized lens colours and shown here in Clayoqout green. Don't drop these ones in the lake, you won't get 'em back. We learned the hard way that hardwood doesn't float. A wider fuller profile at 54-22-140.Sombrio - Just a little off the beaten path. A little trendy, a little classic, another local surf spot. Same size and shape as our Cowichan frames but with the distinctive wood grain of wood. Another handmade hardwood frame, you'll want to keep these ones out of the water unless you want to dive for them. Here with classic black lenses, or choose your favourite of our polarized lenses from below.54 22-140 if you're counting. Chesterman - The oh so natural blonde version of our favourite style. Visit getburnt.ca for a look at our complete lineup. Save Now Before Campaign 2.0 is Over!              Our wicked windshields...7 layers of POLARIZED UV 400 awesomeness! Why are you still paying huge dollars for plastic frames and a brand name? Our polarized lenses will keep you from squinting just as well as any $200 pair of the same ol' same ol'. Be different wear wood!What colour will you choose? Glacier blue, Clayoquot green, Classic black or burnt. orange?         Made of 100 % recycled cardboard each box is hand stamped, making them as unique as the contents within.burnt. is based in one of the few locations in the world where you can surf and snowboard in the same day. Inspired by the landscape around us, we have big ideas for the future. Come with us. meet the entire burnt. crew hereburnt.

story:
Hi, my nameis Dak Eubanks and I'm a professional dancer, teacher, and choreographer with experience in the entertainement industry of over 25yrs.

        I have dreamed of creating Dak Anthony underwear line for many years now.  I wanted a to make underwear for men..while focusing on dancers and performers. Dak Anthony underwear will be a sexy, comfortable, fun line, while still focusing on great support letting you rock it out on stage without worrying about too much movement.Personally, this has been a dream of mine for a long time and is a project I have been passionate about to help me regain myself spiritually while having fun and helping to build some security for my family.

What We Need
All funds raised will help create Dak Anthony the brand. Not only having the underwear made but also the business portion: finding models to be the face of the company,  hiring a photographer, creating and maintaining a website, advertisements, and booking underwear shows/ parties are all part of getting this business (and myself) up on it's feet.  

The Impact
 Dak Anthony underwear will be fashionable, made with great quality, and sold at very afforadable prices.I love to hear feed back from everyone...positive and negative. .I feel this will only make my product better for the company as well as the consumer.I want to make men of all types comfortable in my underwear, but most of all comfortable in their own skin. The Dak Anthony brand will have an assortment of underwear that will help do just that.

Other Ways You Can Help
I know some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about Dak Anthony underwear line. Please help by sharing this Indiegogo page. Every bit of buzz and every single dollar helps me get the brand some exposure!

THANK YOU!!!

story:
"I need one of those so bad." - @youronlychance

"Love It! It is the perfect band for the gym to keep my Fitbit close and you can see through the clear band which is nice." - dyarrow1

"Holy coolness batman! I want one!" - Heidi G.

"That looks freakin' awesome not gonna lie." - Tomlin S.

"I always keep a spare $20 in there and it's saved me numerous times!" - Greg E.

"Way more comfortable than my old Fitbit band." - Victor A.

"Love the texture and versatility." - Melody B.

"Works really great. I use it all the time!" - David W.

What Are Pocketbands?

Pocketbands are high-quality silicone wristbands that have a pocket for stashing keys, cash and other small items. Originally created as a place to put your key while going for a jog, Pocketbands can be used for a lot more.

30 Second Video Demo




Pocketbands And Fitbit Trackers

Pocketbands work great as wristbands to hold the Fitbit One and Fitbit Flex activity monitors. The pocket securely holds your Fitbit in place and is comfortable enough to sleep in.

Video Demo with Fitbit One

Pocketbands Are Versatile

Pocketbands are great for jogging, biking, surfing, hanging at the beach, and tons of other activities and situations.

What Else Do Pocketbands Hold?

Pocketbands hold many types of keys, folded bills, activity trackers like the Fitbit One and Flex, Qualcomm Gimbal, bPay Visa/Mastercard, RFID chips, ioProx Keytags, barcodes, many smart keys and valet keys for cars, usb memory cards, coins, LED inserts, ibuprofen and more.

Available Colors

Pocketbands are available in 8 different colors. Choose the reward you want today, and after the campaign ends, we'll contact you with a simple survey to gather your order details such as sizes and colors. You can choose any mix of sizes and colors with your order. We can help you with any questions you might have. 

How To Contribute To This Project

Are you ready to become a contributor and help fund this project? Thank you for supporting us! Whether this is your first time contributing to a project or you've done this before, we want to make contributing easy...

1. Pick A Perk 

Each contributor chooses a Perk that contains different options. Next, click the red button at the top right of the page labelled "Contribute Now". After the project funding period ends, we'll send your order! You can add perks at a later time by making another separate contribution, or you can go to your "contributions" tab in your Indiegogo profile to upgrade to a higher perk. Please email us if you have any questions.

PERKS 

2. Add Additional Items (if you'd like)

If you would like to add either of the items below, please select your perk and then add an additional gift of $5 to your pledge amount for each add-on item you select. There are no limits on quantities you can order.

If you've already made your pledge and you want to add these items, you can always add them by creating a new contribution or by going to the "contributions" tab in your Indiegogo profile.

ADD-ON #1

LED Light 2-Pack

Add $5 to your pledge amount and we will send you (2) Red LED Light inserts. Each LED insert has 25+ hours of run time. 4 Modes: Fast Strobe, Medium Strobe, Steady On, and Off. *

Please note this Red LED insert light is compatible with the Clear, Red, Pink, Orange, and Glow In The Dark Pocketbands. For ages 14+.

30 sec. Video Demo-

ADD-ON #2

1" x 2" Zip Lock Bags 50-Pack

Add $5 to your pledge amount and we will send you a 50 Pack of 1" x 2" Zip Lock Bags. These ultra-clear small zip bags are great for keeping small items dry inside your Pocketband (ex: ibuprofen).

30 sec. Video Demo

3. Relax For Now 

Now that you've selected a perk and made your contribution, you can kick back and wait for this project to end. After our funding period is complete, we'll contact you with a simple survey asking for all your order details like sizing/colors, which add-on items you may have added, shipping information, etc. Until you get the survey, you don't need to worry about any details. We'll help you will everything and answer any questions you have to make things easy when the time comes.

Funding.

The funds gathered will be used to help cover costs for...

- New commercial-grade steel molds (4).

- Large minimum order quantities from factory. 

- 3D design and prototyping.

- Patent, Trademark, Business and Legal fees.

- Packaging and shipping.

Sizing

Choose the reward you want today, and after the campaign ends, we'll contact you with a simple survey to gather your order details such as sizes and colors. We can help you with any questions you might have.

Pocketbands are available in (4) sizes.

Small (S) – Wrist size between 5.3 - 6.0 inches (13.5cm - 15.3cm). 

Medium (M) - Wrist size between 6.0- 6.9 inches (15.3cm - 17.5cm). 

Large (L) - Wrist size between 6.9 - 7.5 inches (17.5cm - 19cm). 

X-Large (XL) – Wrist size between 7.5 - 8 inches (19cm - 20.3cm). 

Methods to measure the circumference of your wrist:

1. Wrap a tape measure around your wrist to check size.

2. Wrap a string or strip of paper around your wrist and mark where the ends meet, then measure with a ruler.

3. Print out a paper ruler. >Click Here

Shipping

We are trying to leave the smallest ecological footprint possible. Our products are minimally packaged and shipped in Polybags made of 100% recyclable material. Shipping is FREE to the US and International Shipping is offered for the amount specified within the pledge level.


FAQ


1. Can I order each band a different size and color?
Yes, you can choose any mix of sizes and colors with your order.

2. When do I tell you my order details such as sizes and colors?
Contribute towards the perk you want today, and after the campaign ends, we'll contact you by email to gather all of your order details in the form of a simple survey. We will also help you with sizing or any other questions you might have.

3. How big is the pocket inside the band?
The pocket dimensions are approximately 2 ¼ inches long (5.72cm) x .92 inch wide (23.4mm) x .11 inch thick (3mm). That translates to roughly 2 keys or 2 folded bills or a combination of the two. The pocket can stretch to accommodate a shape outside of these dimensions. For example, Pocketbands securely hold the Fitbit One which is 9mm thick.

4. Can I put my car key in the pocket?
There are some car keys that will fit into the pocket, but many of the newer cars with large keys or key fobs (computer chip remotes) are too large to fit in the pocket. However, many of the major car companies like Toyota, Honda, Nissan, Mercedes etc. have created “valet keys” or "smart keys" that can be removed from the key fob that will fit inside the pocket. Just search eBay or online (ex: "toyota smart key" or "honda valet key") to see if your model of car is available. Then just make sure the dimensions of your key are similar to the pocket dimensions listed above.

5. How long does the glow in the dark Pocketband glow for?
Glow in the Dark Pocketbands "charge" when exposed to a light source and will glow up to 1-2 hours per charge. Looks Neon Green during daylight and glows green at night.

6. What color bands are compatible with the LED lights?
Please note this Red LED insert light is compatible with the Clear, Red, Pink, Orange, and Glow In The Dark Pocketbands. For ages 14+.

7. Are Pocketbands water-proof?
Pocketbands are made from a sweat/water-proof material. However, to keep the pocket contents water-proof, you can place small items inside 1" x 2" baggies. We do not recommend you submerge expensive electronics or valuables under water.

8. How does the new size Pocketband compare to the original?

The new Pocketbands 2.0 design is about 30% less bulky. The part of the band opposite of the pocket has been reduced 1.2mm. The entire pocket height has been reduced 4mm and the walls have been reduced down .5mm. Even though these dimensions have been reduced, the bands are now more flexible and will still hold the same objects as the original. 


If you have any questions, please feel free to send an email to info@pocketbands.com

THANK YOU.

story:
Plastic Fantastic:

 

The campaign is a limited collection of Popbeachshorts. The shorts are made from recycled plastic bottles, they have a 4-way stretch, are hydrophobic, quick drying and light weight. They have been designed with our passion for water sports in mind, and we wanted to reflect that through their feature detailing. They come with inner draw strings and no outer seams on our board shorts for comfort and our signature waxed African print cotton pockets and candy striped piping for style. Did we mention they come in 12 colours also ?  Meaning there’s something for everyone.

Our Popbeachshorts stem from our passion for the environment we live in and the people who inhabit it.  Our focus lies especially on the children, who without an education find themselves helpless,  and the marine life who are facing extinction at an alarming speed as a direct result of our negligence. We are a movement, highlighting eco-fashion and conscious living by fighting against plastic proliferation and improving literacy in poor hard to reach areas.

  

 

What We Need & What You Get

On the back of our last campaign we successfully raised enough money with your support, to produce 1200 meters of fabric in 12 different colours. Now we need your help again in raising £3000 to fund manufacturing.The funds raised from the sale of the shorts contribute to Pop Beach Club’s growth as a company allowing us to scale and make an impact on plastic proliferation and child education. 

By supporting us you’ll have the chance to be one of the first owners of these amazing shorts and also be a  part of Pop Beach Club’s story. Perks include exclusive items from our next collection, surf lessons at our local surf school, an opportunity to have a ring side seat in our story and stays at our exclusive membership only club. 

 

The Impact

Here at PopBeachClub we're passionate about the outdoors and water sports in general -surfing, skimboarding, sailing and wakeboarding to mention a few. We believe with access to a strong and solid education system, children will have the opportunity to create a life we can only imagine. They will have the tools to train themselves, using the power of the internet to further their passions. They will be able to take control of the environment they live in and effect change in ways we can only hope. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From this campaign we would have helped rid the world of over 60,000 waste plastic bottles, a drop in the ocean. With your help we could be able to increase this number by a factor of 10 to 600,000 in 2018 and would have also raised approximately $4000 for our education initiative.

 In the past we concentrated in providing infrastructure for our pilot programmes . The results were better than we expected and the publicity generated has encouraged more people to take up the call to provide various methods of support in our battle against plastic waste. Our current initiative is now combining these programs to increase the quality of education available for primary schools around the country. We are trying to find a way to maximise the delivery of quality education by concentrating on improving the teaching methods. We hope to do this by supporting teachers and parents alike.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are an ongoing business and have shown in the past that we are dedicated to fulfilling our perks and even delivering more than we promised 

We have faced issues with international transfers, postage and manufacturing. Providing a product that we feel truly represents PoP Beach Club’s ethos takes a lot of work and support from everyone involved. With this in mind, our goal is to have everyone in PoP Beachshorts and ready for the beach a month after the end of our campaign.

 

Take a moment to view our original video from our debut campaign and see how far we've come since then.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand you may not be able to  contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Tweet it, Gram it, Snap it and even blog about it! The more people involved the better. 

 

Thanks for your time and we at PoP Beach Club are excited to begin this journey towards making a positive impact on our environment with you all.

story:
DE URIA logo combines the root chakra and the heart chakra, to anchor the heart energy in the physical. Catherine, our founder, wanted to create a brand organic in a holistic way. To her, organic means "good for all", the planet but the people who craft these beautiful products, our consumers who will enjoy an amazing highly vibrational product, and all people involved.

How will you benefit more from your DE URIA product? Check out our list of Ayurvedic dyes  we use and chose the therapeutic property you need most at the moment!​

 

 

Here our shawls. We use the same medicinal dyes for our yoga mats and clothing line.

 

As you know, our skin is our biggest organ, which is why we use the ancient knowledge of Ayurveda to give each piece a unique healing property. 

 

·         Our marigold line is dyed with turmeric and is anti-inflammatory.

·         Our coral line is dyed with red sandalwood and energizing / detoxifying.

·         Our aubergine line is dyed with triphala, vetiver, sandalwood and harmonizing. 

·         Our slate line is dyed with vetiver and is relaxing.

·         Our forest line is dyed with aloe vera, tulsi, turmeric and is good for skin conditions and soothing.

 

 

Our beautiful line of organic mats are dyed with Ayurvedic herbs, topped with natural tree rubber that grows in South India.

 

Bottom line, the HOW in the crafting of our products is of the utmost importance at DE URIA. We want you to feel good about YOU, supportive about the planet we inhabit, and inspired to live a XX life.

 

Our founder Catherine quit her banking job and has been looking all around in India during several trips for 12 months until she found the right organization with the right values to work with.

Our handmade products are produced in India by a cooperative of local communities using traditional handcrafting techniques. Women in the villages in south India get an education and are empowered to make a decent living.

story:
Hi everyone! So this is actually my second Crowdfunding, and this time it's for my very own Dragon designs <3 I've always been totally in love with asian dragon designs, and so I fused things I loved about the different types of dragons depicted in mythology and came up with this fellow <3 Haku's design from Spirited Away for sure inspired the foxy features ;) 

I usually do fan-art based work, so this is the first time I'm really doing my OWN thing, so I'm super excited and nervous to get this started. Hopefully you like these guys as much as I do! The reason I’m running this indiegogo is to pre-order these items with the express purpose of covering manfacturing costs and shipping products for a 500 unit order! The rest of the funds go to shipping (mailing), customs fees, etc. If we BLAST past our goals, I’ll add more designs and merchandise! This isn’t to make big money, it’s to get these guys made!

The goal of this is 2500, but I’m happy to make that a soft goal to make sure if we miss the mark, these still get made <3

Now, to explain the tiers. I want all these babies available off the bat, but that puts a SCARY high amount as a goal if I want to cover the shipping, manufacturing, fees etc. However, I don't like the idea of putting "pay walls" and potentially stopping someone from getting a design they love. So I'm going to risk it for the biscuit, and put a WAY lower goal than I likely should, and hope for the best. Worst case, I take a little financial punch in the gut, but I'm putting my faith into these guys as my first ever original pins... SO, without further ado: 


 

Here’s an up close of our dragon friends!

 

Ice Queen Dragoness

2.5" Rainbow plated 

Two Pin Backing 

Soft enamel with epoxy fill 

Simple, yet elegant 

 

The Koi King 

2.5" Rainbow plated 

Two Pin Backing 

Soft enamel with epoxy fill 

Simple, yet elegant 
 

The Royal Night 

2.5" Gold Plated

Golden glitter mane 

Two Pin Backing

Soft enamel with epoxy fill

 

Sakura Blossom Dragon 

2.5" Rose-Gold plated

Two Pin Backing

Soft enamel with epoxy fill

Screen-printed sakura patterning

 

The Galactic Dragon 

2.5" Rainbow Plating

Two Pin Backing 

Soft enamel with epoxy fill

Blue Glitter Body to emulate a night sky
 

Now for the technical bit, where's the money going? How long is this going to take after the Kickstarter ends? How do I choose my dragon if this succeeds?

Money:

All the collected pledges are going right into production and shipping these lovelies out. I will eventually be listing them on my Etsy and other store fronts, but they're going to be available here for an insanely discounted price (they're very complex and the plating is expensive and difficult to do right!) IF this goes further than I'm estimating conservatively, I'll just keep adding goodies for backers :) This isn't about turning a profit (full disclosure, it becomes that after I start officially selling them C;) 

How long will it take to get the rewards?

Good question! These are really complex and have a lot going on, so I do not want to rush my manufacturer in any way, and risk compromising quality. Here's a breakdown for the foreseeable timeline: 

Production: From start to finish, these are more than likely a month to 6 weeks production time. When I do complex work, I go out of my way to go to a good manufacturer, meaning higher costs, lengthier process but most importantly, a beautiful finished product. I will be keeping backers up to date every step of the way, and should any delay come up I am always super transparent and upfront about it! The manufacturer already has all the proofs, so they're ready to go when I'm ready to go, so no delays there :) 

Shipping: I ship merch ASAP. I panic when I see loads of stuff to be shipped, even from my small shop, so luckily for you all, I get stuff out FAST. That being said, I'm Canadian, and shipping from here can be a NIGHTMARE. I circumvent said nightmare however, by sending pins via post to stop clients from paying 20$ to ship a pin... It USUALLY only takes up to 7 days, and I've never once had any incident of a pin getting lost OR damaged (I protect my babies very well in packaging :)) If however you'd like tracked packets, please message me and we can work out shipping together! (Either way, I guarantee all my pins and will happily replace missing or damaged ones)

How do I choose my dragon?

At the end, I will send surveys to every backer asking what rewards they want! Fret not :) More rewards will become available as the Indiegogo progresses

story:
Short Summary

The three of us (Vince, Ben, and Eytan) met at the Berklee College of Music a few years ago and realized that together we have an electric synergy and the ability to create meaningful projects that really serve people, companies, and communities.

We've created many different projects to serve our communities and finally decided to harness our belief in each other and our collective potential and form a real company - The FAM - where we can work together, create fun and meaningful projects, and serve as many people and communities as humanly possible.

Check us out at www.WeTheFam.com

We specialize in Jingles, Songs, Poetry, Video, Pictures, Music Videos, Performances, Consulting, Coaching, and are always looking for ways to improve our environment and the people around us!

Some of the obstacles we’ve been dealing with are that we all live in different parts of the city and we don't have the equipment or resources to effectively and efficiently complete these projects - it has taken 6 months to complete a 3 week project and working under these conditions has helped us realize that we really need a dedicated space to come together daily and collaborate. An office with a recording set up would be an inspiring and fertile space where we all belong and can create constantly.

This is so important to us- it's the basis for our careers and will give us the setting to support ourselves and help out many people in the process. Your contributions and support mean everything to us - it's the only way we can do this right! Help us design a functional and inspiring environment where we can keep creating and serving!


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal here is $8000 (though that's conservative and we could really use much more to do this right) - every dollar you can give is so helpful and will be put to great use!

We need a space - not just any space, we need a place that feels right, inspires creativity and gives us room to breath and work together. We found a space we really feel good about, now we need to make it real!

We need to outfit the space - paint, carpet, desks, building a vocal booth for recording, etc.

We need some gear for recording - computer, microphone, monitors, etc.

Lastly we need some funds for bills, legal work, and general expenses to set up and maintain this operation until we're able to generate a steady profit.

We've put together some really special rewards for anyone who is ready to support us - check em out! 

These perks include speccing time with us in a city tour or a recording session, a 4 song digital EP, a limited-edition signed poem, a private Skype concert, have us record your voicemail message, and even deals on some of our services - jingles, performances, website design.

It's for real - this stuff is awesome, don't miss out!

Any donation really helps - we're hoping to double our goal (hint), but even if we don't reach it every dime will be so helpful in launching our dream - we're committed, this is happening, we hope you'll join us!


The Impact

This is such an important company - The Fam is self explanatory, a small family of like-minded talented people who care about each other and the rest of the world. 

We have proved our system and potential with clients such as Ford, Berklee College of Music, Karmin, City of Boston, Hasbro Children's Hospital, Newbury Street League, and more...

We were blessed by the support of many who helped us with our first big project - The Boston Song, this was an anthem for the City of Boston and was well received. It got a city holiday, the Mayor's and City Council's endorsement, we sang at a Red Sox game, were on every major New England media outlet, and eventually got the song placed for a Ford commercial campaign. The biggest wins though were first seeing how many of the schools and communities around Boston were unifying around our song, and then the big one was in the wake of the 2013 Marathon Bombings, when many people used our song for stability and healing. 

Whoever you are - you must believe in something, and you must appreciate quality creativity (or you wouldn't be here) - we would love to be a force that helps every important cause, company, and movement to improve the world - and do so with beautiful music and media. Help us make this real!

Reference videos:

"So Good" The Boston Song: http://bit.ly/1gXftdW

Hasbro Children's Hospital "All For One": http://bit.ly/1lGtQ9z

South Shore Educational Collaborative: http://bit.ly/QMCyGE

I'm On Newbury Street: http://bit.ly/1dVdRlv

Valentine for Boston - Flash mob that used "So Good": http://bit.ly/1i8QX5J


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money and still want to help - that's great too! Please help by introducing this project to everyone you know who may be interested - you may be in the position to introduce us to the right person who believes in this and has the resources to contribute themselves.

Please follow us on social media and look out for other opportunities to get involved - we always need people for the next music video!

story:
Back our project to help us make our first large run of shoes and bring these historic sneakers back to life!

Our Story

Discovered at an estate sale out of Vista, California back in 2004, the Colchester Rubber Co Sneaker is thought to be the World's Oldest Basketball Sneaker, predating all of it's predecessors by over 25 years. 

The History and sneaker were just too good to pass up, so we decided as a team to bring these heritage shoes back to life for a new generation of sneaker fans to enjoy. We now need your support to create shoe molds (a mold for each size offered) and produce a large run of sneakers.

Please join us on a journey back in time...

The History

Burned Factory Remains: Colchester Rubber Co, 1909

 

Colchester Rubber 5 Fast Facts

1. Founded in 1888 by Englishman George Watkinson in Colchester, Connecticut.

2. Produced high end vulcanized footwear that was sold around the world.

3. Created the 1st basketball sneaker as a prototype. It is believed to have been shown at the Chicago's World Fair in 1892.

4. Colchester Rubber was shut down when it was purchased by U.S. Rubber in 1893. 

5. George Watkinson later worked with Marquis Converse (who founded Converse later on in 1908) at the U.S. Rubber Factory. They were good friends.

The World's Oldest Basketball Sneaker

125 Year Old Sneaker!

Our research into determining the age of the sneaker was not taken lightly. Hundreds of hours of research; combing through old newspaper scans; visiting the town of Colchester and snapping up memorabilia as it popped up on Ebay has led us to the conclusion that this sneaker holds the claim of "World's First Basketball Sneaker." Converse agreed and retracted their claim of being the World's First. 

The technology to purify rubber did not exist until around 1905. The sneakers contain impure, pocked rubber, allowing us to easily date them. 

The Colchester National Treasure is the Grandfather of all sneaker brands, it's DNA is encoded in MILLIONS of pairs worn since. 

Our collection consists of the original deadgrass tan color, as well as the addition of new color-ways. We offer a high and low top sneaker in all colors available. You'll always have a pair of Colchesters to wear with any look.

Your pair of Colchesters comes in a beautiful heritage box.

Sizing

Sizing notes

Our shoes are made in US UNISEX sizes. Use our size chart to find which size you are. For example if you are a women's 8 then you will wear a men's 6.

How Colchester sizes run: Colchesters tend to run slightly larger than normal. If you have wide feet, select the size that you normally wear.

If you wear a half size: If you wear a half size, round down. For example, if you have narrow feet and wear US 8.5, your best fit is likely an 8.

If you wear a number of different sizes: If, for example, you wear an 9 in some brands and 10 in others and don't know which one to base your size off of, you should probably go with the larger size. Our sole molds are similar to those of Converse for comparison.

Shipping, exchanges, returns & duties

Shipping to the United States is 100% free! 

Exchanges: In the case that you need a different size for your shoes, we'll happily exchange them. To avoid any confusion, we highly encourage you to check our size details above to get the correct size and wear your shoes as soon as possible!

If you're in the US, we'll cover shipping both ways.We cannot cover the postage for international exchanges.

Returns: If, for whatever reason, you aren't pleased with your Colchesters, we'll accommodate a return and refund without any difficulty, and cover postage within the US. We're incredibly confident that you'll be more than satisfied with your Colchesters.

International shipping costs: For one pair, cost is $20. For two pairs (color exclusive bundle) it is $25. For the mix n' match bundle/3 Pairs & ultimate mix n' match bundle/4 Pairs it is $30.

Duties: Please note that you may encounter duties if you are ordering outside of the United States. Because this is quite variable, you will be responsible for covering any duties required by your home country.

You can email us anytime at info@colchesters.com 

instagram: @colchesterrubberco

Dedication

We want to dedicate this campaign to the crafters of the Victorian gilded age. Their design and attention to detail was outstanding, especially considering their limited resources. 

We also want to mention Mr. Max Kline and Dr. James Naismith. Along with the sneakers found at the estate sale we also purchased many of Max's momentos including the photo below. We believe the sneakers were passed down to him in Denver by Dr. Naismith whom was attending medical school there. Dr. James Naismith is forever remembered as the Father of basketball, one of the greatest sports of all time. 

Max Kline

Dr.James Naismith, Inventor of Basket-Ball

Max Kline

Dr.James Naismith, Inventor of Basket-Ball

story:
The B2 is a reusable respirator that filters 99% of common contaminants and reduces filter cost and waste by half. Unlike existing consumer masks, the B2 features a flexible, patent-pending facepiece that provides superior protection and comfort. The B2 is the culmination of 4+ years of design and development, and is now ready to be mass produced.

Awards & Recognition

We are proud to announce that we've been selected as a PRI recipient from the Venn Foundation and as winners of the Protolabs Cool Idea Award. 

 

Drawbacks of Existing Masks

Each of these mask types suffers from the following three issues.

Poor face seals: Existing masks don't always achieve an adequate seal on the face, resulting in decreased protection [1]

High waste and cost: N95 masks are intended to be changed regularly, which is inconvenient and expensive in many use cases

Scalability of manufacturing: Face masks cannot be produced fast enough to meet the demands of both the health care system and general public

Is the B2 mask right for me?

The B2 Mask is designed to provide excellent protection to those who are most at risk from airborne contaminants, whether due to increased environmental exposure or preexisting conditions. People who may benefit from improved protection include:

 The B2 Mask is not recommended for those who need protection against oil-based particles or chemical vapors.

B2 Mask: Superior Breathing Protection

The B2 Mask addresses the problems with existing masks and offers clear advantages over competitive options. These benefits include:

  •  Comfortable, Airtight Seal: Flexible facepiece achieves Fit Factor above 100
  •  High-Efficiency Filters: 99% protection from contaminants down to .1 micron for normal breathing rates
  •  Reduced Cost & Waste: Scalable filter technology reduces waste and cost
  •  Durable, Reusable Design: Easily cleanable design provides years of use

Comfortable, Airtight Seal

The B2's patent-pending facepiece provides excellent comfort and protection compared to existing face masks. The facepiece is constructed from FDA-compliant materials, folds in half for easy storage, and can accommodate a wide range of face shapes and sizes because of its flex-hinge design.

 

High-Efficiency Filters

The B2 Mask uses the latest advances in filter technology that provides around 99% filtration against a range of airborne contaminants down to .1 micron during normal breathing rates.

 Particle Filtration Efficiency*: >99.5% at 32 LPM – tested according in accordance to TSI8130 NaCl .1 micron particle size

In addition to providing stellar protection, the B2's filters are easy load with a simple twist-to-lock filter cap.

Reduced Filter Cost and Waste

B2 Mask uses the smallest, most affordable high-efficiency filters on the market. Below is a buying guide to help you better understand how often you change your filters, and how many filters you need to buy depending on how you plan to use your mask.

Every B2 comes pre-packaged with 10 filters, or five filter changes (2 filters/change). You can purchase additional filters at the end of the campaign starting at $14 or only $2.80/month for 5 months of protection for a medium-frequency user.

The B2's filters are small and can be produced more rapidly than N95 masks. This means the B2 can scale to meet the demand of people around the world in search of high-quality breathing protection.

Durable, Reusable Design

The B2 Mask is designed to provide years of comfortable, sustainable protection. The B2's facepiece is constructed from durable materials and is easy to clean by hand or in a dishwasher. The overlay can be cleaned by hand or in the washing machine for easy maintenance. 

Testing & Regulatory Details

The B2 Mask is designed to offer best-in-class protection for daily use. Our team is working with 3rd-party experts to test and validate the two critical facets of mask protection: filtration efficacy and anthropometric fit factor.

Filter Testing 

We've selected a high-efficiency, electrostatically charged filter media that removes >99% of particulate matter down to .1 micron. The material has been tested for particulate filtration efficiency at Superior Felt and Filtration and at Nelson Labs.

Fit Factor Testing

A well maintained face seal is critical to achieving high levels of protection. Initial tests using the FDA-approved Portacount 8030 system showed the B2 Mask had an average Fit Factor over 100 - the level required for NIOSH certification. Breathe99 is partnering with leading human factors design firm Anthrotech to conduct additional face fit testing with 25 participants that fill the NIOSH panel for face shape and head size 

 

Regulatory Approval

We have designed the B2 Mask to comply with NIOSH N99 standards per 42 CFR Part 84, but the B2 Mask has not yet gone through the regulatory approval process with either NIOSH or the FDA. In the short term, Breathe99 will work to receive through the FDA to receive Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

Breathe99: Yesterday

The idea for a protective, lightweight, and stylish mask first took shape almost 6 years ago, while Max - our CEO and mechanical engineer - was living in Singapore.

Since then we've gone through hundreds of sketched concepts, several major prototype iterations, and validated our design with quantitative flow testing. The result is a design ready to ramp up in production very quickly and bring high-quality protection to people around the world.

Breathe99: Today

Now we’re a group of engineers and designers with a passion for public health and technology. Our team has over 10 years of experience in the medical device industry, and our advisers add extensive knowledge and experience in product development, atmospheric science, and business strategy.

  • Max Bock-Aronson - CEO, Mechanical Engineer
  • Coleman Rollins - Full-Stack Engineer
  • Julia Duvall - Product Designer
  • Prashan Subasinghe - Mechanical Engineer
  • Derek Mathers -  Sales & Business Development
  • Emma Gavala - Marketing & Business Development

Healthy Together: The Breathe99 Mission

Our mission is to make the highest quality public health products available to everyone. We believe that each of us plays a vital role in protecting our neighbors and communities, and that it is through collaborative action we can create a healthier, more equitable world. 

Key Partners

We've partnered with industry-leading experts in molding, filtration technology,  and soft goods design and production. Each of these key partners are based in the US and are either ISO 13485 or ISO 9001:2015 certified. Partnering with these businesses ensures we can ramp up quickly and deliver the highest quality product on-time to our backers.

We also have partnered with other leading groups including the Venn Foundation, Anthrotech, and Worrell Design to ensure we are achieving the highest of quality as we seek to further our social mission of making high-quality public health products available to all.

story:
ERA Timepieces - ERA Prometheus - ERA Tourbillon - ERA Watch

The ERA Prometheus Tourbillon Watch raised $1.3 million USD on Kickstarter and Indiegogo. Our ERA watch makes it possible for you to buy tourbillon watches and more haute complications. The ERA tourbillon watch, using every bit of luxury found in traditional luxury watch brands, has forever altered the industry.

Watch the video above to see how we made Certified Millionaire Tourbillon Watches and made them attainable for all.

Thanks For All Your Support! 

If you're interested in our timepieces, check them out here: 

https://eratimepieces.com/a/offers/p/54494/Choose-Your-Dream-Timepiece

---------------

The ERA Poseidon And ERA Hyperion -- Two Timepieces Unlike ANYTHING The World Has Ever Seen

In 2018, We Made History On Indiegogo As The Most Successful Mechanical Watch On-Demand Project EVER

However it was only the beginning....

Because today, we are taking on the most famous watch in the world -- The Diver.

It is the most recognized timepiece in the world today. It is king of the popularity contest.

Chances are when you hear the word "wristwatch", most people picture something similar to a Rolex Submariner in their heads, whether they know why or not.

Everyone knows it.

Everyone copies it.

This design has become so popular that it’s now a design for - the Masses.

But when you have always lived like no one else, always stood apart from the herd…

You deserve a timepiece that is as unique - as YOU are.

A watch not for the Masses, but for Millionaires: the Wandering Hour diver.

 

The New York Times says the wandering hour is an extraordinary first

 

But good luck finding this engineering marvel. According to Hodinkee (the most visited watch site in the world), despite the wandering hour’s age and history, it is a rarity in modern watchmaking.

See, put a wandering hour into ANY watch -- the price explodes:

Five figures, Six figures, INSTANTLY.

Put a wandering hour into a Dive watch however, the price explodes and - it becomes, the ONLY *dive watch* of its kind…

 

Introducing - a certified millionaire diver, unlike any other:

******************************************

ONLY 1000 ERA POSEIDON TIMEPIECES WILL EVER BE MADE

******************************************

Modeled after the Mega yachts on the French Riviera, the Poseidon’s rare wandering hour is an instant conversation starter. 

The hand-crafted bow, stern, port, and starboard, all inside a timepiece, is a watchmaking First.

This feat is displayed on Bold - and Gradient dial colors: complementing the single and Dual-Toned bezels.

How To Tell Time With The Wandering Hour

Protecting this rare mechanism is a Domed sapphire crystal and an Exotic 316L case - multi-faceted like a Diamond.

 

Armed with a helium release valve, the Poseidon is also equipped to withstand depths of up to 1000 Meters. 

So your timepiece IS as Adventurous as it is Unique. 

In fact, each watch is engraved with a unique identifier, making your timepiece a Limited Edition and Officially, one-of-a-kind.

Lastly, the Poseidon’s heritage: Your timepiece is made by SWISS artisans and powered by our IN-HOUSE, SWISS MADE movement - the ERA-001 calibre - the absolute First of its Kind.

 

No clone. No copy. The Poseidon is truly a SWISS diver unlike any. Other.

 

******************************************

ONLY 1000 ERA HYPERION TIMEPIECES WILL EVER BE MADE

******************************************

But what if you wanted more?

Wanted something impossible: like the rarity of a wandering hour AND...the luxury of a tourbillon.

No watch has EVER had the BEST of BOTH these worlds.

So facing impossibility, we turned to the one place with infinite possibility -- the Cosmos.

And here among the stars, we found inspiration to create the world’s first: wandering hour Tourbillon -- The ERA Hyperion

More rare than a typical six figure tourbillon, the ERA Hyperion comes with a head turning 3 o'clock mechanism. Seen in Only 1 out of 500 tourbillon watches, the distinction is unmistakable.

Combine that with a wandering hour, power it with a futuristic rocket, and this is an instant masterpiece. 

And the star powering it all?

Our custom-made, in-house movement, the ERA-002 calibre -- another absolute first of its kind

And like all six figure tourbillons, no two ERA Hyperions will be the same.

Black Aventurine glass lines every dial. Each is handmade with flecks of cobalt, silica, and manganese: forming one-of-a-kind flares on every watch face. 

This galactic symphony is viewed from the designed porthole of a futuristic Spaceship.

Rivets and ridges seal the sapphire crystal window shut. 

While the airlock wheel at 12 o’clock is actually a crown that powers it all. 

But wait -- what exactly qualifies us to be able to create timepieces that have literally never existed before we created them?

In case you aren't familiar with our Company and our Brand, let's take a look at who we are and how we got to our position today:

We launched our company in 2018 with the launch of our critically-acclaimed ERA Prometheus -- The World's First Attainable Tourbillon Timepiece

The response was incredible. You supported us in record-breaking numbers here in the USA....and record-breaking numbers WORLDWIDE.

 

 

Nothing shows a brand's success than the appreciation in value of its timepieces. When we first launched, the ERA Prometheus started at $899. Now ERA Prometheus have SOLD (not just listed) for $1100 to $1800. 

That means that ERA Timepieces have increased in value 33% to 100% in just one year.

No wonder the greatest SWISS watchmaker in the world, Philippe Dufour, predicted our success. Video starts at 19:22 and the following are Dufour's EXACT WORDS: 

"It's a way to fight. But people sometimes people don't realize they say 'we [Swiss] are the best'. But things are moving all around us...when you see what they are coming with their tourbillon...its working properly, its accurate, its affordable. Who knows in five ten years they have a big big watch shop where people are filling and beveling by hand...$3000 or $100,000 you choose." 

Not surprisingly, we've found that people simply can't stop talking about us online.

Even mainstream media (NBC, CBS) took notice:

 
Celebrities? They loved wearing their ERA Timepieces as well. 
 

Like fmr Unified Bantamweight (WBA, IBF) World Champion boxer Ryan Burnett


And most important of all - YOU loved us. You sent us 100s of personal messages. Whether it was to rave about your ERA Prometheus, or the white glove customer service you experienced, or the excitement you felt about joining the ERA family -- we THANK YOU.

Your messages hang over our office, like flickering stars guiding us through uncertain nights. They inspire us.

Because we came together not to buy another watch, but to create a new ERA --  an era where no one dictates our place in life -- an era where we follow our own path -- an ERA where NOTHING is impossible for us to get.

 

 

 

It's important to remember that by owning one-of-a-kind tourbillons and wandering hours, your timepieces are bound to attract A LOT of attention. 

But wearing an ERA is NOT about flaunting a 6 figure timepiece. 

Your watches are unlike ANYTHING else,

Because YOU are Unlike ANYONE else. 

When the world told you to “get a regular job”, “play it safe” , 

 “Listen to what other people think of you” - you refused. 

You needed to live life on your own terms. 

So you built your business, 

you took your trip, 

you started that relationship, 

you quit your dead end job - you. followed. your. bliss. 

And that’s why you DESERVE a timepiece that IS as Unique as You Are.

Because a Cloned copy of what everyone Else is wearing, does NOT belong in YOUR STORY.

If you agree with that...then please, support our timepieces. 

Reserve an ERA Timepiece at a Founders price and help us continue to make even More 6 figure watches - Attainable for all. 

Thank you!

We pride ourselves in being the most accessible high-end tourbillon timepieces in the market. So for a full 24 months (2 Years):

If your watch is suffering from ANY mechanical defect, we will gladly service it for free during this time and make it right.

And for servicing -- unlike other brands who price gouge you well into the four figures, as an Indiegogo backer you are all covered for a flat fee of $150.

This rate will cover servicing and 100% insured express delivery back from our servicing centers.

 

We expect delivery for this Indiegogo campaign to begin in December 2019 for the ERA Poseidon, and January 2020 for the ERA Hyperion.

And we aim to make our shipping fees as affordable as possible. 

While you are responsible for all import taxes globally, we have methods to assist you with this matter as well.  Please shoot us an email at support@eratimepieces.com for more info.

We can confirm that customers in the USA, Singapore, and Hong Kong will NOT have to pay any import taxes.

Poseidon

Diameter:  44mm           

Thickness:  18.9mm

Accuracy:  +/-12seconds/day

Power Reserve: 42hours

Frequency:  28,800vph

Jewels: 25

Case: Custom Hand Finished 316L Stainless Steel 

Crystal: Ultra Scratch-resistant, Domed Sapphire Glass

Water Resistance: 100ATM

Movement: SWISS-MADE In House ERA-001 Calibre

Strap: Custom Made Stainless Steel

Weight: 250g

 

Hyperion

Diameter:  44mm           

Thickness:  18mm

Power Reserve: 45hours

Frequency:  28,800vph

Jewels: 35

Case: Custom Hand Finished 316L Stainless Steel 

Crystal: Ultra Scratch-resistant, Domed Sapphire Glass

Water Resistance: 5ATM

Movement: In-House ERA-002 Hybrid Wandering Hour + Tourbillon Movement

Strap: Custom Made Stainless Steel

Weight: 220g

 

Michael Galarza

Any Silicon Valley venture capitalist will tell you that a start-up is only as good as its founding team, and so it makes sense for me to introduce myself to you.

I started ERA because I personally yearned to wear watches that were impossible for regular people to wear. Since I knew these watches were purposely kept away from regular people by the luxury watch cartel that controls 87% of the world's luxury watch supply, I resolved to forge my own path.

Emboldened by my own relationships with independent master watchmakers around the world over the years, I founded ERA to break through this luxury brand monopoly.

I've been featured in issues of Entrepreneur Mindset for my work in the disruption of corrupt, unfair, and inefficient markets in the last year.

1 year later, I am still personally answering any emails addressed to me in our support tickets because I care that much about the customer experience and know that feedback only comes from being on the front lines.

It is my goal and my dream to CONTINUE to bring previously unattainable timepieces to all, and I thank you for your part in allowing me to do that!

 

What exactly is a wandering hour?

A wandering hour complication displays the time by moving a pointer showing the hour across an arc showing the minutes. The concept is that the moving hour display keeps an almost metaphorical count of the passing minutes rising and setting along the hourly arc.

The Campani brothers are credited for creating the wandering hour concept in the 1600s in a clock for the Pope. It traditionally consists of a central one- to four-armed cross with a disc or cylinder at the end of each arm which rotates to show the current hour and points to the minutes along an arc-shaped track. The complication is fairly straightforward, as each of the 12 hours is evenly divisible by one, two, three or four, so each arm can show the same number of hours. Similarly, the dial is divisible according to the number of arms, so a three-armed system will show the minutes on a 120º track, while a four-armed system uses 90º of the dial, and a single-armed system - 360º.

What exactly is a tourbillon?

A tourbillon is the invention of famed watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet. It was made to counter the ill effects of gravity on the accuracy of his timepieces.

Breguet’s solution was to create an escapement that was constantly in a state of motion. Called the tourbillon (French for “whirlwind”), the escapement is housed in a rotating cage that, because of the constant motion, averages out the effect of gravity when the watch is stuck in different positions.

They’ve remained common among the uppermost echelon of the watch market. Most Swiss-made examples start at around $40,000 and price tags often break the six-figure barrier.

This is because tourbillons are arguably one the most difficult movement to make by hand. The tourbillon mechanism is tiny, weighing in at under a gram, and is usually crafted with more than 40 parts, finished by hand and made from lightweight metals like aluminum and titanium. They require a special set of tools and a lot of time to make. For example, just to make a single A. Lange & Söhne Tourbograph Pour le Merite, its tourbillon chronograph movement takes 18 months.

I saw a tourbillon for $100 - what’s the difference?

Simply put, those aren’t tourbillons.

These are scammers that are trying to pass off an open heart / flywheel off as a real tourbillon.  They are preying on the customer thinking they can see some simple gears and equating it with a tourbillon. What you are probably seeing is an attempt by a Chinese seller to pass a regular mechanical watch as a tourbillon-like watch.

They are allowed to advertise in such a confusing and possibly ill-intention manner because the platform (aliexpress, amazon, ebay, etc.) lets them.

There are no trusted brands who sell mechanical tourbillon watches for under $1000.

And that’s why we created ERA.

Is your tourbillon real? How is it so much less expensive?

There is no such thing as a “real” or “fake” tourbillon. You either have the mastery to make it or you don’t.

And most cannot - they are a feat of technology and creativity, both beautiful to look at and very difficult to make by hand. .

That’s why tourbillon watches will always be pricey.

But by breaking through the cartel and monopoly, we are able to get you a world-class tourbillon for on average 99% OFF what you would pay for another similar Tourbillon.

Will I be forced to pay high VAT / Customs fees?

We will work with our couriers to make sure you pay as low a price as possible when it arrives.

What about servicing for my watch?

That's a great question -- because your timepiece will eventually need to be serviced every 3-5 years, as it's a literal machine that has hundreds of pieces that click perfectly into place thousands of times a day.

We're pleased to announce that we have secured agreements with some world-class horologists that have agreed to service our watches when they are needed.

Just shoot us a message when you want your watch serviced, and we'll take care of the rest!

Technical Questions?

We consider ourselves watch nerds. We are very open to a healthy discussion regarding a myriad of topics like: movement, sensitivity, movement comparisons, tourbillon comparisons, price vs value, etc.

We only ask that you backup your claims with data and logic, because whenever we can - we will as well.

TO YOU. Customers, backers, and anyone else who takes the road less travelled. Who goes for what they want. Who doesn’t settle. Who thinks outside the system. Who understands progress is the universal tradition. Who believes anything is attainable.

Thank YOU so much for making ERA possible.

We couldn’t do it without YOU.

For all comments/questions/inquiries, you can connect with us by emailing: support@eratimepieces.com

Follow ERA on Social Media :

https://www.facebook.com/eratourbillons

https://www.instagram.com/eratourbillons

https://twitter.com/eratimepieces

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChWiAM5ejDLr1o7L8Ur7x8w

https://www.snapchat.com/add/eratimepieces

Returns

While fewer than 2 out of 100 people who buy an ERA want to return their timepieces, we know that sometimes things aren’t a perfect fit for you based on your wrist size, climate, etc. Indiegogo is NOT an e-commerce platform however though and so if you want a refund, please note that it will be a full refund minus Indiegogo's fees which they've already taken AFTER the campaign ends.

 

Risks and challenges

We are aware our project is bold and complex: "making watches that have never been made before". It is true that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, we've been in the manufacturing and distribution business for years and so our knowledge and expertise of the production process is quite advanced. You can have complete confidence in our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. Our thousands of satisfied customers from the ERA Prometheus campaign is evidence of this.

Most products that fail on Crowdfunding fail because the sponsors were just hobby tinkerers who had no idea how different prototypes are from mass producing finished items. We don't have that problem. This is what we do day in and day out. There will be no surprises. Our years in the industry have let us build out a sophisticated distribution network so delivery will be timely and inexpensive.

In any case, if there is ANYTHING unexpected that happens, we promise to keep you informed right away, both during the campaign and afterwards.

Lastly, know that over the past few months we have shown our prototypes to many watch connoisseurs, journalists and influencers. We have gathered an incredible amount of valuable feedback and are finally ready to make millionaire watches a reality for everyone.

And it's made for the most powerful people of the world; it's an exclusive design for bold wearers 

 But good luck finding this engineering marvel. According to Hodinkee (the most visited watch site in the world), despite the wandering hour’s age and history, it is a rarity in modern watchmaking. See, put a wandering hour into ANY watch -- the price explodes:Five figures, Six figures, INSTANTLY.Put a wandering hour into a Dive watch however, the price explodes and - it becomes, the ONLY *dive watch* of its kind… Introducing - a certified millionaire diver, unlike any other:
 ******************************************ONLY 1000 ERA POSEIDON TIMEPIECES WILL EVER BE MADE******************************************Modeled after the Mega yachts on the French Riviera, the Poseidon’s rare wandering hour is an instant conversation starter. The hand-crafted bow, stern, port, and starboard, all inside a timepiece, is a watchmaking First.
 This feat is displayed on Bold - and Gradient dial colors: complementing the single and Dual-Toned bezels.How To Tell Time With The Wandering HourThe Hour is displayed on the sub-dial on the hand.  At the top of each hour, the number will change.  The 1 hand on the timepiece is a minute hand, read like a normal minute hand on a normal watch. 
So you read the hour in the sub-dial, then the minute on the minute hand.  It takes about 2 weeks to acclimate to reading time in this way, but then it's as easy to glance at the time as it is any other timepiece.
Poseidon Styles
 
 
 Protecting this rare mechanism is a Domed sapphire crystal and an Exotic 316L case - multi-faceted like a Diamond. 
 Armed with a helium release valve, the Poseidon is also equipped to withstand depths of up to 1000 Meters. So your timepiece IS as Adventurous as it is Unique. In fact, each watch is engraved with a unique identifier, making your timepiece a Limited Edition and Officially, one-of-a-kind.Lastly, the Poseidon’s heritage: Your timepiece is made by SWISS artisans and powered by our IN-HOUSE, SWISS MADE movement - the ERA-001 calibre - the absolute First of its Kind.
  No clone. No copy. The Poseidon is truly a SWISS diver unlike any. Other.
 
 
 

 
 
  ******************************************ONLY 1000 ERA HYPERION TIMEPIECES WILL EVER BE MADE******************************************But what if you wanted more?Wanted something impossible: like the rarity of a wandering hour AND...the luxury of a tourbillon.No watch has EVER had the BEST of BOTH these worlds.So facing impossibility, we turned to the one place with infinite possibility -- the Cosmos.And here among the stars, we found inspiration to create the world’s first: wandering hour Tourbillon -- The ERA Hyperion
More rare than a typical six figure tourbillon, the ERA Hyperion comes with a head turning 3 o'clock mechanism. Seen in Only 1 out of 500 tourbillon watches, the distinction is unmistakable.Combine that with a wandering hour, power it with a futuristic rocket, and this is an instant masterpiece. 
And the star powering it all?Our custom-made, in-house movement, the ERA-002 calibre -- another absolute first of its kindAnd like all six figure tourbillons, no two ERA Hyperions will be the same.Black Aventurine glass lines every dial. Each is handmade with flecks of cobalt, silica, and manganese: forming one-of-a-kind flares on every watch face. This galactic symphony is viewed from the designed porthole of a futuristic Spaceship.Rivets and ridges seal the sapphire crystal window shut.  While the airlock wheel at 12 o’clock is actually a crown that powers it all. With the ERA Hyperion, each glance at your wrist will open up a new dimension of Space Time. 

It is the sum of ALL infinite possibilities in the Universe, and a reminder that NOTHING is impossible to get.

 

But wait -- what exactly qualifies us to be able to create timepieces that have literally never existed before we created them?In case you aren't familiar with our Company and our Brand, let's take a look at who we are and how we got to our position today:We launched our company in 2018 with the launch of our critically-acclaimed ERA Prometheus -- The World's First Attainable Tourbillon TimepieceThe response was incredible. You supported us in record-breaking numbers here in the USA....and record-breaking numbers WORLDWIDE.  Nothing shows a brand's success than the appreciation in value of its timepieces. When we first launched, the ERA Prometheus started at $899. Now ERA Prometheus have SOLD (not just listed) for $1100 to $1800. That means that ERA Timepieces have increased in value 33% to 100% in just one year.  No wonder the greatest SWISS watchmaker in the world, Philippe Dufour, predicted our success. Video starts at 19:22 and the following are Dufour's EXACT WORDS: "It's a way to fight. But people sometimes people don't realize they say 'we [Swiss] are the best'. But things are moving all around us...when you see what they are coming with their tourbillon...its working properly, its accurate, its affordable. Who knows in five ten years they have a big big watch shop where people are filling and beveling by hand...$3000 or $100,000 you choose." Not surprisingly, we've found that people simply can't stop talking about us online.
 
 
 
 
 
 Even mainstream media (NBC, CBS) took notice:



 

Celebrities? They loved wearing their ERA Timepieces as well. 

 
Like fmr Unified Bantamweight (WBA, IBF) World Champion boxer Ryan Burnett
And legendary NBA future Hall Of Famer, greatest dunker of all time, Vince Carter 
Leading Youtubers in the watch space loved their ERA Prometheus:

And most important of all - YOU loved us. You sent us 100s of personal messages. Whether it was to rave about your ERA Prometheus, or the white glove customer service you experienced, or the excitement you felt about joining the ERA family -- we THANK YOU.





      Your messages hang over our office, like flickering stars guiding us through uncertain nights. They inspire us.Because we came together not to buy another watch, but to create a new ERA --  an era where no one dictates our place in life -- an era where we follow our own path -- an ERA where NOTHING is impossible for us to get.
 
 
 
It's important to remember that by owning one-of-a-kind tourbillons and wandering hours, your timepieces are bound to attract A LOT of attention. But wearing an ERA is NOT about flaunting a 6 figure timepiece. Your watches are unlike ANYTHING else,Because YOU are Unlike ANYONE else. When the world told you to “get a regular job”, “play it safe” ,  “Listen to what other people think of you” - you refused. You needed to live life on your own terms. So you built your business, you took your trip, you started that relationship, you quit your dead end job - you. followed. your. bliss. And that’s why you DESERVE a timepiece that IS as Unique as You Are. Because a Cloned copy of what everyone Else is wearing, does NOT belong in YOUR STORY.If you agree with that...then please, support our timepieces. Reserve an ERA Timepiece at a Founders price and help us continue to make even More 6 figure watches - Attainable for all. Thank you!We pride ourselves in being the most accessible high-end tourbillon timepieces in the market. So for a full 24 months (2 Years):If your watch is suffering from ANY mechanical defect, we will gladly service it for free during this time and make it right.And for servicing -- unlike other brands who price gouge you well into the four figures, as an Indiegogo backer you are all covered for a flat fee of $150.This rate will cover servicing and 100% insured express delivery back from our servicing centers. We expect delivery for this Indiegogo campaign to begin in December 2019 for the ERA Poseidon, and January 2020 for the ERA Hyperion.And we aim to make our shipping fees as affordable as possible. While you are responsible for all import taxes globally, we have methods to assist you with this matter as well.  Please shoot us an email at support@eratimepieces.com for more info.We can confirm that customers in the USA, Singapore, and Hong Kong will NOT have to pay any import taxes.PoseidonDiameter:  44mm           Thickness:  18.9mmAccuracy:  +/-12seconds/dayPower Reserve: 42hoursFrequency:  28,800vphJewels: 25Case: Custom Hand Finished 316L Stainless Steel Crystal: Ultra Scratch-resistant, Domed Sapphire GlassWater Resistance: 100ATMMovement: SWISS-MADE In House ERA-001 CalibreStrap: Custom Made Stainless SteelWeight: 250g HyperionDiameter:  44mm           Thickness:  18mmPower Reserve: 45hoursFrequency:  28,800vphJewels: 35Case: Custom Hand Finished 316L Stainless Steel Crystal: Ultra Scratch-resistant, Domed Sapphire GlassWater Resistance: 5ATMMovement: In-House ERA-002 Hybrid Wandering Hour + Tourbillon MovementStrap: Custom Made Stainless SteelWeight: 220g Michael GalarzaAny Silicon Valley venture capitalist will tell you that a start-up is only as good as its founding team, and so it makes sense for me to introduce myself to you.I started ERA because I personally yearned to wear watches that were impossible for regular people to wear. Since I knew these watches were purposely kept away from regular people by the luxury watch cartel that controls 87% of the world's luxury watch supply, I resolved to forge my own path.Emboldened by my own relationships with independent master watchmakers around the world over the years, I founded ERA to break through this luxury brand monopoly.I've been featured in issues of Entrepreneur Mindset for my work in the disruption of corrupt, unfair, and inefficient markets in the last year.1 year later, I am still personally answering any emails addressed to me in our support tickets because I care that much about the customer experience and know that feedback only comes from being on the front lines.It is my goal and my dream to CONTINUE to bring previously unattainable timepieces to all, and I thank you for your part in allowing me to do that!
  What exactly is a wandering hour?A wandering hour complication displays the time by moving a pointer showing the hour across an arc showing the minutes. The concept is that the moving hour display keeps an almost metaphorical count of the passing minutes rising and setting along the hourly arc.The Campani brothers are credited for creating the wandering hour concept in the 1600s in a clock for the Pope. It traditionally consists of a central one- to four-armed cross with a disc or cylinder at the end of each arm which rotates to show the current hour and points to the minutes along an arc-shaped track. The complication is fairly straightforward, as each of the 12 hours is evenly divisible by one, two, three or four, so each arm can show the same number of hours. Similarly, the dial is divisible according to the number of arms, so a three-armed system will show the minutes on a 120º track, while a four-armed system uses 90º of the dial, and a single-armed system - 360º.What exactly is a tourbillon?A tourbillon is the invention of famed watchmaker Abraham-Louis Breguet. It was made to counter the ill effects of gravity on the accuracy of his timepieces.Breguet’s solution was to create an escapement that was constantly in a state of motion. Called the tourbillon (French for “whirlwind”), the escapement is housed in a rotating cage that, because of the constant motion, averages out the effect of gravity when the watch is stuck in different positions.They’ve remained common among the uppermost echelon of the watch market. Most Swiss-made examples start at around $40,000 and price tags often break the six-figure barrier.This is because tourbillons are arguably one the most difficult movement to make by hand. The tourbillon mechanism is tiny, weighing in at under a gram, and is usually crafted with more than 40 parts, finished by hand and made from lightweight metals like aluminum and titanium. They require a special set of tools and a lot of time to make. For example, just to make a single A. Lange & Söhne Tourbograph Pour le Merite, its tourbillon chronograph movement takes 18 months.I saw a tourbillon for $100 - what’s the difference?Simply put, those aren’t tourbillons.These are scammers that are trying to pass off an open heart / flywheel off as a real tourbillon.  They are preying on the customer thinking they can see some simple gears and equating it with a tourbillon. What you are probably seeing is an attempt by a Chinese seller to pass a regular mechanical watch as a tourbillon-like watch.They are allowed to advertise in such a confusing and possibly ill-intention manner because the platform (aliexpress, amazon, ebay, etc.) lets them.There are no trusted brands who sell mechanical tourbillon watches for under $1000.And that’s why we created ERA.Is your tourbillon real? How is it so much less expensive?There is no such thing as a “real” or “fake” tourbillon. You either have the mastery to make it or you don’t.And most cannot - they are a feat of technology and creativity, both beautiful to look at and very difficult to make by hand. .That’s why tourbillon watches will always be pricey.But by breaking through the cartel and monopoly, we are able to get you a world-class tourbillon for on average 99% OFF what you would pay for another similar Tourbillon.Will I be forced to pay high VAT / Customs fees?We will work with our couriers to make sure you pay as low a price as possible when it arrives.What about servicing for my watch?That's a great question -- because your timepiece will eventually need to be serviced every 3-5 years, as it's a literal machine that has hundreds of pieces that click perfectly into place thousands of times a day.We're pleased to announce that we have secured agreements with some world-class horologists that have agreed to service our watches when they are needed.Just shoot us a message when you want your watch serviced, and we'll take care of the rest!Technical Questions?We consider ourselves watch nerds. We are very open to a healthy discussion regarding a myriad of topics like: movement, sensitivity, movement comparisons, tourbillon comparisons, price vs value, etc.We only ask that you backup your claims with data and logic, because whenever we can - we will as well.TO YOU. Customers, backers, and anyone else who takes the road less travelled. Who goes for what they want. Who doesn’t settle. Who thinks outside the system. Who understands progress is the universal tradition. Who believes anything is attainable.Thank YOU so much for making ERA possible.We couldn’t do it without YOU.For all comments/questions/inquiries, you can connect with us by emailing: support@eratimepieces.comFollow ERA on Social Media :https://www.facebook.com/eratourbillonshttps://www.instagram.com/eratourbillonshttps://twitter.com/eratimepieceshttps://www.youtube.com/channel/UChWiAM5ejDLr1o7L8Ur7x8whttps://www.snapchat.com/add/eratimepiecesReturnsWhile fewer than 2 out of 100 people who buy an ERA want to return their timepieces, we know that sometimes things aren’t a perfect fit for you based on your wrist size, climate, etc. Indiegogo is NOT an e-commerce platform however though and so if you want a refund, please note that it will be a full refund minus Indiegogo's fees which they've already taken AFTER the campaign ends.
 
Risks and challenges
We are aware our project is bold and complex: "making watches that have never been made before". It is true that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.
Firstly, we've been in the manufacturing and distribution business for years and so our knowledge and expertise of the production process is quite advanced. You can have complete confidence in our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. Our thousands of satisfied customers from the ERA Prometheus campaign is evidence of this.
Most products that fail on Crowdfunding fail because the sponsors were just hobby tinkerers who had no idea how different prototypes are from mass producing finished items. We don't have that problem. This is what we do day in and day out. There will be no surprises. Our years in the industry have let us build out a sophisticated distribution network so delivery will be timely and inexpensive.
In any case, if there is ANYTHING unexpected that happens, we promise to keep you informed right away, both during the campaign and afterwards.
Lastly, know that over the past few months we have shown our prototypes to many watch connoisseurs, journalists and influencers. We have gathered an incredible amount of valuable feedback and are finally ready to make millionaire watches a reality for everyone.

story:
Don’t worry about taking your insoles out and plugging them in to recharge every time after every use. Each MiMeng pair charges wirelessly and arrives with a charging pad in the box. Just take off your shoes and place them on your pad to charge. When you have to head out into the cold again, your insoles will be fully charged and ready to warm your feet.

MiMeng InSoles are made to fit into any of your shoes, from work and ski boots to dress and running shoes.

story:
AMAZON ALIVE
SCARVES THAT RAISE AWARENESS

GLOBAL VISION 
My name is Mariza Versiani Formaggini. I am a Brazilian photographer residing in Miami, Florida. My professional career includes, but is not limited to, the designing of furniture and objects, cultural productions and photography training. As a photographer, I received several international awards, including The Photographic Society of Great Britain, The International Federation of Photographic Art of the Americas, The Visual Press Awards USA, among others. It was with this trained eye for the arts that I observed and photographed the Amazon rainforest for this collection that will inaugurate my online store, In order to achieve my goals, I will need your collaboration!

COLLECTION
For this project, I have created a limited  high quality collection of scarves. They are made of pure silk and cashmere, but will be sold at competitive prices.
Through photography, each scarf tells a story of my experience in the Amazon Rainforest. Each signature design brings environmental awareness and a focus on cultural diversity.

YOUR SUPPORT 
I am raising funds to start an online store, hoping to reach a great amount of customers. My customers can raise awareness to preserve the Amazon Rainforest by wearing my scarves. But in order for this to be successful, I'll need: 
-    To hire a web designer to create a website for my product;
-    To develop an advertising and marketing campaign;
-    To print a limited amount of  scarves. 
The creation of the scarves collection is ready for printing and I will present it here on this campaign. Your support is very important to put this project into practice. 


• TOTAL INVESTMENT VALUE - US $ 4,800.00
