story:
We are an surf/ocean wear startup that is dedicated to active ocean goers making swimwear functional and sustainable while being sexy in action. Hakuna suits have a place to stash your essentials, no nip slips, no cheek leak, and no worries. Our suits are designed to allow you to be free to be you. 

Functional

The Pocket!

All Hakuna Wear bottoms have a built in 4x4.75" pocket (with a key loop) big enough to fit a granola bar, a hotel key, money, fin key, sunscreen, lip balm, a GoPro or anything else you can think of that you want to take with you out in the water. 
 

 

Hakuna Wear is designed for ACTION.

Just a few ocean sports that our suits are designed for.

 

Features

 

Sustainability

Ethically sourced, responsibly made. 

When we say no worries, we really mean it. You can rest easy knowing our suits are responsibly made with Glide Skin Geoprene and sustainable fabrics. All designed and produced in the heart of San Diego, California, USA.

 

Our Materials

Glide Skin Geoprene

Limestone neoprene has a high micro-cell structure. What this means is that limestone neoprene has a lot more air bubbles inside the rubber than other brands (over 30% to be exact), and is way less dense than oil-based neoprene.

Because of this micro-cell structure, limestone neoprene provides several distinct advantages to the functionality of wetsuits compared to the traditional oil-based neoprene:

  • It is more impermeable
  • It is lighter in weight
  • It is warmer
  • It is more durable
  • It is stretchy

Sustainable Fabrics

Swimwear fabric is sourced from fabrics that contain recycled materials such as plastic bottles. Our fabric is eco-friendly, chlorine resistant, and UPF 50+. Our pocket is made out of this material.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $15,000 dollars to launch the first line of Hakuna Wear swimsuits. We have already invested in hiring a product manager, sourcing fabric, and suit samples. Each design takes around $800 to launch, followed by production which is another $2,000. For our first four designs this will be around $12,000, plus we need to spend some money on marketing. With our stretch goal of $25,000 we will also be able to work on our next line, The Ohia Lehua Collection.

The Collection

When we reach our funding goal, we will be able to launch four pieces, three women's and one men's under The Rainbow Warrior Collection. You can see the sketches below!

We have already started production on our first suit, The Cloud 9, the one-piece Glide Skin Geoprene and mesh surf suit. The first ten backers get 50% off with a Super Stoked Bird special in the perks and get the first Hakuna Wear suit to solve all your active lifestyle swimsuit problems!

Below are the four levels of pricing for the Cloud 9 one-piece. The extras are offered in edition to some of our perks (The Nosebone GoPro mount and some other perks will be offered exclusively at our launch party, Saturday June 30th @ Culture in Solana Beach, check our instagram @hakunawear for your invite).

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out! 
  • Share our posts on Facebook and Instagram!
  • Connect us with opportunities for collaboration with influencers or media outlets.
  • Maybe you can't fund but you know a family member or close friend who can. Send this to every surfer, kiteboarder, paddleboarder, bodyboarder, ocean lover you know to gather interest!

 

TESTIMONIALS

Our Impact

The Olympics is about to change the future of surfing. It will bring surfing internationally to communities where previously women and men have not been allowed to surf or have limited resources to surf. Just one example is Cuba.

Part of our business plan is to offer a full coverage suit for women from different cultures in order to empower them to do the things that they have never been able to try before. We are also dedicated to sustainable products with swimwear made out of recycled fish nets or water bottles. 

By helping us to achieve this goal, together we will empower women and men everywhere to feel freedom in the water. Be free to be you.

MISSION STATEMENT

To empower people to let go of their worries in the ocean no matter what color, gender, religion, etc. you identify with. Hakuna Wear designs suits that allow you to be free to be you and celebrate the diversity of surfing.

Our Guarantee

We understand buying a suit online can be intimidating, but it doesn't have to be. We want all of our customers/backers to be stoked about their product and we really believe you will be. For that reason, all returns are free! Just send it back and we will refund you the price you paid for your product, along with a 50% off coupon to order something new in a different style once we release them online.  Along with that statement, if you wear your product and anything breaks (it shouldn't!), you can send it back in for free repairs.

 

Risks & Challenges

The first Hakuna Wear suits are made of Glide Skin Geoprene so it is not recommended for tanning on the beach in a tropical location, but it will keep you perfectly warm when the water or wind are just on the edge of comfortable. Our next line will be more tropically oriented. We keep raw edges on the back of the suit for comfort and although they are sealed they are more delicate than finished seams.

Production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. However we have an experienced product manager and production facility in San Diego. We are making the first round of suits whether they are funded or not, so rest assured you will get your product. We are very happy with the sample suits we have so far and we are confident they will be punctual.

The swimwear industry is competitive, but we hold a niche market that is growing. No other swimwear brand combines solutions to all of these active swimsuit downfalls. With a PhD, I don’t give up easily, we are prepared for the difficulty in getting into the market and have developed strategies, ask us for details on our business plan!

 

For sizing please see the chart below.

Sizes run big.

 

About Us

Hi, I am Jessica Boynton. I am a surfer, a fashion designer, and a PhD chemist.  Ever since I was little I have loved design, I designed and created every Halloween costume, and my prom dress. In graduate school I designed, tie-dyed and screen printed many dresses and outfits as an outlet for my creativity. When I started surfing 3 years ago and fell in love, ever since I have wanted to pursue designing functional, flattering, and sustainable swimwear and wetsuits to satisfy an inclusive need in the market to celebrate our diversity in the water. Hakuna Wear is a realization of that dream.

Risks & Challenges
The first Hakuna Wear suits are made of Glide Skin Geoprene so it is not recommended for tanning on the beach in a tropical location, but it will keep you perfectly warm when the water or wind are just on the edge of comfortable. Our next line will be more tropically oriented. We keep raw edges on the back of the suit for comfort and although they are sealed they are more delicate than finished seams.
Production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. However we have an experienced product manager and production facility in San Diego. We are making the first round of suits whether they are funded or not, so rest assured you will get your product. We are very happy with the sample suits we have so far and we are confident they will be punctual.
The swimwear industry is competitive, but we hold a niche market that is growing. No other swimwear brand combines solutions to all of these active swimsuit downfalls. With a PhD, I don’t give up easily, we are prepared for the difficulty in getting into the market and have developed strategies, ask us for details on our business plan!
 
For sizing please see the chart below.
Sizes run big.


 
About Us
Hi, I am Jessica Boynton. I am a surfer, a fashion designer, and a PhD chemist.  Ever since I was little I have loved design, I designed and created every Halloween costume, and my prom dress. In graduate school I designed, tie-dyed and screen printed many dresses and outfits as an outlet for my creativity. When I started surfing 3 years ago and fell in love, ever since I have wanted to pursue designing functional, flattering, and sustainable swimwear and wetsuits to satisfy an inclusive need in the market to celebrate our diversity in the water. Hakuna Wear is a realization of that dream.

story:
Hello and thank you for checking out my project! :)

About CONCEPTIQ

The idea behind Conceptiq is to create art through cool, unique messenger bags with removable covers.

Every outfit is different and must be completed by a personalized bag. With Conceptiq you can match your covers with your favorite T-shirt! The covers will be made in limited edition and this allows to create many pieces of original art. Simply put, you will be able to wear what other artists create or actually wear your own art and have the coolest bag on the street! One bag, multiple covers!

The bags are highly fashionable and made from eco-friendly materials. Conceptiq brand stands for sustainable business, being eco-responsible and aiming to support local community by creating jobs. All of the products will be produced locally and you will help unemployment women change their life.

Artists will have the opportunity to raise money and awareness for non-profits by dedicating a selected design to support a cause through sale of products.

Your contribution is an investment in the creative abilities of graphic, illustrator and photographic artists and in the production of artistic unique messenger bags.

The money that you donate to the project will go directly toward funding the manufacturing of the first Conceptiq bags. Your funds will cover materials, production and other necesary expenses.

I am planning to oficially launch the brand Conceptiq in August and I need to raise money to buy technology equipment and to promote the brand.

My goal is $12000 that will cover the cost of two industrial sewing machines, an industrial printing machine, a professional website, online store, materials, labour, marketing and advertising to get the word out about Conceptiq.

Any funding in excess of the original goal will be used for promotion and for line extensions.

Why Conceptiq? 

-          Be unique with Conceptiq

-          One bag, multiple covers

-          Original artwork by designers or by yourself :)

-          Mix creativity with sustainability

-          Support of local community

Be part of making a cool product see the light of day!

For the future I intend to expand the line of bags, school bags, beauty cases and anything else that my imagination can come up with.

You can invest in this project and become part of creating original artistic bags with multiple covers.

No contribution is too small. All donations will be greatly apreciated and go directly to the launch of the brand.

Please spread the word  and share this project on Facebook, Twitter and Google+. I would appreciate your support in any form :)

I would be happy to answer any questions you may have. Feel free to email me at conceptiq.bags@gmail.com

Thank you, thank you, thank you! You’re far too kind! :)

For your investment, you will get great rewards – check them on the right!

FAQ

1) Is shipping included? No. Please add $15 for shipping

2) How can I change the covers? The bag has a zipper on the back and you can easily replace the covers.

3) Can I send you my own design for a cover?  Of course. It needs to be a good quality design or picture. You can use Photoshop, Illustrator, etc

4) More details about the bag? The bag has two separate compartments-one for laptop and one for everything else(maybe your camera), three big useful pockets for things like your smartphone and other accesories and a key chain. It has a wide shoulder strap and velcro keeps the bag securely closed while offering quick access.

5) When it will arrive? You should receive your perks no later than early August.

story:
The Comfort Coat Caddy 

When you're shopping, traveling, or hiking, often it's on a cold or rainy day. But once the sun comes out, or you go inside the mall or airport, either you tolerate uncomfortable heat, or your jacket ends up bunched in your hand or slung over your arm. Wouldn't it be nice to be comfortable, AND have both hands free?

You can be Hands-Free with the C3! 

My name is Lisa Caramanis. The Comfort Coat Caddy (C3) is a new accessory of my own patented design that will make walking or traveling with a coat much easier. Simply attach your coat or jacket's collar tag to the C3's easy-to-fasten snap loop. Then, when you wear the C3 on your shoulders, you can slip your coat on and off as often as you want, without burdening your hands or arms. Your coat remains with you, but you don't have to trouble yourself at all! It's a functional, convenient, and comfortable accessory. Once you try the C3, soon you won't know how you ever got around without it!

The Impact

I have always loved helping others and making people feel good. I believe the C3 will be both convenient and helpful for a wide range of people. It's easy to use, causes no damage to garments, and can even help promote independence and responsibility in children. Here are some examples of how the Comfort Coat Caddy will be a handy accessory:

• Your children will never lose their jacket again, or ask "Mommy, will you carry my coat?"

• Joggers and hikers can prepare for any weather, and still enjoy complete freedom of movement.

• You'll always be ready for changing temperatures at charity walks or outdoor festivals.

• People suffering from injuries or limited range-of-motion will find the C3 makes life easier.

I currently am the sole proprietor of a business called Highly Recommended, an architectural enhancement firm which for 35 years has been enhancing the finest homes in New England. Now I want to use the experience and determination that made my business a success to bring the C3 to the masses.

What We Need and What You Get

$5000 will get me well on my way. By contributing to the C3, you'll not only be helping me achieve my dream of making the world a little more comfortable, you'll also be supporting worthwhile charities, because a part of the profit from each Comfort Coat Caddy sale will be donated to the March of Dimes or Camp Sunshine. Those who contribute larger amounts will get their own C3, with different options available according to the size of the contribution. Even if we do not reach our entire goal we will follow through and deliver all the Comfort Coat Caddies that are ordered. Thank you and God Bless You.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Tell your friends! Share my project on Facebook and Twitter! Be hands-free with the C3!

story:
My Experience

My name is Mindy Hardy and on behalf of HotNailArtPro, I want to tell you we  appreciate you stopping by our Indiegogo campaign page.  I have been a nail artist for over 20 years. I feel truly blessed to go to work every day to do something I
love.  I consider myself to be a nail artist and nails are my canvas.  My clients come to me with bizarre ideas and I make it my mission to ensure their vision comes to life.  Some of my favorite nail art that I have created are the Beyonce inspired nails, spinning bead nails, strawberry shortcake nails, and zombie nails, just to name a few. Over the past few years we have created a social media outlet for nail technicians
and artist called HotNailArtPro, a place where nail technicians can grow. Here
they can share ideas, ask questions and display their work.  We have a You Tube channel that provides instructive videos showing other nail technicians and artist tips and techniques that will help to advance their career.  You can also locate some of my famous nail art on Facebook and Instagram. I have been a guest host on Nail Talk Radio and had articles published in nail magazines.



 

I am currently teaching nail art workshops throughout Florida and
surrounding states to provide a more in depth hands on training experience. At
these workshops I teach nail technicians advanced nail art techniques that
they will not learn in school. Two of the most important aspects of successful
nail art are the tools used and the color choices.  want to help all nail
technicians take their nail art skills to another level, and ensure that they
have the capability and quality products to have a successful career in the
nail industry.

It is time to bring these quality products, at affordable prices, to the market
for all nail technicians and consumers. With your help this will be possible. I
truly appreciate all your support in getting my products into the consumer’s
hands. Don't forget to look at the amazing rewards, who doesn’t like to receive
great products at an even better price!


 

  Product

 Mindy Hardy has been in the nail industry for over 20 years. Throughout
her career she has found that many nail art brushes are not durable and they
tend to be expensive, especially when you are constantly replacing them. 
Many nail technicians have reached out to Mindy to ask her what brushes
she  uses as they have experienced the same problems.  Another
question that she often is asked is how she chooses her mesmerizing color
combinations in her designs. Since Mindy's greatest passion in the
nail industry is nail art, she has worked with her company to develop a nail
art brush line for nail technicians and a polish collection for both nail
technicians and clientele. Through their research and design they have made
sure to not only offer quality and durability but also competitive low pricing.

The beginning professional nail brush line consists of 3 brushes, a gel
brush, 3d acrylic brush, and striping brush. HotNailArtPro brushes
have been designed and tested for quality, durability and easy usage. In order
to guarantee these results, Mindy has been using the HotNailArtPro
brushes for over a year now and has had great results.

 

 

 

 


Mindy Hardy’s nail art is well known for its bright colors, bling, out of
the box creativity and trendiness. The best thing to compliment her style is
having lavish colors to work with. This is true for all nail art
technicians. HotNailArtPro has brought these qualities to
their polish line.  The initial polish line will consist of two
collections, the Drama Collection and the Angel Collection. The Drama
Collection consists of seven bright vibrant colors and the Angel Collection will
offer seven light pastel colors. The nail polish will be sold as individual
bottles as well.You can mix and match colors from both collections. After
the campaign is over we will contact you to get the specific colors you
selected. One of the coolest things regarding the nail polish collection
is the names of the polish. The polish colors have been named after people that
have been inspirational and supportive of Mindy Hardy throughout her life. The
next polish line to be developed and released will be named after some of
HotNailArtPro’s amazing supporters , so please make sure to look at the rewards
to find out how that can be you! The nail polish is free of harmful chemicals
and durable for natural and artificial nails. It has been tested to ensure it
is durability and with proper application the polish will withstand everyday
living without requiring multiple refill applications due to frequent chipping.
HotNailArtPro’s nail polish line will allow nail technicians and clientele the
ability to rock out their nails like Mindy Hardy by
purchasing HotNailArtPro's mesmerizing nail polish.



 

 


 What HotNailArtPro will do with the money?


We are in the first stages of production. In the images you
can reference what the products will look like. The nail polish colors were
created with the color swatches provided by the manufacture matching the color
as close as possible. The nail brushes will be embedded with a diamond cut
engraving reading HotNailArtPro. In order to cut the cost of the products for
you the consumer we have to increase our production. The money we receive will
help cut manufacturing cost and allow us to get our first orders from the
manufacturer. We will use $8,000 for manufacturing cost and $2,000
for marketing the launch of the products.

 

 

 Why you want to donate?

 This is an amazing opportunity that will allow you to purchase the products
at a discounted price before they go public, and it provides you with the
opportunity to be the one of the first to use the new HotNailArtPro line.

 Another bonus is the awesome rewards we have to offer and who
doesn't love rewards?

Team HotNailArtPro thanks you for your support.

 What HotNailArtPro will do with the money?
 
We are in the first stages of production. In the images youcan reference what the products will look like. The nail polish colors werecreated with the color swatches provided by the manufacture matching the coloras close as possible. The nail brushes will be embedded with a diamond cutengraving reading HotNailArtPro. In order to cut the cost of the products foryou the consumer we have to increase our production. The money we receive willhelp cut manufacturing cost and allow us to get our first orders from themanufacturer. We will use $8,000 for manufacturing cost and $2,000for marketing the launch of the products.
 
 

 Why you want to donate?
 This is an amazing opportunity that will allow you to purchase the productsat a discounted price before they go public, and it provides you with theopportunity to be the one of the first to use the new HotNailArtPro line.
 Another bonus is the awesome rewards we have to offer and whodoesn't love rewards?
Team HotNailArtPro thanks you for your support.

story:
REVIVAL Style is a premium apparel line that blends high style with high social impact. It’s not an ordinary fashion start-up or traditional nonprofit - it’s a social enterprise, which means REVIVAL Style will implement profitable business strategy, but it will be driven first and foremost by a social mission. 


How did the idea for REVIVAL Style develop? We noticed the increasing loss of quality in the clothing we buy and the amount of underemployed talent both overseas and here in North America. At the same time, we noticed that consumers today are becoming more conscious and want to purchase products they know and trust are “good” for them, “good” for the earth, and “good” for the people who made them. The problem however, is that when it comes to apparel, there are not a lot of stylish, ethically-sourced options. But, REVIVAL Style is going to change that by proving that looking good and doing good don’t have to be mutually exclusive!


What exactly is REVIVAL Style? REVIVAL Style is a premium apparel line designed to appeal to the globetrotting fashionista looking to add unique pieces to her wardrobe. The line will include beautifully embellished apparel and accessories that balance stylish modern silhouettes with the ornate beauty of traditional Indian craftsmanship.


Why is there a need for REVIVAL Style? Female Indian artisans are not earning enough to support themselves or their children because of the disconnect between traditional Indian craft and the needs of a modern-day consumer. As a social enterprise, REVIVAL Style, will preserve Indian craft and highlight the talent of these women. REVIVAL Style will help artisans make fair wages doing something they love by fusing Indian craft skill with contemporary design, enabling them to use their strength to find a sustainable income source and uplift themselves and their families out of poverty. In addition, REVIVAL Style will reinvest in the artisans' communities through education programs.


The majority of the garment construction will take place in the US, and so, REVIVAL Style will also create a positive social impact here by helping to revive the Garment District in New York City!


Where can you buy REVIVAL Style apparel and accessories? REVIVAL Style will leverage a distribution channel that incorporates the best of various e-commerce strategies, as well as intimate shopping parties and will potentially be featured in local NY boutiques. Marketing efforts will focus primarily on sharing uplifting & inspiring stories through an integrated social media campaign.


Who benefits from REVIVAL Style?  REVIVAL Style has three main stakeholder groups and will create a positive social impact for each group by economically reviving Indian artisans, as well as the American garment sector, and ultimately, our customers, who will feel good because of the stylish and ethical purchases they’ve made. 


Through REVIVAL Style, we’re changing the conversation from economic development to economic empowerment by focusing our story on the talent of female artisans. 


What’s Next: Allie and Neetu are headed to India to begin production of the debut capsule collection! Become a part of the movement, YOU can help REVIVAL Style create a global (and local) social impact - PLEDGE TODAY!

 

MEET THE TEAM:

Co-Founders:

Neetu Sidhu:  a graduate student studying Social Entrepreneurship through NYU’s Gallatin School of Individualized Study. Neetu has marketing, communications, business development and project management expertise from her years working with SMART Technologies and Karo Design.  Recently, Neetu helped launch Haden, a NYC-based clothing line, working directly with the designer on all aspects of the product lifecycle.


Allie Taylor: an MBA candidate at NYU Stern, focused on Social Innovation and Impact, Global Business, and Luxury Marketing.  Allie has expertise in product development and merchandising, as well as in fundraising and strategic partnership development from her time working in the fashion retail industry with The Limited and Target, and in the nonprofit sector with KaBOOM!.   This summer, Allie was selected as a SIIF Fellow, and worked with Indego Africa.


A special thanks to: Thulasi Sivalingam, our fantastic intern; Daniel Alicea, Sasha Fiser-Miller, and Simon, our design and production support in the US; and Alba Collective, Mother Earth, and Addie Coslett, our nonprofit partners and support in India.


And thank you to all of our friends and family who’ve cheered us on as we pursue our passion to change the world!

Technologies and Karo Design.  Recently,
Neetu helped launch Haden, a NYC-based clothing line, working directly with the
designer on all aspects of the product lifecycle.
Allie Taylor: an MBA candidate at NYU Stern, focused
on Social Innovation and Impact, Global Business, and Luxury Marketing.  Allie has expertise in product development
and merchandising, as well as in fundraising and strategic partnership
development from her time working in the fashion retail industry with The
Limited and Target, and in the nonprofit sector with KaBOOM!.   This summer, Allie was selected as a SIIF Fellow,
and worked with Indego Africa. 
A special thanks
to: Thulasi Sivalingam, our fantastic intern; Daniel Alicea, Sasha
Fiser-Miller, and Simon, our design and production support in the US; and Alba
Collective, Mother Earth, and Addie Coslett, our nonprofit partners and support
in India.
And thank you to
all of our friends and family who’ve cheered us on as we pursue our passion to
change the world!

story:
Once upon a time, 2 brothers decided that they didn't want to buy the same sunglasses that everyone was wearing....they wanted something different.

 

Those brothers are here to launch their brand of bamboo polarized sunglasses called tmbr. (pronounced TIMBER). We have perfected the arms of sunglasses made from bamboo, and combined that with our own design specifications, similar to the ever-so-popular wayfarer style sunglasses, and created a perfect combination of Eco-friendly yet classic pair of sunglasses.

 
 

 

When you wear something, you are making a statement about who you are and what you represent. We want that statement you make to be amazing. We want people to see you as the pioneer, trailblazer and the one-of-a-kind person that you truly are. When you choose a pair of shades, we see that choice as making a statement to the world without ever having to say a word. tmbr. is about making statements!

 
 

It's no secret...we want you to know everything about our sunglasses so you know exactly what you are pledging for. We have dedicated our time to picking the highest quality materials from the lenses to the bamboo.

  • Lenses : The tmbr. polarized lenses enhance visual contrast, improve clarity, make colors more vibrant and cause less stress on the eye. Anti-reflective coating reduces the effects of bounce-back glare and reflective surfaces, while an oleophobic coating repels water, dust, sweat and fingerprints. In short, the lenses improve your vision in your Car, on Water, on Snow and in the Air.

 

  • Bamboo Temple : The temples of the sunglasses are made from strands of bamboo that have been heated and compressed together. The temples for each pair are cut from single blocks of bamboo and are cut in pairs so that each side will match in size and length. The temples are then sanded, coated or stained and polished all by hand. No two pairs of tmbr. sunglasses are exactly alike.

  • Acetate Frames : The frames of the sunglasses are made from high-quality acetate. It isn't the same cheap plastic that you get when you buy a pair of sunglasses from a truck stop. It is the same product that is used to make the high-end designer frames. The frames are formed through an injection molding process and then sanded, coated and polished all by hand. Each and every pair has been handled with delicate care all the way through production.

 

 

  • Hinges : The hinges on tmbr. sunglasses are a stainless steel flex hinge that allows the sunglasses to easily slide on and off your face.The flexible hinge allows for more movement which relieves any pressure that would be put on the side of the head.

 

 
 

The Spooner Brothers will be able to start their first large production of tmbr. sunglasses. The molds are ready to start making the high quality acetate frames. We will be able to purchase the acetate and coloring along with all of the bamboo needed to make the temples. 

 
 
 
 

In order to help us reach our goal on Indiegogo we are offering all of our current products as perks. These wood products will be available again on our website until our Indiegogo campaign is completed. Below are some brief descriptions of the products that we have offered up for pledge amounts.

 Phone Stand – This little bamboo phone stand is perfect to rest whatever phone you may have on it. It is made from two identical interlocking pieces. It is great when you are charging your phone, watching a movie or just letting it rest for a bit.

 Tablet Stand - A bamboo tablet stand made of two interlocking pieces that easily break down for transportation. It works perfect for a kitchen, on a desk, for a presentation or whenever you you want to prop up your tablet. It is extremely durable and comes engraved with the tmbr. logo.

iPhone Case - One of our top sellers. An all natural wood phone case. The perfect blend between technology and nature. This case comes in two parts that slide together for a snug and comfortable fit onto your iPhone. We have a huge variety of options. We offer cases that will work for the iPhone 4, 4S and even the new iPhone 5. We are offering it at a lower price for Indiegogo, just to help us reach our goal.

iPhone 4 and 4S Case Options:

  • Walnut

  • Raw Bamboo

  • Rosewood

  • Carbonized Bamboo

 iPhone 5 Case Options:

  • Walnut with Spliced Maple

  • Spliced Bamboo

  • Rosewood

  • Raw Bamboo

  • Walnut

  • Carbonized Bamboo

iPad Case – A solid wood case that makes your iPad tough and durable. Just like the phone case, it comes in two separate pieces that slide over the iPad and interlock. The case is available for the iPad 2 and 3.

 iPad Case Options:

  • Rosewood

  • Bamboo

 tmbr. Sunglasses – In case you haven’t heard us talk about them enough, we also have some awesome bamboo polarized sunglasses to give away with your pledge.

 tmbr. Sunglass Options

  • Tortoise with Raw Bamboo

  • Tortoise with Dark Bamboo

  • Matte Black with Raw Bamboo

  • Matte Black with Dark Bamboo

  • Matte White with Raw Bamboo

  • Matte White with Dark Bamboo

  • Matte Gray with Raw Bamboo

  • Matte Gray with Dark Bamboo

  • Matte Teal with Raw Bamboo

  • Matte Teal with Dark Bamboo

Thanks for your support and checking out our project! We hope you like what you saw and support us with your pledge! If you like what you saw, please tell your Family, Friends, Neighbors and any Random Stranger you see!!

For More Pics of tmbr. sunglasses and pledges please check here! http://tmbrs.com/indiegogo

story:
CAMPAIGN UPDATE (13-Mar-14)

Thank you to our supporters! We will send you an email soon about delivery of Perks.
LESSON LEARNED: PITCHING TICK GAITERS DURING THE WORST WINTER IN 50 YEARS IS LIKE SELLING ICE ON THE NORTH POLE!  However, awareness of tick-borne disease in growing and with it the success of Lymeez. We look forward to a successful spring season!

__________________________________________________________________

CAMPAIGN UPDATE (14-Jan-14)

"nifty innovation"


__________________________________________________________________

Grab-and-go, long-lasting, lightweight tick-repelling gaiters. Make tick bite protection an easy habit.

The need for Lymeez tick gaiters

Ticks suck. Really they actually do. Ticks lurk in the grass, brush, dunes, golf courses and even your backyard—just waiting to suck your blood. But the really scary thing is how sick they can make you—sometimes for life and sometimes they kill you. You know how the train that hits you is the one you don't see? Here's how big some of the most deadly ticks are:

                          .  ⬅ size of blacklegged (deer) tick nymph

No kidding. 

And the trends are not looking good. If the growth rates of tick-borne diseases continue unabated, a decade from now over 10,000,000 Americans will have contracted a tick-borne disease.

We at Lymeez dislike ticks so much we studied the heck out of them and created a grab-and-go piece of long-lasting tick-repelling outerwear that offers excellent protection. We want you and your family to Play More, Worry Less!™ 

So, what do we know about ticks that helped us create this product? Ticks DO NOT FLY. They DO NOT JUMP. They wait in grass and brush questing and hoping—if ticks can be said to hope—for a warm-blooded victim. Then they climb up onto them.

A University of Rhode Island study showed that by far—like 20x more effective than other personal protection strategies—the most effective tick bite prevention strategy is to intercept ticks with an ixodicide (tick repellent) as they begin their climb at your lower leg (or foot).

Ticks are voraciously hungry when they come out in the spring and then again in the fall for their final meal before they quiet down for winter. Although, in truth, ticks are out feeding in fairly large numbers any day over 35 degrees, including winter.

How Lymeez tick gaiters work

Lymeez are lightweight gaiters that pull over pant legs or onto bare legs. Snug cuffs at each end help keep the ticks out but the real ammunition is that each fiber of Lymeez is infused with millions of high-tech tick-repelling microcapsules.

Lymeez are Active Release™. As you walk, normal abrasion bursts some of the microcapsules releasing tick-sickening permethrin. Skintex MRIII, an EPA-registered ixodicidal technology is the active ingredient on each pair of Lymeez. It is proven technology, used worldwide in many applications. Lymeez are made in Italy and treated in the USA.

Breathable mesh construction for function and comfort 

What's permethrin? It's the active ingredient in the microcapsules. Permethrin is a man-made version of pyrethrum, a naturally occurring insecticide from the chrysanthemum flower. The EPA (2005) has found no risk to wearers of permethrin-treated garments at approved levels. According to the World Health Organization, “permethrin has been extensively tested and is still considered the [ixodicide] of choice for clothing treatment.” (Ingested permethrin, can however be dangerous to fish and cats—so don’t put our gaiters in your fish tank or make cat toys out of them!)

Long-lasting and odorless. Lymeez useful life depends on how much you use them. Lymeez work with Active Release™ microcapsules. Ixodicide is only released when Lymeez are used. In tests done 5 years later on treated unworn clothing effectiveness was still 100%. Effectiveness lasts through 25 warm water washes.

Other tick fighting solutions. Well, the CDC recommends tucking your pants into your socks. Not a great look. And ticks still climb—they have an instinct to climb—right over those socks, all the way up to your lovely carbon dioxide-exhaling head.

DEET Spray. Multiple studies have shown permethrin to be more effective than DEET for preventing tick bites and unlike DEET microencapsulated permethrin is odorless and orders of magnitude less absorbable by your skin—a nice feature.

Specially Treated clothing. These require wardrobe planning, are not always on your body when you need them, and are a chore to separate from regular clothing in the wash, per the EPA instructions. Treated shorts and shirts, because they are loose-fitting and allow ticks to crawl on skin underneath do not always force the ticks to contact the ixodicide. From the tick's perspective it is like a mile away.Lymeez, in contrast, are in their face as soon as they start their climb.

We need your help

2013 was our first year selling Lymeez tick gaiters (after a previous year of seemingly endless designs and prototypes). We want to expand production for a robust spring run in order to make tick bite prevention available to many more people this spring when the ticks come out starving. Your support will allow us to expand into many retail markets—gardening, outdoor, feed & pet, drug, golf, hiking, camping & resort. 

New colors

We are currently working with our supplier in Italy to decide on new colors for spring. Here are our current samples:

* Note: The final set of new spring colors may be greater or lesser than the seven colors shown above. And, the actual colors may differ. We have very stringent requirements for yarn properties (strength, flexibility and overall look & feel).

We will post updated pics of color samples during the project. We will be looking forward to your feedback during this process. We value your input. It is critical that we go to market in the spring with the right mix of colors.

Lymeez packaging

Lymeez are individually packaged in a sealed in a hanging bag:

While neither Lymeez LLC or any other company can guarantee complete protection from tick bites, Lymeez tick gaiters are a smart & easy deterrent. Lymeez are designed to be hung by the door, kept in the golf bag, backpack, garden bag—and easy enough for kids to put on when heading out to play. Play More, Worry Less!™ 

Lymeez® tick gaiters are a patent-pending product of Lymeez LLC.

Risks and challenges

The major hurdles have been overcome, the design specs have been met, and we've had a good first run. Awareness is growing fast. One of the biggest challenges any manufacturer has is quality. Through our two years of product design and prototypes, we've lived through issues, resolved issues and know how be on top of issues for the next run. We will keep you apprised of the process as we manufacture our Spring 2014 Lymeez tick gaiters. We know what markets to target and how to reach them. We have good relationships with our suppliers and do not anticipate any problems with spring production.

CAMPAIGN UPDATE (21-Jan-14)

We've just received a new "ALL BLACK" sample from Italy:

story:
Show the world your Faith in God with our Cross or Crucifix and keep what's close to your heart with you at all times.

Valor Jewelry will provide revolutionary, incredibly durable, metal Crosses and Crucifixes with a hidden memory chamber to place a locket of your loved ones hair, soil from your homeland or even ashes of a loved one.

The idea came about as Marine veteran Chris Gillingham, one of the co-founders, kept breaking his crucifix that he wears religiously everyday. He also was hearing and seeing many of his fellow service members complaining about the same thing. When any service member is deployed, often times their cross or crucifix is their lifeline to loved ones and provides strength and comfort.

With previous manufacturing experience, We thought we should be able to manufacture something that is of the highest quality while also preserving the legacy of a loved one.

Why Your Help is So Important

The most expensive part of manufacturing our Cross & Crucifix is having the molds manufactured. It takes several molds to make the various sizes of the mens and womens cross and crucifix. 

To break it down in general terms, the process involves:
- Engineering of the product (which we already have completed via CAD design and 3d printing prototypes.)
- Manufacturing of the molds by the tool shop. We need a mold for each design and size that we offer.
- Then off to manufacturing by Metal Injection Molding (MIM).

- Metal Injection Molding which is a relatively new manufacturing process that produces exceptionally high quality and very durable product.


If you would like to learn more about (MIM) you can follow the below link. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metal_injection_m...

- Packaging design is very important to us as well. We needed to design packaging that was worthy of such a high quality product as our Cross and Crucifix. Plus we wanted something durable for the men and women deployed, so that it arrives in perfect condition. Were going to leave it as a surprise but we think you will love the packaging so much you won't be throwing it away.

        

ENOUGH OF US, NOW FOR YOU:
- We will have available the Cross and Crucifix in three sizes for men and three smaller sizes for women. You will have the option to have your Cross engraved with up to 11 characters across and up to 22 characters down. We will also have an option to have your loved ones birthstone inlaid into the center of the Cross if you prefer. On the Aluminum version we will offer the option of having your Cross or Crucifix anodized in various colors, such as desert tan, olive drab, black, and blue or pink for the new arrival to your family. We are also planing on many other products in the near future too.
- We are also excited to offer a special service to our service men and women that are on deployment this moment. We will have your Cross or Crucifix blessed by your choice of denomination and include a card which indicates who blessed on the date and the location. That way when you receive your Cross or Crucifix it's already been blessed and ready to be worn.


Why Your So Important to the Future of Valor Jewelry...

Your contribution is so important to us! Whether it's a locket of their loved ones hair, soil from their homeland or even ashes of a loved one, We KNOW so many service members and their family members would appreciate this Cross and Crucifix. 

Our Challenges

One challenge we face is the design of the Crucifix. Trying to generate a mesh 3d CAD design for the tool shop that they can use for the manufacturing of the mold. We want the detail to be perfect. The biggest challenge we face is the costs of the molds. We looked into other manufacturing processes that may have been more cost effective but wouldn't produce the high quality we wanted to achieve. Metal injection molding is BY FAR the best route for us to go. Especially because we are using the highest grade stainless steel and aircraft grade aluminum available. The cross and crucifix necklaces will be of the highest quality and virtually indestructible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that you may not be financially able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Ask your friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Don't forget your FaceBook friends, Please share this with them and ask them to share it with their friends. You can use the sharing tools right here on indiegogo.

We here at Valor Jewelry thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

On the Aluminum version we will offer the option of having your Cross or Crucifix anodized in various colors, such as desert tan, olive drab, black, and blue or pink for the new arrival to your family. We are also planing on many other products in the near future too.- We are also excited to offer a special service to our service men and women that are on deployment this moment. We will have your Cross or Crucifix blessed by your choice of denomination and include a card which indicates who blessed on the date and the location. That way when you receive your Cross or Crucifix it's already been blessed and ready to be worn.


  Why Your So Important to the Future of Valor Jewelry... Your contribution is so important to us! Whether it's a locket of their loved ones hair, soil from their homeland or even ashes of a loved one, We KNOW so many service members and their family members would appreciate this Cross and Crucifix. 
    Our Challenges One challenge we face is the design of the Crucifix. Trying to generate a mesh 3d CAD design for the tool shop that they can use for the manufacturing of the mold. We want the detail to be perfect. The biggest challenge we face is the costs of the molds. We looked into other manufacturing processes that may have been more cost effective but wouldn't produce the high quality we wanted to achieve. Metal injection molding is BY FAR the best route for us to go. Especially because we are using the highest grade stainless steel and aircraft grade aluminum available. The cross and crucifix necklaces will be of the highest quality and virtually indestructible. 
    Other Ways You Can Help We understand that you may not be financially able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Ask your friends and family to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Don't forget your FaceBook friends, Please share this with them and ask them to share it with their friends. You can use the sharing tools right here on indiegogo.   We here at Valor Jewelry thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

story:
Omnia was created to become a new standard in the capsule wardrobe. It is the most simple and comfortable solution for your daily activity:

  Omnia - unique way to change your style during a day.



Omnia is the revolutionary convertible dress consists of the tank dress and the mantle (mantle part).Combining the tank dress and the mantle part, you can create more than 100 dresses styles. 

 The mantle is divided into two parts by a zipper, and each of these parts can be mounted to any point of the tank dress by special fixed magnets.


Also you can choose Short or Long version of Omnia. We recommend Short length for height from 155 to 173 cm, and Long length from 174 to 190 cm height ladies.




The most affordable prices!    

      Amazing discounts for early supporters. By selling directly to you online, we eliminate all excess spending. You can become Omnia's owner with 50% discount.

Indiegogo has provided us with a wonderful platform to connect with backers like yourself. Since we’re manufacturing the product and delivering it directly to you, we can cut out all excess costs and give you the best product and the most affordable price possible. Also we made special retailers packs. 60% discount for early supporters. So, if you want to work with us you can start it here. Shipping will be started from Ukraine for all countries.


 We are planning to start production at the manufactory with 20 years' experience in apparel.

Omniadress now on IndieGoGo

The original campaign ended in July 2016. You can still get here the product for a significant discount before the market launch. The product is under mass production stage and will be shipped very soon! You can find more details in "Timeline" and in project updates.



Omnia dress is a new project of high-experienced team of AGE brand. We have more than 5 years of accessories and apparel manufacturing experience, so rest assured this project is not an "experiment". Our U.S. legal entity is situated in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and our manufactory is in Odessa, Ukraine. 

Our team have successfully finished two kickstarter campaings. All backers have received rewards and making sure of the quality of our products.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/251445438/phonster-is-the-greatest-holster-for-your-essentia/

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/251445438/american-heritage-premium-accessories-only-for-rea
   Last few words:

 Nowadays, it's very popular trend to optimize your life and minimize the daily worries. In our opinion apparel also requires serious optimization.We present ourself not only as the fashion brand. The mission of our company is to help ladies optimize their lifestyle, make it more comfortable and easy. Translated from the Latin, the Omnia means "everything", in the literal sense. This is the best characteristic for our dress. The logo in the form of water drop means the fact that water, as well as our dress, takes many forms, adapting to the external conditions. Our design is as simply as iphone curves. But in both things you will find dozen features, because less is more.                        

                                   Omnia - your magic dress!

Risks and challenges

Our manufactory has already produced 2 small runs of our Omnia dress, and has done significant testing. All of our lucky friends and family that have tried Omnia dresses agree that Omnia is the most simple and comfortable solution for daily activity. However, at full load we have ability to produce 500 Omnia dresses in month. You know, from small beginnings come big endings, that's why we need only 60 pre-orders from Kickstarter to start a production, because we have already received 40 pre-orders before Kickstarter campaign starts. So, please, join us in our journey. This amazing product needs your help! We have manufacturing ready, and will be able to ship within 60-90 days of successful project funding. Our team has more than 5 years of accessories and apparel manufacturing experience for AGE brand ( http://age.com.ua), so rest assured this project is not an "experiment". Also we have two successful KS-campaigns and hope this will be third)) 
Our previous campaigns : 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/251445438/american-heritage-premium-accessories-only-for-rea 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/251445438/phonster-is-the-greatest-holster-for-your-essentia/description 
Having said that, we can't always control everything life throws at us and there are always uncertainties and risks for delay in any manufacturing process. Throughout the duration of the project - we will be in contact with you, frequently updating you in every detail, every step of the way!

story:
Our Motto: Functional Fashion

The idea was simple.

Traditional keyrings were boring and keychains were bulky. Yet new generation keyholders only focused on functionality, but overlooked aesthetics. Designers came up with a truckload of metallic components that no fashionable man or stylish woman would even think of touching and there were no other options.

Well, the game is over.

Now you can have a minimalistic, stylish fashion accessory to carry your keys:


 
10 different designs to choose from, for all kinds of fashion styles.

Pick your style and feed your soul!

 

“Whoever said that money can’t buy happiness, simply didn’t know where to go shopping.”

- Bo Derek


 

 

 

Many months passed by until we finally had the industrial design for the ultimate keyholder in ten different styles. We are proud to present you with a truly ingenious product at such an affordable price.

#getitbeforeitbecomesmainstream

 

“Fashion is not necessarily about labels. It’s not about brands. It’s about something else that comes from within you.”

- Ralph Lauren

 

Medical grade hook and loop fasteners are used in Key2Wallet™.

For each Key2Wallet, you will receive one set of hook buttons (ten pieces) for your keys. You may also attach them to your own USB stick or money clip, which you can carry along on your Key2Wallet.

*Are the hook and loop fasteners strong and durable enough?

Yes! We have selected "built to last" materials. As shown in our promotional videos the hook and loop system is more strong and durable than needed. We say this, because we have been using the final prototypes for the past 3 months ourselves and we have not experienced any problems regarding this issue at all.

 

Key2Wallet™ transforms your clunky heavy keychain into a beautiful, flat and credit card sized fashion accessory, which naturally fits into your wallet.

Yes, in your wallet, but not only in your wallet.

All Key2Wallet models are designed in exactly the same size as a credit card. So:

-  It fits anywhere your credit card would fit  -

This feature also makes it possible to use Key2Wallet as a keyholder for your spare keys in your wallet.

Money clips, USB sticks and even car keys can be attached to your K2W. However, please keep in mind that K2W may not fit in your wallet if you attach those items, depending on the size of your personal wallet.

 

Key2Wallet™ features soft and tumbled premium leather which builds its character with use.

The colors of the leather that we use have been picked from the 2017 fashion catalog, so you will catch the colors of the next season just in time!

Please note that the actual color of the leather may vary slightly from the images shown due to the nature of leather and your monitor/screen color settings.

Additional Insider Information: The leather we have picked is currently also being used by the world's biggest smart phone company, for their officially certified leather cases.

 

None of the keys attached to your Key2Wallet™ touch each other; therefore, we call it "naturally silent". No more awkward looks during conferences, in theaters or in business meetings because of the jingling of your pocket.

Instead, you can put your Key2Wallet out on the table and enjoy the compliments.

- A stylish everyday carry item that you never need to hide again  -

 

Fashion style is like a character sketch that reflects a personality, inspired by a fashion theme.
Your style may be classic, bohem, glamorous or punk, no problem. Key2Wallet is presented in 10 different designs for all kinds of fashion styles.

*How do I choose the Key2Wallet style/model I would like to get?

Just select the perk you would like to have and you will see the list of the available models.

 

Support our project, and in return you will receive the Key2Wallet™, exactly as described and on time.

 

We are keeping it as simple as possible: We are not going to offer you no-name USB sticks, ordinary bottle openers or any made-up multi-tools that you will probably never use in your life. 

 

- A product as described. Nothing more, nothing less.  -

 

 

How do I choose the Key2Wallet style/model I would like to get?

Thanks to Indiegogo's new feature you can now choose the model/style/color of the product you would like to back, immediately after you choose the perk you would like to get. No more surveys or email conversations are needed!

Just select the perk you would like to have and you will see the list of the available models.

How many keys can I attach to my K2W?

Up to four regular/standard door keys can be attached to your K2W using the hook and loop buttons. K2W provides a credit sized area of hook and loop use, so it's up to you how to arrange the keys/things you would like to carry on your K2W.

Can I attach my car keys, larger keys, or my USB stick to my K2W?

Yes! Car keys, USB sticks and even money clips can be attached to your K2W. However, please keep in mind that K2W may not fit in your wallet if you attach those items, depending on the size of your personal wallet.

Can I attach my money clip to my K2W?

Definitely! You can transform your money clip in a beautiful fashion accessory by attaching it to your K2W using the hook and loop buttons.

What kind of leather is used in the production of K2W?

K2W features soft, semi-aniline, natural cow Nappa leather, which builds character with use and ages over time into a vintage article. However, the natural scratches/color changes may also be rubbed off easily with the help of a fingertip; it's up to you!

The leather we picked is ecologically and chemically verified and is currently also being used by the world's biggest smart phone company for their officially certified leather cases.

Are the hook and loop fasteners strong and durable enough?

Yes! We have selected "built to last" materials. As shown in our promotional videos the hook and loop system is more strong and durable than needed. We say this, because we have been using the final prototypes for the past 3 months ourselves and we have not experienced any problems regarding this issue at all.

Will the hook and loop fasteners cause problems by sticking to other things?

No, the medical grade loop side is on the back of your K2W. It feels like ordinary linen fabric, so it will not stick to other unwanted surfaces. The other side, the automotive-industry-proven round hook side will be attached to your keys. No sticky parts remain on the open surfaces.  

Is worldwide shipping really free?

Yes, definitely! We do not want you to have cold feet regarding shipping fees so all the prices of the perks include WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING via REGISTERED AIR MAIL with a TRACKING NUMBER.

You are located in Istanbul. That's a long distance from the US. The shipping is also free to the US, right?

Yes, absolutely. That was the first thing we had in mind when we dealt with the Express Courier Services.

Will any packagings be available for K2W?

Yes! Your K2W will arrive with a beautiful and fashionable package design, which you will certainly delighted with. The package design will also be featured as an update here, once the campaign becomes successful.

Is gift wrapping possible?

We are planning on a very beautiful and fashionable package design. Therefore we will not be offering any additional gift wrapping at the moment.

What is the refund policy?

Indiegogo's refund policy rules apply. You can request a refund while the campaign is in progress. If the campaign has ended or contributions have already been transferred to the campaign owner or you have received your reward, contributions cannot be refunded.

What is the exchange or return policy?

If the product you receive has a manufacturing defect, we will send you a new product under the warranty.

What is the warranty policy?

K2W has a two-year warranty against manufacturing related defects. If you have any warranty issues with your K2W during this time, we will repair or replace it at our discretion. This warranty does not cover normal wear or incidental damage.

Why crowdfunding?

We have decided to ask for your help in order to reach out to an organic customer base who is into design oriented fashion products and to finance the first production batch.

What are the challenges?​

Our team has years of experience behind them in design, manufacturing, foreign trade and business management. We are taking confident steps at every stage of our project. Our selected materials, production methods and local manufacturers will be exactly the same in the serial production as in the prototyping process. With our proactive and hands-on approach we will ensure that we overcome every possible difficulty in the process.

I would like to distribute Key2Wallet in my country or resell it in my retail/online store. How should I do this?

Thank you for your interest in K2W. Please contact us on sales@key2wallet.com

I still have a question, can you help further?

Of course! Please send us an email at support@key2wallet.com

story:
Merino Runners - THE IDEA

 

SURVEY

Surveys will be send out with backerkit where you can choose your color and your size. You will receive the survey two weeks after sending your pledge. We guarantee that you will receive the pledge reward you chose.
 
 

WE STARTED SHIPPING!


 

Merino Runners - THE STORY

Merino Runners are the latest innovation from GIESSWEIN, based in the Austrian Alps between Salzburg and Innsbruck. They are made of a Merino Wool 3D Stretch - an unique fabric invented by GIESSWEIN - and a lightweight EVA Sole. The changeable footbed is bio based and extra soft. Whether you use the Merino Runners for Work, Travel, Shopping or your daily outdoor adventures - we guarantee a stylish no-sweat feeling all day long and an extra comfortable and lightweight experience.

 

 

 

You love stylish sneakers, but hate synthetic materials, heavy weighted designs, an uncomfortable fit and sweaty feet? The GIESSWEIN Merino Runners are made from natural Materials: pure merino wool from happy sheep around your foot and a bio-based footbed. Our unique Merino Wool 3D stretch regulates the temperature in the shoe (cools down in the summer and warms up in the winter) and guarantees a perfectly no-sweat-no-smell shoe experience.

 

THE COLOR RANGE

 

Whether you‘ll like to wear your GIESSWEIN Merino Runners at work or start a daily adventure outside with them - you‘ll love the perfect fit and the ultra lightweight design of our shoes. You can wear them all day long - even without socks - and we guarantee a no-smell experience because of our temperature-regulating Merino Wool 3D Stretch!

 

AMAZING FEATURES

 

WEARABLE WITHOUT SOCKS

The small air chambers in our wool regulate the temperature in the shoe. So we have a cool down experience in the hot summer months and a warm up experience in the cold winter months. The collection of our wool is cruelty free (e.g. mulesing) and we take care of the animals by applying strict standards for our merino yarn suppliers.

 

BIO BASED FOOTBED

Our changeable footbed is made from an organic eco ortholite® formulation which includes natural, plant-based castor bean oil - that makes the footbed really soft and comfortable. In addition, the footbed is a renewable resource which reduces the shoe‘s ecological footprint. 

THE RUNNER SOLE

EVA is the lightest material we could find on our beautiful planet. Extra soft, smooth and a cushioning effect - that makes our soles strongly unique and very comfortable for city trips!

 

MERINO RUNNERS - SIZING

 

HOW TO MEASURE YOUR SIZE: Measure STRAIGHT from the first point of your biggest toe to the last point of your heel (for example: 26cm). After that, add 1,5cm (26 + 1,5 = 27,5cm). So, the right size for your order is 27,5cm. That means: Women US 9 / UK 7,5 / EU 41 / CM 27,5. MEN US 8,5 / UK 7,5 / EU 41 / CM 27,5. Sizes and colors will be requested in a survey sent after the campaign.

 

SHIPPING

FREE SHIPPING FOR ALL INTERNATIONAL ORDERS!

Giesswein takes care of all dutys and taxes. We guarantee no shipping costs on all orders worldwide.

 

RETURNS

We understand mistakes with sizing will be made and we will do our best to exchange any pair of Merino Runners in good faith that you send back to us. Because our margins are really tight you have to manage the returning costs by your own. We will provide an easy returns-solution in your country (home-pickup and/or postal deposit) for you. The Returns for EU-Members are always free of charge.

 

SHARE - BACKERS WILL GET A FREE GIFT FOR SHARING!

Please share the Giesswein Merino Runners with your friends and families and send us a message when you're done. Backers will receive an extra gift from us! (Hint: It's a great accessoire for your new Merino Runners!)

 

GIESSWEIN: IN THE NEWS

 

RISKS

GIESSWEIN has gained an extraordinary amount of knowledge from over 60 years of experience in the fashion industry. We want to start our new project on kickstarter because we believe that kickstarter's fantastic community will help us a lot. Therefore we offer very special prices for an outstanding high quality product.

We deliver several hundred packages from our warehouse every day and can guarantee that our customers receive the order as soon as possible and mostly on time.

With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The GIESSWEIN Merino Runners will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.

The GIESSWEIN Walkwaren AG was founded in 1954. GIESSWEIN is famous for its popular slipper socks.
story_txt:
Merino Runners - THE IDEA

 
SURVEY
Surveys will be send out with backerkit where you can choose your color and your size. You will receive the survey two weeks after sending your pledge. We guarantee that you will receive the pledge reward you chose. 

 
 
WE STARTED SHIPPING!



 
Merino Runners - THE STORY
Merino Runners are the latest innovation from GIESSWEIN, based in the Austrian Alps between Salzburg and Innsbruck. They are made of a Merino Wool 3D Stretch - an unique fabric invented by GIESSWEIN - and a lightweight EVA Sole. The changeable footbed is bio based and extra soft. Whether you use the Merino Runners for Work, Travel, Shopping or your daily outdoor adventures - we guarantee a stylish no-sweat feeling all day long and an extra comfortable and lightweight experience.
 
 


 
You love stylish sneakers, but hate synthetic materials, heavy weighted designs, an uncomfortable fit and sweaty feet? The GIESSWEIN Merino Runners are made from natural Materials: pure merino wool from happy sheep around your foot and a bio-based footbed. Our unique Merino Wool 3D stretch regulates the temperature in the shoe (cools down in the summer and warms up in the winter) and guarantees a perfectly no-sweat-no-smell shoe experience.
 
THE COLOR RANGE

 
Whether you‘ll like to wear your GIESSWEIN Merino Runners at work or start a daily adventure outside with them - you‘ll love the perfect fit and the ultra lightweight design of our shoes. You can wear them all day long - even without socks - and we guarantee a no-smell experience because of our temperature-regulating Merino Wool 3D Stretch!
 
AMAZING FEATURES

 
WEARABLE WITHOUT SOCKS
The small air chambers in our wool regulate the temperature in the shoe. So we have a cool down experience in the hot summer months and a warm up experience in the cold winter months. The collection of our wool is cruelty free (e.g. mulesing) and we take care of the animals by applying strict standards for our merino yarn suppliers.
 
BIO BASED FOOTBED
Our changeable footbed is made from an organic eco ortholite® formulation which includes natural, plant-based castor bean oil - that makes the footbed really soft and comfortable. In addition, the footbed is a renewable resource which reduces the shoe‘s ecological footprint. 

THE RUNNER SOLE
EVA is the lightest material we could find on our beautiful planet. Extra soft, smooth and a cushioning effect - that makes our soles strongly unique and very comfortable for city trips!

 
MERINO RUNNERS - SIZING


 
HOW TO MEASURE YOUR SIZE: Measure STRAIGHT from the first point of your biggest toe to the last point of your heel (for example: 26cm). After that, add 1,5cm (26 + 1,5 = 27,5cm). So, the right size for your order is 27,5cm. That means: Women US 9 / UK 7,5 / EU 41 / CM 27,5. MEN US 8,5 / UK 7,5 / EU 41 / CM 27,5. Sizes and colors will be requested in a survey sent after the campaign.
 
SHIPPING
FREE SHIPPING FOR ALL INTERNATIONAL ORDERS!
Giesswein takes care of all dutys and taxes. We guarantee no shipping costs on all orders worldwide.
 
RETURNS
We understand mistakes with sizing will be made and we will do our best to exchange any pair of Merino Runners in good faith that you send back to us. Because our margins are really tight you have to manage the returning costs by your own. We will provide an easy returns-solution in your country (home-pickup and/or postal deposit) for you. The Returns for EU-Members are always free of charge.
 
SHARE - BACKERS WILL GET A FREE GIFT FOR SHARING!
Please share the Giesswein Merino Runners with your friends and families and send us a message when you're done. Backers will receive an extra gift from us! (Hint: It's a great accessoire for your new Merino Runners!)


 
GIESSWEIN: IN THE NEWS

 
RISKS
GIESSWEIN has gained an extraordinary amount of knowledge from over 60 years of experience in the fashion industry. We want to start our new project on kickstarter because we believe that kickstarter's fantastic community will help us a lot. Therefore we offer very special prices for an outstanding high quality product.
We deliver several hundred packages from our warehouse every day and can guarantee that our customers receive the order as soon as possible and mostly on time.
With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The GIESSWEIN Merino Runners will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.
The GIESSWEIN Walkwaren AG was founded in 1954. GIESSWEIN is famous for its popular slipper socks.

story:
"Before being permanetly dubbed "The New Romantics," a small, colorful subculture of club kids in the 1980s were called "futurists" and more fittingly, "peacock punks" ... the former name focusing on the generation as visionaries and the other alluding to the impact of their actual looks; the makeup, the decadence, the frills.

"New Romantics" is the only name that seemed fitting. It's the only one that captures the poetry of self expression ... captivating and inspiring the world, one outfit at time."  - Eric Belladonna, Lead Stylist

 
Every year, the SubZERO Festival rocks Silicon Valley with an awesome display of subculture that showcases the D.I.Y spirit of our art scene.  Every year, the number of artists participating and people that show up for the festival increases, everyone there displaying the talent and hunger for art that grows in this city. For it's 6th incarnation, SubZERO approached us and requested that we put on a fashion show.  Something big.  Something opulant. A runway show that brings together conceptual high fashion and street wear into something bold and beyond the zeitgeist.
 
Our goal is to not only put on a show that will make everyone talk for weeks after, but also to showcase the artists and businesses who inspire us: local boutiques with lovingly curated collections that keep us from having to travel elsewhere for awesome clothes and designers with avant garde attitudes who aren’t afraid to push the boundaries of fashion. 
 
By helping us out with a contribution, you'll be working with us to put on this event that celebrates fashion here in Silicon Valley.  We promise you that this show will be great; It will be opulant and grand, an experience for the senses that won't easily be forgotten!
 
To see the other great artists and performers who help make the SubZERO Festival the awesome event that it has become, check out http://subzerofestival.com/

 

What your help means to us


Your contribution to this campaign will ensure that the people who work with us will have their expenses covered.  We are all doing this for the love of our community and for fashion and no matter if we reach our goal not, this show will be going on.  We carefully went over all the costs of the production with an eye towards efficiency, and came to the figure of being able to put on this show for $2,500.  These funds will go to cover the materials used by our hair stylists and makeup artists, physical aspects of production (runways are expensive) as well the costs associated with the design and printing of our official lookbook, which will feature all the garments and accessories featured in our show and the places where you could purchase them for yourself!


Why We Are Doing It!

It is really easy to see runway shows as frivolous things, but it is important to realize that this is one of the only kind of venues for designers and local boutiques to present their goods in an engaging way.  Like a gallery opening is a statement about the painter, a runway show is an exhibition featuring the creativity of not only the stylists who dress the models, but for the people who crafted the garments and collected them in the first place! 
 
Everyone on our team is accomplished when it comes to fashion and production. Our Lead Stylist, Eric Belladonna, in addition to being a local fashion icon, also directed a successful runway show for a previous SubZERO festival.  His vision for this show heavily draws from the rococo influence of the New Romantics and Adam Ant, fused with graffiti inspired street culture that is so prevalent in San Jose.  The show is being produced and coordinated by Drew Clark, who has been working with SubZERO for the last four years as the organizer for its figure drawing stage.  He also has experience organizing events for South First Fridays, San Jose Stage Company and was the organizer for San Jose's chapter of Dr. Sketchy's Anti-Art School.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to help us fund this event, there are other ways you can help! We are looking for volunteers who have backgrounds in fashion, photography and stage production to help us on the day of the festival!
 

The Blitz Team

 Eric Belladonna

 

Eric Belladonna is a 26 year old event promoter and photographer who can be seen anywhere in Downtown San Jose.  Inspired by fashion, art, music, his untamed desire to creatively self-express and experiment, Eric has been named "one of the 25 most influential people" in the Silicon Valley by Metro Newspaper.  This will be Eric's second fashion show at SubZERO and he hopes it to be even more spectacular than the last, a show SanJose.com called " a couture gloss to a post-apocalyptic world" -2010

 

 

Ana Villafañe

 

Ana was born and raised in Patagonia Argentina and has lived in California since 2003. Photography became a part of Ana’s teenage years and that adolescent curiosity turned into a life-long passion. Her path through the photographic world as both an art form and business has given her unique perspective on both the creative and professional aspects of a very dynamic industry. For her, the goal is to catch the world at its most natural, to see the essence of a moment and the candid truth in each individual. Photography is not Ana’s only passion. Since early in her childhood she’s been obsessed with clothing and its creative expression, which drove her into getting a degree in apparel design. She enjoys art in many forms. On her free time you can find her watching movies, drawing, painting, taking photos and spending time with her family.

 

 

Alvaro Aguiar
 
 
Offering a professional experience of 4 years in the field, Alvara was co-owner of Lasa's accessories where he was creative director of photoshoots and fashion shows. Alvaro has co-styled and collaborated in photoshoots with local fashion designers, were he also did hair and makeup. He has worked as an image consultant teaching people how to maintain and develop their own authentic style. He also co designed and painted a mural at Mac's night club in downtown San Jose.  Alvaro Aguiar is making great strides for himself in the fashion world, which is documented on his blog.
 
Drew Clark

 

Drew, while not originally from San Jose, has called the city his own for at least 6 years.  In his mother's words, he is talented in all of the things that will never make him any money.  He has worked with the San Jose arts community since arriving in the city. Drew currently works as the Director of Alternative Programming at San Jose Stage Company, where he organizes a number of events including its South First Friday art walk shows. Drew has worked with SubZERO in the past as the organizer and MC for it's figure drawing stage.  He is also a member of the San Francisco-based art collective, CODAME.  Drew is fond of dressing loud, talking loud and listening to loud music.
