story:
WHO IS CARMEN DIANE??

One of the hardest things in life is to be yourself.  Trying to live up to others' expectations and dealing with the judgement that comes along with society. 

I grew up in the northern part of Atlanta, GA. During middle school and high school I was made fun of for my skin color, my facial features, the way I spoke and the way I carried myself. I could see people talking about and laughing at me. I thought the pain would never end after many nights of crying myself to sleep. 

After graduating from high school and going to college I was able to see and experience different cultures, new faces, I found people just like me and I was able to gain a different perspective on life  which naturally drew me to the city. There I was able to comfortably think outside of the box, and live my life how I wanted to live it and surround myself with others doing the same.


Are you a Lesbian??? How can you relate to the LGBT community?

Nope, I am not a lesbian although I do find women to be Hot! :)

I can relate to the LGBT community because of the experiences many of them have shared with me what they are going through. I know what it feels like to feel:

  •  Not accepted by your surroundings
  • To feel different
  • To be criticized by people of my religion because they sin differently  
  • To live a lie 
  • To feel LOVE
  • To feel PASSION 
  • THE FREEDOM FELT WHEN YOU ARE BEING YOURSELF ! AMAZING!

My name is Carmen Diane and I am the Creator of I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS  which is a denim shorts line for gay men.  

                               Why for Gay Men?? How did that come about??

In my journey I realized that nothing feels more liberating and free then the feeling of being yourself. Others will twist and turn in order to hurt you, but it's up to you to stand strong in who you are!


What is so special about these Shorts??

I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS are not "just a pair of shorts", they are a Movement. Fashion is a way for people to express themselves, its a way for people to set themselves apart from others. THROUGH: INDIVIDUALITY, COLOR, AND ART! The brand I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS WILL ALSO HAVE HENTS OF SYMBOLISM THROUGH OUT THE LINE TO RECOGNIZE EQUALITY. 


Do I have to be a Gay Male to wear I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS?

Of course Not! I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS is a denim line anyone can purchase. Love does not discriminate :).

Why does I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS NEED YOUR HELP??


Below is My Apartment : The I Make Custom Shorts Factory!

   

                          



Due to the amount of orders and attention received I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS NEEDS TO EXPAND TO A MASS PRODUCTION LEVEL!!  

      

 I am currently working in my apartment and I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS is growing faster than my resources can keep up!


 I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS GOALS:

$50,000 - WILL BE ABLE TO FUND AN INTIAL MASS PRODUCTION AND BE ABLE TO REACH PEOPLE ALL OVER THE WORLD!!!

-The highest quality of denim will be used 

-The threading on the back pocket will form an equal sign for symbolism of Equality 

-The shorts will have a Perfect custom tailored fit  to fit your body like your favorite pair of designer jeans, so that you will feel AMAZING!


This Money will be used to for the Initial Production of the denim line as well as travel expenses to get these in stores all over globe!!! 

CHECK THIS OUT!!!

So one of my Instagram followers, Andrew told me about this town in Florida called Wilton Manors which is a gay community in Fort Lauderdale , I called some boutiques in the area and this store called Creative Male in Miami, the guy working said "the owners may be in this weekend" So I hopped in my car and went to Florida!



.......AND THE REST IS HISTORY!!!! I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS IS NOW IN MIAMI!


THE IMPACT I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS WILL MAKE ON THE WORLD:

Men of all ages have wrote private letters to me letting me know they have not come out yet because their family will be ashamed of them. They've said I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS IS A LIFE LINE TO FREEDOM FOR THEM AND WITH "THE MOVEMENT" THEY ARE ONE STEP CLOSER!

Your donation will make I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS such a powerful movement that men all over the world will be happier because they know that it's not just them. They will have no fear of being themselves because they will see the worldwide MOVEMENT and when they see I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS in their local department stores........they will proudly pick up a pair and join the movement!


What if I can't give??

Guys!!! Just because you can't give money doesn't mean your not important! You are just as important!! I am here because of all the Support everyone has shown! Here are some other ways to give:

-Share this link on all your Social Media outlets! Facebook! Instagram! Twitter! Pinterest! Vine! 

-Send in a support  video to imakecustomshorts@gmail.com and I will post it to my Page and tag you!

-Tell all your friends and family about it!

Help me guys by Joining this Movement!

Thank you for your interest in the success of I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS! It means EVERYTHING to me and I will work 24/7 during and after this Indiegogo Campaign to make I MAKE CUSTOM SHORTS a Worldwide Movement!

Love,

Carmen Diane

story:
STEP 1 - UNZIP INNER HOOD ZIPPER

At this stage we begin by unzipping inner hood. This will allow you to connect shoelace earphones and auxiliary cable with one another while also allowing you to feed both earphones through to left and right drawstring stitch holes.

 

 

 

STEP 2 - CONNECT AUXILIARY CABLE TO SHOELACE EAPRHONES

You now connect the auxiliary cable and shoelace earphones outside of hood. Connecting outside of hood is much easier than placing hands inside hood. Secure connection securely otherwise technical issues may occur.

 

 

STEP 3 - FEED MALE END OF AUXILIARY INTO HOOD ZIPPER

By feeding the male end of auxiliary cable through hood to right side it will allow you to pull cable through stitched hole (again, this is located on right side) which leads to hidden zipper.

 

 

STEP 4 - PULL AUX THROUGH STITCH HOLE ABOVE INNER ZIPPER

Once auxiliary cord is fed through right side of inner hood you are ready to place into inner zipper. 

 

 

 

STEP 5 - FEED AUX INTO TOP SECTION OF INNER ZIPPER

Feed the auxiliary cord into the top section of inner zipper. 

 

 

STEP 6 - PULL AUXILIARY CORD TO REACH INNER POCKET

Once you have fed auxiliary cable through inner hoodie stitch hole on right side and furthermore into top of inner zipper, you know must gently pull down on cable to give at least fifty centimetres (50cm) so that cord can reach inner smartphone pocket. 

 

 

STEP 7 - FEED AUXILIARY THROUGH TO HIDDEN POCKET

Begin by unzipping hidden pocket inside right side of hoodie. When pocket is unzipped take male end of auxiliary cable and feed into pocket through stitched hole.

 

 

STEP 8 - COMPLETELY CLOSE INNER ZIPPER FROM BASE TO TOP

Close inner hidden zipper from base to top neatly concealing auxiliary cord. More or less cable auxiliary cord length can be adjusted by pulling at either end of cord (inside hood or inside hidden smartphone pocket). 

 

 

 

 

STEP 9 - REMOVE RUBBER EARBUDS FROM EARPHONE HEAD

Before implanting shoelace earphones into STX Hoodie you must remove rubber buds on earphones as it allows feeding through to stitched drawstring hole much easier compared to leaving the rubber buds on and it getting caught on the cotton of inner hoodie as you feed through.

 

 

 

STEP 10 - FEED SHOELACE EARPHONE TO SEPERATE DRAWSTRING HOLES 

Begin by holding the base of either the left or right earphone (does not matter which one you start with) and feed your hand into the unzipped hood. Be sure to have a solid grip on earphone as you feed through, we suggest using thumb and index finger.

 

 

 

STEP 11 - GENTLY SLIDE EARPHONE THROUGH DRAWSTRING HOLE

When feeding earphone through to drawstring hole you will reach the stitched hole, at this point remove hand from interior of hood and gently slide through earphone by shuffling through with index finger and thumb on hood lining as seen below. Same process for second earphone on opposite side to initial inserted earphone.

 

 

STEP 12 - PULL THROUGH EARPHONE TO DESIRED LENGTH

Once the head of earphone has been fed through drawstring hole you can extend shoelace to the length you are comfortable with. Please take caution when pulling through right earphone as microphone is implanted within right earphone shoelace. We suggest you take this step nice and slow. 

 

STEP 13 - CONNECT SMARTPHONE IN HIDDEN POCKET

Upon successfully pulling through auxiliary cable (male end) to hidden pocket you can connect your chosen smartphone and place in pocket safely with hidden pocket zipper closed. 

 

STEP 14 - CLOSE INNER HOOD ZIPPER AND YOU ARE READY TO GO!

Final step in the process is to close over zipper and pick the hoodie up and make sure it feels comfortable and cables are at chosen lengths. Now you are all set to enjoy the full usage of your brand new STX Hoodie. We hope you enjoy the product as much as we enjoyed creating it for you. Welcome to the family!

 

 

 

 

The simplest, most accessible way to use your smartphone is here! Simple, comfortable and un-interrupted playback of music from your smart device while also recieving phone calls through your STX shoelace earphones while wearing your STX Hoodie.

 

STX Hoodie keeps it very simple; your auxiliary cord which connects to your smartphone in hidden pocket feeds through from the bottom to top of STX Hoodie inner zipper and connects to shoelace earphones inside hood. Inner hood can be accessed easily by unzipping zipper that is hidden in centre of hood stitch line.

 

 

When our team designed the STX Hoodie it was imperative that the hood functionality was not effected with any new channels/zippers we added to the current hoodie layout standards. We are very happy that full use of hoodie is available like all of your other hoodies. When the weather turns the hood is needed.

 

 

We have sourced the highest quality earbuds available to ensure all owners receive the best experience possible with their favourite music and during calls. Earphones can be used separately when removed from STX Hoodie with your chosen devices.

 

 

 

Thick style inner zipper that neatly sits right inner side of hoodie. This is the area that holds the aux cord from smartphone to hood hidden away from your view.

 

STX Hoodie has an inner pocket that will hold any size smartphone from Samsung Galaxy 2 to iPhone 6+. The reason for placing pocket on inside is to allow you full use of outer pockets to hold other items or place hands inside when it's cold.

 

All backers will receive a pair of shoelace earphones which STX Hoodie refers to as 'Lacephones'. 

 

Also included is an 80cm auxiliary cord which fits neatly into all sizes of STX Hoodie from hidden smartphone pocket to inner hood.

 

 

STX Hoodie user manual will help you to find out how to remove and implant cords and shoelace earphones, material specifications and STX Brand Mission which we strive towards every single day for our customers and partners. 

 

STX use test tubes in our design workshops to keep electronics components and materials organised. We want those who support our campaign to receive a test tube case to hold their shoelace earphones. Its only right to provide this perk now they are becoming part of the STX Family!

 

 

All backers will receive an STX Gym Bag which upon unboxing contains STX Hoodie. From research gym bags are used in a whole variety of ways outside of gym and fitness requirements. We want all of our backers to have one to do what you would like with it! Use for work, travel, storage and much more!

 

STX team is one that is very aware of its own carbon footprint and when it came to packaging STX Hoodie we sourced the most eco-friendly packaging possible. STX shipping box is 100% fully recyclable with logo ink on box being used again from recycled materials.

 

 

 

 

Street Technology Experiments have sourced the highest quality fabric available being pre-washed 100% true black cotton with a weight of 320 grams per square metre. In short, it is highly durable and extremelly comfortable. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


So much technology today requires the correct operating system. From day one, the team at STX made sure that all technology used was totally compatible with not just smartphones but any kind of device that has an auxiliary outlet. The hidden pocket for smartphone is a size that can accomodate all smartphones available currently on the market. 

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select perk from sidebar at top of this page). All perks include at least one STX Hoodie, one pair STX Black Lacephones, one STX Gym Bag, 80cm Male to Female Auxiliary cable, one STX Lacephones Case and an STX Hoodie 1.0 User Manual (compatible with all smartphones). 

 

The above timeline has been strategised heavily by the team at STX. Many Indiegogo campaigns fail to clearly explain to consumers what the time frame is from a perk being ordered to it arriving at the desired destination. One area that may cause delays is Chinese New Year. We are very aware of this and suppliers we have chosen as first contact will continue manufacturing during this period so our backer's dont have any delays in receiving their STX Hoodie. 
 
We have also prepared back up suppliers for each component of STX Hoodie meaning if any of our suppliers close down for holidays or cannot meet timelines we will go to secondary sources to ensure above timeline once again is met for backer's sake. We know what it is like to wait on an exciting item you have purchase online; we will do our best to get it to you in the most professional and time effective way possible!

During our extensive research in finding out "what information do backers want to see on an Indiegogo campaign" one of the main components that was missing according to consumers, even from the most successful campaigns was transparently communicating to backers where funding will go if a campaign they support surpass its required funding goal. 
 
STX Hoodie will, if we receive the rare opportunity of stretch funding from our amazing backers, be placing additional funding towards new STX outerwear garments and furthermore STX Hoodie 2.0 Edition. The below visually displays this:
 

 

 

Our core team listed above is working on STX on a full time basis along with a number of additional projects. Our network of partners/associated from around the world cover professional areas such as sales, finance, intellectual property, supply, component sourcing and business development which allows us to create and manufacture products such as the STX Hoodie in the most skilled, strategised and professionally managed fashion ensuring consumers receive the best product possible with every single item we make available.  

 

 

 

Our team has a wealth of experience in both the fashion and electronics industry spanning over 25 years, The experience and knowledge that comes from working in these markets for such long period has allowed us to now prepare to launch the STX Hoodie very aware of all facets of the manufacture and supply of smart connected garments also known as 'Tech-Wear'. 

STX team have relationships currently with a number of the worlds leading streetwear brands and a number of boutique high fashion houses along with countless connections to technology based startups and organisations around the world. 

In short, we are not new to this and will fulfil every single order made by backers.

 

We have been working on the STX Hoodie for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate manufacturing so we can make the STX Hoodie available to you and the millions of hoodie lovers from around the world much sooner than we initially planned. Lets make using smartphones easy, our hoodies more interactive and our lives more connected - together. 

So why do we deserve you support?

 

  • Be the first to get an STX Hoodie before anyone else (and we mean it).
  • Continue to release and provide consumers with simple functions within their most loved garments such as leather jackets and snow coats.
  • You love hoodies, we love hoodies! Lets keep making them better than ever before with each other and continue to resolve problems such as tangled earphone cords!
  • Ensure every consumer who would like an STX Hoodie has an opportunity to purchase through our offered perks. We want everyone to have his or her chance. 
 

 

We currently have a working prototype and we're now focusing on:
  • Finalising the supply chain process from order placement with manufacturing partners to products arriving at consumers chosen shipping address.
  • Developing the user experience from STX Hoodie 1.0 to enable us to take STX Hoodie 2.0 to the next level in features and functionality. 
  • Providing colour and pattern variations of shoelace earphones which consumers can match personalise with their STX Hoodie. 
We will soon begin the process of:
  • Brand based collaborations.
  • Physical storefront availability in your local streetwear/apparel store.

 

 

 

SIZING CHART:

STX Hoodie is sized very similar to American Apparel Hoodie. 

*The measurements in table below are in inches and sizing is unisex.

 

 
FABRIC DETAILS:
Cotton: 100% cotton
Weight: 300 GSM (Grams Per Square Metre)
Machine Washable: Yes (Cold Wash)
Treatment: Wrinkle Free Solution
 
 
EXCHANGE POLICY:
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, the hoodie will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jacket for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you'll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just stating up and offering our hoodies at highly discounted prices, we won't be able to accept returns. 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:
 
1. How long will it take for me to recieve my STX Hoodie?
As shown above, backers will recieve their purchased perks throughout April 2016. 
 
2. Where is the material sourced? How does it feel? 
 STX Hoodie material is sourced from within Shenzhen, China. The suppliers we have chosen work with the worlds leading brands and have proven over many years their level of expertise and quality which will be translated into all STX Hoodie garments. The material being 100% true black cotton has a weighted feel very much like your most valued fashion items (coats & leather jackets) which ensures a styled look while worn and gives a high quality finish that is sure to turn heads.
 
3. How do I choose size and color when purchasing STX Hoodie 1.0?
As Indiegogo campaign is nearing completion our team at STX HQ will email you to confirm your chosen size and color of purchased hoodie. 
 
4. Will there be additional hoodie colors made available in the future?
Yes, as shown above there will be four new colors added post Indiegogo (Dark Green, Navy, Burgundy and Tan). In the future more colors will be added with new Street Technology Experiments garments that are made available. 
 
5. Can I purchase STX Lacephones online without buying STX Hoodie?
Of course! You can even purchase just STX Lacephones above in our offered perks if you dont want to jump right into purchasing an STX Hoodie straight away. Our above perks offer backers the option to purchase one set or two sets of STX Lacephones. 
 
6. What is the retail price of STX Hoodie after Indiegogo is complete?
$119.99 Australian Dollars
 
7. What type of washing is best for STX Hoodie?
Use cold water when washing to ensure material maintains quality and does not fade. 
 

8. What happens if the sizing chart doesn't fit me? 

We've all been there, may it be shoes or that certain coat you wanted. Get in contact with our team and we will make sure we can accomodate you in the best way we can, meaning, we'll make sure you get an STX Hoodie. 

9. Are the zippers rust proof? 
Yes the zippers are 100% rust proof and manufactured at a very high quality. This not only makes interaction with all STX Hoodie zippers smooth and un-interrupted, but gives a glowing high quality gold finish which again will not lose quality if washed correctly. 
 
10. Will STX Hoodie be available in my local sports/streetwear store?
Right now the STX team is focusing on providing the best product possible in the STX Hoodie and ensuring all backers all well looked after and informed throughout the whole process. Post Indiegogo our team will entertain discussions with local retailers across United States, Europe and Australia. 
 
11. If my Lacephones break or become damaged, can I refund them?
We will look after all STX customers so if your Lacephones become damaged get in contact with our team and we will help you get a new set as soon as possible, we dont want you having to resort back to tangled cords! 
 
12. What is the sound quality like in STX Lacephones?
The STX Lacephones have been developed in house with support from manufacturers within Shenzhen, China. The Lacephone was designed for an all round performance which supports all types of music and vocal pitches. STX Lacephones rival the best earphones available today. 
 
14. How long will my STX Hoodie last if I wear it every day of the week?
Life expectancy of STX Hoodie if washed correctly is above 5 years. Most hoodies available today fall apart within months, not STX Hoodie! The 100% cotton used ensures that the garment maintains strength, fit and stitching for years to come. 
 
15. I accidentally purchased the wrong size STX Hoodie, can I swap it? 
Of course! We have all made that accident before. Get in contact with our team and they will help you send it back to our labs, we will make sure your correct sized STX Hoodie is in your hands in no time. 
 
16. When will STX Hoodie 2.0 & Snow Jackets be released?
100% focus is being placed on STX Hoodie right now as we know its what our backers deserve, this ensuring we provide what we promise in a timely manner. Upon STX Hoodies arriving to every single on our backers, STX Hoodie 2.0 and STX Snow Jackets information will be released. 
 
17. I own a very old mobile phone, will this work with the STX Hoodie?
Yes, all phones that have a female auxiliary port are compatible with STX Hoodie 1.0. We chose to use the auxiliary cable in version 1.0 for this exact reason so that backers who may have very old phones can still be a part of STX Hoodie! 
 
18. How long does it take to remove STX Lacephones from STX Hoodie?
After days of timing ourselves removing STX Lacephones we found after the first go it takes no more than 60 seconds, this not being rushed and removing slowly and calmly. Be patient on your first go though, it may take a couple of minutes as a new STX Hoodie owner. 
 
19. How long does it take to embed STX Lacephones into STX Hoodie?
Very similar to question 19, embedding STX Lacephones take no more than 60 seconds. As you continue to use your STX Hoodie you become very familiar with the process which will shorten the time even more. Again, be patient on your first attempt, it can take a little longer as a new STX Hoodie owner. 
 

20. Will my current earphones work with auxiliary cable and vice versa?

If you use a set of earphones or an auxiliary cable currently which has 3 tier coating on the male plug you are all set to go! You can check this by simply looking at the male end of your cable (earphones or auxiliary) and check for 3 rings.
story_txt:
STEP 1 - UNZIP INNER HOOD ZIPPER
At this stage we begin by unzipping inner hood. This will allow you to connect shoelace earphones and auxiliary cable with one another while also allowing you to feed both earphones through to left and right drawstring stitch holes.
 
  
STEP 2 - CONNECT AUXILIARY CABLE TO SHOELACE EAPRHONES
You now connect the auxiliary cable and shoelace earphones outside of hood. Connecting outside of hood is much easier than placing hands inside hood. Secure connection securely otherwise technical issues may occur.
 
 STEP 3 - FEED MALE END OF AUXILIARY INTO HOOD ZIPPER
By feeding the male end of auxiliary cable through hood to right side it will allow you to pull cable through stitched hole (again, this is located on right side) which leads to hidden zipper.
  
STEP 4 - PULL AUX THROUGH STITCH HOLE ABOVE INNER ZIPPER
Once auxiliary cord is fed through right side of inner hood you are ready to place into inner zipper. 
  
 
STEP 5 - FEED AUX INTO TOP SECTION OF INNER ZIPPER
Feed the auxiliary cord into the top section of inner zipper. 
  
STEP 6 - PULL AUXILIARY CORD TO REACH INNER POCKET
Once you have fed auxiliary cable through inner hoodie stitch hole on right side and furthermore into top of inner zipper, you know must gently pull down on cable to give at least fifty centimetres (50cm) so that cord can reach inner smartphone pocket. 
 
 STEP 7 - FEED AUXILIARY THROUGH TO HIDDEN POCKET
Begin by unzipping hidden pocket inside right side of hoodie. When pocket is unzipped take male end of auxiliary cable and feed into pocket through stitched hole.

 
 
STEP 8 - COMPLETELY CLOSE INNER ZIPPER FROM BASE TO TOP
Close inner hidden zipper from base to top neatly concealing auxiliary cord. More or less cable auxiliary cord length can be adjusted by pulling at either end of cord (inside hood or inside hidden smartphone pocket). 
 

 

 
 
STEP 9 - REMOVE RUBBER EARBUDS FROM EARPHONE HEAD
Before implanting shoelace earphones into STX Hoodie you must remove rubber buds on earphones as it allows feeding through to stitched drawstring hole much easier compared to leaving the rubber buds on and it getting caught on the cotton of inner hoodie as you feed through.
 
 

 
STEP 10 - FEED SHOELACE EARPHONE TO SEPERATE DRAWSTRING HOLES 
Begin by holding the base of either the left or right earphone (does not matter which one you start with) and feed your hand into the unzipped hood. Be sure to have a solid grip on earphone as you feed through, we suggest using thumb and index finger.
 
  

STEP 11 - GENTLY SLIDE EARPHONE THROUGH DRAWSTRING HOLE
When feeding earphone through to drawstring hole you will reach the stitched hole, at this point remove hand from interior of hood and gently slide through earphone by shuffling through with index finger and thumb on hood lining as seen below. Same process for second earphone on opposite side to initial inserted earphone.
 

 
STEP 12 - PULL THROUGH EARPHONE TO DESIRED LENGTH
Once the head of earphone has been fed through drawstring hole you can extend shoelace to the length you are comfortable with. Please take caution when pulling through right earphone as microphone is implanted within right earphone shoelace. We suggest you take this step nice and slow. 

 
STEP 13 - CONNECT SMARTPHONE IN HIDDEN POCKET
Upon successfully pulling through auxiliary cable (male end) to hidden pocket you can connect your chosen smartphone and place in pocket safely with hidden pocket zipper closed.  STEP 14 - CLOSE INNER HOOD ZIPPER AND YOU ARE READY TO GO!
Final step in the process is to close over zipper and pick the hoodie up and make sure it feels comfortable and cables are at chosen lengths. Now you are all set to enjoy the full usage of your brand new STX Hoodie. We hope you enjoy the product as much as we enjoyed creating it for you. Welcome to the family!

story:
Ymax Multi-Function In-Car Electric Shaver,

Phone Charger, & Emergency Hammer

Running late to a first date? Dressed up, rose in hand and then found your face was covered by a ragged beard? Definitely will ruin the date, and you don’t want it happen. At this moment, Ymax powerful In-Car Electric Shaver can help you to clean your beard when you wait for traffic light. Now, you looks great and ready for a romantic night.

Forget to shave before dating? No problem!

Nervous on a new job interview and forgot to shave? Messy beard on your face will make you looks not professional and lead to a bad impression from interviewer. You do not have 20 minutes to buy a shaver and find a restroom to shave, so Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver can save you from this embarrassing moment. Just a 3 minutes shaving at the parking lot can make you looks nice and shining. Now, you can take a deep breath and fight that interview with confidence.

5 minutes left for the meeting but forget to shave? No problem!

In emergency situation, electric windows in cars do not work once their power source is cut. When trapped in any vehicle, to escape you need a window breaker to smash the glass. Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver has a high quality safety hammer at device bottom. In emergency, you have no need to reach your glove box to get the safety hammer. Just grab Ymax shaver from cigarette lighter and smash the window. Few seconds can mean the difference between life and death.

There is a 2.4A USB 3.0 charge port on Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver, can charge your phone or tablet when you are driving. Very convenient design!

 

Fast charge cell phone in your car? No problem!

 

  • Compact Size

Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver is smaller than most electric shaver on the market, very easy to put it in your hand-bag as a back up shaver. The neat design will make it looks great in your car, and take almost no space from your control board.

  • Long Running Time

Equipped with high volume 300mAh rechargeable battery, Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver can provide 90 minutes shaving time with one charge.

  • Warranty

Ymax Inc provide LIFE TIME Warranty on our In-Car Electric Shaver. Just send it back if it is not working, we will provide you a new one.

  • Very Easy To Clean

Ymax In-Car Electric Shaver comes with cleaning kit, very easy to clean the device!

story:
The brand was started three years ago by me (Eliska) – after a walk with my small nephew in the winter. We both had separate gloves and it was quite difficult to hold the kid’s hand tight. So I realized it would be much more safe (and still comfortable) to hold the hand straight away but still be in a warm glove. 

I went through a long journey finding the best shape, style and fabrics, as well as finding funny embroideries which children would love. Luckily my mum is owner of small family business - sewing workshop, so after a few weeks we had the final version. And a special committee consisting of my nephews (7&5 at that time) approved our embroideries :)

My friend with her little daughter were my first testers.

Later on, I created the version for couples in love as well! So if you like going for a walk hand in hand with your beloved one, this is the best choice. 

When I first introduced gLove, the feedback was really great. I got several rewards for creative business ideas… and before I could make any further steps, I got hit by a serious autoimmune disease which disabled me for almost a year. I was bedridden for several months and was not sure if I will be able to get to work again. Then I met my boyfriend whose endless support convinced me to give it a go despite my illness. So here I am, being able to walk again, and even with debilitating disease, making my dreams (with your help) come true :) 

I would be very grateful for any help you can provide (see perks on the right).


Our main goal is to get gLove out there and thats how we have set up our campaign!

We manufacture gLoves in my mum's sewing workshop. That enables us to pay attention to every single detail because we can control the whole process. But in some aspects, we are limited. At this moment embroideries are being delivered by other local provider. If we are able to raise $25 000, we will be able to buy our own embroidery machine which would help us tremendously. We have many more great ideas and designs waiting to be seen!


We have (hopefully) minimized all risks in the line of producing the gLoves.
It may become a challenge to get all the gLoves assembled in a reasonable amount of time IF we get more orders than we bargained for.


    Please find our current collection in the Indiegogo gallery. Each gLove has a specific code, so if you decide to support us with buying a perk, please note this code as well. Thank you!


    We’re happy to hear from you! Whenever you have a question or would like to provide a feedback, feel free to let us know in the comments or email us on info@glove.cz


    Even if you don't buy any perk, we will be very happy if you just share our campaign among your friends. Thank you very much for your support!

story:
We Ship Internationally

Via your preffered courier. (DHL, Aramex, UPS, regular post)

 

You want to support us, but you don't have a credit card? contact us for details! Any dollar $ means a lot!

Our Story

 

Launched as the first Omani website for women's apparel in 2009. Through Boutique Muscat, I started my own line using Omani mixed silks creating outfits that were flattering, funky and that made a statement. The outfits are versatile enough to wear with a plain white t-shirt, jeans and ballerinas or with our best selling silver buckled Omani belt, heels and your favourite red lipstick.

 

Boutique Muscat, aims to support young upcoming designers from around the world. You send your products we market and sell your product for you in return of a small fixed amount per month and we take no percentage on your sales, at the end of each month we send you your inventory and your sales amounts. Through this project, you as a designer or a home based business owner won't need to think about or worry about start up costs and running costs, you will be able to sell your product and test an international market for a small amount of money, and the best part is that you will make money!

 

To keep the boutique running, I will need your support. Every $ counts, and every word you spread about our campaign and our business makes a big difference!

 

THE PROJECT: TAL

 

Founded by Hazar Al Zadjali and in collaboration with Boutique Muscat, TAL is a project that helps launch emerging designers.  TAL is an annual program and a rotation of collections where six to eight young designers are selected each year. The designers will be guided through the process of developing their collections, as well as promoting them. These collections will then be presented for a period of one year at Boutique Muscat. Throughout their one-year at BM, the designers also get the chance to participate in design related workshops, seminars and collaborations when available.

The Impact

 

 With every word you spread and with every dollar you give you will be supporting:

      * A large circle of at least 10 designers and entrepreneurs from acroos the world

      * You will be gauranteeing jobs for at least 50 talented and hardworking citizens of 3rd world countries

      * You will be supporting my fashion line and you will recieve a custom made oufit of your choice made from authentic mixed and natural silks worth more than 350 USD (depending on donation amount)

      * What goes around comes around :) Give good and it will return to you!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The main bulk of money is needed to cover the debt that was taken to start up the business, for the past 10 months the rent has increased in the location that the business has been established due to the economic sutation of the area.

The project and the fashion line need to be branded (includes photography, stationary, flyers, lookbooks) 

The website needs to be designed and upgraded

The business needs to be marketed and advertised

Fabrics, sewing materials and machines need to be purchased to be able to finalise and work on the summer collection for 2012

 

What you get!

 

In addition to our undying gratitude and appreciation you will recieve some pretty good perks, some include custom designed handmade products from BM.

 

As well as that you can choose the colour of your fabric, outfit, gift from a selection of available colours.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Nothing works better than word of mouth! Tell us about other projects you would like to support and we will mention their projects on our page! Spread the word! Everyone deserves to own some Omani luxury :)
